Reviews.Author: William J. Gecawich
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire hdx 8.9 is a great tablet.Pros- Screen is awesome.  Everything looks awesome.- Immersion reading- weight is very light- kindle case. I have the non-leather origami version. It is great how you can view in portrait and landscape. Very sturdy.- Speed of the machine. I experience no lags.- MayDay has been very helpful- text to speech is actually usable now.- Amazon and Audible content is great- much more like a tablet to compete with apple and google/samsungCons- app selection getting better but not there yet- kindle app does not have page animation- magazines do not take up full screen

Reviews.Title: The battery life ain't great
Reviews.Author: Brad Millman
Reviews.Content: I thought I would use this because I was doing a lot of reading (of web stuff) on my phone (an android). It turns out I mostly use this to listen to music or stuff broadcast on the web. It is okay for that. Making play lists of my music is a pain in the ass on the kindle. I like making play lists much more on i-tunes (I have an ipod for listening to must) on a real computer with a mouse.The batteries seem weird. Sometimes I keeps a good charge and some times it doesn't I basically do the same thing most days and sit in the same place (relative to the WiFi Access Point). I don't know why the batteries seem to last one day and don't the next day. I would consider getting an IPad the next time, given how this has worked out, even if it is more money.

Reviews.Title: Wife is an Incessant Reader - Loves Her Kindle HDX!
Reviews.Author: A. D. Leak
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is my wife's third Kindle. She reads incessantly and likes to play an occasional game of Solitaire as she relaxes in the evening. She has been sold on Kindles since they came out years ago. Finally, after she wore the charging port out on her older Kindle, I talked her into getting this newer, bigger Kindle. We have it connected through our Verison account and are members of Amazon Prime, so she can connect to Amazon to download new books anywhere she can get cell phone service. I am a bit of a computer geek, so I maxed out its features. She loves the clarity of the screen and its readability in all levels of light! The battery on this model lasts much longer than the older Kindles and it is very thin - small enough to still fit in her purse. We haven't used it for Prime movies yet, but it is fully capable of doing so. She loves her Kindle HDX 8.9 and that makes me happy too! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the tablet.
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and I thought I loved my first two, but nothing compared to this one. I have only had 1 issue so far. I was not able to port my contacts for email because of my email provider. Took me a week and probably 7 different Amazon representatives, but once I found someone with a TON of knowledge on the HDX he was able to walk me through 2 different ways to solve the issue. I absolutely love that I have instant access to a live person for help with the touch of a button and yes, a representative answered in less than a minute! It's very thin and light. Probably close to half the weight of my previous Kindle.I planned on asking for this for my birthday which is coming up in a couple months, but when Amazon offered me a payment plan with no interest, how could I possibly pass that up? If you are looking for a low-cost tablet with awesome customer support and rivals the other top tablets, this is for you! The last thing I would like to address would be the lack of affordable and lightweight covers for this on Amazon. I found a very low cost and lightweight cover elsewhere. Just took a few minutes on the internet to find several to choose from.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Hal Hall
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX with 4G...It works great.  In fact, my daughter has an iPad Air that I have played around on quite a bit...the picture quality is much better...even though there aren't as many apps...I've got all the apps I can ever use.  So if you are trying to decide between the iPad and Kindle Fire HDX...chose the Kindle.  I love the mayday feature.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, except...
Reviews.Author: Scath
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for House Hunney, who uses a tablet in addition to other equipment for storm chasing. He wanted to upgrade for faster processor and more internal storage.This Kindle Fire is awesome in every aspect except one: It's too proprietary. Yes, it uses an Android system, but Amazon has locked it down.He couldn't sideload many of the apps he uses, and unfortunately, only two of the apps he uses were available in the Amazon app store. The only work around would've been to root the device, and that voids the warranty, so I'm returning it because it can't be used as intended and I have no use for a tablet myself.Still prefer to read on my Kindle 3 instead of a backlit screen, though the Kindle Fire's screen is easier on the eyes than my desktop or laptop monitors are.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Nikolai Greenidge
Reviews.Content: I own a kindle hire hd already and it's best tablet in that price range when i bought it and still is(my opinion). I decided recently to have fire hd installed as my media player in vehicle so i went with the fire hdx 8.9 to replace for personal use(also purchased the hdx 7" for my son) Upon arrival, the screen image was impressive and highly noticeable (sharp and detailed). I see some thought went into the buttons and mini usb port position..much better on the hdx compared to hd. Some nice feature improvements in OS also e.g calender, apps availability at home screen and mayday which i haven't used yet and hopefully never. CPU improvement noticeable also...browses much quicker.Would have love the ability to minimize and switch between apps instead of closing it out especially when reading a book and need to switch to browser for research (hopefully in an update). Would recommend this to any one looking for tablet in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying larger size
Reviews.Author: TexasGal
Reviews.Content: I have a 2nd generation Kindle Fire in a smaller size.  I am truly enjoying this larger size.  When inside, I prefer reading books on this version rather than my 2nd generation Kindle book reader.  If loads up pages quickly when surfing the net. The screen is crystal clear.  Having a great experience with this so far.

Reviews.Title: Super MayDay Service
Reviews.Author: JoAnn C. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I have had my HDX 8.9 for several weeks and had no trouble with it at all. The screen is beautiful and the unit is light and speedy.  Today I had my first occasion to call MayDay for help getting an app installed.  I was delighted with how quickly Daniel came on line to assist me.  He was very personable and professional and took care of getting the correct version of the app downloaded and installed in just a few minutes.  Without his help I might have been stewing over the problem for a long time and possibly firing off bad reviews of the app or the kindle.  I urge fellow kindle purchasers to use this wonderful free service when they are having difficulties rather than getting their "knickers in a twist" and giving negative reviews.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9 - What a great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: MonaVie User
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 7'' HDX for my wife about 3 weeks ago and couldn't leave it alone, so I decided to grab one of these babies when I saw the great payment deal on Amazon.  Also, it works great on TMOBILE.  Just pop out the AT&T; nano sim and pop in the TMOBILE sim and you get 4G LTE, no issues what so ever.The video playback is super quick, works great with Netflix, HuluPlus, my PLEX server and a bunch of other streaming services including Amazon Video and my Amazon Cloud files. I added the Belkin QODE bluetooth keyboard case and it makes a great travelling baby laptop.

Reviews.Title: amazon - you got me good
Reviews.Author: dp77dp77
Reviews.Content: the apps store is so poor that it makes this pad useless to me.  the store does not include many of the apps that you are used to using.  none of the google apps are on the store.  there are knock-off apps all over the place.  don't be fooled and get some unsafe app.  i don't think amazon monitors or regulates their app store.  i believe the amazon app store is the step brother to actual android store.  of the limited official authenticate apps on the amazon store, some of them have poor formatting (fonts and bar and window sizing).  i can assume this is because the publishers don't care about the amazon version of the app and don't bother with fixes.you are better off sticking to a pad that uses itunes or android.

Reviews.Title: Okay, this little hdx is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Michael Tuccillo
Reviews.Content: All the short comings of the Kindle HD are  no longer on this HDX.  Improvements that I didn't even think about are offered in my touch pad.  For example, I was just reading an article on a web site and they have this read button that is offered by the tablet to reformat the web screen for a much improved reading format!  There's just so many little goodies packed into this amazing little tablet.  The big items such as an improved viewing of quality of movies and pictures is so amazing.  The operating system works so seamlessly.  I have bought many different Android phones and tablets over the years and always compared them to my Mac tablet as wannabes.  Not this HDX though.  It is everything and more than my Mac tablet.

Reviews.Title: So much better than my I-pad Air!
Reviews.Author: Crissty H Hopkins
Reviews.Content: The android market wins this time. I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I love the Android Market! No more wasting money on apps that should be free. And the best part is that this unit has two sided cameras. It is very fast and I am very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: An amazing piece for the technologically challenged !
Reviews.Author: JAMES HOYLE
Reviews.Content: After much research and review, I chose this tablet as a Christmas gift for my wife.  It is comparable to the Apple i Pad Air, but a whopping 35% less expensive, saving you a lot of money.  Forget that the Kindle is Amazon-centric (the i Pad is Apple-centric anyway), this device has a beautifully crisp and bright display as well as exceptional speed.  But most importantly, it has the 'Mayday' button which has prevented much anxiety between my wife and I over tutoring of the tablet.  I don't own a Kindle myself, so when my wife asks for help, I am usually at a loss for the answer because I have no Kindle experience.  Enter the relationship saving (just kidding) 'Mayday' button.  If I am unable to help answer a question, 'Mayday' is initiated and I stay close by to help explain the question/need/issue.  The wait for assistance has always been very short.  The 'Mayday' folks have been amazing with their product and accessory knowledge, as well as their patience and guidance.  The fact that the 'Mayday' people are able to see the user's screen and circle items that the user is seeing on-screen and may need to access or be aware of during the tutoring ('Mayday')session is an amazing boon for those who are non-verbal learners.  I would recommend this device to anyone who is unfamiliar with technology, doesn't own a cell phone and is still using an alpha-numeric pager,any non-linear thinker, anyone who is dyslexic or unable to grasp 'state of the art' gadgets.  It certainly makes technology much more accessible and usable for those people.  Thanks Amazon - great work !

Reviews.Title: Great tool, more than I expected.
Reviews.Author: madeleine g dickie
Reviews.Content: Works great right out of the box.  More than I expected, no issues with email or internet.  Quick charge.  Only con so far is they have removed the mini-hdmi slot.  I used this to connect to my TV to watch downloaded movies.

Reviews.Title: Great HW experience, poor web browser experience
Reviews.Author: why2jjj "why2jjj"
Reviews.Content: For as great as the HW is, Amazon.com could have saved some money on the HW and invested in better software, mainly the Silk browser, and greatly improve the overall experience of this product.The silk browser is the worst browser I have ever used.  It's slow, it can screw up page rendering by placing graphics over text, it's inflexible to font size adjustment (a BIG use-case Amazon should know better being a book company), and it can make font blurry upon the end of scrolling a page (and won't sharpen the font unless you tap on the screen a couple times).  I've tested tens of websites using the Kindle HDX 8.9" via the Silk browser vs laptops (Macbook and Win7, a fair comparison because many tablets are replacing laptop purchases) from Facebook to worldbank.org to programming sites to wikipedia to government sites (ex. cdc.gov) to search sites (like Yahoo...this case it doesn't seem to work as well holding the tablet in landscape mode) investment sites (ex. The Motley Fool). They all get screwed up somehow, some-way, even if the screw-up is just crazy-slow page loading (probably partly due to how Silk traffic gets redirected to Amazon servers). This is a big problem for a device like this because a core competency of tablets are web browsing.Thus, I give the product a low ranking and I will most likely return it to Amazon because Amazon does not provide web browser alternatives on their app store (which I don't blame them, but then the company better deliver on an awesome web browser solution, which the company certainly does not).  It pains me to say this, because I really like the potential of this device, I just cannot get around justifying an almost $400 tablet with crummy web browsing that you really have no work-around solution (like try an alternative web browser).If you want to read further, below is a specific example of one site and example issues I run into and then an example on how Silk could be better.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Goto http://www.cprogramming.com/tutorial/computersciencetheory/sortcomp.html (yes, I work in computers).Problem 1- tiny font. Even setting the Kindle OS settings to "big font" will not fix the font. Yes, I can zoom in w/my fingers but then I have to always side swipe and scroll the screen to read the text.  I want Silk to be able to increase the font settings and re-render the page so the font fits within the viewable window.  This is something Chrome, Firefox, and Safari all do well via "hold Ctrl key, then hit + +" key sequence on laptops.Problem 2.- Silk does give you the option of hitting "reading view" button, IF the button it actually appears for that page (does not always happen). For this page it does.  Sometimes the "reading view" button does provide a good reading experience. however, not in this case.  Two problems occur: 1. Scrolling the window and when it stops there is nothing but blurred, almost unreadable font.  Tapping the screen a few times seems to correct it.  2. It makes the main text font SMALLER and cannot be adjusted at all (no zoom and the 'increase font key' only adjusts the title of the page).How I would like Silk to work?  A good start is exactly mimicking the wikipedia.org phone app you can download to the HDX device for every web site Silk encounters (not just wikipedia web pages).  For a phone app, the wikipedia does a pretty good job re-rendering wikipedia pages and sticking graphics in the right place when you increase the font size on the HDX (I set it to 300% font size and it's plenty easy on the eyes).  It will be easy to see the shortcomings of Silk browser by just surfing and clicking wikipedia pages (and comparing it to either the wikipedia app running on the HDX or a web browser on a laptop).

Reviews.Title: Cajun
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Ladousier "Cajun"
Reviews.Content: I am totally pleased with my new HDX Fire, Wi-Fi, 64 GB. This device does all that I want it to do. I have be loyal to the Kindle product structure since its beginning. This is my 4th Kindle and am extremely satisfied with the versatility that is brought to the table with this product. I had been considering the iPad Air until this new HDX Fire 8.9 came out. Now I would not even consider the Apple product. I am a PC user from way-back and will not switch thanks to this android device.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Gizmo
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT.  ENOUGH SAID!!!  Wish I had purchased this besides having purchased Kindle White a few months prior.  This does everything Kindle White does but SO MUCH MORE.  I use my laptop for hardcore work but I find myself using the Kindle Fire for literally EVERYTHING else even filming and broadcasting my YouTubeChannel.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: J.C.A
Reviews.Content: I traded in my last Kindle HD with smaller screen because of battery drainage issues (I think these were unique to my unit since no one else complains of problems) and the desire to update to a forward and rear facing camera/video etc.I had no idea what I was about to receive would be a such a POWERHOUSE.  Apps load and run lightning fast, the power button and volume controls were moved to the rear and greatly enlarged, the speakers were moved to the top and seem to greatly improve the sound. Overall I am very pleased, I went back and forth between the 16 GB vs. 32 GB and I chose the smaller unit.  Maybe the 32GB would be a better choice for someone on the go with a number of movies/music.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had an iPad. I gave it to my daughter. Bought my wife an iPad mini. Returned it. She is now using my Kindle7hd and loves it.Anyway, I tried out the iPad air and it was the same old same old. I was not impressed.Now for this unit. It is the same width screen when in landscape as the iPad air but with a higher resolution. How can 9.7 equal 8.9 you might ask. 4 to 3 vs 16 to 10 screen ratio is why. Now I can surf comfortably. I can read the net without zooming. Portrait reading is more like a book feel at 16:10 compared to 4:3. Format is sweet for movies. This thing is fast. The app store is smallish but has grown a lot and is still growing. 1 mobile market will get me whatever Google play store refuses to.ANDThis is one of the best you can buy right now relative to hardware. And it was 170 less than comparable iPad.I will never buy another iPad.This thing is sweeeeeeeeeeeeeeet.Instantly connected to my WiFi.fast fast fast and Crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Light, fast, powerful.....A turbo charged beast of an e-reader in android clothing
Reviews.Author: G. Murrill
Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear, sharp display,awesome sound and with customer service unmatched in the tablet world. All things considered, it's almost worth being limited to the Amazon universe where apps are concerned. I give it five stars base on how great it handles e-books and videos. But I'd take back half of a star because of all the great android apps that can't be found in Amazons app market. I'm sure that, in time, some of the great android apps I used on my previous tablet will make their way into Amazons app market. But for now, I'm holding back on giving the half star back

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Big Kahuna
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the kindle fire for very long, but I'm impressed with it's performance. The only downside I've seen is not being able to get more apps in the kindle store. They need to get more android apps into the kindle store or open up the kindle more to the outside apps. Hint, get the largest memory you can afford.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful device
Reviews.Author: Hallie girl
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  It's so much better than my Paperwhite or my Kindle Fire.  This is my 3rd one.  The Paperwhite is great if you're only going to read; but again, it only shows the book titles in black & white and it was truly hard to remember which ones I had read as I usually purchase more than one at the time.  With the HDX, the books are shown in bright living color and easy to see what has been read and what hasn't.  What is frustrating is to delete duplicates (free games) from the stream on the homepage.  Will have to work on that.  It takes beautiful pictures and the color is amazing.  Even though I'm basically computer illiterate, I'm able to make this Kindle work pretty good.  So far, so good!  I would highly recommend it over the iPad - I guess I'm not an Apple user although I do use an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: MCBCL10
Reviews.Content: Love it....cant keep the wife off it...every time I go to grab it....she shoos me like she is swatting flies!

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: John and Lauren
Reviews.Content: I'd give this product 5 stars! It is super fast and the color is great. Reading at night while my husband sleeps has never been easier! The screen does not strain my eyes at all. It's very light weight making it easy to read while laying down. The graphics on this device are very nice. The sound quality is pretty impressive compared to our other tablet. We are very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle but do NOT like the Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Wickgeo "wickgeo"
Reviews.Content: I will not review all the features of the Kindle as that has been done very well by others. I do wish there was a charging light on the edge of the Kindle HDX 8.9 like my regular Kindle Fire.  With the cover closed you have to check inside for the battery charge.  Very minor issue.  I really didn't realize that the Special Offers would appear every time you turn on the Kindle.  I find it annoying and unattractive.  Does anybody know how to get rid of them?  I am sure others probably like the feature but I would prefer to just see a screensaver not an ad.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Fergie
Reviews.Content: This is a super-slim, lightweight multi-functional Android-based tablet. The screen resolution and color is dazzling.  Connect to the Internet, play downloaded games or music, read books, or take photographs or video - it does it all.My suggestion - buy an e-book user manual, install the Kindle Reader app for PC to your computer, and then download the manual to your computer (we bought "The Kindle Fire HDX User Guide" by Charles Tulley ($2.99)).  Take the time to read the user manual BEFORE you futz with the device.The Kindle Fire HDX is pretty intuitive..... any tech-savy teenager or twenty-something will figure out the basics in just an hour or so.  But, if you want to save yourself grief, read a user manual and find out how to do things correctly.  That way, you won't end up with a frozen or goobered device,  the result of doing something horribly wrong (like a bad sync with Windows Media Player).Users should also be aware of the re-boot process..... holding down the on/off button for a full 20 seconds;  it will back you out of many (if not most) problems that you'll encounter.Finally, bookmark the Amazon.com "Help" and "Help Forum" sites for Kindle Fire HDX on your computer.  The answer to just about any question, and solution to just about any problem, can be found on those sites.Overall:  Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"......  it's just amazingly excellent.Final Thoughts:  You really need security software on any device that connects to the Internet.  We downloaded the free ESET Mobile Security app from the App Store.  If your Kindle has 3G/4G wireless capability, the ESET software also provides an anti-theft feature.  If your Kindle is only WiFi capable, consider the free Locked and Found (Geek Squad) app to remotely lock and help you recover your device if it is ever lost or stolen.

Reviews.Title: MAJOR TECHNICAL ISSURE-FOR ME ANYWAY
Reviews.Author: CookieCocoChanel "KMH"
Reviews.Content: My second kindle fire has 64GBP. I returned 1st one within the 30 days because of WiFi issues getting booted off constantly. It was not my WiFi. Amazon replaced it w/o a blink. Since this is my 1st kindle, I just love it. It's fast, presice, awesome resolution and takes pretty good pics! I own a Canon T3i so I didn't get this for the pics. I got it for the videos, shopping and,surfing net. I'd rather use this in my living room instead of my heavy Alien laptop. Resolution is beautiful, I love the quality of the overall kindle. The only flaw is the keyboard, I have a hard time typing accuratly. I guess ill get used to it. Besides I didn't buy it for writing a book.So far iove it! Battery is awesome. Since I'm a prime member it holds true to lasting 12 hours, and that's with watching movies, listen to music, surfing the web.If this would be your 1st tablet then get it!! It's awesome and easy to navigate !I will post an update in 2weeks. Oh, download time is fast as hec,  music transfer from pc is super fast! Not sure why people complain about downloading 1 movie at  time. Amazon has a boat load of movies to watch and download! Really? HowHow many movies can you watch at once??Since I fly across the country every month movie time is,awesome and reliable.Soon as I figure out how to add some pictures I took I will add them._________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________NEW UPDATE----CHANGE 5 STARS TO 3 BECASUE OF CUSTOMER SERVICE ISSUES....________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________AFTER RETURING MY 1ST TABLET BECASUE OF CONNECTIVITY ISSUES ON A REGUALR BASIS AMAZON REPLACE IT WITH A NEW ONE-SENT-AN EXHANGE. GREAT RIGHT!! WOOHO, GREAT INVESTMENT..UPDATE:JANURARY 16, 2014-PACIFIC TIME:AROUND 12:20AMI JUST GOT HOME AFTER A 10 HOUR FLIGHT. THIS WAS THE REAL TEST OF THE "NEW" REPLACEMENT. I WAS REGUARLY RENTING-BUYING MOVIES.BEFORE MY TRIP I DOWNLOADED "RUSH" AND A FREE PRIME MOVIE TO MY DEVICE-NOT CLOUD. SINCE I BOUGHT RUSH, IT WILL BE IN MY ON MY DEVICE.A FEW DIFFERENCE'S FROM 1ST-1- SPEED, IT SEEMED TO LAG, NOT AS SHARP FAST AS 1ST AND STILL GOING TO WIFI (NOT AS MUCH AS1ST ONE) SO I FIGURED I'D WAIT A BIT, SEE IF IT WOULD IMPROVE.WELL IT DID, ABOUT 60% BETTER, I WANTED 100%..SO I STUCK IT OUT. I JUST WANT THEM TO FIX IT-I TRAVEL TO MUCH AND I JUST WANT A RELIABLE PRODUCT---WATCHED RUSH AFTER DINNER-ONLY INTO 1 HOUR OR SO, EASTERN TIME, I TOOK A 20 MINUTE BREAK,WATCHED THE REST OF THE MOVIE. GREAT-AFTER THAT, TALKED TO THE GUY NEXT TO ME-BELIEVE ME, YOU WILL ALL GET THIS ONCE I FINISH THIS!!THE WANTED TO WATCH MY DOWNLOADED NO WAY BACK--WELL, I COULD OPEN THE MOVIE-I TRIED REBOOT 5 TIMES, LET IT REST, BUT SINCE I NEVER STARTED THESE MOVIES BUT FOR THE 1st TIME-IT SHOULD OF WENT SMOOTHLY...-FINALY FOR 2 HOURS NEITHER MOVIE WOULD DOWNLOAD!MAKE NOTE THIS WAS MY CONVERSATION TO THE AMAZON KINDLE SPECIALIST THE MINUTE I GOT HOME-QUOTE-THE MOVIE HAS TO RE-LICENSE ITSELF AFTER WATCHING MOVING..HUH? I DIDNT WATCH THE OTHER MOVIE AT ALL, SO THERE WAS NO REASON THE MOVIE SHOULD OF NEEDED THIS--AND THIS REPLY CAME BACK AFTER BEING ON HOLD FOR 1--15 MINUTES..ALL THESE EXCUSES!!!IM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT, I WANT MY $497++ BACK-NOP PER AMAZON-YOU CAN RETURN IT BUT I WONT GET ME MONEY BACKKK"""WHAT""" AMAZON REP ALSO STATED SOME OTHER RENEW LICENSE BULL.....VERY VERY UNAHPPY..I BET ITS IN THE MANNUAL NOW----OR SEND ME ANOTHER DARN ONE--IM TO0 TIRED NOW BUT I HAVE TO GET THIS OUT THERE.IF ANYONE IS EXPERIENCING ANY ISSUES PLEASE CALL AND TELL THEM!!!! IT DOES NO GOOD IF THEY ARE NOT WORKING PROBABLY AND THEY NEED TO KNOW..I HOPE THIS DOESNT HAPPEN TO ANYONE ELSE...STINKS.....ANY QUESTIONS I WILL REPLY, UPDATE TOMORROW..VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED AMAZON.I SPEND A LOT OF MONEY AND A PRIME MEMBER!!ONE MORE THING-WHAT'S REALLY THE DIFFERENCE IF THE SERVER IS ON PACIFIC, EAST, ICELAND, RUSSIA  ETC TIME?...JUST FELT LIKE I GOT THE BRUSH OFF... TIME--WHAT, PEOPLE WONT BUY THEM ON THE EAST COAST, OTHER COUNTRIES--______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________LAST UPDATE--I JUST GOT AN EMAIL THEY WILL REFUND..ALL I WANT OS FOR IT TO WORK GREAT!! MOVIES, EMAIL, WIFI ...SHOP--ON AMAZON....  :-(

Reviews.Title: very impressed
Reviews.Author: Hamlet423
Reviews.Content: As a major user of amazon services I wanted to try this for myself.  Here are some thoughts1) The screen--its pretty amazing.  Bright and clear with great colors, and its very high resolution.  I believe its a low temperature silicon on LCD screen like the nexus 7.  Its really good. It makes the solid ips screen of the LG  G 8.3 tablet look tame by comparison.The source material is important--but streaming episodes of sherlock or the movie D13- Ultimatum looks amazing. Lower res stuff on netflix not so much, but if its quality video, you will not be sorry.  I could see the pores on Martin Freeman's face!  Just imagine if Edward James Olmos was on Sherlock!2) The sound--the speakers are good and louder than most tablets--surely way louder than the lg 8.3 tablet or the nexus 7. But they could be louder.  Why are they on the BACK of the device and not the front?3)  Construction-high quality--for plastic is impressive and yes, shockingly light.  I am a bit confounded by the button placement, which forces it to be in landscape orientation more than portrait, but its not a deal breaker.  Fortunately its so light it makes for different orientations still pretty easy--and way better in this regard than the samsung galaxy note 10.1 2014 edition (and its much lighter)The snapdragon 800 processor in this is a beast and is very impressively fast and responsive.  Plenty of horsepower here for most everything you can throw at it.4) The software--this is really for Amazon consumption of media--be it audio, songs, or video.  Its not really an android tablet although android powers it--no access to google play store.  For productivity....I think you will have some issues.Given limitations in video downloads from the amazon store and the size of the amazon app store vs the google play store, I'm not sure if you need a 64 gig tablet--this one seems to be best as a home media streaming device, not a road warrior, but I will revise the longer I have it.Aside from a few minor quirks (button, speakers) its a winner. Just keep in mind--it does not have access to the google play store so it is NOT really an android tablet--it has a different function.I guess you can try to hack the tablet but it will void warranty and its easy to ruin it in a lockup or "brick" the device and then you are out of luck.  Don't do that.  Just get a nexus 7 if you must.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX leaves IPad in the dust!
Reviews.Author: Yvette M Hannah
Reviews.Content: Best tablet ever! Never owned a tablet before and didn't think I would like one. Most of my friends have IPads and I don't like them. But the Kindle Fire HDX ROCKS! Easy to use. Haven't used my laptop in a month.

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: Richard Walston
Reviews.Content: Perfect in every way screen resolution weight and the only drawback is charge time but I think something is wrong with mine. Otherwise awesome!

Reviews.Title: More than I thought
Reviews.Author: Joyce S. Reppenhagen
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX today and it is just more than I thought it would be, so lite and thin and the pictures are so bright, I am so happy with it and have been having fun using today.

Reviews.Title: Mind blowing speed, weight, image quality
Reviews.Author: Brigitte Pauli
Reviews.Content: This my third kindle fire. Love the upgrades, especially the light weight, which will allow me to take this device wherever I go. Pleasure to use. I really like that it now has front as well as rear facing cameras... Great for reading, watching movies, staying in touch over Facebook and shopping. It will be my constant companion. If you haven't trusted kindle in the past because it was so much cheaper than other products - try this one. You will be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Stability and beauty in a light-weight, super-thin package.
Reviews.Author: Paul B Dillon
Reviews.Content: I consider myself to be fairly tech savvy, and I took a gamble ordering my new Kindle Fire HDX. I used to be a Microsoft loyalist, then began using Android devices, and most recently I've been using a Samsung phone. The rest of my family all uses Apple devices, so I'm familiar with the most of the major platforms.I've always liked to tinker with my new devices, and I rooted and loaded new roms to my previous Google tablet. I was hesitant to move away from platforms that allow the user more controls, but I'm glad I did. Besides the beautiful screen, the surprising thinness, and light weight of the Kindle, this tablet has one aspect I truly appreciate: STABILITY. The OS runs exactly how you want it (smoothly), and I haven't experienced any crashing with popular apps.Linked well with my Bose Bluetooth headphones, and transferring music was a breeze. If you can live without an SD card slot, personalized menus and lock/home screen wallpaper, I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle FireHDX
Reviews.Author: Doreen Aube
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  I can do so much more with it than my Kindle Fire , which I keep mainly for reading , The screen on the HDX is brilliant and the sound is much better but my main reason for buying it is so I can Skype when I travel to stay in touch with my family and I love the May day help

Reviews.Title: I am in love with my HDX
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: I have three Kindles I like them all, but I am in love with the HDX. It is everything that was advertised. Light weight, great color quick responce, easy to use right out of the box. The apps and web browser work great. I can not say enough good things about the HDX.It has no downside from my view point. I would and do highly recommend the HDX to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A Must have!
Reviews.Author: Daniela Iniguez "chyna4"
Reviews.Content: Such a great tablet/ereader/whatever you want it to be, don't wanna let go of it electronic!  I had the regular fire, and thought that there would not be much difference in the two, but a friend got one, and now I see why!! The upgrades on the performance (nothing wrong with the other fire at all, but this is like driving a mazarati vs a lexus.  Yep. It's awesome, and with the special financing promotion, I could not say no.  Totally Cool!! Keep it up AMAZON!! You guys rock!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: na
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this product. When it arrives my account and everything was already set up for me. I was surprised. I love being able to web surf, wrote documents, watch movies and play games all in one. I would recommend this product to everyone who doesn't need a fancy laptop or a high prices tablet. This has Microsoft applications, high resolution movies and TV. Great for book readers. This product works really well especially of you ha e amazon prime so then you can watch and read books for free. I do wish you could add your own personality with colors and background s

Reviews.Title: The Tablet to buy
Reviews.Author: srinivasan ramanan
Reviews.Content: The perfect tablet with the power of Amazon. Needed to work on some issues like e-mail and flash player otherwise this is as good as it gets. I also think that with upgrades to the OS coming this should get better and better.ThanksSrini

Reviews.Title: Tht HDX is the  ery dinktium!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Saunders "Papa Smurf"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with it's performance. IT IS MY COMPUTER ON THE GO. Plus my entertainment at home and away. The panic button is the greatest thing since.certainly sliced bread. It and my hotspot GO wherever I go.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Michelle Wynn "Church Girl"
Reviews.Content: Like it even better than the last kindle fire hd. The picture is better, the audio is better and a few more features. I HATE the case - they should have stuck with the last one - it's design was simple and easy to use. Love my kindle - hoping to find a better case.

Reviews.Title: TOP of the Line Tablet
Reviews.Author: John N. Schëar "cxxi121"
Reviews.Content: December 13, 2013 Update:In conclusion, this is the finest tablet I have ever had or used.  It is faster than any of the others.  It has a display unmatched by others.  The resolution is so good that I do not have to put my cheating glasses on to read the screen.  If the screen output is too small a little expanded pinch enlarges it.  All together usage boils down to needs.  While 16GB is fine now, I can see where it would not take too long to need 32GB and while I do not now have a need to use the Kindle for a phone it could very well be handy at some later date.  The cameras are far better than several dedicated point and shoot cameras I use although it is not quite as good as the Coolpix 820 but that's an unfair comparison.  The Kindle's internet is so much faster than my desktop and laptop computers are.  In short it is a growing element on each of us here and we thoroughly enjoy using it and its applications with a positive outlook for tomorrow's adventures.Original comments:I have had this Kindle for only a few days and I have found it to be better than I imagined.  It is fast.  It has beautiful resolution and it is so good that I do not have to wear glasses to read the written words or graphics.  It is light and easy to hold.  Battery life is better than many of similar size.  The front and back cameras do a surer job and with its High Definition output I was astonished at the quality of the pictures.Right now I am simply getting to know the Kindle and it is a pleasure to keep its company.  It pairs quickly with Bluetooth and connects faster.  WiFi works well and has not kicked me off yet.  So far I have used about 36% of the 16Gb memory and could easily exceed that unless I pay closer attention.I readily admit to being a dummy now; however, with continued examination and exploration I can see no reason to change my initial rating other than to find more of the internal goodies.  Amazon and its partners did its customers a fine service and presented to them the top tablet.  There may be other tablets that rate higher by one service or another but each that exceeds the Kindle Fire HDX cost a whole lot more and does not have flexibility.In a few days I will update this to include any additional observations and thoughts.

Reviews.Title: So far so great..
Reviews.Author: kevo
Reviews.Content: I'm currently test driving the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" via Amazon's 30-day free trial.  Well, I'm definitely buying this because it has already exceeded expectations.  Set up was a breeze and I haven't had any issues web surfing and viewing media. The only problem so far has been how disruptive this technological masterpiece can be on time management - completely lost track of time while catching up on Season 3 of Downton Abbey in one day. Yep, Amazon Prime rocks!  This is an excellent product for the price!

Reviews.Title: Surprised by a lot it can do, disappointed a little.
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: I like the new HDX 8.9, very light weight, clear and bright screen, good on battery, great ecosystem.  Coming from a ipad 2 gen, and nexus 7 i do miss little things like folders, widgets, multi tasking.  For what it does it delivers.  If your a amazon customer or Prime memeber and have the money to keep spending on music, books, videos in the amazon market place then this is something you would like.  I am disappointed about the app selection.  It pales to the like of Android and Apple, I hope more developers will start to build apps for these tabs but we will see.

Reviews.Title: Excellent video quality
Reviews.Author: USer
Reviews.Content: Excellent video quality and great to have on a plane with videos downloaded onto the device. There was a problem with getting the videos downloaded initially because it kept telling me that I had topped off my permitted 25 videos. The problem took 2 days to resolve. I think 2 days to resolve a problem is too long.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied With Purchase
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: Pretty great device, especially if you plan on reading or viewing movies for long periods of time. The screen resolution is outstanding, and the light weight of this tablet makes it a pleasure to hold for hours. The software interface is very quick, and I really do not miss the Google apps too much, although it would make the tablet much more functional if you could load them natively (I am aware that some of the Google apps can be sideloaded, but not all of them work appropriately). Many apps that people complain are not available through the Amazon store such as Firefox can easily be obtained by downloading the apk file directly from their website.I do wish there were more Prime movies and shows available for offline viewing, but hopefully the selection will expand soon. I also wish that the speakers were louder. I tried out a 7-inch HDX and the speakers were obviously louder, but that blue haze around the screen borders drove me crazy.

Reviews.Title: One of the best choices in the market
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Excelent screen, thinner and lighter than others. It is a pleasure to take it anywhere. It is a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Amazon hit a home run with the Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Jo"
Reviews.Content: WOW!!!  Love, Love my new 8.9, WiFi, 32GB, HDX.  I have never owned any type of tablet or ereader but with the help of 2 free guides downloaded to my PC, I had  WiFi turned on, my email & facebook set up, and  downloaded 8 books from my PC wish list within 1 hour.  I used it for reading for approx. 6 hours and 75% of battery life remains.  I used the black background w/ white text and liked that screen view.  No glitches during set up or reading. Thanks to Amazon for an amazing product.

Reviews.Title: An awesome upgrade from the previous one!
Reviews.Author: G. Alanis
Reviews.Content: Looks and works great. The new screen is sharp with great color. I bought the 64 GB version without advertising and I couldnt be more happier with it. The amazon market place works great, although more apps need to be brought on. You still have your essential apps that most people would like. I do think they should make a device that will be able to use Second Screen instead of needing a 2013 Samsung TV or a PS3. They do have devices that work with MirrorCast but I would like the features that come with Second Screen since they did not include a mini HDMI port this time around. Still an awesome device for the price that you pay for. The origami cover is also really great to have.

Reviews.Title: An Outstanding Upgrade From the Fire HD
Reviews.Author: DonD "Retired IT Systems Specialist"
Reviews.Content: An outstanding upgrade from the Kindle Fire HD. Everything is faster and more polished. It is markedly thin and light (if you don't put the Origami case on it). My only complaint is that the email program will not delete email from Comcast's mail server. Hopefully, this will be fixed in Ver. 3.1. My work-around is to use Enhanced Email.!! Update - 11-23-13 !! Ver. 3.1 released, and it fixed the Comcast mail server deletion issue. Be sure to delete any existing email accounts and re-enter the info. Go into Advanced Setup after you type your email address and be sure to set the delete parameter after Inbox deletion.

Reviews.Title: Amaz(on)ing set-up experience, awesome power
Reviews.Author: ThierryE
Reviews.Content: The user experience for the set-up of the device was intuitive and seamless.I own a lot of Amazon provided content; books, video, audio, and it all sync'd to the device pretty much instantly, turning the tablet into a content rich environment which is a joy to explore and experience.Like other reviewers, I cannot believe how light the device is, considering how powerful it is.The screen is beautiful, watching HD movies is spectacular.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle!
Reviews.Author: Sophie
Reviews.Content: Have finally upgraded from the original and love the new one even more.  I love all the added upgrades and using amazon prime.

Reviews.Title: First Look and Mayday Button
Reviews.Author: Adam Rakhamim

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_mo13ID6I9GIYHI9/178-7009677-8629921?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo13ID6I9GIYHI9currentClick) { return cv_mo13ID6I9GIYHI9currentClick(); } } } Length:: 9:26 MinsThis is my first kindle fire, and I am still getting used to a lot of the features, but so far I am very impressed with the display and the Mayday button.(One thing that I am not happy about is the limited about of productivity apps, but I'm sure as time goes on, the amount of compatible apps will increase.)

Reviews.Title: Google Play!!!
Reviews.Author: QuietBillG "William E Gilbert"
Reviews.Content: I would give this a 5 star rating if it had the Google Play store!  This BULL S*** competition between Amazon and Google is only hurting Amazon's customers!!Amazon does not sell it's own phone, so most of us have Android phones (crapples are not real phones!) so we buy apps from the Google Play Store. If we want to use the same app on a Kindle Fire we have to buy it again and that is only if it is available in the Amazon App store (and MOST are NOT)!!And I am NOT going to root this. It should function correctly right out of the box.I will NOT be buying another Amazon product until they fix this issue!! The Fire TV is a waste of money until this is resolved!I will keep the Amazon Prime because I can use it on my Roku, Tivo, xBox 360, xBox One, PS3, PS4, Vizo TV, and my laptops (and it is a good deal).QUIT HURTING YOUR CUSTOMERS!!!!Edit: I want to clarify my opinion here - I love the hardware in this tablet, it is an outstanding tablet for the Amazon infrastructure. It is just not very useful for anything else.

Reviews.Title: Office Suites not really installed
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: First of all I love my new Kindle Fire HDX for overall content delivery. However I must point out what I believe to be false advertising in regards to Office Suite. What you get by default is just an Office document viewer. You do not get the Office Suite application which cost additional money.Even the Mayday rep thought the real Office Suites was supposed to be installed. I'm very disappointed in Amazon for implying that the real Office Suite was installed.

Reviews.Title: Prefer it over the IPAD
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle HDX 8.9 through Best Buy with my reward points and I must say I really enjoy it. I am a current Kindle HD owner, but my child confiscated it from me so I used this as an excuse to upgrade. First thing I notice is the HDX is thin and very light. The sound is incredible, the screen is very nice and the processing is smooth. I haven't had any issues with the device, but it is an electronic so I am sure it will freeze up or get hung up somewhere down the line. I have owned an IPAD before and after using the HDX I truly believe I over-payed on the IPAD. I am a true believer in the KIndle after owning one previously. It does everything I want it to for a much lower price (Even though I got it for free). I did have enough points for an IPAD but I still chose the HDX. The sound is so much better than the IPAD, the picture, in my opinion is better,  The only thing I don't like is that Amazon does not have a NOOK app. I wanted to retrieve my NOOK books, but I suppose it is good business not to promote a competitor. I would recommend the HDX or the regular HD to people.

Reviews.Title: does so  many things but does not print from browser
Reviews.Author: Corbaley
Reviews.Content: I was so impressed to read all the many things this does, but, according to Mayday, the BROWSER IS NOT COMPATIBLE TO PRINT. This means you can't print anything from anywhere on the internet. My Mayday rep informed me of a "work around" and I tried it but I was not able to print the full page I was trying to, the quality was poor, and it only works on a single page. This is a HUGE oversight to me, to not even have this be mentioned in all the advertising, and it might well be a deal breaker.Yes, it will print from email and original documents but this is not adequate for me in a tablet that is advertised to be able to stand alone.. Even my little, old iPod touch is able to print directly from the internet to my wireless printer with ease. I just spent a lot of money to get something that doesn't provide a major function I need. Have to think on whether it goes back as maybe the next model will provide this basic function. Shame on you, Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: WIFI huh??????
Reviews.Author: Michael Regener
Reviews.Content: Amazon. How can you sell a product that's this poor. The WIFI on this device, was it even tested?? Product consistently drops its WIFI connection with no cause and seemingly no fix from Amazon support. At least issue a statement and tell us your working on a fix!Yes the product has great features. BUT WHAT GOOD ARE THEY IF YOU CANT CONNECT OR YOU KEEP GETTING DISCONNECTED FROM YOUR INTERNET. I DOUBT IPAD HAS THIS ISSUE. GET REAL GUYS AND TEST THIS STUFF BEFORE YOU START MASS PRODUCING AND SELLING THESE PRODUCTS!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kellett A. Goodwin
Reviews.Content: I think that this product (Kindle HDX 8.9 in) is the greatest thing that I've ever seen and I'm sure that I won't be without the latest version again. :) Tony Goodwin

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64gb Love It
Reviews.Author: michellevmcfall "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: I chose the 5 star because since it was delivered I have had no problems with playing with it what is really great is that it's a sleeker smaller package what ever the games apps or books you got it came up on the cloud all I had to was touch it was downloaded the Camera works really great the front facing and the rear facing both it does what was promised.  Thank You Amazon

Reviews.Title: Fast High Tech Tablet - 1st Quality on the market !
Reviews.Author: Casey Reed
Reviews.Content: REALLY NICE !  Wow !  Not enough good things to say about the hardware. The confusion with any new platform has been well thought out by Amazon's tech team and owner who designed this tablet. Help is "MayDay" and live 24-7 Damn!What you can't find out that you need like subtitles on your movies (mpg4 - h264 ) files, is not a problem with VLC pro app to allow you to select available subtitles, and this app even goes on the internet to look for alternative subtitle files.Interfaces easily with PC and updates using WIFI quickly.Forget waiting when you turn it on: BANG !  It is on !  Quick as that it is on and you unlock the screen and there is the desktop or home with app icons ready to go on the internet, watch movies, listen to music, or see photos. Just a real high tech email checker for people who do not want to carry a laptop to stay in touch and be entertained.2.2Ghz Quadcore CPU makes this very high definition screen work beautifully !  Get enough memory now because there is NO card slot and you can NOT upgrade your memory later.Highly recommend as a PC builder and user.

Reviews.Title: Mayday Mayday Mayday!!!
Reviews.Author: CSS
Reviews.Content: Got mine Saturday! Estimated date was Monday, but it came early. I like under promise and over deliver! I had the 8.9 fire HD. I loved it. I did not like the button placement on the Fire HD. So that was my main reason to get the HDX. But man was i wrong! There's a whole world of better reasons to upgrade from the HD!Get the Origami case! When you slide the HDX up, which is seamless, the camera comes on automatically. The new OS incorporated every suggestion I submitted and many I never even though of. All of which have been positives for me.In a world of ever increasing pour costumer service and even worse product releases this product sets the standard. I mean to say that nothing less than this should ever be acceptable. Mayday Mayday Mayday!!! A product that works with great customer service being Sold Here!

Reviews.Title: It is what it is...might even say perfect.
Reviews.Author: J. Peter Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the Fire HDX 8.9 16gb from Staples last night for $329 - WHAT A DEAL!  I love this tablet and upgraded to if from a Kindle Keyboard e-reader.  I thought long and hard about how I would use a tablet and have very few issues with going into Amazon's "walled garden".  The only reason for 4 stars is the lack of Google Drive (Google Docs).  If I can sideload this and it works, I will change to 5 stars.  I don't care about the other Google Apps because the Kindle offers good alternatives for e-mail and calendar.  I also do not use Google Books or Music.  I purchased the 16gb model because I get all of my video entertainment from Netflix via streaming.  I am heavy into Kindle Books and keep most of my books in the cloud (keeping about 50 on the device at one time).  I downloaded FBReader for ePub books and may sideload Nook Reader because my wife is a Nook HD+ owner and may need access to her Nook library.  I do know about Calibre e-book management software but complicated books such as 3000 page bibles with thousands of internal links do NOT convert well from ePub to Kindle.The hardware is OUTSTANDING, the price at $50 off was OUTSTANDING and the "Walled Garden" is more of a nuisance and not a deal breaker at all.  With the HDX being so popular, ANY of my "nuisances" with be overcome from the EXTREMELY large HDX user community.The Kindle HDX is what the Kindle HDX is - it's perfect.  It's not Android, it's not Apple BUT, I can make it do EVERYTHING I need it to do while looking better then ALL the other tablets and at a lower cost.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Bowman
Reviews.Content: Received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, 32 GB today, and am totally pleased with the improvements I see so far from the older version of the 8.9.The first thing I noticed was how much lighter it seemed.  The picture quality is crisper and the sound is very impressive.I sold my older version of the 8.9 and have been using the 7" KF HD, but having the extra 1.9" is awesome. I use my Kindle everyday for shopping, e-reading, watching movies and  playing games and I know this new version will give me more enjoyment especially with the rear facing camera.Amazon has listened to customers of previous versions of the Kindle Fire and have given us a tablet that will be hard to beat.  Enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Richard Spafford
Reviews.Content: I have only used the HDX for a few hours, but I've had every iteration of Kindle machines except the DX, and I think this is a stunningly good tablet. The weight of this tablet, as compared to the new iPad Air, for instance, is incredible. When you compare the two tablet's weight versus their volume, the HDX would be equal in weight to the one pound Air if it weighed 15.5 ounces. But it doesn't; it only weighs 13.1 oz!Thinness? The iPad air only has a two one hundredths of a millimeter advantage.The screen is just flat out brilliant. Watching movies and playing app games on this tablet is superior to everything else I own.The last thing I would add about the specs is that the more I use it, the better I like the size. I have a 10" Nexus 10, a 9.7" iPad, an 8.0" Samsung Note, and a few 7" tablets. For the combination of size, weight, and useful portability, I like the 8.9" of the HDX best.BUT, the most important thing about this new Kindle tablet is the increased usability. It just flies through everything and all the moves I want to make are much simpler, more intuitive than the 8.9 HD. My various Samsung devices have massive tricks and features, and the iPad on the new iOS is interesting, but neither works as easily as the new HDX. The only device that compares favorably to this in usability is the pure Android experience on the new Nexus 7... but it came with touch screen weirdness.Finally on the "pro" side, my 64 GB cost $20 less than the iPad Air's 16 GB tablet, and their 64 GB cost is $220 higher.Cons? In general, while greatly improved, the browsing experience cannot compare to Google.This is a first look. As I go, I'll add.

Reviews.Title: Transparency and Honesty from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I have had many issues with the HDX and WiFi since December. During a technical support call, their rep said that "The HDX has been experiencing issues with connecting to WiFi in high-traffic environments."  Amazing Amazon, exactly what has been happening.  They sent me another unit to test.  Same issue.  When I pressed them to fix the issue (because I do not want to send it back), they said they were a "customer centric company".  I asked if they had looked at their own webpage and the 40+ pages of customer comments on the WiFi issue, the customer service rep would not validate.  But yet she said that they are a company that focused on reading and listening to their customers' comments and feedback.  Contradictory.  When I asked for an response, she said she would investigate and respond.  Here is their response ..."I'm sorry, Amazon.com does not comment about rumors or speculative news reports. We haven't announced any plans to update the wireless capabilities on the kindle devices as there is not a known issue at this time. Furthermore, we cannot speculate or disclose information about what another customer may be facing. If you continue to experience wireless issues in high traffic areas, please contact our kindle specialists at 1-877-453-4512. I'm sorry I can't provide any additional information. We hope to see you  again soon. "Sounds like someone from public relations or legal crafted this.  Always been a big fan of Amazon. Loved the Kindle. Want to keep it. Ordered many things from Amazon. But can't use it outside of my home (not in a 'high traffic environment').Now? Returning both kindles. Prime membership ending. No more orders to Amazon.Note to Amazon, if you wish to "Build Earth's Most Customer-Centric Company" ... then maybe your words have to connect to actions.  Transparency.

Reviews.Title: Very unhappy!
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: The Pros of this proucts were the size, weight, and feel. The 8.9" was PERFECT for me. Not too big, but bigger than the "mini" tablets. The weight was super light and easy to hold, and the feel of it was great. The back was sort of rubberized which was nice. The display was beautiful and the sound.The Cons however, were too much to get over to consider keeping it. The product does not allow for much customization as far as wallpaper, screen saver, icons, etc. I couldn't put things where I wanted them. I also was not happy with the operating system itself. It was almost too user friendly. The system ran quickly, but just not "up to par" with other current systems out there. I have a Samsung Galxy S4 phone, and couldn't stop comparing the two. My biggest complaint though, is that is does not allow many of the most popular "normal" apps available. I was aware before purchasing that they did not have the vast amount of apps as on Google Play or the Apple store. However, I couldn't believe that I couldn't even download Dropbox! One of the main reasons for getting a tablet was for me to put work files on it when I travel. I was going to use Dropbox for this. I couldn't do it! They also have blocked most Google branded apps. So it did not sync well with my Google accounts. They had a gmail app, but it wasn't up to date with the newest style so things would look different from my phone to my tablet.Overall, just very frustrated with the Operating system setup, look, and the lack of apps. Also annoying that you have to pay extra to REMOVE the ads! I had to return it. I ended up buying the brand new Samsung Tab Pro and LOVE it. The size is a tad smaller and weighs a BIT more, but It is much more "modern" and works so much better! The Tab Pro was also cheaper and allows me to add a memory card if I ever need it!

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: spuds366
Reviews.Content: My husband has his I-pad and I would put my Kindle against it any day! He has been put through the rigor after calling customer service and was amazed at the mayday option on my HDX. To bad so sad for him, it's mine all mine and he knows to keep his I-pad and stop hating LOL

Reviews.Title: Finally freed from the iPad
Reviews.Author: Stephen Aniston
Reviews.Content: I love the scroll wheel, tabs and buttons combination on the UI. The scroll wheel and the tabs on top are what I use the most to buy new content or watch or read what I have recently started. Saves me a lot of time and is very intuitive. Finally, I have been freed from the delirium of icons on the Apple iOS. The screen is brilliant, fantastic colors and it does not give me a headache like the iPad. The responsiveness of most functions is lightning quick speaking to the quality of the microprocessor and graphics card. It is extremely thin and light as well. I like the plastic back as well as putting this a tablet on a table doesn't have to enduce scratchy sounds. The ability to combine Amazon Instant Video and Prime Video in one unified library so I can rent or watch movies is priceless and is the reason I have wanted this device for so long. Book buying is obviously the Amazon bread and butter and it's done well. Buying magazines is also a very nice and an easy experience.  There are two downsides so far is that 3rd party apps and games are not up to par with Apple, but that is not really that important for me.  Also the Silk browser can definitely be improved. I had a much better web browsing experience on the iPad Safari. Somehow I was always thrown on the mobile pages and I should have the option to browse in regular mode.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, but special offers can drain the battery
Reviews.Author: DaMaDo "DaMaDo"
Reviews.Content: There's tons of detailed reviews so I'll just add that the special offers consumes 30% battery per hour on mine. It ran out faster than my smartphone. I'd consider that $20 upgrade.Other than that it's an amazing tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Device.
Reviews.Author: check "test"
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 has good hardware and has an excellent software system. The picture quality on the HDX is stunning. It is noticeably better than the HD, there is no comparison between the two of them.

Reviews.Title: PRIME Member returned after 2 weeks & My "Mayday" experience
Reviews.Author: MountainMan "David"
Reviews.Content: The Good1 - Built-in Dictation. This feature works pretty damn good. See:dmediamomDotCom/2013/12/11/are-you-using-the-kindle-fire-hdx-dictation-feature/2 - Screen, duh! It *is* nice and everybody has talked about it.3 - Keyboard, especially "long-press" for numbers and special characters.4 - There is a scrollable word correction display as you type that would be annoying on an android phone but work well here.5 - Battery charges to 100% overnight and I have never gone below 50% with the exact same usage I gave my laptop every day. But I do not remain tethered to it like some people that I know. As for playing games, although I had about a dozen on the HDX I did not find one addictive enough to play for more than just a little while.The Bad (FYI, submitted to Amazon's returns-feedback email address.)1- Documents I copied over according to directions that the HDX provided after clicking on the "Docs" menu were not showing up in the docs section. I copied them over in individual year-dated subdirectories that the HDX does not recognize. It appears that, although folders (sub-directories) can be copied from laptops to Documents through Android File Manager (AFM) and are visible on the kindle through AFM, the Kindle software through the DOCS menu cannot see sub-directories (folders). I have several years of files on my laptop that reside in their respective years' folders. It appears the only option I have is to copy every year into the single Documents folder on the Kindle. This is unacceptable as it would make sorting (without renaming each and every file) impossible because most of the files have the same name. Sub-directories and sub-folders have been included since computers' existence. Leaving such a basic capability out (it is not even a "feature" but a common sense capability of all computing) makes the Kindle Fire HDX "Documents" menu item useless. This screams for a software update. Fortunately, I could see the document subdirectories in ES file explorer and in Kingsoft Office.2 - I also tried using the email documents option. The only problem with that is you cannot edit documents once they get to Kindle because double-clicking on the document pops it into Kindle like it was a non-editable book.3 - I could not watch live internet television due to I get the "need to update flash player." Sideloading Adobe Flash works but audio/visual is out of sync. I tried with both Firefox and Dolphin. Forums here and on XDA were no help. "Mayday" rep said "they are working on it and I will submit a ticket." Like that would help with a known issue.4 - Attempted to watch CBS's new series Intelligence." When prompted, I allowed Amazon's BETA streaming player to load but the video/audio sync is still off. Audio is before video. To confirm it was not my router, I put the Kindle HDX next to my laptop and started both of them at the same time. My laptop was perfectly sync'ed. [Note I was only offered to use this BETA software when watching CBS, not CNN or other networks streaming through the internet.]5 - The most disturbing thing to me is that after using Amazon's BETA streaming player for 30 minutes it started playing commercials! It even-numbered them in the top left corner one of five. The same exact feed through my internet router had ZERO commercials. I paid $15 to not be bothered with commercials but yet I get them on Amazon's BETA streaming player! I don't care if it is a beta player. I am not going to be a beta tester after paying nearly $500! This was the final straw for me deciding to return the HDX."Mayday" rep had not heard of, nor had any notification of an Amazon BETA streaming player. Such things are to be expected from large corporations that typically do not inform Customer Service Reps about BETAs or updates. However, even after the rep put me on hold (meaning she was asking someone else), she denied any knowledge of any such "workaround" and suggested I sideload Adobe Flash. I explained I already tried that.From my career as a Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 CSR and trainer in hardware and software support I know that even the best CSR's will not know everything if they don't think outside of the box and keep asking questions from "veteran" reps and their Systems people. Instead, I received the "I apologize" excuse ad infinitum despite the fact that I told the rep that she had no reason to apologize as it was not her fault that a basic feature expected from all such hardware is sorely lacking in the HDX.6 - If you are used to texting on your phone, type and edit in portrait mode. Typing in landscape is difficult. Swipe is not supported. Every piece of nonsupported software that I try to sideload eventually had glitches and problems trying to run on the HDX.7 - I explained that I could not find a way to change the internet background color on websites in Silk. The white background is hard on my eyes and the screen has a bad glare on it. She hesitated for a moment, checked her screen and advised that there indeed was no way to change it. I now know that changing to "Reader View" allows for font and color changes. The "Mayday" rep was either not sufficiently trained or was not provided hands-on testing after the training; either of which would have solved that problem.8 - As far as the Carousel is concerned, I want the same icons on it every time and I don't want them moving around based on usage frequency. And, adding the first photo from the photo collection to the carousel each and every time I go to photos even if I never looked at that first photo is really annoying. The rep explained that she understood and started to explain my options of deleting or moving each Carousel item. I explained that I already knew this as well as just scrolling the Carousel up to hide it but that lack of simple customization is frustrating.9 - If I attach a photo to an email and then later go out and choose photos from the top menu it brings up the email. Just a tiny bug that can probably be quickly fixed. This should have been caught before rushing this to market but this type of bug is typical for corporations that rush products to market to beat holiday (or other internal) deadlines.10 - Screen glare is bad especially on the Bezel. A color other than white might help the screen background but the only option to change the screen background is while reading a Kindle book or in Silk's "Reading Mode." A black bezel is not recommended for any product if you will be using it in a brightly-lit room or where there is artificial light behind you. I notice no difference from my current laptop's 1680x1050 resolution except my laptop glare is much less.11 -  It is a fingerprint magnet. You need to leave a soft glasses cleaner cloth nearby.12- As almost all people have noticed, there is a pesky backlight issue. At first I thought it was because of the extremely sensitive screen but it makes no difference how long you leave your finger on the screen. Moving from screen to screen causes the screen to change from bright to dim with auto-brightness turned off. The screen is way too dim with auto-brightness turned on.13 - I could not access Kindle book discussions from the book menu. I do not think HDX is a complete "fail" or the software is completely broken but, even as a PRIME, movie-watching member, I can't live with it. You will need time and patience for its learning curve and for software updates if you need to do more than what it was designed for, reading books and watching Prime movies.Last, it was very difficult to hear my "Mayday" rep [name omitted for this review], even with the HDX volume turned all the way up and my home completely quiet. This may also be attributed to either not having her headset adjusted correctly or her non-English accent.  And NO, there is nothing wrong with my hearing! I got the definite impression that she was extremely uncomfortable in her job due to she was not prepared. Hiring bi-lingual reps strictly for their language capabilities and ignoring their lack of customer service experience and lack of communication skills is a Human Resources issue that I strongly suggest Amazon address if they want to keep their "#1 Customer Satisfaction" rating." Finally, when I asked the "Mayday" rep to help start my return process, she again put me on hold and a minute later another (male) rep came on the line. I could hear him saying hello to me but because the original rep left her system on hold, he could not hear me, nor could I see him. He continued to try saying hello to me with my hellos going un-answered for 5 minutes until the connection was lost. My email address was previously confirmed and the first rep accessed my account so they also had my phone number. When a connection is lost, common customer service dictates the rep attempt to contact the customer again. Not here! This experience was the poorest I have ever received from any company in my 30 years of IT experience. Fortunately, Amazon's Returns policy does not require a customer service rep's help and I initiated the return myself online.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Brilliant colors, very responsive.  The Mayday button is a great feature.  I have only used it twice, but it looks and works just as it does in the ads.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: I never take the time to write a review, but I had to write regarding my Kindle which my husband bought me for Christmas.  I LOVE IT.  I love the live help.  One thing I do wish is that the volume went a little louder.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Brian D Klaus
Reviews.Content: I never thought I'd stray from Apple products but this tablet has convinced me otherwisegreat display, ease of use, decent battery life, free app every daycan't rave about this more

Reviews.Title: What can I say????
Reviews.Author: RiverCat
Reviews.Content: I say, Fabulous!  I have to sit in a chair for 3 1/2 hours on M T and W, for dialysis.  My first,generation kindle died;  I bought the top of the line model hoping it would last longer.  It is so easy to use and I have it enclosed in an Origami cover; it sits on its own and needs no prop, just my lap.  The color is so good and I can adjust the size of the font for my”chemo” eyes.  It is just so handy, I love, love it...I even named it Mary in honor of my FB friend who sent me my first Kindle as a gift.  Mary and I go every where together, reading a book, playing a game, searching the web...too cool

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: sharon Trank
Reviews.Content: I gave a ipad, I bought this for my son for Christmas and he says it's better than my ipad!  Personal preference but I agree that it is strongly made and we gave had no problems what so ever.

Reviews.Title: So Easy to Use!!!
Reviews.Author: Carollee
Reviews.Content: I watch movies, read books, download music, play games and everything is so easy.  And there is always that wonderful help button if you need direction.  Best money I've spent in a long time!!!

Reviews.Title: Great kindle!
Reviews.Author: Lacey
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law for mothers day and she absolutely loves it! It's very light weight and the screen is awesome!! Very nice!

Reviews.Title: My new favorite
Reviews.Author: sbb
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle I liked my Fire Kindle but the HD is the best!!! Love it love it love it!!

Reviews.Title: Worthwhile Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sweeties Dad
Reviews.Content: I really like the help function. It worked perfectly and was as advertised. Amazing! Size is great and it seems to hold a charge for a long period. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: The Best Thing Since Sliced White Bread!
Reviews.Author: Clear Blue "clearblue"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this thing! It has made my book reading, movie watching, game playing, web searching existence mobile!  I can now take what I love most anywhere! The font is bright and readable with varying sizes to choose from. The battery lasts forever! Well, 12 hrs and somewhat more. I love the origami case which is beyond fabulous because you can form it and it feels like a real book cover! I can take it into the kitchen with me and set it up on the counter so that I can see it while I am preparing a recipe! I love that! Or if I'm into a movie, oh and movies are beautiful on this thing and the sound is the best I've ever heard even better than my Toshiba laptop. When it is near dinner time I can take it with me to the kitchen, prepare dinner and continue watching my movie. It is so light and easy to carry. I really do not see why there are ANY negative reviews on this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. The apps are awesome and I found some free books on facebook using pixel of ink. People have to be crazy to rate this little jewel any less than five stars. I highly recommend it! You won't be disappointed. Give yourself time to get use to it and learn all its functions. It has a ton!

Reviews.Title: Good but not Great
Reviews.Author: Martin D Waugh
Reviews.Content: Not being able to access so many apps is very frustrating.Not having the freedom to use applications on the Fire severely limits you.Slow response time with the Amazon apps is also surprising and frustratingIf this isn't fixed I will go with another tabletPlease upgrade Amazon! The ability to use other systems only makes your tablet more desirable

Reviews.Title: the best kindle fire ever
Reviews.Author: Kendall
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire.  I bought the first kindle fire that was made.  I loved that one, but now I have the new 8.9" HDX.  This is the cat's meow!  It is very fast and very clear in video and sound. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is everything I expected plus a whole lot more.  Upon arrival I selected the May day feature for assistance with set up and within five minutes I was up and running.  All my stored items from my old Kindle was there too.  I LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: twinmom42
Reviews.Content: Had the Kindle Fire HDX 7" but my eyesight is not as good as it used to be so I upgraded to the 8.9".  It is incredible what a difference the size makes.  I thought it might be a little heavier given the larger size but it is about the same and it still fits in my purse.  I wish I had purchased this to begin with!  Great device with awesome Amazon service.

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!
Reviews.Author: jkl.
Reviews.Content: I received my first Kindle as a gift and thought it could not get any better.  I was hesitant to upgrade to the newer HDX and larger display.  Once it arrived, all doubt was gone.  Lighter, clearer display, great features.  Toss the laptop and other cumbersome gadgets.  This has everything I need.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: gekmikey
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what i need to use.  Only thing isnot having google play. Have had no problems. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Jump into Amazon's ecosystem full-force with HDX!
Reviews.Author: MickeyJoe
Reviews.Content: Amazon Prime + Amazon Fire TV + Kindle Fire HDX = :-OI have the very first 7" Kindle Fire from 2011, and it still works perfectly.  I got the Verso Marrakesh Genuine Leather Cover for that, and love it so much.  It has worn around the Kindle and looks like a well worn vintage book.But with the new Amazon Fire TV, and loving it, I decided to go all out an upgrade to the larger 8.9" HDX, and so glad I did.  The interaction between the two is awesome.  I love the screen swapping and basically using the Kindle as a remote.  The "second screen" is awesome when watching movies and tv.  Since Amazon owns IMDB, it literally pops up information on each actor as they appear, as well as various info in all scenes.  Like a non-intrusive commentary.  No more "who is that actor" as you just look at your HDX and there it is.Since 2011, I have collected thousands of free apps via Amazon's app store.  They give at least one app away free every day, so the value of the apps I have make it well worth the investment to get the largest storage available of 64GB.  But I love being able to listen to my 51,000 songs stored on my Amazon Cloud and listen on the Cloud player taking no device space at all.All apps and functions are blazing fast and quite a jump from my 2011 Kindle Fire.  I also have Apple's iPad, iPhone etc.  But the HDX is all about the Amazon experience for me.  I'm quite embedded with products and services by Amazon, and you cannot beat their customer service.
