Which I have to also say that the HDX customer service feature called MayDay is quite amazing.  When setting it up, I had a question, and you click MayDay and an actual person appears on your screen.  They can see your screen and help you with anything, or show you features right in front of you.  They talk you through it, or you watch how they do it.  All while seeing who you are talking to in a video box in the corner.  They don't see you, but it would be an interesting option.I have the HDX on all day.  Either on stand-by or full use, I get a full day of use at home or travel.  I would say at least 10-12 hours of use.  I just charge when I go to bed.  I feel like I use the Kindles more than my iThings, but both serve different needs.  However go all out and go for it.  A great investment.  Sure there will be something new around the corner, but you know that this is still going to be working years down the road.  Quality product and customer service.  Priceless.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Loving Life
Reviews.Content: best little tablet a person could hope for reasonable price,clearity perfect, great size especially for those of us over 40 (lol) I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Choice for Me
Reviews.Author: Staci Ann
Reviews.Content: I had thought I was an all "apple girl".  Sorry apple, Kindle fire HDX has surpassed you with their Mayday feature.  It is worth it's weight in gold.  Every agent has been able to speak to me in my language without accents that I don't understand. I have had that issue many times with other companies. Mayday techs are also knowledgeable and the BEST customer support I have ever come across.  As for the product itself, I can do everything that I wanted to straight from my kindle. The sound is great, the picture is beautiful.  There are plenty of apps available.  The kindle is aesthetically gorgeous.  I am so happy with my purchase which I was afraid to make.  Silly me. I would have gotten it sooner if I would have known.

Reviews.Title: Too many problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife bought a kindle Fire HDX 2 1/2 months ago. Two weeks later, the screen suddenly went blank and the device didn't work anymore. We brought it back to the store and they kindly exchanged it for another one. The store's tech person said that this was a common problem with the Kindle Fires. The second device worked fine for two months, but suddenly last week, it started turning off at random times. Now we are exchanging this second Kindle for a third, this time through Amazon customer service.I suggest customers get a regular tablet if that's what they want. Amazon should stick to making e-readers.

Reviews.Title: Nice but has a major flaw
Reviews.Author: E. Bennett "Shopsalot"
Reviews.Content: I like the device, however, what I've found is a lack of compatibility with my other Android devices.  Few of my Google play apps are compatible with the kindle and that's a big disappointment.  A big one is that I can't use my chromecast device with it.  So be aware that you are pretty much limited to Amazon for apps and many Android apps won't work.  If you don't need a lot of other apps, it's a nice little device for Netfix, basic browsing, reading and kindle games.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet, especially good if you are just using it for multimedia, the one to get over the HD if getting a Kindle
Reviews.Author: JM in NY
Reviews.Content: I have been fortunate to be able to compare this product directly to several other tablets in this size category, namely the ipad mini, Dell Venue Pro 8, and also the new version regular Kindle HD 7.  First off, if you are going to get a Kindle, get this one.  While I am not sure the screen upgrade is noticeable under the majority of conditions, the processor upgrade definitely is.  The HDX is much faster and more fluid, whereas the regular HD is noticeably sluggish and does not handle things like streaming movies nearly as well.  If you are using it primarily as a media device (reading, watching movies, listening to music) the HDX does pretty well.  It has a simple to use interface, the carousel makes it easy to get back to things you were recently viewing or using like tv shows or apps, Amazon purchased movies, music etc automatically show up--no searching for apps and hoping they work, just click on music or movies and they are there.  If you want to watch Vikings using the History app it actually works, whereas the ipad hangs most of the time (the Dell doesn't have the HC app but you can just go to the website and it works fine--the Dell is much faster/more at home on the web than the others).  So while the Ipad has more apps, they are much more likely to not work from my testing, whereas the Kindle ones, though fewer, seem more likely to actually work.  Your basic multimedia apps like Netflix, Hulu, etc are there (though not Vudu at the time of this review).  There is a Roku app so you can use the Kindle as the remote for your Roku if you have one (which gets you a keyboard rather than picking out each letter when searching).  The speakers are quite good, noticeable on music compared to the ipad.  Main downsides would be a smaller screen than the competitors mentioned, and it is somewhat pricey, especially compared to the Dell Venue Pro 8, which has a larger screen and the more full operating system if you are looking for more of a netbook replacement.  It also seems somewhat slow to charge and doesn't seem to hold a charge as long as the others mentioned, which is somewhat odd given the smaller screen size.  The browser is somewhat cheesy and internet usage is slower than with the Dell/Windows device, probably on a par with the Ipad which is also somewhat slow (although when I say that it is comparable with the ipad using Mercury, Safari is pretty bad so the Kindle probably does better than the ipad using the default Safari).  The HDX seems to find and connect to networks faster/more smoothly than the Ipad, which again seems sluggish at that and tends to hang.  The only other con I can think of is for Android devices in general not just the kindle, and that would be the Big Brotherish nature of Android apps compared to say a comparable windows one (and we don't know on Apple ones, since they don't seem to even let you know what permissions you are granting).  An app that from the Windows side wants 1-3 permissions might well want a dozen or more from Android, and you are left wondering why some basic calculator app or whatever needs to have access to all of your contacts, identity, location, etc., so if you worry about such things you end up using a lot less of the apps than you might, even though they are available.  Still, if you want an easy to use no hassles way to watch movies, read books, listen to music, and occasionally browse the web a bit, the Kindle is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Donald Ngai "Donald"
Reviews.Content: I loved the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and couldn't wait to trade it in when the new version came out.  The screen is clearer, brighter and much faster.  Everything I do is so much quicker than the older model.  Play movies, browse, etc.

Reviews.Title: Charge Port Problem???
Reviews.Author: L Hughes
Reviews.Content: I DO LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE 8.9 hdx..But...sometimes it will charge and sometimes it wont..I noticed from day one that the charger was crooked when it was plugged in...Set at an abnormal angle...This is very frustrating...Contacted support..They are sending another one...Very upset....You get it set up with pictures and all your apps and then you have to start from scratch...My original Kindle did not do this...The cost of the 8.9 hdx is pretty high so I expect more from them...Obviously this is a known problem with the Amazon Kindle and we were not told....If they plug up the kindle before they sell it they could not miss the crooked plug....A lot of people are having the SAME PROBLEM..Recall????? Read the threads....To many people with this same problem...May want to wait until they get the things fixed before you buy...

Reviews.Title: kindlefire HDX
Reviews.Author: V Betz
Reviews.Content: i cant go without it..tjr best thing i ever got for myself.. i take it everywhere i go... drs dds its the best.i even watch my movies.read play games skype..look up things cooking..and so handy to take in your purse.  LOVE IT.......10+

Reviews.Title: kindle Fire HDX8.9, HDX,WI-Fi,16GB
Reviews.Author: Rose's
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle HDX. The Screen is so striking the color is something else! The colors are so true to form. I would really recommend this to anyone who watches movies,and enjoy playing games. I also read on my kindle. Now, if I could beat candycrush I really be happy. That game is so addicting! I love it!

Reviews.Title: really hoping for this tablet to be better than it is
Reviews.Author: Ryan E. Crichton "Evil Ryan"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire HDX 64GB (without special offers).  If I could I'd give it a 3.5 star rating, but I can't quite bring myself to give it 4 stars.  I was really, really hoping for this tablet to be better than it is.  While there are plenty of pluses, the minuses are just too significant.On the plus side, I love how sharp and bright the display is, and it is incredibly light (even after I added a bluetooth keyboard/case to it).  As someone who is very invested in Amazon products (on my Android phone I am all about the Amazon MP3 player and Kindle e-reader app), it is great to have a device that doesn't have all that Google Play bloatware on it, and I love that the music player and e-reader are integrated into the OS on the Kindle Fire (although there are a few things about the music player that could be better).But now for the downside (and there's much more downside than I'd like).  Firstlly, the tablet is glitchy.  I'm constantly finding that when I click on an icon on the home page, nothing happens, and I have to go up to the carousel to get the app to start (which is really annoying when the app I want to use is one I haven't used in a while, so I have to scroll through the carousel trying to find it).  And even more frustrating is how many apps I have that routinely crash.  This seems especially true for high end apps (like almost all of the games I play on it).So while I love the integration with Amazon, and have no complaints about the interface, at the end of the day Amazon needs to put a lot more effort into making their operating system more stable than it is.  I don't know if the problem is that FireOS is starting to be enough different from Android that standard Android apps aren't fully compatible, but whatever it is, it is something Amazon needs to address sooner rather than later if they want the Kindle Fire HDX to truly be a top-end tablet.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely brilliant!
Reviews.Author: VicChik
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting to try the new Kindle Fire HDX and finally I did. WOW.  I also recently bought a new laptop.  My laptop sits.  I carry my Kindle everywhere I go.  It's so light--like carrying a small book but the things this little package can do.  The graphics is excellent. Its very easy to use.  But perhaps most of all, the customer service rep at the touch of a button is nothing short of genius. I just used it and am so impressed.  Super fast response and fixed my problem right a way with a personal phone call.  It's unheard of.  Today when personal customer service is nearly a thing of the past, Amazon sets yet a new standard.  Hats off and many many kudos to Amazon for a great product and THE BEST customer service anywhere.  Without question, I would recommend this product  . If you want to give someone something special, definitely consider the Kindle Fire HDX.  They will love you for it.  I wish I had bought my Kindle Fire first and not the laptop.

Reviews.Title: I find display screen lacking
Reviews.Author: LaWanda J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I like my previous Kindle better for screen quality - there is too much glare on the screen to make it easy for reading.  I am sure I will like it for the other functions it offers but since I am an avid reader, I will be using my other Kindle more.

Reviews.Title: missing one thing
Reviews.Author: Mark m
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the fire hdx. it just needs a sim card slot. an ability to plug in a card reader would be nice

Reviews.Title: Everything it was expected to be.
Reviews.Author: Tilaran Rita "Rita"
Reviews.Content: I did all the research and it was everything I wanted it to be.  I need to take advantage of the online support because I haven't figured out how to take advantage of all it's abilities.  And I don't know how to organize my book collections yet.  It's totally different from the system I was used to in my old Kindle, which still works beautifully, it's just a dinosaur.  It takes a while to get used to the gorgeous display after my black and white.  Love my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: This is the best
Reviews.Author: Joanne Odom "-Odom"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the perfect size.  It has everything that I need.  I love the display layout.  I have the total package.

Reviews.Title: awsome product
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I heard a few rumors about screen issues, but I bought 2 and use them daily for hours on end watching streaming and shopping and have not had a single issue.  So far it is faster, runs smoother and 0 hiccups it runs better than my high dollar gaming computer.  Definitely blows iPad out of the water hands down, and runs better than some of the other competitors.  The free live visual tech support for any questions comes in handy also.

Reviews.Title: This product ROCKS!
Reviews.Author: Kit
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift and am over the top pleased! I have a First Generation iPad that is worn out and acting up on me and I wanted a new tablet. I LOVE THIS! It is lightweight and thin and fits in even my small purses. The screen is crisp and clear and there isn't a lag or delay like there is with iPads. My movies, books and music downloaded without a problem. This is exactly what I was expecting and what I was wanting. I enjoyed my iPad while it lasted, but I will never go back. The functionality of the Kindle Fire just shuts down iPad. Battery lasts long and recharges quickly. There are a few games that cause it to drain quickly but that is to be expected from the larger storage games. Do not hesitate to purchase this if it has caught your interest.

Reviews.Title: killer just killer
Reviews.Author: Jeremy R Redmond
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire HDX 8.9 is the killer of all tablets including iPad. I own an iPad mini and I would easily choose this. This does everything you want it to its honestly the best table on the market

Reviews.Title: The iPad mini takes a beating.
Reviews.Author: Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX - Two week reviewThe tablet has become an entertainment device for the children. The Free Amazon App of the Day has only encouraged this situation. I find it strange that the younger ones rather watch Netflix on the tablet than on the television. I think it is because the image is actually bigger than the screen appears from the couch.The tablet works well as a chant/music e-reader. It is light enough to hold during an entire practice or Mass, and there is enough bezel to do so with one hand and not mistakenly 'flip' the page. The other hand is needed for my lame attempt at chironomy. The ability to digitally draw markings on the music is also a plus (use the free Adobe Reader). It also works well as a regular e-reader for the same reasons listed.I have yet to become that person that can "do anything" on a tablet and rarely uses the laptop. That day may never come. The keyboard and mouse have spoiled me, and the quick email-fb check is easier and more practical on the handy smartphone. I do, however, appreciate the occasional quicker web search when the two laptops are in use.I sideloaded Flash onto it and felt content. However, I have yet to use it for anything Flash related. Go figure.I have no iPad related regrets. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is most comparable to the iPad mini (same width in portrait mode), yet it is lighter (good for one hand e-reading), has a brighter screen for outdoor viewing, is less expensive (good for the wallet), and offers up great free apps of the day (some apps that normally retail for $7 at the Amazon and Apple App Stores).So if you are looking for an alternative to the iPad mini, take a hard look at the HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: much improved
Reviews.Author: Dana G. Cook
Reviews.Content: I bought a iPad air and kindle fire hdx. I couldn't make up my mind so I bought both and tested them out. They are both great devices but I think the HDX is better for more people. Every app I wanted was available on the HDX. I had to load some apps, such as Next Issue, directly from web sites but the system works perfectly.  As a previous kindle and iPad owner, I always preferred the iPad web browser over silk. That is no longer the case. I had constant issues with the iPad browser and it didn't work with my bank's advanced features that I use such as person to person payments. The Amazon browser is much more stable and the reading view is awesome.  I have always felt that my iPad was more suited for access to apps and my fire for all things content related. Going forward, I don't see a need to own both. The fire HDX is superior for all things content related as it has been in the past, but with improved browsing, more apps, app switching and the mayday button this device is all I need.Superb product Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Coleman
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX for myself intending simply to have a great storage system for technical books, etc. so that I could use it while learning Linux on my desktop since it is so much easier to have a tablet open in front of you for research while practicing using text editors, file management, etc. than to have an actual book. I love it for this purpose, but fell in love with all the other goodies that tablets have- such as streaming videos, movies, music, and so on. This thing really is spoiling me, as I never really use my desktop for media consumption- it's great to just reach out and grab this thing when having a sleepless  night; there is always something to do on the Kindle besides tossing and turning! So glad I finally made the move to Kindle and really, really love my Amazon Prime subscription...

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: mccool
Reviews.Content: I was only buying this to read my textbooks on but I have found so many more uses for it than just a book reader and I can't keep my kids off the apps n games. One of my son's who hates to read will read on the kindle.  Reading is reading however he does it thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, only small design issues that don't impact overall experience.
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: LOVE!I really enjoy using this product.My only negative feedback so far is that when you plug the tablet in... the connection will eventually break the way that most phones break. There isn't enough structure/reinforcement around the outlet and power cord, and the location of it is such that it will have pressure on it over time and eventually loosen the connection and probably need to be repaired. Its is a problem I've had with a lot of phones too.The tablet itself performs very well, is lightweight and thin, and displays excellently. I'm not in love with the volume control and power buttons on the back of the tablet rather than on the sides, but I can live with it.The "special offers" enhancement is very non-invasive and totally worth it.

Reviews.Title: Hot Product
Reviews.Author: NancyEM
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure which tablet to buy since there are so many on the market.  Decided on the Kindle HDX and I LOVE it.  It is as good as a laptop only smaller.  I can do anything on it and take it everywhere! Vibrant colors and watching movies on it is exceptional.  GREAT PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: cork999
Reviews.Content: I love it! I have owned 4 Kindles, and this one is definitely my favorite. It does still glare in sunlight tho. No matter how much anti-reflective glare covers you place on them. But, I love the rest of it. I haven't used the "MAYDAY" feature yet. After all the pads I have owned, I do pretty good on this one. The one thing I love about Kindles is the ease of use. My husband has an Ipad, and we love it, but, a Kindle is a bit more "user-friendly" in my opinion. Especially if you are not used to APPLE. Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Kirchner
Reviews.Content: Love everything about it, especially the mayday button....that is the reason I bought this one instead of another tablet...I have used it and have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: mertny
Reviews.Content: love this thing, super fast. haven't found anything that slows this sucker down yet. everything runs butter-smooth. Only wish it used Google Play, but I've found other appstores so it's nowhere near a deal breaker. honestly couldn't be happier with this purchase.if you're thinking about this, quit thinking and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Best Ever!!
Reviews.Author: chaosbleeds70
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 about a month ago and I absolutely love it, it's been one of the best investments that I have made! The color and display is much brighter and clearer than the Kindle Fire HD, I love the new mayday button, help is just a click away and I can ask questions if I get stuck!! I like the way my books, games and movies looks and plays, I love how every thing sounds, the clarity and crispness of music is awesome!! I also love the front AND back facing camera and with the origami cover, not only does it protect my Kindle, but I can slide the Kindle up and it automatically activates my camera! ABSOLUTELY DELIGHTFUL!!!

Reviews.Title: doesn't support google play apps :(
Reviews.Author: Kendra Dawn
Reviews.Content: I love amazon and I love google!  I thought I'd get the best of both with the Kindle Fire....I was very disappointed to find out upon receiving this that kindle doesn't support google play apps and the amazon app store versions of google apps are sub-par.  Also, their app store is lacking.  I wasn't really digging their SILK browser and there were no other ways for me to load a different internet app.  Wait, correction: there are ways....but I didn't want to have to manage all the different crazy downloads of this and that and put up with error messages every time I turned my tablet on.  ([...])  On another note, I was astonished that I couldn't personalize the kindle more.  I kept getting these annoying offers on my lock screen which I turned off in the settings yet, they still appeared.  The Kindle fire really is a great product; beautiful screen and resolution, fast operating system, super sleek design...I just want a seamless interface that supports the google play store.  My fault for not researching more before I bought.  Really so disappointed that Kindle doesn't support google.  Back to the drawing board.

Reviews.Title: Dynamite
Reviews.Author: A. R. St Jean "ARS"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. It replaces my first generation fire. So far I have found the performance to be perfect, great visual characteristics and great sound from such tiny speakers. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Easy to hold, beautiful than the picture
Reviews.Author: Wnag Baobao
Reviews.Content: It's much beautiful than the pictures on the web site, much thinner than it looks at the pictures. The back cover is not as smooth as I suposed, it gives me a feeling of touching rub, so it's much easier to be hold in hand without worrying about to drop it on the ground. I love this pad, the sound is wonderful, miracle, astonishing...

Reviews.Title: as before amazon has a home run
Reviews.Author: player
Reviews.Content: excellent product, easy to use, touch screen is very responsive, battery life seems to be good, you cant go wrong

Reviews.Title: wonderful device..........
Reviews.Author: Christine Hall
Reviews.Content: The kindle does everything I wanted it to do. the only dissappoinment is connecting to local internet, it takes several trys and lots of patience for sites to load.

Reviews.Title: I'm having fun with it, althouth I bought it for professional reasons,
Reviews.Author: tttiger "Tinctoris"
Reviews.Content: that is, in order to display my photography in art class, there to be transformed into paintings. The camera is 8mp and much better than the Ipad. I should state that I began my journey with an Ipad Air, only to be disappointed at its contrariness and mediocre 5mp camera. While I haven't used the flash on the Fire, it's good to know it's there when I need it. I find steadying the tablet camera very easy with the Fire, which is something I worried about. I see no difference in the weight between this and the Air, which I returned. I find navigating from screen to screen easy--very intuitive. The picture is bright and clear as a bell. While I don't use the audio much, the speakers are good. I find exploring the web a bit cumbersome with Silk (the browser), but quite do-able. I have called for Mayday assistance three times, and had my questions answered quickly and professionally each time. Amazon has built a good product, and the support behind it is unmatched in the market. Go buy one.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: anncat
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle.  I purchased this particular model to have the unit serve as a portable laptop in addition to being my e-reader.  I would give it  5 stars if I could figure out a way to lock the screen orientation.  I even purchased an app and it doesn't work.  I'm still looking for a suitable cover that serves as an easel.  The one I purchased has a nice notched base-plate, but the back (easel part) is not stiff, so I am unable to set the Kindle at the angle I prefer for reading at a table.  The Kindle slowly tips backwards as the easel relaxes and bends from the weight of the Kindle.As a laptop/notebook computer, this is faster by far than my PC, which isn't the latest or fastest.  I use it primarily for downloading e-mail and doing internet searches.  Using this as a reader, I'm still reading a minimum of 2 books per week and am impatiently waiting for the next books in several series to be published.  I purchased the 16GB model because of a review that reminded me of the cloud, so I can keep the storage at a useful level.All in all, it is "as advertised" and I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Danielle Stapleton
Reviews.Content: Don't know what to say.  I like my kindle, only issue was my daughter was about to totally reset to factory settings and lost everything I had on here. Had to redownload it all. Wish that was under parental block too so needed password to access settings

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: PAUL H WHEELWRIGHT
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas this year and I love it. I read books, surf the web, I have even been learning Swedish on it. It is a little different the Apple and Samsung as far as navigating around, but it did not take very long to get really comfortable with it. It is very thin and light weight. The programs load quick and the graphics are awesome!!! My wife has an I Pad, there is no way I would trade my HDX for it. I bought one of the folding covers in leather. It works great all so. I would buy this tablet again and again.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase!
Reviews.Author: Hiwartha V. Donaldson
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  I am a workaholic but this tablet is basically for entertainment and it does just what it is made for.

Reviews.Title: Terrific product
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: My huband bought this for himself as a Christmas gift and absolutely loves it .... he is a big reader and had been adamant about having the "feel" of the book in his hands .... now he's addicted to his tablet and downloading his books there .... he says he now doesn't need a light to read and that makes it easy to take with him to catch a read at lunch or waiting in a dr's office ..

Reviews.Title: Faster than the previous Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Kelley
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews and finally decided to upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi.  I'm so glad that I did, because now I can sit in my living room and download content without getting dropped and I can play games on it without it freezing and taking forever to upload. I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone that is thinking of upgrading to this generation.  There's only one draw back really, that if you upgrade to 4G and you aren't currently going through AT&T; or Verizon for your internet, that you would have to pay for this service.  Since 4G is not currently available in the area I live in, it made perfect sense to go with Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: As Advertized
Reviews.Author: 1st Sgt
Reviews.Content: Putting out over $350 was a hard decision for this cash-strapped retired person.  I have the $69 Kindle, and had it loaded up with books.  When my new Kindle arrived, I registered it, and all my books transferred over automatically...something I was worried.  I did have a problem with signing into Kiva, a micro finance institution.  I pushed the "Help" button, and in 5 seconds there was a gal on my screen asking, "How can I help you".  I told her my problem.  She did some kind of hokey poky inside my Kindle, then asked me to try to sign in.  Bingo..it works just fine.  What a great feature, what a great device!  Faster downloading apps and internet pages than my Galaxy S3.  Enjoy yours.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift of Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am just crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  I also signed up for Kindle Prime and I watched my first free movie last night.  I am so glad I asked for the Kindle.  I also added the Yahoo App for weather and have set up a few cities and check them everyday.  Of course, I have downloaded quite a few books already.  I just can't express in enough words how much I enjoy my Kindle HDX.  I ran into a small problem in regards to searching for movies and I called Amazon and Mary Ann walked me through it in 5 minutes.  Great customer service from a very nice lady.

Reviews.Title: MY HUSBAND IS JEALOUS OF MY KINDLE LOVE AFFAIR....LOL!!!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Mendez
Reviews.Content: I have become a hardcore Kindle freak.... and now I have two...one 7inch hdx and one 8.9inch hdx....Love em both....I'm a nurse so the 7inch hdx I use for work and the 8.9 hdx is for having fun at home. I'm a reader and a movie buff so the so called "closed" system of Kindle isn't an issue for me. Any google app I have on my android I have either successfully  found on kindle's system or found a satisfactory or BETTER replacement for it....seriously the best tablet anywhere for those who don't require a windows os. The screen resoulution is AMAZING....I'm a prime member too so I have TONS of free movies to watch....the speed is lightening fast and no freezing issues as some have experienced. I love AMAZON....who ever owns this company...."WAY TO GO!!!! I HOPE YOU BECOME A BILLIONAIRE BECAUSE YOUR SERVICES, PRODUCTS AND COMMITMENT TO EXELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE ACTUALLY MAKE PEOPLE'S LIVES BETTER" XXOO ;-)

Reviews.Title: almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Bob Linda
Reviews.Content: Would be a 5 star, but the Wi-Fi disconnects too much, my wife's IPad stays connected much better, and its only a gen3

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: M.Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I own 3 Kindles,The original Paper White, Kindle Fire HD, and now The New Kindle Fire HDX8.9. Although I love them all,the latest is perfect for me! The 1st. One was only for reading,out in my porch,at the pool in the summer. When I saw the Fire in color,and it was pretty much like a laptop I bought it and loved everything about it. It did have a glare,but that was fixed with a screen saver. I have a lot of health problems,and my Kindle keeps me company and reading is my pass time,but one of my disabilities is my eyesight is getting really bad. The New Fire HDX, 8.9, has a nice sized screen, no glare, more clear, and a lot thinner and lighter. I don't have any bad things to say about either of them but this one is perfect! Thank you to the makers, and Thank you to Amazon for the super fast 2 day Prime Shipping. If anyone has thought about buying a kindle this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Look out Apple!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fast enough, has gorgeous color and he picture, is incredibly light, and even for a low tech writer, fairly easy to operate once you fool around with it for a few days.Mayday is excellent for when you really get confused. Great idea. I am sure everyone will soon copy it!Don't miss the Google play store since I buy those apps on my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it except for the Sound
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I was already the proud owner of the Kindle Fire HD 7" and decided to get the 8.9' Kindle Fire HDX in addition, for the larger screen and two way camera.  I found the sound to be a bit distorted and low in volume, compared to HD 7". Then I compared it to the Kindle Fire HDX 7" (my sister-in-law) and it was the same result, both 7" were clear and loud compared to the muddled sound of the 8.9".  I proceeded to return twice and I found all three Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' I tried were all comparable in sound.  I gathered that the 8.9" is calibrated at a lower volume, all three were not audible until one quarter up the volume scale.  I am hopping this was done for engineering reasons like vibration or something than an evil plot to get you to buy speakers, which I did.  If anyone knows the real story please share it with me.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Photography / Miracast
Reviews.Author: Nanhenker
Reviews.Content: I did not have or need a tablet, but I wanted a quick and clean way to mirror photos and video to the big screen, and I have been a long-time user of Verizon mobile hotspot connectivity because I'm never at home.  I was instantly impressed with the color display as well as the very decent audio.  I consider myself a serious amateur photographer, and I have  to say that I am using my Kindle for quick clear macro shots instead of my cameras; but of course this is only a tablet camera. The connectivity is flawless, and the download speeds are like lightning with the double processors. I have used this device to control my GoPro camera remotely; nice!  (Although the free app had to be sideloaded.)  I do wish the built in Silk web browser had Flash compatibility, and the that the Google Play store was not blocked.  There are other sites that you can get apps from, and I understand why Amazon wants to protect itself as well as our devices, but the Amazon app store is severely limited.  There are simple effective workarounds for most major complaints here, and I have used the Amazon experimental video streaming player, however on some sites (read: subscription) where it will  not work when the content is routed off the site's servers to Amazon's servers. I'm working on how to fix this.  I have used every major feature except the Miracast, which I will try when I get an adapter for the TV, but so far, the device is lovely and fast!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Zettie
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  I wanted to upgrade from my older Kindle Fire and this is great.  It is lightweight and easy to read.  I am enjoying all of the great features of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Shocked at how great this is...
Reviews.Author: Sam F.
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of the entire tablet category, thinking they were just laptops that were less useful. And I didn't like how big full-size iPads were. But after a couple months with this unit, I enthusiastically endorse the HDX. It's completely eliminated the near-nightly fight over the main TV and DVR. The wife doesn't have to be relegated to the bedroom to watch something when we want to watch sports.Admittedly, the strength of this is as a content delivery device. I haven't really used it for office stuff and doubt it would be well-suited for that. But as a method to get books/movies/mags/TV shows, it's really unequaled. The real power isn't fully realized unless combined with Amazon Prime - seamlessly integrated into the operating system. If you have a bunch of Apple or Google Play content, the case for the HDX isn't nearly as compelling, but even then I think it's still a strong case on the combination of ease of use, perfect size, light weight, performance, and price. But with Prime, it's really no contest. Very satisfied. We use our Kindle HDXs (we have both a 7 inch and 8.9 inch) daily.The only thing I wish it had was GPS....you can still use Google Maps (no, it's not in the Amazon App Store, but it's fairly easy to add, along with Chrome, as the included Silk browser...well....kinda sucks) but it won't enable turn-by-turn directions since there's no GPS. Small price to pay for a primarily home-content device, though.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Azlina Abdul Aziz
Reviews.Content: I sold off my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to buy the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and I am so glad I did. The new Kindle Fire HDX is so light and with the specifications of a Quad Core 2.2 Ghz Snapdragon and 2 GB RAM, it is so buttery smooth. The display is fantastic. I am so happy I made this purchase. I just wish I could download google play though and that would hit the sweet spot. Nevertheless, I would highly recommend this tablet to people interested in media consumption.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE works as promised. I love everything about this Kindle. it is handy for watching Netflix, reading, using the internet, and playing games. I wish they left the micro HDMI slot, which is the only negative I have. the mayday button is amazing. I regret that I did not get to thank the young lady that helped me. I would recommend an Amazon Prime account. Amazon Prime has a lot of free movie and TV shows to watch, and it is handy if you like to rent movies, plus the discounts you get and free delivery on a lot of items in the store.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Suesz
Reviews.Content: Our computer is set up downstairs.  When my husband had back surgery recently, the kindle fire was so nice for him to use from his chair upstairs.  It did have a learning curve and had some frustration over buying a book to tell you how to operate.  Our other kindles came with an owners manuel installed and that would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: SAD
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle, they have done a great job on it! I like to read at night before going to sleep the lighted screen is just perfect my husband can sleep while I read, I don't have to have the light on. Screen can be changed to paper so it is not to bright so can still go to sleep. Color is perfect!!! The only thing I have trouble with is it it a sluggish changing the page on pentrest, but would not trade it. Oh, I gave my older one to my sister in law and she loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Very happy but...
Reviews.Author: ogre1164
Reviews.Content: Does everything they say it does and does it well. Compares very favorably with my wife's iPad. Very happy. Only disappointment is the fact that you can only get apps from Amazon. No Google apps. No Google Play. I understand you can jailbreak (or root) the device but it apparently voids the warranty. Come on Amazon don't you get enough of my money without nickel and diming me on a poor selection of apps? I also hate the "special offers"

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!
Reviews.Author: loreli
Reviews.Content: OMG, the best Christmas present ever!  I gave it to my husband  for Christmas, he hasn't put it down. HDX 8.9 speed, display, ease of operation, gaming is awesome, the camera rivals anything, viewing tv or movies is amazing, gotta love that mayday button.  Problem?  My Kindle Fire is so slow in comparison now!  So, the moment my husband goes to sleep or work, down goes my Kindle Fire, and I grab his 8.9 HDX WI-FI! Can't afford to get a second HDX right now, but luckily he doesn't mind sharing. Well, sometimes,  way to go Amazon! Did I mention amazing service?

Reviews.Title: Absolutely slick!
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: I've had android devices ever since the tmobile G1 was released (I had a pre-order).  I have never had a device like this before though.  It is smooth- I have not experienced the lag or other distractions that remind you that you are on an android device.  This is likely due to the tweaks amazon have made to the android OS (to make it into Fire OS) as well as the blazing quad-core processor.  The speakers in this device add to the gaming experience and the processor drives games to awesome visual depth.  An office suite is also included.I didn't buy this device for gaming.  It was the specs vs. price which attracted me.  A 2.2ghZ quad-core processor is the fastest I could find in an android device and the Amazon integration is great but not overly distracting.  I have no regrets about my purchase at all.

Reviews.Title: nice upgrade from hd
Reviews.Author: Gram
Reviews.Content: I'm finding more things I love about the HDX each day. I think the best upgrade is the camera..Although I have used the May Day feature a couple of times. This service is GREAT! The reps are so helpful and congenial. I purchased a Samsung smart t.v. and next thing I know the kindle was asking me if I wanted to watch Netflix on the kindle hdx or the Samsung t.v.. I'm not tecky so all these new features are wonderful!!  Best tablet for the best price! I rarely ever use my computer anymore. No reason to - I can do everything right from here!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Debra Schultheis
Reviews.Content: I've been an Apple fan for a long time but because of the high prices, I thought I would give this a try.  I'm glad I did.  It has everything my Ipad 4th gen has and it actually seems a little faster.  It was easy to set up and get into.  Although, I am still learning, I enjoy all it has to offer and recommend it to anyone.  Very impressive.The only bad thing I found out was that no one in my area carries any of the cases for the 8.9" display model so Amazon you're there for me again.  Thanks Amazon!D. S., Illinois

Reviews.Title: Best purchase
Reviews.Author: Diane S
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best purchase I have ever made for myself.  Some of the reviews had me concerned about the view on the screen but I am not experiencing any problems.  I mostly use mine for reading but I have had no problems with any of the other features.  The camera takes better pictures then my digital camera which I paid almost as much for as the kindle. I like the bigger screen too.  Reading in bed is great too.  Not needing to have a light on is very beneficial if someone else is in the room trying to sleep.  l Love my kindle!

Reviews.Title: First Tablet E-Reader
Reviews.Author: ThatTexanDude56
Reviews.Content: E-Reading +Magazines +/- Not all Mags are digital yet. Need a digital subscription to the The Horse Backstreet Choppers!Surfing Net +Android Games + /- (Not All Work Games For Kindle)Camera + /- (Cannot use for Instagram)Skyping +/- Auto focusing makes a dinging sound kind of annoying. The fix keep you tablet still don't walk around with it.Video +Sound +

Reviews.Title: great screen but does not play WAV files
Reviews.Author: William C Meyer Jr
Reviews.Content: A higher rating would be warranted for great screen.My problem is the HDX does not play WAV files as advertised!First mayday call resulted in being told by nice young lady that wav is not supported.Further research determined that others have this problem.  The HDX is supposed to support wav files.A second mayday call got a person who transfered me to a tech on the phone and we tried to resolve the issue.Finally the d/l of (VLC Plus Pro) would allow the playing of a Verizon voicemail if it was first downloaded.I trust that Amazon engineers are working on a solution to play embedded wav files w/o an app.

Reviews.Title: All I expected and more...
Reviews.Author: Lenny Kraftchick
Reviews.Content: When a product lives up to the high qualities advertised, and delivers the many superior features addressed in its marketing campaign, I believe it deserves the five star rating. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 does exactly that. In particular, I like the HD display and the quality of sound from the stereo speakers. Since I am replacing my netbook computer, my one concern before purchase was the performance of the Silk browser. This turned out to be no issue. I am very satisfied with the browser speed and the way it performs...a huge increase over the old netbook I was using. I added the Netgear Push2TV device and now enjoy mirroring video and pictures on my large flat screen tv. I have had occasion twice to call on live help through the Mayday function, and both times I had a support person respond within 15 seconds. Wow, that is a nice feature. My one small nitpick is that I wish the speakers played a little louder. Not that big a deal because when I listen to one of my DVD concerts that I converted to MP4 and loaded on the Kindle, I  bluetooth to my outboard speaker.

Reviews.Title: Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Dianne A. Richardson
Reviews.Content: I actually love the Kindle Fie HDX 8.9 but within days of purchasing it the HDX would only display it's name "Kindle Fire" and that was it,  It wouldn't shut down and wouldn't turn on.  I wrote to Amazon but to date have not received as much as a confirmation of my inquiry.  This is my fourth Kindle, all the others, even though I've given them to family members, still work perfectly.  I asked Amazon if it could have been the magnetic cover that is also an Amazon product.  No response.  I purchased both the HDX and the cover at Best Buy.  I had the device exchanged for a new one but am awaiting it via shipment.

Reviews.Title: Is great when it works
Reviews.Author: TxBuyer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle arrived in a nice box, fast shipping time.I set it up and was gladly surprised of the quick response and the browser speed compared to my ipad.The camera is great and the screen looks very nice.After a week or so, I started experiencing some freezes while reading a book (on different books) and the browser took a long time to connect (tried several websites, most of the time tested google to avoid lots of images).Tried the remote help feature and was impressed by this, the response time was great and the support agent very nice. They made some changes on the kindle and worked ok for a few hours but the problem came back again.  I used the help again after a couple of days because of the same problem and got instructions to reset/re-register the Kindle but the problem started again after a few hours. I kept telling the support people that the problem does not happens all the time but it looks like they don't listen and follow a script.Thinking on return it before the 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Shouldn't have elminated the HDMI connection.
Reviews.Author: Milsma
Reviews.Content: Extremely thin and light (until you add the cover).  Graphics and sound quality are excellent.Button position on the back is awkward for wake up.  There is no mini HDMI outlet to connect to TV for HBOGO, etc.

Reviews.Title: Some things awesome, some things not
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Media consumption on the HDX is great--great for movies, videos, and reading your books. Browser is not so great, typing on it is not so great. Seems to have some bugs... For instance, search function begins in the midst of typing search phrase, applications freeze, etc. voice recognition rarely works consistently. Bottom line, cheaper than the iPad and it shows. So, you may dig it if you have never had an iPad...

Reviews.Title: tough experience in australia
Reviews.Author: spud
Reviews.Content: i knew this product dosent have access to the amazon media store and i was ok with that. the media i have got plays awesomely.my biggest problem is the nba league pass app. i thought this device was a fantastic piece of hard to watch the nba on my international league pass. unfortunately due to some weirdness the live game steaming is geo blocked. its driving me nuts and a quick search of the internet shows its driving other non usa people crazy too.for me if this was fixed id give the kindle hdx a five out of five.

Reviews.Title: Love It, But...
Reviews.Author: edward laue
Reviews.Content: Thought I would love it, but lack of popular apps like Facetime are big disappointments. My wife and kids all stuck with new IPads this xmas but I insisted on Kiindle Fire. It is much lighter and picture more crisp and love Amazon Prime. Just give me Facetime so my family and I can more easily communicate.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sallyanne Urciuoli
Reviews.Content: Love it so much...that my mother in law bought one as well! Would recommend this product to everyone. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: It's fun
Reviews.Author: Lissak
Reviews.Content: For the most part I really like my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 64 GB. The apps are fun and I read on it all the time. Most things work really well.It has a couple of problems though.... the battery drains fast and the Silk Browser crashes often, which is really annoying. Hopefully they fix that through a software update.  I'll probably come back and give it another star if they do.

Reviews.Title: Thought it had MAYDAY and had to be UNREGISTERED.
Reviews.Author: Diane Williams
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize it would come with an ID already on it that I had to changed before I could try to order a book.  Kept getting an error message.  Had to have my daughter help me and after a LONG time she figured out it had to unregisterd and then registered under me.  Also I thought It had the MAYDAY button it.  When I ordered it, it didn't say anything one way or the other so I assumed it would be on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: miss my original kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Julianne Henning
Reviews.Content: I have to turn it off and restart all the time. Apps hang up and it locks up a lot. Not sure what the issue is. Maybe this particular one is a lemon.  I really miss my old kindle fire. Not a lick of problems with it.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: Not happy I can,t watch videos.  I cannot play some of my games.  Could not get itunes.  Missing to many things I like to do.

Reviews.Title: It beats my laptop
Reviews.Author: Thomas Peterson
Reviews.Content: I paid over five hundred bucks for my laptop and this smokes it. Definately a very good buy. I totally reccommend

Reviews.Title: Miss my ipad
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first generation ipad had just about had it so my husband got me the new kindle for Christmas.  The ads had us convinced it was just as good as an iPad just better priced. Although I like the excellent picture and lightweight feel, I still miss my ipad. I find kindle's android platform much less user friendly and am disappointed I can't get a bunch of my favorite apps on my kindle. I can't seem to customize the home or lock screen either. If you've always had Android products than I'm sure kindle is right from you...but if you're thinking of making a shift from Apple to Android I think you'll find yourself homesick like me.

Reviews.Title: It's okay I guess
Reviews.Author: Mark S. Marinelli
Reviews.Content: No audio for Mayday feature.Even with a great signal it consistently logs off.Nice color/graphics.Relatively fast despite problems listed.Wonder if I simply have a lemon?

Reviews.Title: Too many limitations
Reviews.Author: Wilma Huffman
Reviews.Content: Amazon has put too many limitations on the tablet, ie., slimmed down browser and selective use of apps etc.  not the android you might think you are buying.  Also, I bought a case with an opening for the camera, but the tablet still thinks I have to push the tablet up out of the case to use it.  Very inconvenient and MAYDAY has no solution.  When in the case, if you open the camera app a big sign comes up on your screen-in the middle of where you are trying to take a picture, and says "push up to take a picture"

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: DIANE KELLEY
Reviews.Content: I have always loved the Kindle products, but this is by far the most amazing of the group. The picture is crystal clear and sound is much improved. My only comment is the location of the power and volume buttons - they are on the back edges and are not easy to get to with a cover on. I liked the edge placement better.

Reviews.Title: Quite good, with one limitation
Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: Overall I am pleased with the device.  It is a thin, light unit with an excellent display.  Battery life is excellent.  The system software is robust but not perfect, I experienced two instances of network lockup in a month, both times were resolved by a power cycle.  (In each case, the OS indicated the wireless network was up, but an application reported the network was unavailable.)  The Amazon Prime library has a good free movie selection, although they obviously prefer to sell programming -- which is priced competitively with other on-line media services.  Applications are easily available only through the Amazon app store.  Some folks will view the curated Amazon app selection as a good thing -- "sanitized for your protection".  Coming to Amazon from the wide-open Google Play environment, I was mildly annoyed by Amazon's modestly more-restrictive selection. For those who chafe at Amazon's selection, a bit of web searching will show you how to sideload apps to the Kindle (Amazon does provide the ES File Explorer app, which is a very useful tool for the task).

Reviews.Title: So so wonderful
Reviews.Author: Candy, Ohio
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is my second kindle I have.  The first one was a kindle fire HD 7". I needed a bigger screen so I got the next bigger one kindle fire HDX 8.9. I love it so much. Quality is wonderful. Kindle products will never disappoint you.  Love reading or surfing the web. This is what you need then. And you get lots of free books to.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: D. Stone "Bedford Wife"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is all I expected it to be.  It performs quickly and without very many glitches.  It is not a PC, so it does sometimes have issues opening web pages or with links, but by downloading a second browser, I could get around many of those.  I'm still exploring the many things I can do with my Kindle.  Reading on it is great, once I stopped trying to flip the pages ;)  There are so many free books available, too!  I've taken some good photos, used Skype, and played games with my grandkids.  The Special Offers included are not annoying, only seen on the opening screen.  My only concern is that it does eat up battery time pretty quickly when browsing or playing games.  I find it needs charging nearly every night.  Was awesome to have it on a recent trip.  So light to carry on a plane!

Reviews.Title: email does not sync, printing difficult
Reviews.Author: steve phillips
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed to find out that email does not sync.  I have att.net and while all the email loads, there are no contacts, folders or updating of deleted, sent, etc.  I have to manually delete all received emails.  Printing to my wireless canon pixma722 printer does not appear possible (or easily done) is another major issue.  To me, email and printing are basic functions of a tablet that should be a given feature.

Reviews.Title: Stays on it.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "fletch1"
Reviews.Content: I think I've lost my wife. She stays on it to much. But I'm happy she loves it. Oh well , at least she's home.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Carol Donovan "Luv my Westie pup"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for Christmas along with the wireless keyboard.  as a MAC user myself, I was absolutely impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 - when I can, I plan on purchasing one for myself! Sorry Apple

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet (but)
Reviews.Author: Clinton
Reviews.Content: This product is right up there with those of Apple and Samsung. I actually tried it out for 30 days for free while I had my ipad air with me. The screen is magnificent and bright much more superior to that of the ipad air. Some games actually tend to run smoother on it and I never experienced any sort of lag. It's perfect for movies, videos and some games in particular. The tablet is comfortable to hold in the hands.Now cons- from the very first day the back panel attracts fingerprint so much and is very noticeable and might be a turn off for some.The operating system is so boring and very dull looking. It's not cool and very non adjustable. I wish they had gone for an open android like system.Extra - the cameras are average, like any other tabletAll in all this is a very good product and I was very impressed with it and even though I chose the ipad over it, the only significant benefit from that is just the numerous tablet optimized apps for the ipad. Otherwise this is better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offer
Reviews.Author: Ella Lindenhofen
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", 16 GB tablet an hour ago, so I will have to return in a month or two to give a true review, but I can say that I am a 67 year old widow and not what you would call an expert in the field of high tech gadgets. I took the Kindle out of the box, plugged it in and synced up with my router and was up and running in no time. If you can read directions you can set this up without a problem. I actually watched Downton Abbey first episode from Amazon Prime and it was incredible. Picture quality is outstanding, and the sound is fantastic. There are still plenty of feature's to explore, as I would like to stream movies and watch them on my TV, etc.  I will write a follow-up in a month to see if I am still as elated as I am today.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Kinney
Reviews.Content: This is my 7th Kindle purchase, and so far the best. I have given kindles to family members and they share my enthusiasm for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I. LOVE. IT.  Beautiful display, excellent sound.  Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Acquistapace
Reviews.Content: The problem is I never want to put it down.  Watching movies with some headphones is similar to watching on my large screen tv. (not kidding).  The device is very responsive has plenty of options/settings to personalize to your preferences, such as changing the "sleep" timer setting (default is 5 minutes).  To get the full benefits of owning this latest 8.9" HDX Kindle Fire you might want to consider becoming an Amazon Prime member.  Excellent product and Worth Every Cent!!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use and video is great I would recommend it to any one. Reading books is easy on the eyes.

Reviews.Title: Changed Views on Kindle
Reviews.Author: Shannon E.
Reviews.Content: Love this product...I had no desire for a tablet type system and when I reviewed the special offer and read up on the he Kindle Fire I thought I would try it...great visual and sound as well as being handy on the go. Battery life is great as well. I charge every night so I don't know how long it will go without charge but I watched 2 movies at hospital stay accessed FB, checked email and played a couple of games to pass the time and it never went below 50% battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Bonny J Kerby
Reviews.Content: upgraded from the kindle fire, I love this new kindle. Along with the prime membership it is the best ever

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Frank E. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Love the HD brilliance of the display and the mayday button that allows direct customer service to answer and fix any problems I have. Would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" to anyone looking for a tablet. Don't waist money on a much more expensive IPad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: amv03
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this. Great picture quality. Does anything and everything I wanted and was looking for. Books are so great on here too! If you want something great for a good price I will say buy it. Only thing I don't like as much is the charge cord is short. But that's so small of an issue I don't mind. So worth the money. This is my favorite new toy!

Reviews.Title: Powerful, Fast, Useful for Any Purpose, and Fun!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle FIre HDX 8.9 - First of all, it is incredibly light and thin.  It is very comfortable to hold, and weighs much less than you would believe possible.  The web is super fast.  Downloads take only seconds - much faster than my original Kindle Fire.  I have always enjoyed my original Kindle Fire, and now I really enjoy my larger KF HDX!  The Kindle tablets are so user friendly that anyone could learn to use them like a pro, and enjoy the experience!  I would certainly buy this tablet again, and I would recommend the KF HDX 8.9 to anyone who wants a work horse of a tablet with a user friendly platform that is fast and fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Still learning more about this everyday.I do not understand the cloud too well, nor do I know exactly how to get from th cloud to the device,but maybe and old dog can learn new tricks.

Reviews.Title: new constant companion
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love this new kindle, it is my third kindle purchase. Imagine is so crisp and clear. This version is also so lite. Only negative is I don't like where on/off button is as I tend to accidentally hit it when holding horizontally.

Reviews.Title: The only Kindle worth getting, and by that i mean its amazing!
Reviews.Author: Bradley
Reviews.Content: After trying the other kindle fire products, i found they all had unacceptable compromises, like the blue tint on the hdx 7 inch,  and the slowness and poor screen quality of the kind fire hd were no where to be found on the 8.9 inch. In my opinion they should remove those models and keep only the 8.9 inch. HDX 8.9" is easily the flagship of the series, and possibly the best tablet on the market.Cons:-Incompatibility with things like the office 365 mobile ap.-Apple users coming over have no way of transferring music and songs (greedy apple, glad i left em)-Software is not rock solid, it needs polishing, i know for a fact you will run into some kind of minor bug within the first hour of vigorous online use.

Reviews.Title: No Product Disappointments With The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: STORYTELLER "GRANDPA RON"
Reviews.Content: Really growing to enjoy, but still learning the features.  Only Cons: Compatibility with sites requiring Adobe Flash.  Amazon didn't honor their 25% down w/4 monthly payment offer which was my motivating factor.  Watch out for that one!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX  8.9----
Reviews.Author: kathy babcock
Reviews.Content: I have had all the Kindle's (in order) and each time a new one came out I upgraded!  This Fire HDX is amazing.  It does everything I need it to do plus a lot more.  My son has an Ipad and after seeing this one he wanted me to trade.  The answer was a resounding NO.  I love my new Kindle Fire HDX and and hope to learn how to use it to its' highest and best use.

Reviews.Title: Four Star - Excellent for Reading , Poor for Tableting
Reviews.Author: ankitkat
Reviews.Content: Positive -Really Good Display.  Excellent for Reading Books, Magazines and PDF files . Very Light and thin. Awesome  Battery life and quick charging put this device ahead of iPad. I bought it because of these positive points only.Negative -Crashes very often while reading TIMES or NAT. GEO. magazines ,specially running videos or reading from in build pop up functionality of magazines. Very poor web browser compare to iPad Safari or Android  Phone Browser.  No GOOGLE apps .Yes you read it write - You cannot find Google Apps in Amazon App store.In Sort, If you are fan of Amazon content , just go for it. If you are looking for android tablet , please search fro Samsung Galaxy Tab. :)

Reviews.Title: Great compliment to your PC
Reviews.Author: Lenny Leonard
Reviews.Content: If you already have a personal computer, and want an easy way to read, watch tv or movies, listen to music or browse the internet, this is the device for you.  I prefer it to the Apple Ipad Air.I bought the 1st generation Kindle Fire in Dec of 2011 and loved it.  It was much more convenient and portable than a pc for media consumption.  I used it every day.This Dec 2013, I splurged and bought the Fire HDX 8.9.  Every feature has been vastly improved over the 1st gen, including adding front & rear cameras and a microphone.  Books, magazines, music, movies, tv, and games all work great!Caveat:  I never use my Kindle for work, only for fun, so I don't know how it handles work documents.I love:  The gorgeous larger screen, the smooth response, the lighter weight and longer battery life.  I think it is the best value for a tablet computer.However:  You need to have an Amazon account set up, have WiFi available and a home PC.  I think Amazon Prime is overpriced;  you don't need it, but go ahead and use up the 30 day trial period offered.  Also there is no Adobe Flash support, no HMDI, and no access to Google Play apps.  But none of these has been a problem for me.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Tablet meets the content!
Reviews.Author: Sam C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this during December promo ($50 off via amazon cc). I've owned many Ipads and Android tablets. I've read many helpful reviews here (thanks guys) before buying this tablet. Just few thoughts(i) It's lighter than the Ipad Air; ok, I never held the air but this tablet is not feathery light for me. My kindle reader ($69) I think is "light". Not that this is heavy but I was not comfortable holding it with one hand.(ii) apps; right. I use dropbox a lot. I know I can side-load those apps whatever but at this point, I don't care. I do all my works on windows laptop. If I need to read something then I will use web to access those files. I just don't care any more. I'm sure Apple has unique apps that you need for your work and school...so then buy ipad. Simple. But for me. I don't use those special apps. So This HDX works out fine for me(iii) in the end, question is, what do you do with your tablet. For me, I read Kindle books and watch Free Prime Videos. I know Ipad is able to watch Prime. But again, this tablet makes everything Amazon content related matter easier. When I went to 3 day trip, I downloaded 2 TV shows and 1 video. With many Kindle book loaded, I felt like I was ready. And my trip was fun and exciting. I know those limit (2 shows) sucks. But in the airplane, I switched to books and watched videos when I had spare time during the trip. So it worked out fine.Ask: what do I do with my tablet? If it's Prime contents and Kindle books, then, you need to get this. If your work requires those special apps for ipad, then, you should get that.Also ask: how long do you keep your gadget? If you spend $500 + tax + accessories on cheapest Ipad, then, you should make or generate more income than $500. But as for me, I never used a device more than 1 year. So if I'm gonna upgrade every 1.5 years, then, I would get by with perfectly fine HDX 8.9. When time comes, then, I will buy newer one.I'm very happy as I read, read, and read on this and watch many cool prime shows (I think they have better TV shows like "Vikings" or "Tudors" than the movies). And I think $500 + for consumption only is too much.Only thing that I wish for HDX is that other manufactures bring out folio keyboard cases.Buy this. I am enjoying this more than any ipads and android tablets I've owned (total 6 tablets so far)

Reviews.Title: I had my doubts, but this proved to be an excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: sinecure
Reviews.Content: From the specs, I could see this had the best hardware available among tablets (as of Dec 2013) - a 2.2 GHz quad core processor and a display that's out of this world, all with a weight of just over 13 oz. But the OS is not stock Android, so app compatibility was a concern. But I was able to load 1mobile market just fine, and through it several apps including Nook, Firefox, and Chrome. Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Candy Cane
Reviews.Content: I've had my kindles for several months and we have zero regrets.  They're durable and work amazingly well.  We also have iPad in the house but will not be getting upgrades.  We are sticking with Kindles from now on.  For our uses, primarily entertainment and internet, the Kindle is hands down the favorite.The speakers are far superior in sound and placement to the iPad.  The screen display is on par.  The speed and software seems less temperamental than the iPad.Buy it.  Buy one for someone you love.  The best value of any tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: RWL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother for Xmas, and she loves it. She watches movies, and reads books, and plays games, puzzles, etc. She is 71 and learned how to use it quickly, I did have to give her a few updates on how to do things, but she uses it almost everyday!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: BR "Boo Ray"
Reviews.Content: It is fast, clear, easy to use, with a great screen resolution! I bought it for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. One reason I did not want an iPad was the proprietary chargers and accessories you must buy from Apple. The Kindle Fire came with a charger but it also recharges with any of our phone chargers, you don't need a special plug like you do with Apple products.It is lightweight and has a longer than expected battery life. The speed, clarity, and ease of use exceeded our expectations! I would recommend to anyone looking for a tablet. No disappointments  here!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Replaced my Kindle Fire 7" with the HDX 8.9 and am loving it!  Not sure about the "special offers" not liking that part.  Might have been worth the few extra bucks to buy without the special offers.

Reviews.Title: You Won't Be Sorry
Reviews.Author: MonaMe
Reviews.Content: Great little device.  Amazing picture.  Really nice when coupled with Amazon Prime.  You won't be sorry with the Kindle.  Wish they had more choices for covers.  Hopefully Amazon will step up with more choices.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device
Reviews.Author: Kerry Spiker
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle HDX. However, I would not recommend purchasing the 4G capability.  It is not necessary if you have access to Wi-Fi.  I did, but I learned  from my cell phone provider that they will assess me an additional charge each month if I activate the device.  So I've chosen not to activate the device.....bottom line...... I paid extra for the 4G capability that I will never use.  In addition, you may need to investigate the compatibility of the HDX's wireless with your television.  I've been unable to push the image from the HDX to any of my TVs.  I used the Mayday button for help (which is pretty cool) and was informed I would need to purchase Netgear's Push to TV device.

Reviews.Title: So happy I bought this Kindle
Reviews.Author: Christie L Eller
Reviews.Content: So I been wanting a tablet for awhile but could not afford one. Of course, I was holding out for an iPad. However, Amazon's fantastic offer made my day.  I thought I'd give the Kindle a try and I am glad I did. I love it. I can read books, listen to music, take pictures and video, watch movies and keep up on mail and social networks without lugging my laptop around. I love that I can take it in the kitchen and access my recipe sites, plus listen to music while I cook. It has much better sound than my Dell laptop. Plus, it fits nicely in my purse. I do not find the special offers annoying and there are more than enough apps to meet my needs. I am sort of an anomaly in that I don't have a smart phone or any Apple products. The Kindle really meets all my needs at a fraction of the cost of the iPad. I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love this damn thing!
Reviews.Author: Gregg C. Michael
Reviews.Content: I have waited a long time for a product to please me and it is fantastic. Plus I have never found something so user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Love the new Kindle - but...
Reviews.Author: J. S.
Reviews.Content: There is a problem with the camera when in the case (with camera hole - purchased on Amazon), the forward facing camera is used a big logo appears in the view finder that states 'slide camera up to take picture'.  Now why in the world should I have to take the camera out of the case to take a picture?  This type of issue requires a software upgrade or fix.  The picture still takes, but it make is impossible to focus in on something.  I have seen on blogs where others have this problem also, and I know someone who has a different 3rd party case - purchased on Amazon with the same problem.  Come on Amazon - you have a great product here - now come up with a great and easy solution to fix this, or my rating may go down - I'd like to make it 5 stars.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas to Me...
Reviews.Author: Beth A. Sokol
Reviews.Content: Finally, I got this for Christmas.  Absolutely love it so far.  Beautiful screen color and clarity.  Just the right size.  Still figuring some things out yet.  Gaming on the HDX is impressive.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice
Reviews.Author: alanm32
Reviews.Content: I will make this short, to the point and focus on what I feel really matters.  Starting with the display, It is as advertised sharp with  great color and contrast. Next the kindle is fast, it has a Quad-core 2.2 GHz Krait 400 which in conjunction with a fast gpu (Adreno 330)  provides outstanding performance whether your playing games or general computing.  To sum it all up, its very light very fast great display and very good battery life.  Prior to the most recent update it would occasionally reboot by itself.  Since then  I have had  and no operating issues AT ALL.  I have owned it since 11/13.  Great Purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: kd "Kathezplc"
Reviews.Content: I Have Enjoyed each day I have had this New 8.9 HDX. I have the smaller 2012 7" HD from last year, which I was thrilled with.However I had wished I had the larger screen. My Family surprised me this year with The New HDX 8.9.I Love the larger screen of course, the clarity and Beauty of this screen is Amazing. Sound is also improved. As far as how quickly my New Kindle works it moves its faster than my last years model. I do have occasional issues with my Wifi and not a Kindle issue. We know this because in another home works great with no issues.  So I have to go into settings and turn off my wifi for a second and turn it back on, ususally works fine.  Some of you who blamed your kindle might look at your Wi Fi connection. Does this bother me No....usually takes care of its self quickly.This time around I don't have the little annoying advertisements, that was a sweet surprise.Have not had to use the help button. It is wonderful to know that I have that option.  There are changes, some of your Apps are in your cloud & take a few minutes to download to your new Kindle. Frankly I thought this was nothing to get excited about. Though some found it insulting. I found that some Apps can stay in the cloud. Music, books, games, etc....I can get them anytime its not an issue.This Kindle is So Light, and thin its like air.  It also takes Beautiful front and back pictures, & Movies.  Also if you are like me you will need a Nice case to keep you New Kindle protected. Just read the reviews or the general feel of them. I chose one made by Amazon for the Kindle. I works very well. To each her or his own likes for that.So now I have read a lot of reviews, many people find issues with everything.  I am not techy enough to rate it item to item.I can tell you the HDX is a Beautiful improvement from last years Kindle HD. I have not compared it item by item. I can say its thinner, Lighter, Screen is just Stunning.......and that was comparing it to family memebers I Pad, and that is what they said as well.So I would say do your homework (as someone said) then follow your way to the New Kindle HDX 8.9Really don't think you will be disappointed. I certainly am not. Our family bought two at the same time. Although these gifts are at different homes, we keep in touch comparing things. Both of us can not say enough about our new Kindles.Great Job Amazon, Another Winner!  Enjoy

Reviews.Title: I love this device.
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I really like the 8.9 HDX. The build quality is excellent,  the OS enhancements are well thought out, and the processor is fast. And of course the screen resolution is incomparable. This table meets my needs and I think Amazon has done themselves proud.

Reviews.Title: the last step could have been taken
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: I give this unit a 4 because the opportunity was there for kindle to have had it built with a sd-slot card capability,, they choose not to, this would have made it perfect.  rick, in Cincinnati

Reviews.Title: I Can Organize My Books Again!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Just received my new Fire HDX 8.9" (about an hour ago) and am still exploring it, but I have made one discovery that I can't wait to share.Collections are back!!The ability to organize my books into collections has been the thing I have missed most since going from Kindle Touch to fire.  Even my iPad, which is slowly losing it's mind but the Kindle App still works, doesn't let me organize my books into collections, but my new Ire HDX does.I actually bought this kindle to use as a tablet since my old iPad has been going senile and losing things.  I figured since the Kindle app still worked, I would simply use it as an eReader with a larger screen.  It's still good for that and I may give it to my granddaughter, but I have nearly a thousand books and finding a particular one can take ten minutes.No more long searches.  Collections are back.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever tablet.  I wasn't sure whether to go with a Windows or Google-based product but ultimately decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig because of it's top-rated screen quality.  I've only had it for a little over a week and so far I am really impressed!
