I know from reading a lot of reviews that many people would like to see more apps such as what you can get at the Google store...I must admit there a few that I have on my Android phone that I can't get on Amazon but I am hopeful that they will eventually get added.  The tablet is incredibly thin and light!  I did also purchase the Origami polyurethane case.  It does add significant weight to the Kindle Fire HDX but... it does provide great protection with a stand that folds into some cool designs...a nice change from most stand cases.  Overall I am really satisfied with my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig as I've loaded my gmail, and most of the apps that are most important to me.  We are now a 4- Kindle family!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Tammy Nelson
Reviews.Content: My husband is very happy with his Kindle Fire HDX, and that is an accomplishment and a compliment to Amazon.He is a Web Master and a Professor teaching Dreamweaver at a nearby city college and he loves the way his web pages look on the kindle HDX. It's digital quality is to die for. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK AMAZON...

Reviews.Title: Great Little Machine
Reviews.Author: bvail "meganik"
Reviews.Content: First, my Kindle history:2010 - downloaded Kindle app to smart phone2011 - Kindle 3g 6" screen - pretty lame for internet - e-ink no color2012 - Kindle Fire - nice color - better for e-mail, etc.2013 - 8.9"All I can say is this thing rocks.  Beautiful HD screen.  Very fast on internet.  Surprising sound - not like my Kindle Fire.I chose not to get the 3G version, as I have the FoxFi app on my smart phone which makes it a hot spot as long as the phone has a signal.I waited until Amazon had a special offer and last month they had thirty bucks off any HDX so I pulled the trigger the last day of the offer.  Also signed up for the Amazon CC for an additional fifty bucks off.  I'm a prime member so free two day shipping and a price of $399 delivered for this bad boy.  How good is that?Oops, forgot to add that when I opened the box and took the Kindle out I'm thinking this is a work of art.  Very thin, elegant with simple controls on the back and light as a feather.As far as 'limited apps' go, how many does one want?  From what I gather but haven't tried yet is to go to settings and allow downloading of non-Kindle Amazon apps.  Also, some complain they can't access YouTube.  Oh contraire!  Go to silk and then type your default browser in the address box (I use MSN but freebies like FoxFire would probably work)  and then go to YouTube or whatever you wish.  Easy Peasy :o)I've had this jewel for only a couple of weeks, but I'm totally satisfied.  My wife, who has no experience with a Kindle at all was very impressed with it, checked her email, etc and she is somewhat of a Luddite :o).  I had to talk long and hard for her to switch from dumb to smart phone.  She now loves her Samsung Galaxy III.One thing I don't get is the many reviewers who complain that this is not a full featured notebook and the many who compare it to iOS units.  But then I'm biased against anything Apple, be it phone, mp3, computer, whatever.  This Kindle fits my needs and I'm pretty sure there are workarounds for utilities, such as Word, but then I have computers for those tasks.One more thing.  As thin and lite and 'pretty' as this unit is I wouldn't want to scar it up, so like all my electronics I will install a cover.  Most are pretty expensive but I found this one:  Maxboost Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Case Book  Leather Stand Cover  for the measly price of $12.95 delivered.Cons?  None to speak of...

Reviews.Title: Works perfect, including "miracast" wireless WiFi projection, to my big screen LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Donato "sailor.in.florida"
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet for reading ebooks, and watching videos, especially taking advantage of Amazon Prime's free instant movies & TV shows.  I use the Kindle Fire's "miracast" setting to project the picture to my vintage big screen,  65"  Panasonic LCD TV, (my TV is 10 yrs old). I use  Belkin's WiFi Screencast Streaming adapter, which is HDMI connected  to my TV (also purchased from Amazon).  My new Kindle Fire HDX (via miracast app setting) connects to the Belkin adapter via WiFi, transmitting the video, which is then transmitted by Belkin to the TV. Works Great as advertized. Screen on Kindle is crisp & outstanding. On my wish list would be to include a USB connector, which it does not have.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dale L. Dawson
Reviews.Content: The best device for the money! Unfortunately it is so new that developers have yet to update their apps to fit the 8.9" HDX format, but I am waiting patiently. For this old mans eyes, it's size beats the 7".

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I made the switch from the Nook Color to this, and I have absolutely no regrets!!!  I was nervous at first, but after having my kindle for a few weeks I'm upset that I didn't make the switch sooner!  The product itself is just so much better - the operating system is simpler and easier to navigate, the display is so much more vivid, and I've even noticed that 50% of the books that I had on my B&N; wish list were cheaper on Amazon (the others were the same price - none were higher).  Definitely love my new Kindle, as both an e-reader and as a tablet!

Reviews.Title: What an excellent machine.
Reviews.Author: Pamster
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and certainly my favorite.  It's great for reading, but then, all of them are.  I downloaded some movie rentals to take on a trip, and even though I downloaded them in the lowest quality resolutoin in order to save space on the device, they still displayed beautifully on the device itself.  (Not sure how they would have looked on a TV screen or larger monitor, but I wasn't trying that.)  Today I got it set up to stream to my TV using Display Mirroring - what a great feature that is.  I can hardly wait to try out some more of the features.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Gassner
Reviews.Content: I have had two previous kindles.  One with the keypad as the bottom, which I broke, and the second the kindle touch.  Loved it, but missed the backlit feature of the ipad I had borrowed while waiting for the second kindle to arrive.  The paperwhite was not out then.  Later purchased a cheap tablet on line from Walmart, which worked fine, but was slower than all get out.  Ordered the fire hdx when amazon offered the no interest financing, and all I can say is WOW.  Speed and performance wise, it left the tablet sitting in the dust.  Was kind of alien at first, but learned more about the fire each day, making it more fun  and productive to use each day.  I now find myself reading while listening to free music, and checking my email inbetween.  The only thing I wish that kindle had included, was a slot for SD cards, but hey, who knows what tomorrow holds.

Reviews.Title: This is the best Kindle by far
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Rahn
Reviews.Content: If you read books or surf the web, this is for you.  It is the best Kindle by far and sending emails are simple as you type words appear on a line and you can choose which word you want to use greatly speeding up doing emails.  It also has a mic for dictation or emails.

Reviews.Title: just do it!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this thing. Buy the otter box with it. Saved my butt a couple times already :). Fun games, stunning video, awesome audio. Very great tablet. Would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: My new Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Walter F. Baranowski Jr.
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to read and all the great app.,  As a 79 year old I found easy and you always have help

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Dawn R
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS KINDLE. I HAVE ONLY USED FOR EMAILS AND READING BUT I JUST LOVE IT. I DIDN'T RECEIVE MY SPECIAL OFFERS SO I AM NOT SURE WHAT THEY ARE OR WERE. IF YOU ARE ON THE FENCE ABOUT GETTING A KINDLE GO FOR THE BIGGER SCREEN AND HDX DISPLAY-GLAD I PICKED THIS TABLET OVER ANOTHER BRAND.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Good Guy
Reviews.Content: I researched tablets heavily and eventually decided on the Kindle HDX. All features that I saw in most tablets work seamlessly and quickly. The immediate definitions while reading is a big plus. The only downfall, which may or may not be unique to the Kindle, is it had very poor connectivity to my Wi-Fi. I had to buy a stronger router, but that fixed the problem.I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: wonderful again Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Diana Fournier
Reviews.Content: This is our sixth kindle fire in the household and I'm in love! I love the larger screen, dual cameras, best present from my hubby I've gotten in awhile! I didn't originally think I needed am upgrade from the original fire hd but I'm glad he did!

Reviews.Title: What's not to LOVE
Reviews.Author: fifthzepin
Reviews.Content: I've had a Kindel Fire for almost 3 years. I have been considering a purchase of a tablet or another Kindle. I finally decided to make the jump and purchase the new Kindle Fire HDX with the large screen. I am so pleased, what a wonderful thing.....I loved my old "Fire" but this 8.9 display is just perfect. I also purchased the case at the same time and didn't know if I'd like it but the origami case is great, glad I took a chance and choose it.I was on my old "Fire" almost everyday, this beautiful new HDX 8.9 took up where the old left off and soars higher.Go ahead, jump, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Rafael Olivo
Reviews.Content: The images are crisp and beautiful, no pixel distortion even in shadowed areas of images. Movies run smoothly and internal speakers have reasonable fidelity. Book and magazine reading offers excellent features. Allows to highlight sections, take notes, look up definitions automatically in dictionaries and Wikipedia, connects you on-line with a word or phrase selected. Mayday button was used once for help locating a file and the response was immediate and very helpful. Battery duration even with constant usage is dependable.

Reviews.Title: my Mayday doesn't work,  but i really like everything ether about this tablet!
Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: I bought the 32 gb  8.9 HDX . I have only used it about a week.  So far I am impressed with the speed of it.  The screen is awesome.  I am so happy I checked out all the other tablets for months and finally decided on this one!  I have downloaded free movies from prime and watched them recently.  Borrowed a book on it from my local library and bought a couple books on Amazon.  Got some games on the app store and the graphics are excellent.  So far I really like everything about this tablet.  However the Mayday option does not work on mine, it takes me to a help page with a picture of a sad dog that says sorry this link is no longer here.  Anyone know how to get this function to work?  I'm not sure why it doesn't,  but I'm still going to give five stars because I'm really enjoying this.  This is my favorite tablet I've had so far.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Help - Now at hour two
Reviews.Author: DesertFey "DesertFey"
Reviews.Content: I am on hour TWO with a THIRD person trying to get items from my 'yourMediaLibrary' up to the Amazon Cloud so I can then get them to my new Kindle.  Really loving the Kindle, but if Amazon can't get stuff to the Cloud that I have purchased over the years, I'm going to return it and go with another tablet.  I specifically bought the Kindle to start using their highly hyped Cloud availability.  If I want to sit around and transfer Amazon purchased items to my Kindle from my computer, I think I'll do it with another tablet.  Still sitting here waiting for help...... Cannot believe that after the first Mayday call (pretty cool feature) that the second person went off and then disconnected.  NOT happy with the help (all very nice and sorry about everything) but lets get this Kindle and YourMediaLibrary connected.  Two and one-half hours.............not how I wanted to spend New Year's Day on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Another great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Nancy Gilliam
Reviews.Content: This is our 5th kindle.  All have done what they were designed to do and do it well.  We use Amazon a lot and this works for us.  It is great to not have to purchase our books, movies & apps again. We just downloaded them to our new Kindle.  I will not repeat to much all the good things others have said.  Now I have seen a common complaint about goggle apps, not being able to load. This is a none issue.  It can be done. Just check the internet.  I do it all the time.  I had to do a factory reset when I was trying to down load 2 movies, 10 books, 3 songs and about 15 apps all at the same time..  My books would not stay open. I pushed the Mayday button & was able to get straightened out.  It was great.All the tablets are great.  This one is one of the best out there.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Paulette J. Perez
Reviews.Content: I am still learning it but I really love having my new Kindle. It is really great and I will continue checking out all it's really great things.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Gail Sims
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire 7" about three years ago.  I upgraded to the kindle fire HDX 8.9 this Christmas.  The difference in amazingly wonderful.  Thanks for a great tablet at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Just what I thought it would be,
Reviews.Author: Leonard D. Jompulsky
Reviews.Content: An exceptionally fine tablet. Great vivid colors, light weight and fun to use and easy to navigate.Very happy that my children bought this for me.

Reviews.Title: i like it very much, the display is very clearly, process is so fast. the Mayday function is wonderful.
Reviews.Author: shi guo ping
Reviews.Content: it's perfect and better than ipad mini.the price is more competitive.also the service for Amazon is the best of all(Mayday is wonderful)

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Diva45
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Kindle HDX 8.9, I already own the Kindle Fire HD 32GB "7". It's easy to use, & I just love Amazon, I'm really excited that I now have a rear camera, cause I just love taking pictures. It's very light easy to use, I'm trying to get use to how fast it goes. Anyone who don't have one please purchase one it's really something you and the whole family can used.

Reviews.Title: Ongoing problems
Reviews.Author: BillFL
Reviews.Content: The resolution is excellent, response times very good.Problem: intermittently unit stopped with the blue screen of death; upon rebooting blue screen still displayed; after several minutes unit would reboot but reboot extremely slow.Occasionally, when using back arrow unit aborted with totally black screen; same reboot problem.Tech support made assurances fix would be downloaded; did not happenStill some hidden bugs in the overall system

Reviews.Title: I am a happy camper!
Reviews.Author: H. McCaddin
Reviews.Content: I have only had this for a few days, but I love it! The battery is long lasting so far, but haven't watched movies or anything yet. It was a breeze to get set up and going. Very user friendly and so skinny! I have yet to have an issue with it. Will add to review if something negative pops up in the future. Am very happy now!

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX
Reviews.Author: Diamond D
Reviews.Content: I had a HD fire, and thought it was good, but the HDX blows the HD fire away! It's so much faster, sleeker, and lighter. Great price, great product!

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: maam
Reviews.Content: worked right out the box very easy to maneuver screen brightness is adjustabel and or adjust for you love that feature. HD quality is fantastic. still figuring out features but very happy with. light weight fits in my bag without weighing it down. battery charges doe snot last it you are playing games for hours on end and forget the time! oops! need to buy a second one so hubby will leave mine alone

Reviews.Title: GREAT !
Reviews.Author: tetvet6768
Reviews.Content: Bar none - nothing less can be said. Great screen, great color, great graphics, great lay-out, great UI, great apps, easy set-up and integration with other components (Kindle PaperWhite 3G) and previous purchases of books, etc.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, with one tiny issue.
Reviews.Author: Kellen Wynn
Reviews.Content: Incredibly impressed with this tablet. Startlingly light, fast and responsive. Sure, the Appstore is lacking, but side loading apps is super simple. Mayday works perfectly, just as advertised.You can't get a better tablet, this size with this kind of hardware, for the price. Definitely recommend!----------UPDATE------------This is just a personal opinion, and I'm not going to dock a star or anything. I just don't like how the charger fits into the device. It sits at a kind of cock-eyed angle, sort of pointed up. I feel like I'm breaking it every time I plug it in to charge. Not a big deal at all! Just be kind of careful.ALSO! I'd recommend getting rid of the special offers. (which you can do at anytime, for $15 plus tax) I felt like it really drained my battery very quickly. Again, just a personal opinion. My original opinion stands, that this is the best tablet you can get for the money, and really is the best tablet I have ever used.----------UPDATE #2----------Finally having issues at a little under three months, I knew such an amazing device has to have a flaw. Starting 3 days ago, my Kindle started spazzing out (the only way to describe it). It wouldn't select the book I requested, instead it opened Silk and navigated me through 2 yahoo pages and a Wikipedia entry, all by itself. It freaked out while scrolling, arbitrarily zooming in an out of pictures on twitter and Facebook. While reading, it would highlight words and navigate me all through the reading menus and stuff. It was exhausting. I did a factory reset last night, thinking it was something I downloaded. This did not resolve the issue. So I called Amazon Customer Service today for help. Within 5 minutes, after explaining my problem, they offered to replace my device, which will be here by Saturday, 03/15. I am docking one star, because Customer Service does not attest to the quality of the device. I haven't dropped my Kindle a single time in 3 months, it's barely even been out of my house. These issues were just out of the blue and random.Other than this issue, the device was great and I'm really looking forward to my replacement and jumping back into my books and tv shows :D

Reviews.Title: Fire is on fire
Reviews.Author: Barbara Z. Chadwick "waterlily"
Reviews.Content: Just love EVERYTHING ABOUT THE FIRE.  Love the help gosh are they great.  It is faster, clean and lighter........This is my third............thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: Can't wait for new apps to come but love what I have!! Video and audio quality are out of this world

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Sonya Mosley
Reviews.Content: best thing I ever bought. Very good product I would buy again. I haven't had a problem with it yet. I love how music plays on it, download speed is fast. taking pictures  is quick and easy.I love my kindle

Reviews.Title: Loved the kindle fire hdx!
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed the kindle fire, very user friendly.... Initiative, great display and fun to use. Definitely going to be buying one... Love how my books sync with each device.

Reviews.Title: GOT EVEN BETTER
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: Got the free trial offer it was really hard to give it up but Xmas was around the corner. This is by far is the best Kindle ever.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Graphics
Reviews.Author: Ryan Williams
Reviews.Content: As for an entertainment device, the HDX is outstanding. My only drawback was that the apps are not friendly with my office applications. I am sure as time goes on the app store will be very comparable to the google store.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Janice C. Friel
Reviews.Content: Never thought a strap would be so convenient. Love the ID pocket and auto on/off. This was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "falcon"
Reviews.Content: I was so pleased with my "HD" ... I was not looking for significant advances for a long time.  The HDX is really spectacular. Every element of this tablet is the best ... I can't imagine what the next HDX advance could bring.  One caution ... the price tag was a big "move up".  If that continues ... the Kindle Fire will lose it's edge!

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: the HDX is wonderful. the clear bright screen works great both indoors and outside in the sun. I can sit outside and read my books I downloaded. I love the white background also. makes it much easier to read. picking up wifi also works great outside away from the router. I'm very happy I bought the Kindle HDX over the I-pad I was looking at also. thanks for making a great unit.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Happy With My purchase
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Penelope Twain"
Reviews.Content: Pretty light.  Video quality is very crisp.  Sound is good enough...although I wish it were a little louder.  Very easy to navigate and I am just a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Best for me!
Reviews.Author: alindwurm
Reviews.Content: I have looked at other tablets and even purchased an iPad so I could compare the Fire with it. The Fire, for me at least,  is easier to use.I do wish the screen was larger and wish that I can use the account I already have with Google play to watch the movies I already purchased via my Pantech Flex, but that's okay. The best part is reading my books on a larger screen. And, Mayday is just great! It's wonderful to have a customer service rep ready to help you anytime. I am very happy I chose this Kindle Fire! And, yes, the iPad was returned.

Reviews.Title: Very nice quality of picture and sound
Reviews.Author: HaTsUnE NeKo "Life is a puzzle, and someone f...
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace my Kindle Fire SD version. love it but it does have a downside at this moment, it don't like netgear wireless modems. At the time of this review that's about the only downside of this product. but since all my wireless and modems are of netgear i cant connect it to the net without piggybacking it off another network.It is a known issue so it is being worked on.So unless you have a netgear network, you should be fine.Awesome product and great picture quality.5 stars for everything, -1 star for the netgear problem.

Reviews.Title: Just arrived
Reviews.Author: Tom Airhart
Reviews.Content: This Kindle just arrived on December 10th so I haven't had a chance to put it through its paces yet.  I did take advantage of trying the Mayday button and the service is prompt and efficient.  The HDX is head and shoulders above the Fire HD in performance.

Reviews.Title: Top of the line
Reviews.Author: Susan L. Kaul
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle fire I had the original Kindle fire before the screens started getting so fancy but now the HDX is unbelievable it is so fast I have never had a computer online more fast than this thing it also has the crystal clarity of  beauty on every page. I love it ! also picture taking is unbelievable it's the best I I just can't believe how many improvements have been done to it

Reviews.Title: Love my new tablet
Reviews.Author: Anne Mummert
Reviews.Content: I'm not a gadget girl so I'm slowly finding my way around my new Kindle. Was able to take and email a photo yesterday.Only critical thing I've found thus far is not being able to personalize your screen. Don't particularly like the mechanical images selected. Ok. I'm a girl and NOT mechanical. How about some beautiful beaches, mountains, flowers, dogs or kittens?!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT HESITATE, BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Sergio Basilides Pascual "Basilides"
Reviews.Content: First time entering the world of Tablets. I advise a lot, and all they said Sansung and Mac, I decided to go for Amazon, and I was not wrong at all, fast, friendly and easy to operate. I gave it to my wife, I want to have one for me. My compliments.

Reviews.Title: And the winning tablet is ...
Reviews.Author: Gandalfe
Reviews.Content: Wow, okay I'm biased, but wow. I use this device at least two hours a day on my bus commute and people now rely on me for certain kinds of research. With the 4G this is blazingly fast. The video is stunning and the speakers surprisingly good considering the small form factor. I also really appreciate that the battery last longer, the device is lighter than my HD, and the rear-mounted camera is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: Sweets Ervin
Reviews.Content: I absolutely  love  this Kindle, Mayday  is  always  so helpful, I currently  own  the Kindle Hd  and 1st  generation.  If  this  one  would  have  came  out  first,  would  not  have brought  the  other two.  This kindle  is  thinner  than the iPad 2, a little  smaller  but  side  by  side,  you  really  can't  tell  the  difference. If  you  own 2  Kindles  and  read a  lot,  once  you  put  one  down and  pick  up  the  other  one,  it  takes  you  to  that  location.  This  wasn't  something  mentioned  on  the  website  but  an  added  bonus,  just  wanted  to  share.

Reviews.Title: Using and loving it!!
Reviews.Author: John J. Beeler "JB"
Reviews.Content: This year I switched from my Nook HD to the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and love it.  It is super easy to use and super fast.  I even used the Mayday button on my first day and had my question answered immediately, by a friendly tech.  He was very helpful.  So glad I made the switch.  I even used Amazon Prime many times and amazed how fast I receive my purchases.  I will recommend the Fire HDX 8.9 to all my friends!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Barbie Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This was everything I hoped for. My birthday and Christmas gift in one.This is my third Kindle. We have become a kindle family.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Ginger M Artigue
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire quickly. Awesome product!  Easy to use and battery stays charged a long time. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Tried it free for 30 days and did not want to give it back. So great for our family to watch shows, play games and read.so convenient to check emails as well. Picture quality was amazing!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Twigg
Reviews.Content: So far my wife really likes it and has given me permission to dispose of her 1st generation iPad to help defray the cost of HER Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Gregory Bleeker Jr.
Reviews.Content: The "Mayday Button" is awesome, within 5 seconds I had someone on my screen both times I pushed it, it helps having an Amazon Prime account if you plan on buying this...Not as featuresque as the iPad Air which I have also, but it can come pretty close at times...

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: I've been reading a kindle for a very long time.  Have read over 300 books on my old kindle.  Just decided to order the new kindle fire.  It has definitely exceeded my expectations.  I've recommended the kindle fire to all my friends and my book club.  It's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love it (with a few complaints)
Reviews.Author: LUCY EARHART
Reviews.Content: This was given to me as a gift and I love it!  I had a Nook color that was smaller and more bulky.  This is slim and easy to use.  I only have three small complaints.  One:  I don't like where they placed the plugin for the charger on the device.  Two:  There should be more font size options for books.  There are only two and the Nook had several.  Three:  So far, there is only one option for a case and that is the origami case.  It doubles the weight because it is a heavy duty case and I don't like the way you have to maneuver it to get it to a standing position.  Other then those three small complaints, I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: It is light weighted and has two cameras
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Gourdine
Reviews.Content: I like it.  It is much lighter that the original Kindle so you can take it with you without being weighted down.  I also like that I can take pictures with it instead of also having to take a camera with me also.

Reviews.Title: The new Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: best Kindle ever! The display just pops out at you. The new Silk is a great improvement. Mayday is a nice feature. The display for reading as bright and clear. The new thinner design makes it much easier to hold while reading. I think this was an excellent investment.

Reviews.Title: HDX everything I wanted and more.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have been using the original kindle for about two years now.  The Fire HDX blows that one one away.  I can do so much more.  The HDX has a brilliant screen, great sound, and very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: YAY! SO Pretty!
Reviews.Author: Metalette
Reviews.Content: After years of being single, I think I want to marry my new Kindle HDX 8.9.... *sigh* Love at first sight.

Reviews.Title: HDX Dream Machine
Reviews.Author: nedjinski
Reviews.Content: It's hard not to give this thing 5 stars - I was an early Kindle Fire adopter - I had the first edition KF 7" , then the 8.9 HD, and now the 8.9 HDX. The evolution of this device has been amazing. With each iteration I was highly impressed, but none more so than this new HDX - it is simply incredible - very fast, very smooth, light weight, super sharp screen graphics. I can't imagine these things being exponentially better in a year or two.I would like it if it were more of a device open to the rest of the world - meaning it would run all apps in the google play store seamlessly - but it does what it does very, very well.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Quality tablet for reading/web browsing.
Reviews.Author: LostITGuy
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX as the kindle versions of books I needed were $120+ cheaper.  As far as the HDX unit itself, I've been very impressed with the build quality and construction.  My unit does not exhibit the blue tinge that I've read about in other reviews, and backlight quality is phenomenal.  I use my HDX primarily for reading and web browsing, and both have been very enjoyable on the unit.  Both Kindle books and PDFs look absolutely gorgeous on the 2560x1600 screen (even older scanned texts).  I ended up purchasing the 8.9" as the 7" screen was too small for me.  Web browsing with the silk browser also looks great although there is stuttering on some bloated pages (I have not tried side-loading the Google Play store and using chrome yet).  Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and can definitely recommend the unit to anyone using it primarily for web browsing/reading.As far as the special offers, they only show up on the home/lock screen and are not annoying.  I haven't paid to remove them as they really have not bothered me (and I've been lazy)

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Dorothy L
Reviews.Content: This version, so far, has a faster Silk browser than the HD version and hasn't frozen up yet.  This was a big issue with the HD version.  I've only had the HDX three days, but so far so good.  Other features are great and the improvements have made it better.  I love the Fire, so I hope the past browser issues are really resolved in this version.  I haven't had an opportunity to try Mayday, but probably will soon to learn how to use some of the features I haven't utilized before.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ms. Cynthia A. Hart
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE my new Kindle!!!  I bought the Kindle Fire when it was first introduced 2 years ago.  Have been waiting to see what new Kindle would be introduced this year.  Once I saw this one, I knew that I was ready to buy a new one.  It also have a larger harddrive which I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: I have only had mine a couple of weeks but so far I really like it. Very easy to use it has all that I need on it. Glad there is a camera front and rear. It would be nice if it were open to more apps.

Reviews.Title: HDX is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my HDX 8.9! The movies in hd are amazing to watch. One thing I have noticed is that if I want the battery to last I need to dim the brightness of the screen. Whenever I watch a movie though I make sure to change back to auto brightness

Reviews.Title: Great idea, very poor delivery.
Reviews.Author: Adam Cusick
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 should be fantastic but it misses the mark by a long shot.  I'm a geek through and through.  HTC One, Nexus7 (2nd gen), 3 rokus, raspberri pi, media sever, I mean the works.  When I had the opportunity to try out this device I read the specs and it looks pretty good on paper.  It is however limited severely by the shell that amazon has placed around it.  Not having true android market, gmail, and access to your purchased android apps makes this device ridiculous.  There is currently no root for this device as it is so new.  Those things are a problem that Amazon should work at fixing.  I'd like to see this tablet with a 49.99 unlock from amazon allowing you to use it as an actual android tablet.  Then you'd have the great specs that they've put together combined with the full functionality of android.  Bottom line, if you're wanting this don't. Go get the Galaxy Note 8 inch.  It will do everything this will plus more.  Price is about equal.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves it. Can't get her off the darn thing. Recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: A very solid device
Reviews.Author: Flashfire
Reviews.Content: I've had this for about four months now, purchased during the promotional period around Christmas. Prior to that I didn't have much use for tablets but this one has changed my mind and become part of my daily routine.First, the audio/visual side of it works very well for me. Obviously the HD display creates very sharp images and video playback runs smoothly, looks excellent (with a high-quality source), and I have had no complaints about the sound. I added the origami case and while some people say the design doesn't really affect the sound, I do think it improves it slightly by helping redirect it back toward you just a bit. Even without it, you can hear everything just fine.I can't really get into all the deeper details about how the tablet itself works except to say navigation is simple and easy for me. The carousel is a snap to customize as far as showing what you want on it with the rest of your apps elsewhere.I mostly use the tablet for e-books, some games, and Amazon Prime videos. I've also propped the tablet up in the kitchen to follow a recipe without having to print something out or go back to the CPU to double-check something.  I have always been a traditionalist when it comes to reading, preferring the physical feel of a book in my hands, but having it on a tablet compared to a smaller device has made me change my mind.  It's probably a standard option, but I also prefer being able to set it as white text on a black background since my eyes are a little more sensitive to bright things than usual.  It just helps keep them from getting strained.A major selling point of the device is the ability to watch video through Amazon Prime.  The simple fact of the matter is you aren't going to maximize the potential of the Kindle Fire without it, because it opens up a ton of viewing options when it comes to movies and TV shows.Not everything is free through the instant video service, of course, but there's still a whole lot of stuff you can access that way.  You just have to see what the options are for each film or show.  Some allow you to download directly to the device while others don't.This should be showing up in the right place, but I bought the 64 GB version, wifi only, because for the most part it's an at-home device.  When I thought about what I pay for home internet vs. what I'd probably be paying to stream or download over a 4G connection, it made more sense for me to get the wifi-only version and live with knowing that if I'm going to take a vacation or otherwise be out of town, I'd have to either download stuff directly to the tablet before I go or hope to have a wifi signal somewhere.As an example, I took an overnight trip out of town and even though I stayed at a place with wifi, I didn't bother getting it.  I just downloaded a few episodes of a TV show to watch and that was that.  I also took a two-day train ride that did not have wifi, and I was able to watch an entire season of a TV show during the trip.  The HD episodes took up about 3 GB each so I came pretty close to maxing out the storage capacity, but as soon as I finished watching an episode I just deleted it.Be aware that once you start watching a show or movie you've downloaded, if you're not connected you have 48 hours to "verify" things again or you won't be able to watch that particular download until you do.  This is really a great feature of the device, since you can actually watch downloaded stuff while being completely offline for a bit.  It made the train trip extremely convenient, and I also got through most of two e-books by the end of it as well.I find the battery life to be pretty much as advertised.  It holds up well even when watching a few videos in succession, though I often charge it when I'm not using it.The camera gives a good enough image, but the examples I've taken with it seemed to have a bit of a contrast issue compared to my smartphone or the actual camera I have.  I'm not the kind of person to go around taking pictures or video with a tablet anyway, so it's not a big deal to me.  The camera itself was hardly a factor in what I decided to get.One small criticism I have is probably not a device-specific thing, but it does bear mentioning.  I have it set to automatically update my apps, though from time to time an app will prompt me to update and send me to the appstore only for there to be no "update" option.  On a few occasions, I've had to uninstall then reinstall the app in order for the update to register.  The last couple weeks, at least, apps I had that problem with seem to have auto-updated fine, so this may be fixed.By the way, if you're concerned about the "special offers" being intrusive or anything like that, they're not. When you access the device, they're no more than a displayed ad that goes away when you unlock the device, and you're on to what you want to do.  there's a tab at the top of the home screen to view all offers if you want to.  You can also spend $15 (I think) if you want to have them removed, so you're not stuck with them if you originally buy a device that comes with them.Overall, for what I got the tablet for, it meets or exceeds my needs. It's highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: BAD BAD BAD
Reviews.Author: Chad Michael Wright
Reviews.Content: One star is really a generous rating for this item. The product arrived fine and quickly. That is were the good rating ends. First day of using it the camera would shut down for no reason. As it was Christmas with family photos are super important. Contacted amazon and they sent another and more camera problems except it would shut down entire device.  Contacted amazon again and  third device would not hold a charge. I returned third and final device for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Hufnagel
Reviews.Content: I originally chose the kindle fire HDX because of their claim of being lighter and better screen resolution  It's delivers in that respect but  fails in so many others.  WiFi is sketchy.  Apps (only a fraction of available apps compared to apple or android market) don't load and I've spent hours watching a spinning circle.. I have  high end router and although it says my connection is "excellent", nothing is smooth.I've had to boot from factory settings several times and the help screen unfortunately is staffed with folks, that are nice but not very knowledgeable.  I keep getting kicked up to the next tech over and over with nothing solved.  I regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: very unsatisfied to the point of selling after 1 week of use for 30% off....JUNK!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt Federico
Reviews.Content: Not very impressed with actual performance of this tablet...Freezes constantlyAuto correct for typing suggestions way offAuto correct for typing overrides anything typed to what it thinks is rightKeyboard space bar tiny and thinks I want a period after every word.. example: hello.my.name.is.WiFi error when still connected says no service then freezes tablet but until reset000 help from Amazon for issues or.support yet  claims to have great customer serviceEditing words is a joke the cursor jumps around to every spot other than the one requested then likes to split words to make irrelevant suggestions that causes more problems.Lots of issues that even my 7" RCA tablet doesn't have that I bought for 70$After my experience I will never recommend this to anyone or purchase another myselfMost irritating issue... Auto correct assumes what I want to say but no where even close, extra useless letters and splits words to make 2 complete random words, and most of all I'm sick of having to double or even triple check to make sure spaces between words aren't replaced with periods yet it will overrideMy advice is to reconsider  buying this tablet and a sure waste of time and money thinking.you got a good deal on a decent tablet...(took 2 hours to make this review from all the problems it caused and freezing up.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!
Reviews.Author: Livinlite "M Madonia"
Reviews.Content: First -- ordered and shipped/received in less than 24 hours......AMAZING Amazon!Second -- Exactly as described and was up and running in under 5 minutes --- it doesn't get any better than that!Third -- I have owned IPad 2 and IPad Mini -- this Kindle is the IPad killer for sure.Finally -- Best bang for your buck.  If you are on the fence, lean in and get this tablet for yourself.

Reviews.Title: WIFI
Reviews.Author: DONNA
Reviews.Content: I have had problems with it connecting to my WIFI. It is connected, however states that there is no internet. I have a wireless network and has a strong connection. This kindle freezes in games constantly. I have the kindle fire and never had any problems with it.The only positive thing I can say about this kindle, is the screen is larger and the may day. But that hasn't been able to answer the question of the freezing and WIFI. They just have me do a reset. Which works for a while, but not long.

Reviews.Title: This Is An Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Katt Winter
Reviews.Content: I am a techie, and an Amazon Prime lover. I own a Note 3, MSI GT70, Ipad4, Note 10.1 2014, and a few older tablets for reading including an underwhelming 2012 HD refurbished Kindle. I was annoyed with the old HD for many reasons and was going to return it until my son stole it for Kindle Free Time, which btw, is worth the subscription. However, as many people do who don't have multiple screen homes (Kindle HD 2012 was first and only at the time) I was annoyed by its limits and didn't see it's merits.Even with my plethora of fancy and infancy devices I missed Amazon's set up for books and video streaming. I could have got the all new version of the HD cheaply but I thought for a few dollars more having the most recent Kindle would've hurt, would have all the product support (os updates, lending library, and Prime HD streams). However, what I didn't know about was the free Prime downloads they added!!!!!Unfortunately this feature will only be amazingly useful on Kindle with higher memory. It makes me want to cry. :( If you want to store your music and have up to four or so 1080p movies downloaded for offline use 16 gigs is too small. It's the case for any tablet, and to be honest 32 is really very little. The os your apps and games will eat that space in no time. It's not like the olden days.Aside from the os eating all my space, I have to say if you're a Prime Member the HDX is a need. It's so lovely watching videos for free that were optimized for your device in impressive full 1080p. I had no idea how useful this would be for more than a bedside companion. No 4G or purchases necessary to enjoy a show while you're waiting at the doctor. In that respect alone, if you're a loyal Amazon subscriber regardless of the tablet this is a no brained thing you will enjoy.The old HD lags and is slow, but this model is fast. You can write accurately and with ease. The battery life might make you sad, but if you're reading I believe you have 17 hours. Which, is totally why you own a fire right? ;)The app store is still limited, and behind ios and android in updates and releases, but Amazon is working on getting exclusive games for its tablet owners like the Telltale Walking Dead series. Which is amazing...I'm pregnant and struggling with a lot of physical issues and have been confined to my bed so gadgets have become very important. I doubt I could rationalize spending $300 of tech money on an 8.9 or even a 7 inch HDX when for that I could purchase a Nexus 10 or 7, or even a used retina ipad mini, but I can't say I don't want one. (There is one on my wishlist).If you're new to technology and tablets you will love an HDX, if you're a loyal Amazon Prime fan and use their wonderful services then you will enjoy this. It's fast. So fast, and streams in true HD with proper broadband connection so you will only miss the downloads when you're mobile. We all know Kindle Ebooks beat all other ebooks, and Amazon makes the best reading app. It's still an impressive ereader, and the Goodreads integration makes my nerdy soul happy.Cons are it's still a bit heavy for a reader, but a nice case with a strap should remedy that. No back camera, so if this is going to be your main tablet you will be saddened. No HDMI port but those are becoming dinosaur tech, and adapters or Miracast exists now for older tv's. No Google Play store... But I have to say something as a techie dork. Amazon I hope you're listening, you guys almost have it right. What do I mean?You're providing great hardware for discounted prices and adding amazing customer service to your product for no additional cost. *Slow Clap* You're producing Amazon Exclusive content that is available only on your devices, but you allow other devices access to your main features so you're not self isolating either like Apple can.The HDX is truly a step in the right direction of you guys can do the following:Open The Play Store. Trust your products and store, it's great. Apps are discounted, and fair. Limiting yourself in this area is hurting you. I believe you'll see the errors of your ways here. Have exclusive content and offer your own, and win the internet even more than you already have.Step the prices down for the bigger memory tablets. You're not selling machines, you're selling a portal to one of the best services out there. I save so much money using your physical stores alone!! Your videos are beautifully optimized. Your tablets are now impressive, and no one can best your customer service for the services you provide. So, since you're selling physical products, movies, and exclusive content take a bit more of a hit on them HDX tablets so the service is available to more people everywhere.Allow us to customize the carousel. We know it's a Kindle, but give us some options. Let us display a book collection up there instead of all the recently opened things. Remove from carousel is one of my least favorite things. I don't mind the special offers, because there are great deals and recommendations there but allow us some level of customization and I don't mean those weird decals.Let Google into your hearts all the way. Give us a normal page or two with widgets. I love the folders feature.If you made those tweaks your tablet might win the internet completely. (Maybe usb 3.0 too)That all being said this is a great tablet for Prime members, readers, and streamers. The 16 gig HDX is worth keeping around for a long time, and I believe newbies and tech lovers alike will be happy with the hardware.If this is your only tab expect app store limits and some frustrations, but Amazon is really working to improve those things, and HDX owners will reap the benefits of this in the future. Music sounds great for back speakers and is the best I've heard from any non Bluetooth connected tablet yet. Price is still good. May Day is useful for even the savviest of us because it saves time. If you're not going to be a Prime Member, you want the biggest selection of apps and all of their updates immediately and this is going to be your main and only device... you're not a reader... or you're looking for a productivity or Jack of all trades machine this isn't for you. Don't buy it then give it a horrible review. This is a media tab. Movies, music, books, and shopping. All the best things in life. It does do some productivity but if that's what you need look elsewhere.When you pick up an HDX you're picking up well crafted fun. The pixels are so pretty you'll want to shed a tear. Amazon's media access is so extensive you'll want for little, and combined with other services, you may just want for nothing.If you get an HDX no matter what you will find things that will bring you joy, hopefully for a few years to come. I wish I paid full price for device help if it malfunctions (they all do) because dealing with Amazon directly is usually a dream, but I got a great deal. I am absolutely pleasantly surprised and taken with this device, and I think you will be too if this is what you choose for your ereading and Amazon media needs.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: CHRISTINA M WOOD
Reviews.Content: I loved my Kindle Fire...used it until it died, would no longer charge. This happened right around the time the HDX came out so I decided to replace it.  I like the Regular Fire better. I had to get a replacement after 2 months and its still not working right. Freezes all the time, knocks me off of sites, very slow, issues with games. I wish I hadn't wasted the money and had stayed with the lesser model.

Reviews.Title: After 3 months I'm Totally Disappointed - If you want to be locked into a content provider go get an iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got the for Christmas and really wanted to like this device, but there are a ton of drawbacks:1) Amazon App store doesn't have the selection that GooglePlay does.2) A lot of the Apps in the Amazon App store simply do not work, or are too buggy to use... even the ones called the Kindle Tablet Editions.  I find this is almost always the case with steaming video apps that might compete with Amazons streaming service.3) FreeTime is a great concept, but unless you pay for the premium version you can't share your downloaded prime content or your borrowed prime books with your kids, you can only share the apps.4) No Google integration at all.  No Gmail, no way to play my music from GooglePlay, no Hangouts.This device is inexpensive because it forces you into Amazons content and if forces you to play by their rules.  If you don't care about being forced into those sort of rule, then go get yourself an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Should have gotten the Nexus - great hardware isn't enough
Reviews.Author: R. J. Bigelow
Reviews.Content: Awesome specs. It even has Swype. Screen is everything I'd hoped for. BUT. No Play Store and more than half the apps I rely on are not in the Amazon store. No SD card expansion. Doesn't work well with content servers.

Reviews.Title: Finally upgraded from the 1st gen 7" Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: FlamingoNut "Tracey"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, I was floored on how thin this device was.I opted for the 32GB since my original Fire, while I had plenty of GB available, you're only allocated a certain percentage for apps, which I find ridiculous.  I would have to uninstall apps just to install new ones.  This shouldn't be limited (but it is), especially when there was plenty of GB still available.I was able to obtain the OtterBox Defender Series for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" (will only fit Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"), Black, which is a perfect case for this.  Sure, it adds a little bulk, but it's a good quality product that protects my new Kindle, and the clear plastic screen protector doesn't interfere with the sensitivity of the touch screen.The color & display is crisp & absolutely gorgeous.I also opted not to pay extra just to shut off the special offers.  Initially, I was irked that I'd have to endure them, but honestly, I don't find them bothersome at all.  Actually, I like that they offer items specifically for my Kindle (I purchased a Marware speaker that was just offered for $10, as opposed to the regular $29 price), plus, have gotten a few mp3 credits.  Honestly, I don't think it's worth paying to get rid of them, and that actually still surprises me to be saying that.  They're not nearly as intrusive and I thought they would be.I don't notice much of a difference in charging times between my old Gen 1 KF and this one.  Both seem to need to be charged quite frequently.The only issue I have with this Kindle is that even though it's connected to my router, no internet connection is detected.  To rectify, I can either go into the Wifi section and switch to another Wifi, then switch back to mine, or I can just shut the Kindle down and turn it back on.  I seem to be doing this more frequently, and it's getting rather annoying.I also don't like the email connection.  I'd much rather put my password in each and  every time I want to check my email.  I don't want it to be logged in permanently, and am having a hard time finding a way to do this, so for now, I removed it.

Reviews.Title: Poor WI-FI
Reviews.Author: Wayne Boelter
Reviews.Content: Downloading on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is very bad.  Sometimes it takes more then an hour to get a download.  You have to keep going back and resetting your Wi-Fi connection.  One screen will tell you that you are connected and the download screen will tell you that there is no Wi-Fi connection.  Contacted the Mayday to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Great but some glitches
Reviews.Author: b.bailey
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 on Christmas eve. I love all the features, but noticed that it would never charge above 82%. I contacted Amazon who quickly sent me a new charger. But that didn't fix the problem. So they sent me a "new" kindle which was actually a "reconditioned" kindle. This one didn't include a charger, so I purchased another one from Amazon (the same one that comes with the kindle). This charger didn't work at all--the lightening bolt wouldn't even appear. So I gave up on those chargers altogether and ordered an aftermarket charger from a company that had good reviews. It charged the "new" kindle but again, only to 82%, even when charging overnight. But occasionally it will pop up to 100% randomly. I've given up on expecting the kindle to fully charge and am living with the 82% charge.Others have mentioned this other problem--it drops my wifi at odd moments. I have to wait sometimes several minutes for it to pick it up again, even though the device says it has connected to my wifi, and sometimes I have to shut it down completely and restart before it will pick up the wifi again. I don't have this problem with any of my other devices.On balance, I wish I had waited to get this version of kindle until it had been out for a while. I have a first generation Kindle Fire that still works perfectly, which I bought after it had been on the market for over a year. I think if I had waited to buy the Kindle HDX, it would have given them time to fix the glitches. Still concerned that they sent me a reconditioned Kindle instead of a brand new one, especially as it was still easily under warranty. I am a huge fan of Amazon but this hasn't been up to their usual standard of excellence.

Reviews.Title: I love this kindle!!
Reviews.Author: Missus  B
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty sure that it doesn't get any better than this. This kindle does everything I want and a whole lot I probably haven't discovered yet. The picture is clear as a bell and it's lighter than my older 8.9" HD. It has easy to use functions and apps and if I get hopelessly confused I have Mayday, or chat or the web for help. I use it every day for just about everything but phone calls and texts. My husband is also ecstatic that I bought this one, although I have to say he has an ulterior motive; I gave him my old one! I think that secretly I want to be a "tech junky" and this lets me feel like I am. I would very much recommend this to anyone in the market for a tablet that isn't looking to use it as a laptop substitute using large software packages. It has the best of all (that it was designed for) and I'm happy as can be with it. I can't speak to the inner specifications as I know little about that stuff, I only know that I am totally satisfied with it and believe that it was worth every penny I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Beats iPad hands down!!!
Reviews.Author: SingleMommy
Reviews.Content: My wife got me the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for Christmas.  It is my first tablet.  I really like the way it works, its' speed and the quality of the product.  I am not an Apple fan.  My wife has an iPad and I like mine much better.  Apps are great.  I especially like the Bloomberg free app.

Reviews.Title: Underwhelmed - certain key features missing
Reviews.Author: SF Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought this after reading great reviews about this. Here are my key issues with it:Cons:a) HDMI connection not available - you cannot connect this kindle via an hdmi cable to a TV for instance. To mirror the screen you have to use Miracast. The equipment for that costs another $50 and hasn't recd. good reviews. Perhaps I should have read the reviews more carefully? I just assumed that this option would be available.b) Silk browser - very unstable. It appears to be a known issue. I now use Mozilla (was unable to download the Dolphin Browser)c) Slingbox not supported - I am unable to see my TV remotely as Slingbox doesn't support it.Pros:a) Mayday - great feature. Responsive teamb) 4G  connection seemed pretty fast - however if you run into issues and call your phone company they don't know how to troubleshoot stuff as they dont' have much of a database/knowlege regarding the new kindle yet.

Reviews.Title: To many problems with it
Reviews.Author: Judi Green
Reviews.Content: I have had to shut it down way to many times just to get it to work, I only had to do that with my other Kindle fire once. This froze on me and I had to get on my computer to get help well what if I didn't have a computer where would I be. I'm not to happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: durward Smith
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is designed to promote sales of other merchandize for Amazon.  It is limited in its use, and not at all what I expected.  I wanted a small device where I could archive Word documents and Power Point files.  I did not want to buy books or movies, or be inundated with adds.  I wish I would have bought an Apple or Windows device!

Reviews.Title: Loving my Kindle Fire HDX upgrade, thanks Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Aquaman
Reviews.Content: Just upgraded my Kindle Fire for the new 8.9" HDX. Totally worth the money, especially since Amazon offered to upgrade with installment payments for the new model. I like the larger screen and the camera was a great addition. I use it all the time, I recommend joining Amazon Prime too. Tons of movies and TV shows. I also am an Audible book club member. Listening to books on the train is great. I hardly get a chance to read anymore so Audible is terrific. All this entertainment in such a compact, portable device is amazing. I take it everywhere. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Reluctantly Returning this Very Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Boo Radley
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my iPad – had high hopes for it, think it has some great features, and really wanted to give my money to Amazon rather than Apple.  I think it’s a great device for a first-time tablet owner, but ultimately I think it falls short as an IPad replacement.I have first generation iPad that has become virtually unusable. There is nothing physically wrong with it – it just crashes continually because its memory can’t keep up with “advances” in operating system and apps since I bought it three years ago.  This problem plagues earlier generation iPad’s and Apple’s response is “EOL” – the device is end-of-life and they won’t support it; buy a new one if you want one that works. I think Apple meant “SOL.”Not enamored with this attitude, I looked for an alternative and thought I had found one in the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. Great specs, beautiful display, most of the apps I wanted  (I thought) in the Amazon app store.  And cheaper (although it is a little smaller). And I think Amazon’s a great company so I ordered one.The display is beautiful, and it was a huge pleasure to watch video on the device. I like my viewing on a big screen and never watch much on a tablet, but I had a bunch of waiting-around time the weekend I got the Fire HDX and binge watched some shows from Amazon Prime (Luther, Sherlock, Alpha House). Download was easy, video was terrific, and though I originally thought it was just a gimmick, I LOVE the X-Ray feature on the Fire HDX. Sound is good, too, although I mostly used headphones.I also love the cursor control when typing text on the Fire. A slider appears under the text box that lets you precisely place the cursor for editing, much easier to use than Apple’s.The device was snappy, but not eye-wateringly fast, as I expected upgrading from the original iPad.I don’t use a ton of apps, and before I bought the Fire I checked that a couple I use regularly on the IPad were available for the Fire in the Amazon App store. But being available doesn’t mean they’re the same. For example, on the iPad I have the paid version of Words With Friends, but the only one available for the Fire is the ad-based version, which pops up an ad after every move. It also sometimes  will not let me escape from the ad without exiting the app.  Very annoying, and I would be willing to pay a couple bucks for the upgrade, but it’s not available. I also use Zite (an online magazine) quite a bit – again, the Kindle version looks different (not a big deal) but also frequently hung up when I tried to play video from within the app.I also surprised to find the lack of customization available on the Kindle. Really, I can’t put my kids’ picture on the home screen or lock screen? I can’t put shortcuts to web pages on the home screen? Well, maybe I can do that, but if so, I have no idea how, which brings me to another point of frustration – finding information on how to do things on this device.As far as I can tell, all Kindle devices come under the same user forum on Amazon. Whether you’ve got an original Kindle, an HDX, or any of the e-reader and Fire devices in between, all the discussions are in one big lump. Makes for a lot of wading through irrelevant material to find what you need. For example, I was trying to figure out how to put a bookmark to a website on my home screen, so I could just tap that icon and go straight to that webpage, rather than firing up the Silk browser and then navigating to the website. Can I do it? I don’t know. I found instructions on how to do this, but they were for an earlier Fire tablet (or browser version?) and the instructions didn’t track to what I was seeing on the HDX. Eventually, I gave up. I also gave up on finding a comprehensive user manual for the device – the only one I could find on Amazon was a .pdf of the quickstart guide, and the “User guide” on the device is almost as bare bones. Yes, I could have tried the Mayday feature but I really don’t want to fire up an A/V connection and talk to someone every time I have a question about the device.Ultimately, the tablet didn’t do – or didn’t do as well – some of the things I was used to doing on my IPad, and the time I was investing in figuring all that out just wasn’t worth the price difference between the HDX and the iPad. So, hating myself, I reluctantly bought an iPad Air and am returning the HDX.If this were my first, tablet, I think I would be very happy with it. In fact, we bought a Fire HDX 7 for my 11-year-old and she loves it. But for me, it was not an adequate replacement for my iPad.

Reviews.Title: The best thing since sliced bread!
Reviews.Author: ecojackie "ecojackie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my wife who was in the market for a computer. The advances of the HDX give it nearly all the functionality she needs to research, surf, watch media, and write. The form is outstanding, it is light, and faster than any other device we own. Bravo Amazon!

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx8.9
Reviews.Author: blue boy
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and i'm still learning how to use it. It is very lightweight. The screen is a good size and the color is amazing. I had to use mayday twice and the second time i could not hear the mayday lady and my sound was on but she does come on fairly quickly. I will update later when I learn more. My grandaughter is helping me. Got the 32 gig. don't know if i will need it but I got the tablet with a special on paying it off in installments so i went for  the 32 instead of the 16. Love taking pictures and sending them to FB. The sound is very good also. I did buy a cover for it which makes it quite a bit heavier but i think you would need one to protect it.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: L. Guzzo
Reviews.Content: Resolution is fantastic.  Started using the front camera.  Takes excellent pictures but a little unweldy to hold for a long period of time.  Connects with internet very quickly.  Had an opportunity to use the Mayday feature to ask a question.  Very fast response and the person handling the question did so quickly and to the point.

Reviews.Title: best yet
Reviews.Author: Penny Winters
Reviews.Content: I love this device. I is the best kindle fire yet. I am glad I went with the 8.9 inch screen

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: M. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I have only had this Kindle for a short while but I already love it! It is so much lighter and easier to hold to read a book than the older Kindel Fire HD. I absolutely love the camera on this Kindle, It is so easy to use, it takes great looking pictures that you can touch up if you like. My Kindel will save me tons of money this winter by keeping me out of the stores, instead of shopping I will be curled up next to the fire reading books from Amazon on my Kindel Fire HDX.. This would make a wonderful Christmas present and guys this would save you a lot of  money also by keeping the wife out of the stores. I highly recommend the Kindel Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Lighter and faster then an Ipad Gen 3
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife on release day. She absoulutly loves it over my Ipad. lighter faster and same apps as the ipad.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest!  Everything I had on my old Kindle was downloaded automatically without any problem.  I did use the "Mayday" button and service was fast and consultant "Teresa" was very helpful and personable.  Thank you Amazon!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: C. Fine
Reviews.Content: Very impressive. What ease in use!...My son has an ipad, and this is just as great, if not better! Very happy with the sound, the graphics and the help button should i ever use it. They make it so easy to work with, and am very pleased! I love that is all connects so nicely with Amazon that i don't even have to think about it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9. Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this new kindle HDX 8.9 it's lighter the the last kindle fire I had, although I loved that one also. This new version is great. Light weight, clearer picture, the May day button I have used twice now and it was Very helpful ! I would,  and have recommended this tablet to everyone

Reviews.Title: The portal to my entertainment life
Reviews.Author: Lindalealphamale
Reviews.Content: Infinite content delivered to a speedy device that has great audio and video playbook. Easy to use and 30% cheaper than the ipad which comes with a less impressive spec sheet.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: R. Delaney
Reviews.Content: Its as advertised. I had the first kindle fire for 2 years and it was a little quirky, but the this one is flawless, I do miss the portability of the 7" device.

Reviews.Title: A great iteration!
Reviews.Author: R. Kassis
Reviews.Content: The graphics are awesome! someone said to me it looks like it is 3D. It is so clear!It is lighter than the fire. The case (clam) feels sturdy.I have other tablets but this is my favorite. I am very glad that storage went up. I purchased the 64 Gig. I have downloaded 3 HD movies and still have 30 G left with all the books and app I have.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Deegal "Deegal"
Reviews.Content: What's not to love?  Even has that wonderful little live person who comes on the screen to help you.  Great features and fits in my purse but still has a nice size screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. The Fire hdx 8.9 is a huge improvement over the Fire hd 8.9. I will be buying another for myself.

Reviews.Title: can do tablet
Reviews.Author: donna
Reviews.Content: I consider the fire a tablet because I can do anything  on it . I use it primarily for reading.  WIth all of the apps,available for the fire  I can use it for documents  and surfing the net. I check the weather, my grandkids play games, watch movies etc.  I used May day once just to see how it works.  It worked as advertised . They answered right away and  were very professional  and helpful. This is my 3rd kindle and have loved each one. Go for prime because it takes your kindle to a whole new level of use.  Free shipping , borrow 1 book a month, watch movies for free  you can't beat prime.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: robert a kabase
Reviews.Content: I find it slow.  Now after 6 months of ownership the item has locked up on me and the kindle is getting hot to the touch and I am unable to get it to respond to remove and item or turn off!!!!I am unable to get to Mayday option...lot of good that option does me.I had better luck with the app to read books.I was looking for a table that could do it all.  Read magazines, books a game or two and search.  Not working out like I thought and a lot heavier than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Ok,  I got a few years on me, and I ain't that tech savvy, but I love this thing. I read, listen to music, audio books, check my email etc. This easily meets all my needs. It took a little getting used to  but once I adapted to the touch screen and learned to navigate around l found it easy to use. I don't use many apps so that's not an issue. I down loaded a lot of my music and that went pretty well. It seems to lose WiFi connection more than I think it should and the glare on the screen makes it hard to use outdoors. I bought an anti-glare screen protector that helps some. Those are small complaints and overall I am very happy with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Who needs an IPad when there is the Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Ganey
Reviews.Content: I always wanted a tablet, but didn't want to spend a fortune. The Kindle Fire HDX has all the features of the IPad but half the price. When I'm reading books or downloading learning apps for my kids, it is such a breeze. I love my Kindle F and wouldn't want anything else!

Reviews.Title: no newlivestream
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Like the device except for one big problem...can't seem to access New Live stream . THis is a really important app for me. Some events are only available on Live stream. May be a deal breaker for me. The device is great in many ways but if I can't use it to watch Newlivestream.in particular..ONENESS events..not much value to me.I have tried to side load it and May day..which is a wonderful service in many ways.w a sn're able to help in this case.Update I was able to watch a Live stream video using moboflash and Dolphin. SO all is well and I would now have to say that so far I couldn't be happier with my kindle fire HDX. Really an awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: Better then IPAD all day!
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Burgett
Reviews.Content: My friends and brother all have IPADs and they try to sell me on one everyday.  As much as I liked Steve Jobs, Apple just doesn't allow the same freedom the Kindle does.  I did mainly get this to go along with my new Amazon Fire TV, and it is nice...I can be watching a movie in my living room, pick up my kindle and it transfers the movie to my kindle and it picks it up right where it left off.  Then if I go into my bedroom I can just transfer from my kindle to that tv.  The functions, features, and picture quality are amazing!

Reviews.Title: wonderful value
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Coyle
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what I expected of this device, but it has certainly surpassed anything I could have imagined.  I have only had it for a few days and I already know that I wouldn't want to be without it. The screen resolution is excellent, the speed is excellent, the camera is great.  I haven't begun to explore all it's possibilities and probably never will but I think it is a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: J. Reed "luv2draw"
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of using the Kindle Fire. I started with a Samsung Galaxy & found it would not allow access to Amazon Prime. Found out from Amazon that only i-Pads & Kindles can access Amazon Prime. I tried a friend's i-Pad and had great difficulty trying to figure out how to use it. Since I have a laptop, I don't really need to be able to use word processor/excel on a tablet. The Kindle is much easier to use than i-Pad or Samsung, the screen clarity/color is outstanding & the camera takes great pictures. I only wish it had a close up option. I also like the option of the MayDay button. I've only had to use it once so far, but love knowing it's there. I am very happy with this Kindle and Amazon customer service rocks!

Reviews.Title: OMG.....LOVE IT...../
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle....Started out with the no bells plain old read a book, then I ventured out and started looking at the Kindle HD Iv'e had a blast with that. then comes the HDX, this has got to be the best yet, it's light does everything they say and more....I am still playing with it, have so much to learn. One thing I wish I would have read on here is about the mirrowing your movies....if you do not have a newer model TV then you need to buy a Devise to stream the movies through. I dont mind but wish I would have known sooner so as I could have bought what I needed then. I'll up date as I learn more when I have the time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for flying
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: As some one who travels quite a bit for work being able to download and watch a bunch of moves and tv shows, including HBO shows, and play them offline makes it worth the cost alone.

Reviews.Title: suprised
Reviews.Author: shorty
Reviews.Content: There's more to it than I thought.  I'm loving the May day! I need a lot of help as I am not electronically inclined.  The battery lasts way longer than my Kindle Fire, so my big decision now is, should I use the Fire for reading or music or....should I use the HDX  for that or visa versa(sp) .  And which one should I use for games?  I  receive and send email, check FB on HDX and much more.  As the saying goes, "I'm lovin' it!"

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Betty J Rector
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle. It is so powerful and user friendly. The clarity is awesome. I had the first generation Kindle Fire prior to this and am so pleased with this upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Astounding
Reviews.Author: Jose Artur Lobo
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Fast downloading, excellent picture quality. Transaction was fast, dispatch was very fast. Great!

Reviews.Title: Great device even better when I could root
Reviews.Author: Jim D. Combs
Reviews.Content: Love the display on this device. Have an IPad Air and IPad 3Gen and love the res and video on the Kindle HDX more than I do the Retina on the IPads. Both are nice, but for me the Kindle gets the edge. Have an Amazon Prime account so that makes being locked down, in with the Kindle tolerable. Makes being limited in my droid choices tolerable. I really loved this puppy when I had it rooted and got out of the box could pick and play with Droid. Still a great device that I love. Use it for reading and video on the road, SOHO, and at home. Had to go with ATT for the mobile service, cell, and it sucks as usual in my area, but you live with what you have. Out of the mountains ATT service isn't as frustrating. Great device and worth the price. Use it for movies and books, a great front as I say  for Amazon services especially if you go Prime and definitely get the ad free unit.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: lojo
Reviews.Content: Loving the Kindle,  would recommend it to everyone!The only negative would be that I cannot pair it with my bluetooth headset but if that's the only thing it's still perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle is so much lighter  and is a lot faster. I thought it would be larger than the one I had,but I had a fire 8.9.  I like the new features on the new one. This is my 3rd kindle and I am on it eachday for several hours.

Reviews.Title: good but could be better
Reviews.Author: Jbiel "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I use this Kindle every day. Great for reading books getting the news. I think the pictures show up better  on this screen than on an iPad. Would have given it 4 stars if it could play a greater range of video types. More importantly there are a number of Android apps that I would like to use that will not run on the Kindle. For instance LightTrac. I am a photographer this is an app that landscape photographers use all the time. It does not play on a kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Diana P. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I just love this Kindle!! It is incredibly light,weight, and the graphics and color are amazing!! Takes great pictures, and very easy to use..Great promotional sale, also...if you are in the market for a replacement tablet, not just a book reader, definitely put Kindle at the top of your list!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Beverly Mallow
