Reviews.Content: I used this a few times but my sister loves it as she is a great reader so I just have to go with what I'm told.

Reviews.Title: i had the kindle fire for two years
Reviews.Author: drcast
Reviews.Content: I loved my kindle fire and now my daughter is enjoying it  since I upgraded to the HDX 8.9. I am still learning all the cool ways to use it but the big reason I purchased it was to have a tablet linked to kindle and Amazon that has bigger screen. I can create documents with the free download and so much more, like magazines which are larger and color is great. Also the camera with reverse picture taking is a plus. So far I really like it.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: james clark
Reviews.Content: My wife Love's it! This is much faster than expected. Very easy to use, the mayday button is great. Awsome print capability.

Reviews.Title: fantastic device
Reviews.Author: Irina
Reviews.Content: very clear and sharp image, super-light, nice to hold! just the right size to combine reading and movie watching functions.highly recommend!!! worth every dollar!If only there were more accessories...

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "arcon"
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 without reservation. It works and performs exactly as described by Amazon. Worth it. So, if you are hesitating, don't. Just buy it. But, if you must read in sunlight, pick up the Kindle that is best for reading outdoors, at the beach, in the sun; I did. The convenience of having your library on the go under any lighting condition makes it ll worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to drinking the Kool-aid that is Apple Products
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle HDX, while traveling overseas, my Kindle would connect to Wi-fi, that my wife's iPad couldn't even see. The screen has great reaction time, and the screen is a great high quality. If you're big into downloading movies, get bigger than 16B. One HD download of Star Trek ate up 10GB! Couldn't do much else with that movie in place (thank goodness for the Kindle Cloud).

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Catwoman "bookcrazy"
Reviews.Content: Great sharp images larger screen makes it easier to see the books which is what I mainly use it for. Playing candy crush is more enjoyable than on the kindle fire 7" even beats out my desktop. However my order was lost by Amazon and I ended up having to run to best buy to get the replacement for $30.00 less which worked out better for me n the long run!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: K. Kasaba
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying its functionality! It is everything I expected it to be, I would suggest that others purchase one as soon as they are able.

Reviews.Title: Not An IPad BUT
Reviews.Author: C. Snead "STi  Mtn  Man"
Reviews.Content: This is a really good alternative to the much more expensive tablets out there. It's fast, attractive, and handles normal needs very well. I own the 7" HD and there is no comparison to the Xs better performance. Kendle cases are way too expensive so I purchased a Poetic one that keeps the unit from normal scratches and dings. At 20%of the cost it's a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great device for the less than tech savvy person
Reviews.Author: DJK
Reviews.Content: I like the fact I can manage the device for the person I bought it for using my amazon account.

Reviews.Title: Right desition
Reviews.Author: ReadingBitch
Reviews.Content: I played with the thought to get a Kindle for a while and finally gave in, now I wonder why I did waited for so long. I mainly use it for reading. I have so many books that I decided to get the 64 GB one so that I can have a bigger part always with me without hoping for Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Kalani Waldron
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and fun to use. I will be using this tablet for years. Perfect size too.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it
Reviews.Author: T. Driste
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my husbands bdayHe had an older Kindle and it needed to be updatedHe loves his Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: The clarity is wonderful and I love the Mayday feature.  They were very helpful and knowledgeable  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Echo Karras
Reviews.Content: LOVE the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! Bought it as a birthday gift for my husband (will probably buy another for myself!). It works FAST, it's fun and easy to use, and the Amazon pricing special made it affordable.We have only used the "help" person once, but it was wonderful to SEE & HEAR who was helping us - a new high in customer service.I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to ANYONE looking for a tablet - one of our sons is in the Army and stationed abroad, so my husband loves to be able to keep in touch using his Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Excited then let down with app availability
Reviews.Author: dkarger
Reviews.Content: Love the product but rather dismayed when the play store is not available on the Kindle and a lot of the apps that I had purchased were not available to me or even available in the Kindle store. Of course there is always a way around everything which I found but why would you make it difficult to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Can't play certain videos
Reviews.Author: Phillis Combs
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the new Kindle Fire.  It does not come with an adobe flash like the old kindle did and now I can not watch a lot of videos.  Wish I had not bought this one and just kept on using the old 7".  They need to come up with a fix for this.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: TAMMY PHILLIPS
Reviews.Content: I just wish you could get Google Play on it.  I can't play POGO games on it.  I wish it had more apps like checkout 51 and other apps for us couponers, other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: miss the light.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Michael"
Reviews.Content: I love the picture,there is one thing that I miss from the previous kindle fire. The previous one had a tiny orange light, that told you it was charging. It turned green when fully charged.  I always used to check it's status.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: Albert N. Haler
Reviews.Content: This item has meet all of my expectations.  I have steamed movies and also downloaded movies both worked flawlessly.  The 8.9 HDX for my needs is the perfect size, easy to handle and not to big to carry with you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet
Reviews.Author: David Boege
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is unbelievable and syncing with all the amazon features (prime, kindle library, etc.) is seamless...  Incredible power and quality- has the possibility to be life transforming, if you are willing...

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: There really is nothing intrusive with the "special offers", other than seeing when when you first "wake" the tablet. So much memory, and what a crytal clear picture and sound. I have yet to find anything that I dont love about this.

Reviews.Title: Nolt what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Ronnie V
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle HDX 8.9 for six months, and I have to say I am terribly disappointed.  Other than the camera and slightly larger screen, it is not much better than my Kindle Fire.  The processing speed is annoyingly slow.  There are other tablets with processors that are so much faster than this one.  It seems that whenever two or more of us with different tablets are looking for an answer, everyone finds it before I do.  And frankly, the Kindle Fire is easier to turn off and on.  I bought this tablet because of a promotion Amazon was running, and frankly, I wish I had not.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, WIFI, 64GB
Reviews.Author: Ethel 2
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase of this kindle. I have the original kindle and this one has faster speed and better color. I also like that it has a camera and takes great pictures. I also like that you had the option of choosing a payment plan for it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Amazon Prime subscribers
Reviews.Author: K D Romaine
Reviews.Content: Being a subscriber to Amazon Prime I decided to give this tablet a try. It has a great screen and impressive sound coming from tablet speakers. It is ideal for watching videos and listening to music. Accessing content from Amazon is almost too easy, but that is one reason I bought it.I still prefer to read books on my old Kindle reader, which is much kinder to my eyes.One major complaint I have regarding the Kindle Fire is the lack of apps, particularly for accessing other cloud storage services like Dropbox and OneDrive. Hopefully this will get resolved in the near future. With more apps this tablet could beat out the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Fine display, responsive, but WiFi could be better
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dfwc"
Reviews.Content: I have had the device long enough to find that I like pretty much everything except the WiFi radio. First, it seems to suck battery more than the Nexus 7 I owned previously. I find that I must put it in 'airplane' mode when I am not using the network to get decent battery life. Worse, I find that the connection to my local wireless router becomes unresponsive after some amount of use. I find that I have to occasionally toggle the 'airplane' mode to get a good connection again. I don't have to do this often, but enough to be noticeable. Other than this, the device behaves as advertised.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle.  I wish it was adobe acrobat compatible but they do have a video program that lets you access things like cbs.com so at least video streaming works for online stations.  Not able to use it for gaming.  Awesome sound and video quality over all.

Reviews.Title: Love watching videos
Reviews.Author: Sydney's Mom "7923"
Reviews.Content: I got this so I could use the Prime downloads for off line viewing on an airplane, as I spend a fair amount of time on an airplane.  But, as I am sure Amazon figured out, I buy far more movies and TV shows than I get for free.  The ability to watch an episode of a TV series without commercials is priceless.  I have the entire Breaking Bad series in my library, and before each trip, I just download a couple episodes and watch on the plane.  The resolution is stunning.  I also have an ipad air, and I watch Amazon videos on it.  For the price, there is no comparison.  I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an ipad air just because there are a couple apps I need that were only available on ios.I also love reading on my Fire.  Just not at night.  I have found that the non-backlit display of the Paperwhite is much more conducive to sleep.The price reduction makes this my favorite android tablet.  I have an old Samsung Galaxy Tab, and when that dies, I am sticking with the Fire as my android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great price on an upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marsha Schultz
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an original Kindle Fire and still use that to read books at night.  I bought the upgrade to use the camera and video feature.  This works great for taping track athletes at meets and showing them a great clear picture of how they are doing.  The internet is also much faster on this version.  I also enjoy being able to watch movies or shows on it because of the great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful hardware, but it software is too limited
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The hardware is wonderful: fast, smooth operation with a great display.The purchase price is very reasonable, but it comes at a cost: Amazon will not let you install software other than what is in their apps library (yes, you can "side load", but that doesn't actually work particularly well). And that means you miss out on things like the native g-mail app (yes, it's better than Amazon's e-mail app), browsers like Chrome and Firefox (yes, they're better than Silk), and so on.The integration with Amazon prime means that watching videos is easy, and Amazon also lets you stream Netflix. It's kind of hard to argue too much with Amazon's trade-off of low price in return for being mostly limited to Amazon's offerings, but this Kindle would be so much better if you could also use Google's app library.Amazon, please open up the Fire HDX to other app libraries!

Reviews.Title: shoulda gone with the iPad
Reviews.Author: Miss Cellophane "Clearly, you don't remember me."
Reviews.Content: So few apps (like airline apps) on the Kindle.  I am sad that I didn't spend the extra money to get the iPad.Additionally I can't sync my work stuff on this device.The glare on this tablet is annoying when reading.  I love the old school kindle for reading and continuous to use that whoever possible.

Reviews.Title: cant wait for the fix.....still love it...
Reviews.Author: mitch3155
Reviews.Content: I loved the first kindle, wanna love this one, too. The quality of construction and clarity of the screen are second to none. The only issue I have, which the people from kindle assure me a fix is coming, is the sudden loss of WiFi. Can't wait for the fix. This is truly the only device you need when traveling here or Europe. Haven't tried it in South America.

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: G. Plude "orchid lady"
Reviews.Content: This is my first foray into the tablet world.  I was on the fence as to whether I needed or wanted a tablet when I have a smartphone and a touch screen laptop.  I was on the fence too when I bought my first Kindle reader and feel immediately in love with it (and I won't give it up for reading books).  The HDX is easy to use, easy to get used to (I haven't had to hit Mayday yet).  I have found I use my phone less for email, unless I'm away from home, and I can see the portability advantage.  Is a tablet crucial, probably not, but it is fun.  More to come.

Reviews.Title: Some Problems with Options
Reviews.Author: RGrabber
Reviews.Content: I am still working on understanding all the options.  This is my first tablet and it appears as though Amazon expects a first time buy to know the ins and out of finding option.  The Mayday is helpful if you know what questions to ask.  They have been friendly.  If you know the basics my feeling is that is a good item.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping it would be!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I hate the fact that I can't download some of the games I had on my Kindle Fire HD onto the HDX!  The one game that I really liked to play (Pogo) can not be downloaded.  I've lost other games too but that is the one that irks me the most.  If I could I'd like to go back to the old 8.9" Kindle Fire HD.  This one is NOT worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: First thing I check in the mornig and the last thing I read at night.
Reviews.Author: James B. Kuminecz
Reviews.Content: My constant companion for work and play and leisure reading. Suggest that you get the HDX Fire8.9 Wi-Fi,64 Gb.After four months have still not made use of all it features. NEEDS A WIRELESS CHARGING CAPABILITY. Has my Catholic book of prayers and Bubble installed. Has apps for banking Drug Store as well as medical reminders and references.

Reviews.Title: Light, fast, beautiful
Reviews.Author: Gurjeet Bal
Reviews.Content: I find it more useful than I thought would be. It is light so doesn't strain hands, It is fast and screen resolution is great. Its fun to watch small short videos which I never had time or ease to watch it on laptop. There are many apps now for it so there is no issue regarding the usability. I am glad I got it. price is also cool compared to similar products.Only annoying thing is that I can not share prime movies on it with family member account but that is more of Prime account rather than the device itself.

Reviews.Title: Love the Fire!
Reviews.Author: Ewenice "ewenice"
Reviews.Content: For the price, it should have come w/a protective screen cover.  Also, there are so many times, I've clicked on certain things and the message "that I need Google Play Store for whatever it is I'm trying to do" keeps coming up and it's very frustrating.  Kindle and Google need to get together somehow and make things easier for people such as I am.  All in all, I'm glad I made the purchase and I hope to learn all I need to get the full use of it.  After that, I'm sure I'll love it even more!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Best for Videos
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle Fire HDX almost every night to watch videos as I unwind from the day and gradually fall asleep.  The screen quality is just beautiful for movies, photos, etc.I gave only four stars because of the difficulty in having to sideload apps from Google Play.

Reviews.Title: Like my new Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Muriel J. Farnkoff
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle, however I just had some problems with the Zynga game, Words with Friends and was unable to use it for a month. I know this is not Amazon's fault, but thought I would let you know.I did not give it 5 stars, because I am a little disappointed in the life of the battery.  I'm pretty sure it was advertised as having a longer life than my older Kindle, but it seems like 3 hrs., give or take, is all I get from a full charge.  Is this the correct time I should be getting?I really like the Mayday button, as I am still learning all the things that the HDX fire can do and it is so helpful to have someone you can ask a question of and get an answer !!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Bates
Reviews.Content: I had the previous model Kindle and loved it. But I always find myself saying "I wish I had my camera" well, since I go nowhere without my Kindle I no longer have to say that. LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!! I only wish the 7" came with the camera on both sides like the 8.9 does. Made that mistake and had to exchange it. I like the 8.9" but it does not fit as well in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: atmtore
Reviews.Content: The video viewing is absolutly unbelievable.  I have never seen an HD screen look as great this device does.I am having trouble trying to read books, it is just a matter of finding the user manual online.

Reviews.Title: This is sooooo cool, I have been wanting this kindle since it came out!
Reviews.Author: J. Terrell "Avid TV Watcher"
Reviews.Content: This is my best purchase ever!  It has such beautiful color and so many other terrific features. I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: I love it! I had a 7" which my husband uses now!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I could buy one for each of our grandkids! These are the best! I've always loves to read but when we go somewhere it's so awkward to take a bunch of books in the car. And as you get older it's so wonderful to be able to make the print larger. Also to be able to check email on the same device is just the best!

Reviews.Title: Amazon really nailed it with this device
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I was a proud, and very addicted owner of the original Kindle Fire which I purchased on it's release.  Although I was tempted to buy the first 8.9 HD, I'm glad I waited for this device... it's everything I read in the reviews and then some.A few of my favorite features:The keyboard is Swype enabled.  Might not seem like a big deal to some, but I'm so used to swyping on my android, tapping away at the keyboard slows me down.  On my old kindle, I gave up on accessing email, doc applications, and even writing reviews :)  There's also a voice recording function.  Simply put, I can do so much more on this device than I could on the old Fire.After reading multiple reviews on how the processor speed puts the Nexus 7 and iPad to shame.... I can tell you it's absolutely true.Bluetooth...and the range is pretty great.Front facing camera along with the improved screen resolution is great for video chat on Skype and imo"Collections" feature for both apps and books.  While I still wish someone could come up with a stellar app to import all my books into some type of folder or collection hierarchy, this feature is still an improvement.Audio books are now part of the menu instead of having to run them through the Audible app.  Not only do they download faster, they run better.Technical specs aside...part of what makes a great device is the UI/UX.... little features that improve usability and overall user experience are critical, and Amazon really did nail it with this device.

Reviews.Title: A THREE TIME KINDLE OWNER
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is perfectly perfect.What a pleasure to use.What a beauty.Bravo Amazon, you have  done it again! How can you possibly make it any better?  But if there is a way,you will and I'll buy it also.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely Love my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: dean Huthman
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my Kindle Fire. I especially like the feature where you can get help  from a  tech person, by simply pushinga button. (clicking) They do not make you feel stupid when you ask a stupid question ,and handle every response in  a professionalmanner. The Kindle has great color and clarity and works so well I almost feel that I have had it for years.My Daughter wanted meto get an Apple IPad, but I felt Kindle was superior and have not been disappointed! Also several Bucks Cheaper.  Kudos toAmazon. Great Product !!

Reviews.Title: FUN!!
Reviews.Author: C. Wisehart "Icarolyn"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure I would use a Kindle enough to invest in one but I'm surehappy that my husband talked me into getting one.  There are manythings to learn and I'm just getting started!!

Reviews.Title: A must for Prime members
Reviews.Author: Mr. Joshua "JB"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome product. Definitely a must for Prime members. Streaming alone is amazing.Wish I bought the 64gb instead of the 32. Takes some time to get used to but it's fun learning it.I haven't figured out how to customize the lock screen or even if I have access to do so. I haven't used Mayday yet but I well soon. Battery life it's quite nice. After live streaming for a few hours, I was still good to go.If you're looking to buy and you have Amazon Prime, buy the 64gb Wi-Fi with ads (save yourself the $15).

Reviews.Title: Of all the Kindles, this one beats them all...
Reviews.Author: Henry Wiggles "Snorg"
Reviews.Content: Except for the usual problems you would have with any Amazon device (you need to be born with the instructions installed in your brain) this Kindle far outruns the previous Kindle devices.  I mostly use it for streaming videos from the Amazon Cloud. Always do that otherwise you will be using your memory to store them. I would only download videos that I would like to see "off line". I bought the Kindle HDX 8.9 with WIFI and 64 Gigs of Memory. You can save money by accepting Amazon's "Offers", like I did. The only drawback from doing that is that a lot of their offers are for kids. I don't have kids. Some of their offers do not give your the "unlock" device function. Then you have to either cycle your Kindle through standby or go to the offer and decline it. That's the hassle from saving the $30.00 to $40.00 more you'll pay for NOT having offers come up on your Kindle. Just the same, I would recommend having this Kindle over the iPad and Samsung Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: A bigger screen helps and is a big plus
Reviews.Author: John Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle (my 3rd) before Christmas. I have not been a big fan of reading devices before as they were too small.However, this Kindle Fire is big enough that I can use it whenever I want. I am seeing impaired and by double tapping a web page I can comfortably use this Kindle.Note: I do not use the Kindle for book reading (my girlfriend does and often wants it first after dinner). I use it primarily to keep up to date on my work or hobbies for which it is excellently purposed for me. My son uses it to watch Amazon Prime movies with ear-buds.Note: I don't remember when we bought the first Amazon Kindle (five years ago maybe), but all three continue to work with no issues. We have all of the Apple iPad generations also and I would say that they are very close in quality and ease of use. For my family Amazon Prime is the key factor (movies for everyone and the big screen for me and low cost books).

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Zito Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the picture quality is excellent, but the sound is only mediocre.  It is quick and responds well.  The battery lasts a real long time.  My main disappointment is that the operating system is a modified version of Android.  As a result, many of the apps I am used to on my phone cannot be installed on the Kindle.  One of the main reasons I bought this Kindle was to read one of my magazines that is only digital now.  I downloaded the previous issue with no issues, but when I try to download the current version, I get an error claiming that I have to update some software.  Some of the apps not available are Google Now and Zinio,  I feel like I overpaid for this at $379.  I feel that I should haves hopped around for a Android 4.2 tablet, and i would probably have found something comparable for less than half the price.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: Cannot say enough about my Kindle - it replaces my lap top computer totally.  If I didn't work on my lap top I would probably never open it.  The display is amazing, the sound is clear and distinct, there are what seems like a "zillion" apps in the store.  I'm an avid reader and hate to be without new books. Searching for what you want takes longer than the purchase and transmission.  Does it all, beautifully. Again, LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Ingrid P. Long
Reviews.Content: I was researching the Kindle Fire for quite sometime and when the HDX came out, it was a no-brainer for me.  I really like that it isn't very heavy and it connects me to everything in an instant.  You really don't need more than 16GB.  The display is crisp and the great size screen at 8.9" is perfect. I also have the Special Offers which you really don't notice because you just swipe to "unlock" and it's gone :)

Reviews.Title: E Reader
Reviews.Author: gghia
Reviews.Content: I have owned a previous Kindle and the Sony. Without question this Kindle Fire is easier to read, faster to download, and has become such a part of my life that I use my laptop and phone less. A must buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it better than my ipad
Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: Got one for my mom and she really appreciates the new features, lighter weight, and the mayday button. Transition for the older model was great. Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: joevas
Reviews.Content: Just recently got it and am setting it up. It is well thought out and, with Amazon's support, it works well for me. I love Silk, the browser, and there is so much available it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire or IPad?
Reviews.Author: Nicks Nuna
Reviews.Content: After talking to several people I decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the mayday button. I've used it twice and it was much easier (and personal) than "chatting" on line.LOVE IT, LOVE IT.....Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: bought for wife
Reviews.Author: robert lindenberger
Reviews.Content: got it for my other half for her anniversary an that's what she wanted. I made a good choice.when she is happy I am happy!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a must have!
Reviews.Author: C. Barnett
Reviews.Content: Everything about it surpasses the IPAD 4 I had before it!  Amazon beats Apple on all counts.  Love the HDX!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sally McEntire
Reviews.Content: So very happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, still learning everything that it does. Took some great pics with it already. I have already recommended this to several friends. Downloaded a guide and it has been very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice.  extremely simple to use and even easier to read than expected.  No problems at all.  Absolutely pleased with the purchase.  It was a birthday present for my husband and he is thrilled with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Al Lenhardt
Reviews.Content: Would like to do spreadsheets and documents on the device as well as to print from it. All other features are what we wanted and need.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Patrick Eakin
Reviews.Content: A good tablet compared to the others currently on the market. The screen has a vivid display and graphics and videos look good. It works works great with my wireless home network. It didn't come with a screen protector so I purchased a screen protector and a nice case to protect it. Battery life is decent for what is it used for as well.

Reviews.Title: Great way to read, surf, get emails
Reviews.Author: PRHPage
Reviews.Content: This is a gift for my husband, and he loves it! He's had a laptop up to this point, and the Kindle is much more portable, but the screen on this devise is plenty large enough that he doesn't miss that part of the laptop. This devise is very light-weight, and the graphics and colors are stunning. It's quick to pick up wifi.My husband (and I) have no reservations or problems with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Claricei "the Truthseeker"
Reviews.Content: FAR surpasses the ipad.  Husband loves it-display is terrific. We will have to see how it holds up.  The Kindle Fire I bought him 2 years ago is USELESS now.  Some internal breakdown of charging port has left it unusable.  I hope the HDX lasts better

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Reisetante
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade from my previous Kindle HD Fire. The screen is bigger, the colors very brilliant, and best of all it has a rear facing camera in addition to the front facing camera on the older model. The Kindle Fire HDX is a very nice tablet with many useful functions - some of which I still have to discover.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Daisy Dingess
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle fire after using a regular kindle fire for a couple of years and was greatly rewarded with the speed and color and the sounds.The difference while playing games is like night and day. My grandkids want to use it now also instead.I still love my other kindle with all my books on it.It's so much easier to browse on the internet.I'm very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I ENJOY MY NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9". I HAVE A BIGGER AREA TO VIEW WHEN I WATCH MOVIES OR READ A BOOK. PLUS I HAVE MANY NEW OFFERS TO CHOOSE FROM. STILL HAVEN'T FIGURED OUT ALL THE THINGS IT CAN DO.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Salleng
Reviews.Content: I have upgraded from the original Kindle Fire to the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and I couldn't be happier.  Everything about it is pure upgrade. The screen, the power, the performance, the everything.  This is what a tablet should be. Period. End of story. Make yourself happy and get one of these.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: CW FISHER "stars for connie"
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle and I am enjoying this one very much.  The things I like about this one you can see page number and location number on the kindle.  It has a camera that can take pictures from the front and the back. The books are easy to read and I am enjoying playing scrabble on my kindle.  It is light weight and it has a large screen.  I do not look at movies just books, comic books, and sometimes my audio books.  I am very please with this kindle.  What I dislike about the kindle is it is not light on the outside letting you know that the battery have finish charging.  In other electronics you do not want to overcharge the battery but you have to turn in on to check to see if the battery is fully charged unless you cannot overcharge the battery that the device cuts off the charging when it is full I do not know.

Reviews.Title: The fire keeps going out on my kindle
Reviews.Author: Renee Hall
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LOVE MY KINDLE but it keeps falling off line I have called my helper several times and it will work for one good day and then stop again.if someone can help please please help me out

Reviews.Title: Nice, but some apps are cumbersome to install...
Reviews.Author: Evert Meulie
Reviews.Content: Very nice, all and all. A bit cumbersome that some apps need to be installed via a 3rd party app store because the Amazon app store either doesn't have them, or they're hopelessly outdated.

Reviews.Title: Just chillin with my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Angela Williams
Reviews.Content: I cannot begin to express how dark and dull my life was before this amazing machine showed up on my doorstep.  We are now rarely apart, we do everything together.I bought a bluetooth keyboard at a discount with an Amazon local deal and now I can actually tolerate writing reviews, such as this one.It has changed me.  I'm a much more interesting person than I was before.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I am having some problems with it though.  It freezes up frequently and has to be rebooted frequently. Occasionally it doesn't start at all and seems dead, but if you hold the on/off button for more than 20 seconds it wil reboot.  Anything less than 20 seconds won't work.  I am still getting used to it and finding new things to do with it.  It should come with a detailed instruction book, but did not.  Had to borrow a book on Amazon prime to get how to use it.  For something so expensive it should come with detailed instructions.Margaret

Reviews.Title: So much better!!
Reviews.Author: C. Celestine
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9!! I had a Kindle Fire, but it died (RIP, Sweet Pea) so I purchased this one & I would not trade it for anything. It's so much faster and the battery lasts longer. It doesn't take long to load up during start-up like the Kindle Fire did and there are more apps included like a clock, a calendar, and Goodreads, which I absolutely love! I am so happy I made the upgrade to this version of Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Hidden $15 fee to get rid of annoying special offers
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Great device. I just bought on and love it.However I got annoyed at all these special offers on the lock screen and on the home tab.Amazon discloses that they will be there, Best Buy doesn't. None of them discloses that you will have to pay $15 to get rid of them, even when you click on "learn more".Amazon claims that these ads don't interfer with the use of the tablet, but they do. They popped up several times  while i was playing Fruit Ninja and actually paused the game.We called Amazon customer service and at first the rep said that we didn't read carefully all the fine print. We told him that we got it from Best Buy, because the same model was $40 cheaper than Amazon, and they had no information anywhere about these "special Offers".  He was understanding, waived the $15, told us to restart the device and they were gone!That's the reason I will give only 4 stars. The sellers should be more upfront about these things.Otherwise, it was very easy to get started, since I had a first generation Kindle Fire HD. As soon as I entered the account info, everything got automatically uploaded. E-mail was much easier to set up that the previous model, and it now supports Outlook. Good camera, not I would really be caught taking a picture or a movie holding a big flat thing in front of me :). Like the way that the camera is activated when you lift the device from the origami case. Also the Kindle conveniently turns of or turns on when you close or open the case.Great battery life, going on 3 days of heavy use, still trying to get it empty so I can power cycle it. Handles wifi from our wacko router much better than my laptop.

Reviews.Title: doesn't blow me away
Reviews.Author: Ronald Riccitelli
Reviews.Content: everything is proprietary to amazon. web search and browsing in multiple tabs not there. cannot use Google or Firefox or adobe or anything that isn't amazon. this rates with google's cromebook, the palm, and apple mac vs. windows pc for compatibility with third party software. bottom line it's great if you don't mind buying everything amazon if you can find it!

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup with exception of Verizon 4G side
Reviews.Author: jvw
Reviews.Content: Great product exactly what I wanted. Easy to setup and use, the only exception was getting my hook up to Verizon.  I already use Verizon so just changed my plan increasing my data limit and sharing the minutes between my phone and the Kindle. I was on the phone with Verizon 3 separate times and they couldn't get me connected. I went to my Verizon store and their technical people at the store got me connected up in about 30 minutes or less.  One catch though there are several Verizon merchants in my town but only one of them was a Verizon company or corporate store, the other smaller stores did not have technicians at their stores. So a word to the wise just call your local store first and ask them if they would be able to help you setup a Kindle Fire HDX with the 4GL before you zip on down to their store.

Reviews.Title: Good graphic and good speed
Reviews.Author: Sophoeuth Seng
Reviews.Content: Everything is good with this device, good graphic, battery life, nice size, easy navigation and more. The downside is that I wish I have the option to extend the storage and put my own picture as the background instead of seeing the black background color all the time.

Reviews.Title: Prepare to be entertained. This is the Kindle we have been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: the stout hearted "reinx"
Reviews.Content: Media consumption at its finest! This is the Kindle Amazon has really been striving for it seems. Gutsy(fast and responsive), stylish, and very surprisingly light! The origami case will add a noticeable amount of weight but you will want it to keep this particular piece of tech safe.Browsing the web and reading your favorite books are both immediately satisfying, while the Amazon app store continues to grow its offerings at what seems to me a reasonably competitive rate.The HDX's ability to catch hold of and maintain a signal from your WiFi is solid(impressively so) and will keep you connected for all your Netflix and other streaming needs.And stream you will, because the picture quality is very good. The speakers are not as loud as last gen, but for a tablet I find them adequate for a quick couple of tunes on break or an episode of my favorite TV show before bed.I have occasion to use my HDX for up to 12 hours at a stretch at times and the battery keeps up quite well for reading or researching the occasional article on the net. The included charger and cable will keep you juiced up at a very pleasant rate as well.Bottom line: The kindle as a media consumption device does its job without a hitch. Highly reccomended. The 8.9" screen is still quite handily portable but if you don't mind the loss of screen realestate you can't beat the price of the 7".

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Beverly A
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" was the first tablet I ever had.  I am computer literate.  I am a novice at this tablet, however it is easy to operate.  I like the idea of having WI-FI and 4G LTE.  I have WI-FI at home but I like the option of using this tablet anywhere instead of looking for a Wi-Fi hotspot when I am traveling.  It is easy to read a book or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: pumpkin8
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic.  The screen is high resolution and movies look fantastic on the 8.9 ".  It is very fast.  It also allows android apps to be downloaded. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Grandma of four
Reviews.Content: Good for reading especially long books!  I like that I can place book vertically or horizontally also for games.  It doesn't add much weight.but the cover is heavy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet; one shortcoming
Reviews.Author: shopdaddy "musikdaddy"
Reviews.Content: I bought a 32GB Kindle HDX 8.9.  Traded my previous Kindle HD 8.9 which I was very happy with, but I got bit by the "new model" bug.  The HDX tablet is much lighter, has a sharper screen, has faster response, and obviously better WiFi.  The only shortcoming I have to complain about is that Amazon didn't see fit to include HDMI on the HDX as they did on the HD.  I really enjoyed this feature on the HD because I could download a movie, then play it back on any TV with an HDMI port.  Unfortunately, Amazon chose to build in Miracast, a technology to connect to TVs and other devices that is deployed on very new TVs and, apparently, is not yet perfected, based on the plethora of 3-star (and less) reviews of the Miracast adapters sold on Amazon.  It is the reason I didn't give the HDX 5 stars, otherwise, I'd consider it a perfect mobile device.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Weichselbaum "Chaswax"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife. At first she was a little worried that it was only for reading books. She was so surprised that it could do almost everything her notebook could do and do it faster. has great speech recognition to use instead of typing. The screen is so big and clear so that even us old people can see and read. Best of all - it made my wife happy.

Reviews.Title: It is very good!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to figure it out, but as I learn how to use it, it is quite the instrument.  It should have had a instruction manual with it.  The biggest fault with the unite is when you go out of town it won't work without being hooked up to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Georgetta M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I pre-ordered it before Amazon was ready to ship. I have the Kindle fire HDX 8.9, 64 GB. Each one has met expectations.  The only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because many of the books now have the table of contents grayed out.  I could see and use the table of contents on previous devices.  However, I have located the table on most books and bookmarked it.The second reason for only 4 stars:  I have purchased 3 cases- looking for the perfect one.  Have not found it yet.  I do not want to raise the camera from the case to take a picture.  One case allows me to take a picture without raising the camera, but there is a black spot hiding the center of the picture, but the picture comes out great. STRANGE!Even though I only gave my 4th Kindle 4 stars, I would not give it up!

Reviews.Title: Nothing like this!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Prentiss
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a note pad of any kind but I rely don't think I would ever want anything else!  So portable and everything is right there at the touch of your finger. The HD is incredible! Facebook is so easy, my email is set up great. Nothing bad to say about it! I could go on and on but I want to get back to playing! :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome features!! Glad I got it!!
Reviews.Author: Mavisjo
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire!! I already had one of the original ones which I still use because it is more compact & easy to stuff in my purse. I love the neat features the fire had to offer. The color screen is very clear & great for playing games and watching videos. Oh and it of course is great for reading, although as I mentioned I still use my first kindle for most of my reading. I find it has a better screen for outdoors & is more compact & lighter than the fire. I can access all my books on either kindle. I just sync and it picks up whenever I left off, great feature! I have yet to use the mayday app, still learning all it has to offer & haven't felt the need yet. I know I will at some point. If you are considering a kindle vs iPad, I would suggest giving the kindle fire a try, you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: I would recommend one of these to anyone! I'm extremely happy with the Kindle fire HDX 8.9! It's pretty fast!

Reviews.Title: it pretty sweet but...
Reviews.Author: p0w3rg10v3
Reviews.Content: It seems like all the commercials on television or ads I see online showcase games that seem like they're only available on iPad...  Other than that I think it's great.

Reviews.Title: Review for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Hans J. Suchanek
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. For my age (65) is it very easy to handle. Mostly I am using it for Skype to be connected A/V with my relatives in Europe.I wished I had a printed short manual available to find troubleshooting help, especially if my screen is going black. Please supply a laminated manual similar to spark charts to help me and the elderly.I will take my kindle to a trip to Europe  and will try to convince my daughter to buy another kindle for herself. By the way, the pictures made with my kindle are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: In love!  <3  <3  <3
Reviews.Author: pchy
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best mobile device I've owned.  The tablet is extremely light, making it easy to hold while reading.  Fonts on screen are super crisp.  The backlight adjusts correctly so it isn't blinding at night.  The tablet is responsive and snappy.  And to top it all off, the BATTERY LIFE is amazing!  Beautifully done Amazon.  Beautifully done!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: C. Serio "Mom of 2 beauties"
Reviews.Content: We got this mainly for when my husband travels and it has been exactly what he needed.  He can watch movies or read.  He also can check his email and we were able to Skype with him on his latest trip.  It was very easy to set up and we love the Kindle Free Time for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Missy Mullins
Reviews.Content: I adore my Kindle Fire HDX. I take it everywhere and use it all the time. Everyone is shocked when I tell them it is a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Elinor P. Olson
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire HDX 8,9.but have not as yet tried all of the options.  As I learn more about all that can be accomplished on the kindle I'm sure I'll add a star!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Anthony M Murray
Reviews.Content: I love it. I have no complaints or comments. It is a great product. It is a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: TP "mom"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my new Kindle.  I still have so much to learn about it, but I am looking forward to using it for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Learning Curve
Reviews.Author: Steve Townsend
Reviews.Content: Maybe I'm just behind the times, but I have had trouble getting used to the "different" way of navigating on a tablet.  I love the bright, sharp picture, and apps I've downloaded have been good.  I have had trouble with different passwords, which has been rather frustrating.  Overall though, it is a great device, and I'm sure I will get the hang of it eventually.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 16GB For Photography
Reviews.Author: ArtisticCowboy
Reviews.Content: Let’s make this review simple and to the point so hopefully it will help someone make a good decision about whether to buy this or not.I am 52 years old, an avid photographer and fairly tech savvy (I build my own computers). I do have a business license for photography but do more free than for paid. My number one goal was to use this device for my photography to make it easier to view images then my excellent but small screen on the back of my Canon EOS 5D Mk-III. I wanted a very bright screen, highest resolution I could find, best color reproduction I could get, light and long lasting on batteries, and easy to use. I also wanted it to be easy to setup and fast for photography because, let’s face it, if I have to wait to see my images on this I won’t use it in the long run and it will become something to collect dust.So how do I feel about it so far? AWESOME! This device lives up to everything I had hoped. Even my wife enjoyed using it and wanted to learn more about the software (CamRanger). I do admit that in a very bright sunny outdoor area (used it yesterday in the mountains for a bridal shot) it is harder to see the screen. Now note I said “harder”, not impossible. It was still much better than the screen on the camera and it allowed my beautiful wife to better assist me in my shoots. You can connect this with an Eye-fi card or with a CamRanger. I did both. (Go look up my name as a reviewer on the CamRanger). I do not recommend the Eye-fi for pros. It is too unreliable and to fussy.Bottom line: I would definitely recommend this to others for photography. I will always have it in my bag wherever my camera goes. It is also very enjoyable to use for surfing the net and reading the latest eBooks (I read a lot of photo how-to books all the time). It is beautiful, light, fast, slick, easy to carry and fun. And did I mention that the screen is downright gorgeous?Enough said.May this review help those who are trying to decide. God bless!Bill C.

Reviews.Title: Replacing my computer
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Loeffler
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a dream come true. It allows me freedom to browse without being tied to my computer.  The only drawback is that it can't open some types of files.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 64g 8.9" is the perfect little "laptop" for home or on the go
Reviews.Author: Lori F
Reviews.Content: I love the new kindle fire HDX 64g 8.9. I was already a kindle owner of a 7" 8 g, which was a gift last Christmas when I became new to the internet but I realized I was almost out of memory which is why I purchased the 64g and went with the larger screen. I've chosen this rating just because I haven't been able to use all of its features yet.. There has been a problem with editing the calendar, which amazon technicians are working on to resolve as quickly as possible. The photos are fantastic and with having the front and rear facing camera makes it easier to use. The picture quality is great and watching a movie is so clear. I believe the best feature that was developed was being able to print from my kindle. I recommend this product to everyone, it is a great little laptop.

Reviews.Title: hd rocks
Reviews.Author: trixie
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle, way nicer than my 2 yr old nook. I can read at night & it doesn't bother my eyes at all.  With my nook I'd be reading a really good book over the weekend & the color to read with would cause so much eyestrain that glasses & giant letters wouldn't help me everything was still fuzzy so I'd have to quit reading. Now it's no problem at all.  I can read all day & all night.  Still do not need my glasses or the giant letters. And the video is awesome!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: David Lorden
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble with my Kindle Fire and was able to troubleshoot the problem by going to the Amazon site.  Great customer service and even better product!

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the Kindle HD to this one.  Actually, my husband bought it for me.  I love the size of it.  The picture quality is great! I had one problem where it froze and wouldn't do anything.  I couldn't even turn it off.  After researching on Amazon for questions and answers, found the answers.  When I asked a question, had a response within an hour or less.  Have not had that problem since.  I do a lot of reading so this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Jim Dandy
Reviews.Content: The kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is great! It has all the features of an I Pad, costs less, the display is just as good or better when compared side by side with the I Pad and the selection of apps is good. Of course the selection of books is outstanding as always with any Kindle. If I had to find one fault with it it would be the glare when reading. I had another Kindle and as an E-Reader the display was better but in order to get a tablet you have to compromise on the reading screen a bit. It is still easy to read but in bright sunlight sometimes can be a bit difficult. If someone wants an E-Reader and only an E-Reader I would recommend the Kindle Paper White. As an E-Reader they don't come any better.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Ray H.
Reviews.Content: It doesn't allow printing with my wireless printer which really limits its use. Only works with certain printers. Other than that really is useful and handy little tablet. Picture is so clear and sound for movies is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Super tablet
Reviews.Author: Gary M. Pewitt
Reviews.Content: Incredible video and sound.  Fixed almost all shortcomings of the previous version -except for the unforgivable lack of an S.D. card slot.  Why oh why don't they put one in?  Can't reach the "Cloud" when out in the boonies.  I have a solar array to power it but can't put enough movies on it for more than a short trip in the outback.  I had to buy a wireless one terabyte hard drive to add storage.  Please Amazon add an SD slot to the next version.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: A. Porter
Reviews.Content: I have had kindle, kindle paperwhite and now the HDX 8.9.  Paperwhite is still best for consuming books.Screen delivers outstanding picture. I mostly use this HDX for consumption of TV shows/Movies.  Secondary uses e-mail(works very well), surfing internet(OK-Silk locks up occasionally), and time wasting game apps(work well).Issues-Silk locks up occasionally.  When apps update they can interfere with Silk/streaming movies until you reboot device.  Battery will drain quickly if you don't use airplane mode when device not in use. Device will drain from 100% to 10% in 10 hours.  Even with these issues I rate a five.  Hopefully Amazon will address these issues with future updates.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Donald C Hudson
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought and then issued to students in a paramedic class for use of all online learning resources and etextbook. It has met expectations. My only grip is that it does not support Goolge services. I understand the different competing manufactures, but great products from both can actually support each other and bolster sales on both sides!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet
Reviews.Author: LesterT
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Samsung 10" table that was getting a bit long in the tooth.  I decided that the Kindle's size and clarity were to my liking, so I purchased one.  Interestingly enough - and I don't know if this special is still available - I got a good discount by purchasing it through AARP.That said, I don't have too many gripes about this product.  It's fast, easy to use, and makes reading novels (my primary desire for getting free novels through Amazon Prime) enjoyable.  My one big gripe is the Kindle app store. As a now retired techie, I like the ability to pick and choose which apps I want to use. The Kindle App store prefers to limit those choices by a wide margin compared to Android's play store.That said, I gave the Kindle four stars even though I believe it's a five star product. The Kindle App store issue, in my opinion, is not a minor grievance.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX. Wish I had purchased it sooner. Very easy to use. I hardly use my lap top anymore

Reviews.Title: phenomenal
Reviews.Author: Claiomh
Reviews.Content: The only two problems I have with this is that I can't get flash player for it, and, since I got the ad free version, I would like to put my own pics up as my screensaver. Those are the ONLY two misgivings about my hdx. Otherwise, I love my hdx

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: 4realguy Beaumont, Tx
Reviews.Content: I really love this product, i have desktops and laptops but the device is versatile enough to carry any where and it can do just as much and keep you entertained on the go.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Berr Breiding
Reviews.Content: The versatility and graphics have us hooked.  Keep up the very, good work, and we 'll keep enjoying the apps.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Schilling
Reviews.Content: I already have an iPad and I had to share with my husband so I decided to invest in another "tablet."  Im so glad I bought this.  I love the HD screen and at 32GB it has plenty of memory for me.  I love the size of it and it is  compatible with my other Kindle accounts.  I love that it came ready to go (with the exception of adding my personal email account) right out of the box!  Fully charged and my Kindle account/Amazon stuff was already synced with it the moment I turned it on!!!  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" WI-FI and 4G LTE, 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i  havn't had this unit very long. At first is was a little disappointed because I couldn't get an old black and white movie to play on it but I found the right app to do this, so so-far-so-good. I was initially concerned it was going to be too big to carry around, but it really isn't. Like they say in the ads, it is very light and has a great screen.  I would recommend to anyone gettingt a Kindle to max out the memory.  The 4G LTE has also proved handy when I was out of range of my wi-fi signal at a friends house; I was able to show them how I could download a book and do other shopping.

Reviews.Title: Met my expectations in every way.
Reviews.Author: Steven J Yetter
Reviews.Content: One of the few technology choices I have made in recent years that has met my expectations. The only issue I have is reading outside in bright light but I knew this was going to be an issue that is why I kept my Kindle DX. I would recommend the Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX to anyone who needs a good table and reader. I may even try to leverage my windows development skills on this platform.

Reviews.Title: What did we do with our time before this?
Reviews.Author: Mr. Dad
Reviews.Content: One word can sum this device up... FUN! Second to that I would say "time waster". But who doesn't know that going in? This tablet is phenomenal in its quality, entertainment, and is it fair to say usefulness?? Not a cheap investment, but much better price than Apple products. The biggest drawback is the apps; Amazon has it set to only work with their own rather than with other options like Google Play. Not sure why as that hinders people's fondness for the device. There are other ways around it, just not convenient. Great product and we're glad we got it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindle fire. It is more than a tablet. I like how it is integrated with Amazon. Though it might not have every android app, it doesn't need them. What it does well. I've read 12 books since I've had it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gramieto10
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the things I can do with this that I couldn't on my kindle fire. 4G for one. The set up us different and took some getting used to. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi, 4G LTE 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9'. After the larger keyboard version and a smaller keyboard version for my purse this one is great.  My larger keyboard Kindle tanked after 3 yrs and 1000 bks and I wasn’t as crazy about the smaller screen on my other Kindle. Now instead of needing 2 Kindles (one at home and the other in my purse) this version fits perfectly in my purse and isn’t too small or too heavy. And no more clumsy book light attachments. My new HDX was money well spent. While I’d like a larger screen this size works well enough. Thankfully Amazon has a forum and a Q&A; page to help with initial start up that I thought was a bit tricky. Guess I could have asked the May Day person for help but I haven’t tried that feature out yet. The only negatives I’ve seen so far (and I’m still learning) is the s-l-o-w start up and the battery runs down quickly.  I’ve only used it thus far to do a lot of reading and to play a game or two.  I’m charging it up every other day.  I’ve played around with a few free apps but thus far I haven’t been all that impressed. Certain ones I hear drain the battery.  I was disappointed to learn quite a few magazines’ only show lots of ads.  The web browsing is not as easy as I hoped it might be, certainly not as easy as my laptop. I’ve yet to watch any movies but the color quality is excellent.  But for reading it’s great, very happy with that part. I’d heard there was a blue edge that shows up while reading books on this model, but that’s not true on mine.  I read for hours and I love reading on this.

Reviews.Title: I am pleased to have my Kindle but would rather not deal with all the ads.
Reviews.Author: Rita Stevens "Ritarae"
Reviews.Content: I do not appreciate the many ads that entice for gambling or games.  I am a reader and that is why I wanted a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great Display!
Reviews.Author: Stanley T. Myles "techsan68"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle purchase, and the best of the series so far. The display is just stunning and the streaming very fast! This Kindle does everything you should expect from Kindles (media, games, apps) and is a terrific buy as long as you don't expect the near-PC functionality some other tablets offer.

Reviews.Title: Everything the commercials claim!
Reviews.Author: Nancie Cornwall
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Great display, sound quality and apps.  The "help" feature is outstanding.  I like the fact that it syncs to my kindle and I downloaded a free manual for the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Interactive Reading
Reviews.Author: Cheri MorningStar
Reviews.Content: The color is beyond belief.  Characters in a locale you don't know?  Speaking to each other by song titles?  Need an instant dictionary?  A few taps and pictures, music, word definitions are instant.  You can put books by genre, author lists.  Down stream movies, Netflix or HBO GO.  This Kindle is awesome.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love this little device!  Very easy to use and comfortable to handle.  I've used it for email, social media, reading books, etc.  I haven't watched a movie yet but that's next.  The pictures are amazing as well.  Great purchase for the price!  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Mike A.
Reviews.Content: It is perfect for consuming content.  Nice size and easy to carry around in a jacket pocket (I have some big ones!).The picture quality is superb.  Really enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: F &T
Reviews.Content: I can read a book, watch Netflix, watch Amazon Prime movies or tv shows, play games, accesses the internet, read the news of the day, get the weather forecast! Whats not to like!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great gift idea
Reviews.Author: Steve Martin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife for Christmas and she loves it. So much so, I have to hide the charger to get some alone time... I would write more, but she doesn't let me use it. I can tell you that I can read the screen clearly from the next seat over.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle Fire HDX. Wish it had FLASH!
Reviews.Author: S. Lichty "TeacherMom"
Reviews.Content: Hey y'all! Thanks for indulging me for a minute. I bought the 7 inch version, then returned it for the bigger one. I love them both, but the bigger one is  a better size for me, and it has a couple extras such as front and rear cameras and a little sharper image. It starts up fast, and it is convenient. As a prime student member, I can borrow one book a month from the Amazon owner's library. Pretty awesome!However, the silk browser, which is the kindle browser doesn't support flash. So many online games and such will not work on your kindle. I've read online about how to download a flash app for kindle and a different browser, but c'mon Amazon! Why should I have to go through the hassle? Why can't you just update Silk to support flash, and give us a flash app yourself? Should be very easy.Lastly, you cannot use the g---le play store on kindle. This is a shame because you can often get some apps cheaper at one versus the Amazon app store. I like to have options! So if we could rix these two minor issues, I could have given my kindle fire hdx 8.9 a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: angiebc
Reviews.Content: I really love the new Kindle Fire HDX. The picture quality is great. It's light weight and just the right size to slip into your bag of choice.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Dana
Reviews.Content: I loved my first generation kindle fire but when I started having problems I went to the HDX 8.9.  I love it except for one thing.  The battery life isn't long enough for me.  Of course I use it for 4 hours usually at a time.  I've been know to read a couple of books at a sitting so it might be my fault.  I love the kindle and will always have one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MAY KINDLE FIRE.  IT HAS BEEN A GREAT SOURCE OF PLEASURE.  I use it for face book, e-mail and games.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Debbie Smart
Reviews.Content: It's big enough that I can actually read it.  I am going to put more things on it that I can read

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sandy Kauffman
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle purchase. The first was the original 8.9 e reader. But this kindle is amazing it's a computer, e reader, gamer.It's great !!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Candykss
Reviews.Content: Took a little bit to get used to finding my way around, but it's beautiful to use.  I love the carousel, the light weight, the graphics, and the camera is awesome.  All in all it takes a bit to get used to but I love it and I'm just getting started with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle very good, but tech and delivery problems
Reviews.Author: Janette Neal
Reviews.Content: I like the KIndle 8.9" HDX very much. The first one I gotfrooze and had to be replaced. That led to delivery complicationsfor the new KIndle. Everything eventually worked out fine.  Janette Neal

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jim Eastman
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful.  I learn something new on it almost every day. Their live "Mayday" tech support is awesome.  The image quality is amazing. I bet you think I really like it???

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Traveller
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent choice for someone like me who is not computer savvy.  The personal guide, which I have brought upquite often, walks me through every question that I have with my Kindle.  This is the most outstanding feature that I can have someonehelp me directly.  They all have been kind and patient.  There is not anything that I dislike about it.

Reviews.Title: The Time is right for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kent Johnson
Reviews.Content: Has a very good video screen; can download and watch Hulu, Amazon Prime, and Net Flix. Good availability of Apps

Reviews.Title: Love reading my PDFs on this
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Walker
Reviews.Content: I get a lot of art instructions or magazines that are in pdf format.  I just discovered how easy it is to email them to the Kindle by using my kindle email address assigned to this new device.I still read regular 'text' stories on my Kindle keyboard, but this is for my art books and magazines that need that color format.  I've been reading them on my computer using the Kindle app, but this is so much nice to have available.  I also enjoy the camera feature.  The special offers are not obtrusive either.  I tried them on my keyboard once and they were totally obnoxious, eating up part of the screen all of the time, but not so with this version.  You only see the offers when you first turn the device on while the screen is still locked.  I am very happy with this device, although there is glare on the screen if you are in strong light, so I will be researching the glare screens available.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sharona
Reviews.Content: Great buy..Checked out others but the pluses of this one won my heart. This is my 3rd kindle. I just seem to upgrade my kindle. Can't imagine what will be next.  Great sound,  AWESOME color.Super fast downloads..Glad I chose Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: I really recommend this machine
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferreira
Reviews.Content: I do like the Kindle fire HDX because I had an iPad and I like this better this machine is faster and it's got better resolution camera takes great great pictures

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Mcgovern "Donna"
Reviews.Content: Kindle did it again! I had gotten the first kindle fire when it first came out, now this one is outstanding! It basically has it's own brain!!  Can't say enough!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice and take everywhere I go.  I enjoy reading from it and surfing using the Silk browser.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: geckogirl548
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 4 G lite. The screen is bigger and easier to read. I like that the on/off and volume buttons are on the back on opposite sides. This is my 6th kindle, so I know my kindles. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Light weight and powerful tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindler
Reviews.Content: Minimum weight, great screen, a powerful CPU, large memory, simple interface, convenient Amazon services. This is all I got for the minimum money. In my collection were and there are tablets, as a NOOK Color, Asus Transformer, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD 8.9", NOOK HD Plus. So, the choice is absolutely relevant, meaningful and perfect result.

Reviews.Title: Apple man loves new kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Marcus Davis
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's just the right size . Ultra light and the display is perfect. I am an Apple guy but I really love my new k kindle fire..And thanks Amazon.for.letting me.pay it off in installments!!

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD and Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I now have 2 Kindles and I LOVE THEM.  They do absolutely everything I want to do.  I can browse, I can watch movies, I can play music, I can play games.  I take it with me to the beach and anywhere there is wifi you can connect, for free.  I don't think anyone can ever say, they don't like the Kindle.  It does everything, what is there not to like?  When I first bought my first Kindle I had no idea what I was getting other than the advertisements I had seen.  But everyone loved it so much, I had to get a 2nd one. The sound is great and the picture is fantastic!  If you only have one, you will have a hard time getting to use it, everybody else loves it too.  My husband would not use my desktop Dell, but he will use the Kindle to check his stock, catch up on the headline news, etc. because it is so so easy because you can use it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire yet
Reviews.Author: Catherine Adkins
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and they just keep getting better. I love the 4G so I can use it when there is no wifi availble.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: David M.Hartness
Reviews.Content: This product is fast and has an easy to use interface. The screen resolution is amazing. I'm still learning and the screen size could be slightly bigger but all the feature are great.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: red hen
Reviews.Content: So very easy to read.  Colors are just very intense, vibrant, and appropriate. I am very happy to have selected this model and brand.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!  Download most movies/tv shows and watch offline...  And interfaced with IMDB!
Reviews.Author: Scott.R "Yea!"
Reviews.Content: *** What a great feature to download movies and TV shows at no 'additional' charge, so THANK YOU AMAZON!  I did not know this feature was available when I purchased the tablet. Now I can most watch movies/TV shows offline when Wi-Fi is not available.*** No space problem for my 16GB - I downloaded a full length movie at 720 HD and the available space went from 7.1 to 5.3 for a decrease of about 2 GB. That makes 2 - 720 HD movies downloaded and with my other apps/books the device still has 5.3 GB available... so still plenty of space available. Due to download times I use 720 HD which is still an incredible picture quality due to the small size of tablets.  It's really is a waste of time and space to download 1080 HD... unless the 13" table down the road is not a myth...*** I love the X-Ray feature showing the movie and TV shows' with the IMDB connection of cast biographies and other their titles, ratings and interesting general trivia...  the IMDB cast changes as the actors change from scene to scene...*** The Dolby sound is amazing.***  In my opinion, the KF may not have the quantity of apps, but does have a ton of 'useful' apps.  The KF and other android tablets have the best euchre app by far... compared to the other non-android tablet...  and I love playing euchre.  The other word and numbers (such as Sudoku) type apps are on par with any other tablet...***  Cannot comment on the camera - who uses a tablet to take pictures anyway?***  THE BEST WARRANTY even when out of the warranty period...  Amazon has replaced several our older KFs which were out of warranty since it was our first problem... that is incredible service.***  I used the Mayday feature and sure enough the response was just a few minutes... he corrected the audio problem quickly which I should have figured out myself in the first place.  He wrote on the screen since I could not hear him.  How cool was that...  and I believe there is no charge for online help even if it is out of the warranty period.Our family has the KF and the other top rated non-android tablet and love both...  one is just too costly for me, but apparently my wife can afford the more expensive one.Insert a product link[Cancel]

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: CMOR
Reviews.Content: It is great for reading and surfing the internet, watching tv,  & playing games. Am looking forward to more apps coming for this device.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. I really like this one. It is like a small computer,not just a book reader. I do every thing on it.Most of the time  I don't have  to even get  my lap top out. It's very lightweight and slender. I take it ever where.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Love
Reviews.Author: jane m wolfe
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire! I can take it with me any were and to tell the truth I have. It has great color and I never get any glare from the sun. I tell all my friends that it is a must have.

Reviews.Title: another "hit" for Kindle
Reviews.Author: SMS1253
Reviews.Content: LOVE  the new HDX! User friendly, sound is superior, and price is right.  8.9 in. is perfect size for over 50 crowd. Keeps viewing screen compact but not too small for those of us using readers : ) Another great product in the Kindle line

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Francisco
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle except that I didn't buy the one that I didn't need Wifi but that was my mistake. I use it several hours a day and LOVE the Mayday feature.  Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Power inlet..
Reviews.Author: virginia sigala
Reviews.Content: The HDX Fire is our third Kindle.. We get tremendous enjoyment from the reading, games etc. etc.They say a chain is only as strong as it's weakest link. To us, in our opinion  .. The power inlet on the Kindle is it's weak point.Our first two Kindles have lost the ability to recharge because of the plug receptacle. The present plug is too small and on the fragile side to stand up to what is expected from it.. We would suggest a stronger wider recept, something built to withstand the many, many times that the power cord will be plugged in and pulled out. The Kindle is Great !  We get hours and hours of enjoyment ...

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: greenbean
Reviews.Content: I'm new to tablets so don't have any experience with which to compare this device.  But it is amazing to me what all it can do - and so efficiently.  I'm still learning but am most pleased to this point in time.  Have had one experience which required customer assistance and it was handled with the usual Amazon courtesy and expertise.  Love the brilliance of the display and how small and light in weight it is.

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: Lance Zehring
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought for me as a chistmas gift and its the best i've ever used the graphics are fanominal and the sensitivity is the best i have ever seen. I would recomend the tablet for teens and family bother .

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, portable, crisp
Reviews.Author: Danise C. Chester
Reviews.Content: Love it, I'm used to a bigger screen but it's very light and great for travel!! Battery life could be better but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Edick
Reviews.Content: crystal clear colors, very light weight ,many fun apps to choose from, videos play smoothly. I only wish the on/off button was on the front.

Reviews.Title: my kindle
Reviews.Author: Damaris Velazquez
Reviews.Content: It's actually pretty cool. I'm able to do practically every thing that I'd do on a desk/lap top... I'm very happy with my kindle

Reviews.Title: Very Handy
Reviews.Author: The Chosen Ones Cs
Reviews.Content: I would have given the HDX 8.9 5 stars except that there are a few little quirks that I have to get used to. For example, there is no way, that I've found, that will allow me to delete multiple emails at once. So I have to delete emails from my mailbox individually.On the positive side...this thing pretty much allows me to take care of my business the same as I would be able to on my laptop. Not to mention, I can read books without having to maintain a paper bookmark...lol. I am even able to participate in online conference calls, which is awesome.Oh, and one more good thing...for those of you that don't have the mobile phone upgrade on your Kindle, if you subscribe to Skype for $2.99 a month, you have a fully functional cell phone that calls Skype numbers and cell numbers and the call quality is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Judy Koffroth
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to use for travel. It's lightweight, and has a lot of apps. It was highly recommended by the salesperson.I tried pairing it with my HOTSPOT for secure, online purchases, banking, etc. while traveling only to learn that the devices are not compatible. Had I known this before purchase, I'd have made another choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice device and cheaper than Apple...but
