Reviews.Author: Kestrel Hess
Reviews.Content: One would think this should work very much like an Android phone and in many cases it does.  It lacks the support for many of the apps, however, and struggles to be as productive as the iPad for only $100 less.  It sits in between the productivity of the Windows Tablets and the iPads but seems priced more as the more productive Apple.  If you are using just Amazon, great.  It doesn't have Chrome support or any other browser, which has its drawbacks.  Most of the games you enjoy on your phone either need to be re-purchased (inexplicably) or simply aren't supported.  The touch is pretty good though it sometimes runs a bit slow.  It is better than my Windows Venue 8 Pro but less well than the iPad Air (or any of the previous iPads).  Decent device but you might want to save for the iPad which does nearly everything just a little bit better.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: WAB
Reviews.Content: The Fire HDX (mine 64GB, 8.9") is a superb tablet. My first was stolen, and I had no hesitation in choosing the identical unit to replace it. My only suggestion would involve the motion (rotation) sensor. It is far too sensitive. Only the slightest inadvertent rotation will change the portrait/landscape orientation. This was evident in both my units. Live Tech support could only suggest locking in the desired orientation (Options menu). As the Kindle Fire line did not exhibit this behavior, I must assume this was a less than optimal design decision, which hopefully can be corrected in a future software release. That said, everything else is state-of-the-art. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "khde"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  WOW !!!!!!!! The graphics and sound are incredible . Size is awesome and light weight.The apps are fantastic , Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: a lovely addition to the electronic toy collection
Reviews.Author: Roger W. Hawk
Reviews.Content: The images are so sharp and clear....makes you want to watch a movie right now.  This is our first tablet so we're learning a lot.  For the most part it's very easy to navigate, but we're having a little trouble mastering the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Keeps you occupied
Reviews.Author: Karen Stendahl
Reviews.Content: This thing is great while your sitting in the Dr's office, Keeping your husband occupied while sitting in the Drs office is even better. The graphics are better then our TV's. It's easy peasy getting apps. One click and it's on your kindle. I cant wait to travel with it!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Miller
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at tablets since the 1st I-Pad came out but just wasn't sold on Apple. I read several reviews when the Kindle Fire first came out comparing it to the I-Pad and it was one of the ones that was comparable, lower in price, and did more. I kept comparing lots of tablets until I could make my purchase. I was really pleased when they came out with the larger screen, because I didn't like the smaller ones as much. I am very happy with my purchase. I was pleasantly surprised that a non-techie could use it right out of the box without a how-to manual or a even a little frustration. Easy to use, great pictures and graphics, 2 cameras, lots of memory, and a great price. What's not to love? I'm glad I made all the comparisons ahead of time. I have a tablet that's a winner and I am really enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: southwest lady
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is super fast and easy to use. And the mayday feature is  beyond awesome. When I was first setting it up I could not find my e mail and the person appeared instantly to guide me through the process of setting up e mail accounts. I have had trouble connecting to my home wif fi but out anywhere public it works great. Perhaps some issue with our internet but I dont think so because our intenet works fine for our desk top and lap top,.;..more on this issue later. I already called twice and went through some basics with no resolution. They told me to call my internet company who told me to call my router manufacturer. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GADGET FOR READING AND .email... AND....games AND ....
Reviews.Author: Lawrence A. Lang
Reviews.Content: GREAT GADGET FOR READING - - AND, IT DOES E-MAIL, GAMES GALORE, ETC.,  ETC.and, YOU CAN READ OUTSIDE ON SUNNY DAYS.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Sandi
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle. It's more portable than a laptop. I can do a lot in more place with less baggage.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Connie George
Reviews.Content: I really like the dual mode camera option. I'm having problems viewing some videos and have not attempted the flash player download.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: The Soldier's Wife
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle and I love it. I don't have a negative thing to say about it. It travels with me everywhere for whenever I get a minute or two of downtime. Very pleased with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great device.  I have one problem that hasn't been solved.  I can't get my email contacts imported.  I've talked to 3 kindle associates but they haven't been able to help.  I also have a kindle 1 and the contacts imported when I signest up my e-mail account.  Other than that, it is very user friendly.  Books download easily.  Only had it a few months but the larger screen is so much better, and clearer than the kindle 1

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Kay McMann
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX to have a better way to read books and magazines than what my old Kindle has offered. I find I am using it for much, much more. All of my old Kindle books and back-issues of magazines were automatically available. The picture quality is great, making everything easier to read. As a bonus, I can now fall asleep reading and not have to turn off the bedroom lights; I just read in the dark, and let the Kindle turn off.I also download a couple of free games, one of which I really enjoy. And I have gotten hooked on watching old TV episodes that are free with Amazon Prime.The only real complaint I have is that I often have to disconnect/reconnect my WiFi; however, I believe this to be an issue with my internet, and not with the device.I definitely do not regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: MANY, MANY Features
Reviews.Author: T. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Used primarily as a e-reader. Love the size; # of screen pixels; view choices for reading (sideways, two column, screen brightness). Not too crazy about the ability to switch from reading to home. It usually takes me several attempts to find my icon. The browser is less than I expected for internet. I'd give it a 4.5.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my Kindle Fire. Very simple to download apps. Also it has Mayday if you need help. A real person talks you through how to install or fix problem. It is nice to take along with you it is very light weight.It takes great pictures and you can send to email or face book. It does lots of of other things..I give it a "Thumbs UP".. Jane

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hayes
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to all Android lovers! I love this tablet. It is easy to use and if I need help there is the Mayday button with reps who are always ready to help. I have found all the games I like to play. I have purchased and borrowed books, which is a feature of an Amazon Prime customer, and it all works smoothly.

Reviews.Title: great!!
Reviews.Author: switchking
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle HD got for my birthday February 2013. I saw the Kindle HDX 8.9 on a commercial,and what got me was that it was lighter to hold , as I read outside in the summer .I thought this newer version would work well. The picture quality is outstanding!! I am Very happy with my purchase.Looking forward to summer time reading!!

Reviews.Title: LIGHT AND BRIGHT
Reviews.Author: Mark Koditek
Reviews.Content: DOES EVERYTHING i WANTED IT FOR.Light as a feather and fast as a cheetah.Screen is easy to read and its intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Vicci Varner "VicciV"
Reviews.Content: I never could get into the whole tablet mania.  They were nearly as heavy as my laptop and the screens made my eyes hurt.  I had a Kindle paper white for reading and thought that would be enough.  But, after someone recommended that I check out the new Kindle Fire HD, my wishes came true.  It's easy to carry, has a sharp, sharp screen that I can read on without getting a headache, and a fast response time.  I love my Kindle Fire and I hope everyone can have one so nice.

Reviews.Title: I really like my kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: vangie potter
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX. Its my second one. They were both gifts to me for christmas. The first one was the kindle fire and I just used it mostly for reading and internet. The HDX I use for everything and it takes picture and video. The price is less than the IPAD and does the same things. Its also a good size. I ordered a case for it and when it arrived it was not the right one. I realized I ordered the case for the kindle fire HD and not the HDX so when you order a case make sure you order for the right one that you purchase. I just kept it because it would cost more money in shipping to return. I'll make it work.

Reviews.Title: Best so far
Reviews.Author: William Murray Jr.
Reviews.Content: The new HDX 8.9 is a huge improvement over the original Kindle Fire.  It run better than most laptops and navigation from one site to another is easy.  The display is just like watching a expensive TV.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Inez
Reviews.Content: What can I say, this Kindle is fantastic.  This was a Christmas present to myself and I'm still exploring all the apps am trying to find my around this wonderful pad.  I tell all my friends to get one and they would not be sorry.

Reviews.Title: On Fire!!!!
Reviews.Author: Charles R. Scheidt
Reviews.Content: I had a Nexus 7 and was very happy with it, but I also belong to Prime and weighed buying the HDX.  After several days of debating I decided to give the Nexus 7 to my wife who is not real into electronics.  At this time I couldn't be happier.  This tablet let's me get into a late night movie without bothering anyone and I think the features are fantastic.  Think I made a really good decision and would do it again.

Reviews.Title: special tv required to watch movies from your Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kim Schubert
Reviews.Content: I had an older Kindle and I could watch movies (with a cable) on my tv.  Now with the new Kindle Fire HDX you have to have a special tv that will connect remotely with it.  Like how many people have that specific type of tv??  Very annoyed with that (new) option.  Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEAESED
Reviews.Author: Alice L
Reviews.Content: First time dealing with Amazon without any problems.My wife try the nook and did not like it. The first timeshe used the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" display she fell inlove with it.Alice

Reviews.Title: Christmas from Husband!
Reviews.Author: Alison Stoll
Reviews.Content: I love that I can read my favorite books and check my email.  Now I can use this wonderful amazing Kindle and not haul around my heavy laptop.  It is amazing.  I can connect to internet any time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Super!
Reviews.Author: tom harper
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the HDX 8.9; its many advanced features are certain to please most new or current tablet users.  Found that purchasing a User's Guide on the product to be quite helpful in navigating its features.  I was introducted to this product by a friend and was immediately taken in by it, which led to my purchase.  Thanks for creating it!Tom

Reviews.Title: Struggling with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sylvia L
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle difficult to use particularly if you accidentally touch the screen and the system jumps out of what you were doing.. There is a lack of information on how to use it. I still have not been able to configure my email and the on-line help people were no help, they could not do it either. Have had this since Chistmas (a gift) but it is not being used any more. If it would not offend the giver, I would ask for the money back.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!
Reviews.Author: Dianne H
Reviews.Content: I have used many tablet but ths one is the best.  I love the screen size and clarity.  It is very easy to read books on my tablet and it is much better than my Kindle e-reader!  There are tons of apps and games.  My grandkids love playing games on my Kindle Fire.  I also purchased a case for my kindle that has a keyboard in it so it is like a mini-computer to surf the web, write emails,  etc.  I couldn't be more pleased with my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: S. P. Cliatt "Sandy C"
Reviews.Content: I really love my new kindle, but I do not like having to deal with the ads every time I turn it on. With the price of this tablet, we should not have the ads with it. I understand that we can pay an additional fee to have them removed. REALLY?!?! Also, my older kindle had a light that turned green when the charging was done. This one does not. It would have been a great feature to have included on this one.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire is HOT
Reviews.Author: Josheila Crandall
Reviews.Content: Looking at the reviews for the Kindle Fire HDX and comparing it to the IPad Air is a no brainer.  I was told by a colleague ofmine that he likes the apple because it is sexy.  Well guess what the Kindle Fire is just as sexy and more and the pictures make the Ipad Air look amateur.  Okay so you say the IPad has more apps well how many of those apps are you really going to use.  My suggestion buy the Kindle Fire and let Apple know they are not the only game in town, in fact they need to step up their game iof they are going to compete with Kindle.  Kindle Fire rocks in every way.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I expected!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had been waiting for an affordable 2 in 1 tablet/computer that included everything that I wanted but it seems that none of them met my requirements so I decided to table that idea and go with just a multimedia tablet with an emphasis on reading/video/music. I had previously purchased my wife a Nook since she is an avid Barnes and Noble shopper, but since I primarily shop for books at Amazon and have purchased quite a few music CDs from Amazon as well, I figured that I might as well go with the Fire HDX. Another factor in my decision was that I had already downloaded the Kindle reading app on my phone and computers and acquired quite a few free books for my library. I am a teacher and having these available on my classroom computer appealed to me.So that is "why" I went with the Fire HDX. I decided on the top of the line with everything except for 4G coverage because I figured that I would always have enough content to keep myself occupied between wifi hotspots and would never need the Kindle to download something urgently enough to require it right then when I was not in an area of coverage.I am totally impressed with the display on videos, the music sounds great when connected to quality headphones, and I already have enough books to keep me busy reading for quite a while. I need to remember to utilize my 64gb hard drive since so far everything that I need is sitting in the Amazon cloud. I never was a big gamer fan, but I've downloaded several free games and a few interesting apps and being a traditional guy, I will probably stay with a steady rotation of those when I feel like playing something instead of trying to improve my mind by reading.If I would have to give any negative comment to this device at all, it would have to be that it occasionally doesn't keep up with the buffer on streaming and doesn't play perfectly with a few online video apps like Watch ESPN or CBSSports. So far, I have had only one instance of it needing to catch up with an Amazon Prime video but it wasn't a huge problem and obviously could be remedied if you went ahead and downloaded the video before watching.Speaking of Amazon Prime, it seems many people are upset because all videos are not available with an Amazon Prime subscription. I just started my trial and will spending the next 30 days checking to see what is actually available with Prime. If I cannot find enough of the videos that I want to stream for free, then I will simply discontinue after the free trial. I did the same thing with Netflix because their selection did not have the newest or best videos available for streaming. The same seems to be true of Amazon Prime but I will give them the full trial period before passing judgement.  I suggest everyone check out the videos that are available through Prime before jumping on that wagon.Anyway, the Amazon Fire HDX is everything it says it is and apparently every bit the competitor for the Apple Ipad Air or the Nook, with a display that tips the scales in favor of the Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: joshua diaz
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just ok. I can't stand the constant (must be built in) advertisements that are constantly popping up. It is so annoying. From my understanding it how they kept the price down.  I would have paid an iPod price to avoid it. I don't notice a pixel difference between this tablet and my old iPad. I also find this tablet to be slow and lagging. The app selection is decent.  For basic internet surfing its ok.  I would suggest an iPad. 100%  thank god this was a gift.

Reviews.Title: My Review of Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful to be in bed and watch my favorite TV shows and movies!I love watching the Kindle while I am warm and snug in my bed.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but hard to read in bright light
Reviews.Author: David kitterman
Reviews.Content: The Fire is a great internet appliance, you can cruise the web, check email, and enjoy a light lap top, not.  But, for books it is less than wonderful.  The screen is reflective and isn't all that easy to read in the light.  If you read at night in bed, its fine.  Another anoing thing is all the comercialization that comes with the apps and standard Kindle.  Expect to be controlled by the commercialize Amazon appliance.  Would I recommend it, yes, as long as you live by Amazon.  Cheers, David

Reviews.Title: try and you will become a believer
Reviews.Author: Flower Lady
Reviews.Content: I purchased the original kindle fire a couple of years ago and really enjoyed. I wanted to upgrade and was torn between the air and the HDX 8.9. I decided to explore a trial of  30 days and was sold after less than an hour of usage. It is very easy to use and if needed May day is handy. Not only is there ease of use but very fast. This has replaced my laptop. I would recommend for all age groups as there is something for every with/without monitoring.

Reviews.Title: i like this and not that
Reviews.Author: bethany
Reviews.Content: So far so good. EXCELLENT picture quality, easy to use.  However, I often have to turn my Wi-Fi off and then on to use the internet or for apps, like Facebook for instance this always happens. Very annoying. Not sure what that is about.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Karla Biteman
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle for my birthday a month ago and I love it! I recommend this product to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: james robert horvath
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet out there u get what u pay for. The only downfall is you can're watch flash on it

Reviews.Title: Best Present EVER!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Maierson
Reviews.Content: I received this for Christmas and I have enjoyed it so much.  It is easily navigated and it serves my purpose well.  As soon as I catch up on my backlog of books here at home I will be using it to access the library on Amazon and reading more!Definitely recommend to anyone!  Even though I am still learning its' uses.

Reviews.Title: loooove it!!!
Reviews.Author: heidz
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX. I take it with me everywhere I go. If I had to give a criticism it would be the tipping trends to put spaces in between letters if I  don't watch. Not a biggie.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price.
Reviews.Author: Bob Kesler
Reviews.Content: First tablet I have owned. Light weight, fun to use, great display and I really, really like the Mayday button.

Reviews.Title: Love It!�
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing! It's battery doesn't run out easily, it's so light I can take it anywhere, the grafitcs are awesome, and you can read it where ever! I love my kindle! It's better then an iPad

Reviews.Title: Good device but needs some help.
Reviews.Author: Michael Politz
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice tablet for most things but is lacking in some crutial areas. It needs to be able to download adobe flash player. I cannot understand why it wouldnt be able to do something simple like that, many videos on facebook and youtube require flash player and the kindle fire hdx will not play them. Also you should be able to print from the kindle and that is another miss.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX8.9 HDX Display Wi FI 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Jenniffer
Reviews.Content: My son gave me the Kindle Fire for my Christmas present.  I can't put it down! It is everything I would want in a tablet. The light and color is EXCELLENT! I can check my email and compose email. I have a front and rear camera that takes EXCELLENT clear pictures. I can browse and shop for anything that I want with KINFLE Fire.  IT fits so comfortably in my hand and with just a light touch to the screen connects me to whatever  I want to do. It is great for everyone in your family to use. YOU can set parental controls and set time limits for your children or grandchildren.  Just as I am able to type this review , when I am reading a book and come upon a word that I need to know the definition, I LIGHTLY tap on the word, I can makes notes about the word and highlight the word.  There is so much to say, but I leave you with this, when you need help with something you press the help app and you get a real person  speaking back and forth with you, leading and guiding you through the process.  By the way you can see the person but the person cannot see you.  Go out and buy your New KINDLE FIRE! You won't regard it.

Reviews.Title: Not very user friendly and not enough memory for best quality
Reviews.Author: B. Mason
Reviews.Content: Graphics and picture are excellent, but it is not very user friendly.  Found that you can only download one movie at time if you want the best quality.  Maybe an additional extra should be an external flash drive port or SD card slot.

Reviews.Title: Greter Expectations
Reviews.Author: Sharon Harrington
Reviews.Content: It is not as easy or adaptable as I expectedI am not particularly technologically adept, but feedback made me think this would be a cinch!

Reviews.Title: Kindle is nice when it is working.
Reviews.Author: Josephine Burton
Reviews.Content: It is nice when it is working but Ihave had problems and right now it is froze! Going to try to return for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Power button and book reading.
Reviews.Author: tom wells
Reviews.Content: The power button shuts down immediately. Several times I have been in the middle of something and inadvertently touched the power button and shut down. Think about a delay before shutdown.Also I can't easily find the way to stop reading a book and return to home screen. I have swiped the screen different ways and tapped on different ways to no consistent result. I get the side panel, seemingly by magic, that allows me to get out to home screen. I try the same actions again with no result.On the other side, I find the picture and sound quality to excellent. Other features are good as well. I am really enjoying my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: flash needed
Reviews.Author: Zach Kroll
Reviews.Content: great tablet, but sometimes if I want to watch something without flash can't play  I can't say enough the great customer service that comes with the kindle.  I would purchase again and do become a prime member if you watch a lot of movies.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: David Barrymore
Reviews.Content: Thank God for Mayday!  As a first time tablet user, I'm at a loss with some of the icons and symbols.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dana Ray
Reviews.Content: I considered the KF against the ipad and samsung tablet and chose the KF because I am a loyal amazonian and liked the lightness of it. I felt like I was cheating my book library by going through an app on another device. However not being able to change backgrounds/wallpapers, struggling to navigate through and find things, and needing to buy tokens to play within free apps and games is a turnoff. So....it is bigger and lighter than my old KF but I feel the limitations aren't worth the money. I would have been better off with the samsung tablet but hindsight is 20/20. It does serve it's purpose and is still a great reader so if that's all you want to do, go for it! And because I still love Amazon I do think their PRIME movie selection is better than Netflix streaming any day of the week.

Reviews.Title: Never too old to learn.
Reviews.Author: Ruth L. Richards
Reviews.Content: I still have lots to learn, but I'm having fun.  The Mayday feature is great.  I've only used it once so far and was so pleased with the polite helpful person I talked with.  Now I'm writing down things as I go along, so I'm better prepared with my questions.  I'm 74 yrs. old and decided it was time to energize my brain with something new.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: shirlyNoE
Reviews.Content: I thought that the Kindle would act as much like a tablet as an e-reader. That's not quite the case. As an e-reader it is excellent, as a tablet not so much. Many of the Android apps that I expected to be able to use are not available for the Kindle, like YouTube. There are apps that are similar, but not the one you expect. Same for several of the word games I play on my Android phone, not available on Kindle. The other disappointment was my local newspaper. I wanted the whole paper, with the same format. A reviewer posted a reply from the paper regarding the format that said Amazon restricted the way they could submit it. Also, love reading the magazines with the color display, but my favorite ones require you to download an app, and I preferred them to be downloaded instead so I can't get them either.

Reviews.Title: apps suck but reading and picture quality are great!
Reviews.Author: Heather A. Stottlar
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great and has an awesome picture but i cant play my games on it because it is so far behind in updates I'm past the levels it is stuck at. Otherwise it is good for reading and watching a movie. I like shopping on Amazon better on the kindle than on the computer. It has easier ways to view things before putting it in your cart.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with very few exceptions
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: Product screen, speed, and most functionality are great as advertised with small exceptions that perhaps have "work-arounds". The exceptions that I experienced are printing to a Cannon wireless printer and is perhaps more fault of the app rather than the Kindle. But, the unit is advertised as a productivity tool from which you can print. I can't as of yet.Also, I downloaded multiple movies from Amazon Prime. Upon deleting them the last movie would not allow me to delete it in the conventional manner so I re-booted and the screen responded with a question that basically asked if I wanted to restore factory defaults or continue to boot normally. I chose not to restore settings and continued to boot. I later went into the settings screen and found an alternative way to delete the movie without having to resort to losing my personal settings.Other than these issues, I really like and would purchase it again. The live help feature works great with knowledgeable and professional support techs. I perhaps should have asked them to assist me with the two aforementioned issues and still may do so.  I use this product more than I ever thought that I would. My friend has the Apple equivalent and from what I've seen so far, I would choose this Kindle ..hands down ... if I had to make the purchasing choice again.

Reviews.Title: Fast, looks good, but 2 major flaws.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Peterson
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a good product.  The obvious downfalls have been well documented, but I'll say it once again:1. The App availability needs to increase substantially.  Compared to Google Play and the iTunes App Store this doesn't hold a candle.2. FLASH - who doesn't have flash enabled browsers???  Silk is a good browser, but not having access to videos is a huge annoyance.  Side-loading dolphin helps, but then it turns into a preference game - every time you click a link it asks you which browser you want to open it in...Other than that, the performance, the HDX display, the speed of the processor are all improvements over the previous version.  Also the weight is a huge plus - It's so light.This tablet is purely for entertainment purposes.  If you're looking for a tablet to bring to work, as well as read books, watch movies, etc, look to the Nexus 7, Ipad or Samsung Galaxy Tab products.

Reviews.Title: mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The jury is still out. I love the feature of having a live person to help me with questions, don't like the glare when I'm reading from the screen being so shiny. I haven't spent that much time doing other things yet. So as time goes by my rating could change.

Reviews.Title: Amazon fixed problems from the first one they made but they still have some issues with this new one
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I owned the first kindle fire when it came out. It was slow, the touch key pad never typed right and where you plug in for power on the device was poorly designed that it finally detached from the mother board where you could no longer charge it. I believe amazon has fixed those problems with this one. I love the image, the touch screen, the size and it's fast. Things they need to fix is the camera. It says it is a 8 meg pix but my picture come out blurry or poor quality. The footage part comes out ok. The sound on the device could be louder. Also I bought a Fintie cover for my kindle and due to the magnetic for the automatic turn off when you shut the cover, it interrupts the use of the camera. Meaning when you want to use the camera or video there is a picture in the middle of the screen telling you to slide your device up to change the front camera to rear. I talked to someone in technical support and they told me they have had many compliments about the issue and they are trying to resolve an update to fix that problem. That was in December and now it is end of January no updates  yet to fix it. I do like this product and I would recommend to those that want to watch movies, play games read books, and research the net.

Reviews.Title: Great but.....,,
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Would give the kindle fire hdx 8.9 5 stars but it freezes at least 2x a day and it gets very frustrating

Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9 Blazes
Reviews.Author: Albert D Barksdale
Reviews.Content: Excellent play and operation provided you have a fast internet Wi-Fi. Otherwise it doesn't perform so good. Well, nor does any computer or laptop. Definition and viewing is great and everything else is fine. The charge holds good.The key is a good Wi-Fi. Without it, you might be a little frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's still not as user friendly as an IPad but it does have high quality pictures. I am going to download a manual so I better understand it

Reviews.Title: Kindle outshines iPad
Reviews.Author: F. Roberts
Reviews.Content: All of my friends have recent iPads. My Kindle stacks up with the iPad in every way. Thanks to the linkage with Amazon it has a number of positives that the iPad does not have. I think it is an excellent product at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Text to Speech
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: If you move it shuts off, or skips pages then fails to catch up and shuts off.fix this=5 stars

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Mike Simpson
Reviews.Content: Great product, very worth price.  Have used both kindle and iPad, prefer the kindle for many reasons.  Shipping was fast.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worth the upgrade
Reviews.Author: Joanne Widmer
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and by far the best! I am a Mac fanatic but couldn't see spending the extra money for an iPad... The Kindle Fire HDX does everything I need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Rodney Lutes
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is everything I thought it would be. Does everything that my wife's I pad does. It is Crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: The best present every
Reviews.Author: Lori L. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I use it everyday and am overjoyed with how easy it was for me to use.  The screen size is perfect for  reading books and checking my e-mails

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: I really like this kindle, makes reading and what ever else I am doing easier. Also my grandkids like it for games or reading. Much loved addition to our household

Reviews.Title: Really Great!
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is so wonderful!  I have the original Kindle Fire, which is also great, but I love having the larger screen, front and rear cameras, amazing picture quality, and of course the much larger capacity!  I have used it with the 4G and also with my smartphone hot spot to connect with Wi-Fi, it works great with both.  It's fun trying out the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Walter I. Gruer "S. Gruer"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the HDX.  It is lightweight and  easy to use.  The processor is fast.  Because of its size and weight it is very convenient to take anywhere.  I never use my ipad anymore.

Reviews.Title: husband loves it
Reviews.Author: tammy king
Reviews.Content: he is so in love with it that it is his prized possesion an

Reviews.Title: Meets ALL expectations
Reviews.Author: Roman Garcia
Reviews.Content: Never been a fan of the Apple products. But this does everything and more that what I expected!!! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" - I Love It...
Reviews.Author: Linda Sue Stinchcomb
Reviews.Content: It does everything that an ipad  can do. It stays charged longer than the Kindle Fire does. I an just enjoying everything about the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". I take it to work with me.

Reviews.Title: Really like it.
Reviews.Author: Carol Frances
Reviews.Content: The thing that stands out for me about this device is that lovely Mayday button.  I will leave the technical reviews to others that know much, much more than I do.  I hate being dependent on others to answer my eye rollingly silly questions.  With the Mayday button I can ask as many silly questions as I want in the privacy of my own home. Not one of those video techcians roll their eyes at me nor do they sigh before answering me and fixing my little problem.  Otherwise it feels good in my hand, the colors are great and it's not very hard to work.  I am very glad I got the 8.9" display.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: bugsy
Reviews.Content: I have not bee able to put  my Kindle HDX down since I received it.  It has many, many helpful applications at the Amazon site that are very helpful to me.  I love all the games you offer and the cookbooks have so many recipes in them that I want to try.  I love transacting business with Amazon.  Everyone there has been very helpful and nice to me when I have called.  I joined Amazon Prime and have really enjoyed watching the movies and I am glad I am able to be with the rest of the family while they watch TV I can watch a movie with my headphones.  I am so happy with this purchase and very glad I made it.  When I received mine, my husband liked it so much he ordered one for himself.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Don't choose another product. HDX is the way to go!
Reviews.Author: kah262
Reviews.Content: My parents really wanted a Kindle but were too reluctant to make the purchase on their own. I did my reserch and compared other products, and this seemed to be the right fit for them. Turns out my dad loves it and reads much of the day because it's easier in his eyes than the fluorescent light he used for reading his crime novels. My mom loves to surf the net and watch news videos without any trouble. She got so excited when I found an app for her to play different meditation music.Only downside is not all magazines and newspapers have a Kindle edition, but all in time, I guess. I have a Kindle Fire and love mine but an jealous of the HDX!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Kindle purchase and it is awesome.  I am a huge fan of the Kindle family and would never consider any other tablet.  I started with the 7" black and white reader (which I still own) and advanced to each upgraded device as they became available.  The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is, in my opinion, the perfect tablet and e reader.  The colors on this KIndle Fire is amazing.  Reading and watching movies on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is unbelievable.  You have to experience it to know just how awesome it is, TV commercials and the computer screen does not convey the clarity of this device.  I love the great customer service that Amazon offers, especially the mayday service that is offered with the Kindle Fire HDX, and the ease of purchasing swiftly through Amazon.  I have become a huge Amazon fan through my Kindles.  Keep up the great work Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Broadbent "tlbroadbent"
Reviews.Content: I had an original 7" Kindle Fire. I made good use of it but ran up against its limitations - slow processor, limited memory and storage. I couldn't load all of the Apps that I wanted and many ran very slowly and frequently stopped. I also found the 7" screen limiting for the things I wanted to do.The 8.9" Kindle Fire HDX with 32GB and WiFi meets my needs very well. The quad-core processor makes this a fast and very responsive tablet. I've not had any problems loading and running the Apps that I want. The Silk browser doesn't fail on some web pages like the original Kindle Fire.The display is outstanding. I love the 8.9" screen.Sound is adequate but volume still seems weak. I usually listen with headphones so this isn't a big issue.I can now leave my laptop at home when I travel because the Kindle Fire HDX does what I need.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Carol M. in NC "nurseicm"
Reviews.Content: i love the new kindle fire hdx not only was it a good deal with amazon allowing the purchase in 90 day increments, it is really light weight, thinner than previous kindle fire. only thing that makes it heavy is the otterbox i also purchased for protection since i am slightly clumsy and prone to dropping things. I love the display and the clarity of videos and movies i enjoy. love to read, still exploring the whole thing it is definately different from kindle fire. I really dont like the book or video recommendations that show up under the book carousel. And i still am looking for a way to list faves like the other kindle, since im exploring i will either find it or i wont so its not a big issue......

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Gloria S. Wells
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire has great sound and good picture. The only complaint I have is touching the power button accidentally turns it off too quickly.  Needs to have a delay in shutting down.

Reviews.Title: Can't put it down
Reviews.Author: Alex G
Reviews.Content: I waited for this version over getting an iPad because I'm an Amazon Prime member and you can download loads of the already included Prime content and watch offline. I read on this and watch way too many TV shows and movies. I've never regretted getting this over an iPad (like my wife owns) for a second.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet has set a new standard for performance...How do you spell homerun!
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Schneider "MN_PatS"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a Kindle Fire HD 8.9" about 12 months ago and was relatively happy with no intention of replacing it.  I decided to take advantage of an offer from Amazon for a 30 day trial period of the new HDX version and I was pleasantly surprised, no I was wowed, with what I've experienced.  To say the processor is fast is an understatement...they should require a pilot's license to run it because it flies.  The graphics are outstanding and the May day help feature really works although I've had only a couple of occasions where I've used it.  I've experienced no lag in responsiveness whatsoever and I'm happy...happy...happy.  I knew I wouldn't be returning it by the end of my first day using it and my only downside is now I have to say goodbye to my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9".

Reviews.Title: The 8.9 HDX - 64 GB - WiFi + Prime Membership
Reviews.Author: Bill Byrum
Reviews.Content: This product is a solid five PLUS Stars in my opinion.I am a Prime member and use my Kindle for multiple reasons including VERY reasonably ($) rented school textbooks, books of interest, free game applications like Candy Crush, and the amazing selection of free movies.The HDX config allows a 30 day time limit of downloadable movies for use for 30 days when I am out of wireless range.Superb real-time assistance is available via the MayDay button feature, so it is a great product even for those with minimal computer use skills.The display quality is far in advance of what can be found on competing tablets.Also I suggest everyone with a Fire visit the site kindlebuffet.com every day to see many free books and one free Fire application per day.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: In love the new Kindle HDX  8.9".  In have the Kindle HDX and this is much thinner and goes everywhere with me.  In especially love the camera and ease for posting pictures on facebook as I do not have a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: An awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Joyce H. Edwards "gramma25"
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd Kindle - Kindle, Kindle Fire (1st release), Kindle Fire HDX.  I like the size (8.9") and storage (64 GB).  It holds a fantastic amount of books and apps and still responds quickly.  The size is great for reading and viewing videos.  I have Amazon Prime so I occasionally watch TV shows and movies on it but mainly use it for reading.  It was so much cheaper than getting  an Ipad and I can do anything with it that I could do on an Ipad

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for watching movies
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the screen is amazing. So far, I'm enjoying the fire hdx.However, I wish the pages of books flipped as they do on the Kindle app for the ipad.Will follow up with other opinions as I become more familiar with device.

Reviews.Title: Just love it!
Reviews.Author: sherri a.
Reviews.Content: Clarity is amazing...easy to use...Mayday help is truly helpful.  I did find one thing that was awkward....the power button and volume are located on the back of the device.  When you use a nice cover you can not get to those easily...you must remove cover to reach them.  But otherwise I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jill L. Gress
Reviews.Content: I went from the 1st version Kindle Fire to this one, what a jump!The graphics are outstanding and having the ads are no big deal.My only complaint of this is the apps - there are just too few of them. I know they are working on this so this can only get better.As per the other recommendations/comments, went with the mid range on storage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: Phil Lair
Reviews.Content: I had the previous version of this kindle and was very happy with it, but this newest version is super fast and the screen resolution is even better. Connectivity is excellent; I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: Fast.  Some people will find the Amazon spin on Android annoying.  If you are a devoted Amazon user, then you will love it.  Super sharp screen, too.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nana Nae "Renee"
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle. I love how much faster it is now. I would recommend this to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: I'm on FIRE!!!
Reviews.Author: Puffbunny
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!!!!!! Don't regret buying it!It meets all my needs. Love the display and the easy to use apps.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Blues
Reviews.Content: Having a first generation Kindle, the step up in quality and function was eye opening. (Literally.)Been getting a lot of use out of the unit with very few hiccups along the way.  No regrets at all.Display is as good or better than my wife's retina display iPad.A winner in my book.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 IS GRRRREAT!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: GEORGE W MILLS
Reviews.Content: I checked out all of the reviews CNET, U-TUBE, ARTICLES & ADVERTISED FEATURES AND SPECS. So when I received my 'real' copy I immediately began to play with it . It was every bit of what I envisioned it would be. No disapointments. You can't beat the clarity of picture, Dolby sound and CPU speed in a thin light weight tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift and so far, it has met all of our expectations.  We are still learning tricks here and there but it holds true for all the advertising about it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Moss
Reviews.Content: This is a great item not only for reading books (which I do) but for connecting to the internet.  I use the Kindle for reading newspapers, some books, and for email purposes.  It has many more uses but it is great for what I do with it.  The color is great and the display for reading is good.  I have a keyboard I use with it and it makes the Kindle much more easier to use when entering text.  This was a good purchase and I recommend it to any one for reading and internet usage.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Loretta A. Flynn "laflynn"
Reviews.Content: Haven't finished figuring out all the uses for this Kindle Fire, but every day I find out more things that can be done.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it
Reviews.Author: Trisha Richardson "Trisha Richardson"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing about this Kindle that I don't like.  Very simple to understand and use.  Just having problems figuring out how to print from it

Reviews.Title: great gift idea
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle fire HDX!  was given as a gift and I cannot put it down! just love it!

Reviews.Title: My second Kindle fire devise
Reviews.Author: JCBM
Reviews.Content: There has been a few glitches with apps and other issues.  Still, overall, I'm happy with my device and use it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great device, excellent graphics
Reviews.Author: Richard Finley
Reviews.Content: I was torn between the latest iPad Air and the Kindle Fire HDX.  Both are great products but the Kindle has tremendous graphics and very easy to use.  I like the look and feel and happy with my choice.  Very little to complain about, except the volume and power controls are on the back.  But there are apps to control volume without thumbing around the front while you're watching something.

Reviews.Title: Kindl Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: R. Harding "Golfer"
Reviews.Content: I'm quite a novice, but the more I learn and become more comfortable with it, the more I love it.  Everything is so crystal clear. Even used the "help" application and found it very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Dean C, Skaggs
Reviews.Content: I have talked myself into and out of purchasing any kind of tablet for several years. I have been a kindle user for nearly 5 years and thought that if I went with a tablet that a Fire made a lot of sense, due to the ease of viewing my content on both devices. Reviews for past models have been something like "a nice tablet for the money, but somewhat lacking in features and content." The reviews I read for the new HDX impressed both reviewers and myself. Being a long term Kindle user Amazon offered a payment plan of 25% down and an additional 25% down payment every three months until paid in full. I figured that it was only going to cost me about $100 to take a look. I am really impressed with this and use it to check email, surf the web and stream videos daily using the Prime content. I am glad I waited for this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: mark tritschler
Reviews.Content: You really can't go wrong with this item. The special offers are really unobtrusive and actually hit the mark sometimes. If I was more interested in a pure tablet I might have bought something else, but I read a lot and this is my third Kindle. The only gripe I have is that there is a lack of browser apps as it seems that Amazon is trying to lock down Silk as the must use browser. But I do use this to pay bills and am able to print from it with 3rd party apps. Overall I am really happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ann "Ann"
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect size for watching movies, and also for productivity. I have a blue tooth keyboard which works great with it. I use it mainly for email, browsing the web and Office Suite Pro7 to view documents, spreadsheets and presentation. It is great to take notes in a meeting. It does not have the full capability of a laptop but serves as a small light weight, basic function mini-computer.  The size and resolution of the screen is excellent for productivity tasks and reading books.  I have many reference books and bibles on my kindle. I even have a Sandisk 32GB wireless flash drive that works great with the kindle as well.  I upgraded from the Kindle fire 1st generation and even though it was a change, it was a positive change and I adjusted quickly.  It was easy enough to use that I have not taken advantage of the instant help yet. Great product.

Reviews.Title: KindleFire HDX
Reviews.Author: theresa davidson
Reviews.Content: The nicest kindle I own. It is fast, very reliable, (with a long lasting battery), and the screen makes working on the internet very comfortable. I am very glad I made the investment. The 4G LTE allows me to continue working when WiFi is limited or not available.I definitely give It 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Kathi Bagley
Reviews.Content: I love the weight of the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 The size is just right...pictures are sharp and very clear.  Good for reading books, checking mail without waking my husband.  Would highly recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: better then they original
Reviews.Author: pascale
Reviews.Content: Its lite and durable, its apps are clear and fast download, videos are exceptional. I only put it down to sleep and its the first thing I pick up when I wake.

Reviews.Title: good for movies, limited app marketplace
Reviews.Author: R Nav
Reviews.Content: Overall combined with Amazon Prime this is a good solution for someone with kids needing video in the car.Until you get good at side-loading apps via 1marketplace the unit is very disappointing for the kids to game on. Popular iPad and Android games mostly not available in the Amazon marketplace.Otherwise box holds its charge well and within an Otterbox is well protected.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Jack Moore
Reviews.Content: The HDX has the best picture of all that I have seen. It is easy to use and performs flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: DeDe
Reviews.Content: Exceeds expectations.  Easiest computer or tablet I have ever used including the IPad.  Love the helpers they are very knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Rob 427
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas Gift to my Lovely Wife ,she loves to read and Facebook and search the web and is a almost non stop reader she takes it every where she goes ! She Loves it !

Reviews.Title: I only say I like it, because there are a couple of things Wrong with my tablet.
Reviews.Author: TOO MANY DOGS:)
Reviews.Content: I CANNOT GET THE SOUND/SPEAKERS TO WORK. I've TRIED everything I could on my own; THE MAYDAY, AND OF COURSE HE CAN'T HEAR ME.PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE HELP ME WITH THIS PROBLEM.MY 7" Kindle has no problem. ALSO, when I play my Bubble Pop Pymamid game, it runs EXTREMELY SLOW. And a Black Shadow shows up on it when starting it up and changing between levels of the game. I feel like I got a re-furbished one and not a new one.I believe I'm going to have to return it for a replacement, with NO problems.Just tell me how to get the SOUND to work, and the speed of my favorite game up to where it should be.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Helene Kyle
Reviews.Content: I had the earlier Kindle which I loved, but now that I have this larger one, there is no turning back.  The only thing I don't like about it is when I'm reading a book, playing a game, or whatever....it's often hard to get the "home" icon to come up to get back to the main menu.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: stephen stiers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product do to price for the value, It can do all the things I need it to. And I would recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Works even better than I expected
Reviews.Author: montanarex
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a computer wizard. This is my first step in a tablet, gradually breaking away from my standard desktop and laptop. We travel a lot and wanted something smaller to do my business things and web surfing. Lugging around a laptop to Mexico is a pain in the butt. This thing is many times faster than any of my pc's and it is pretty easy to get to learn how apps work on a tablet. My wife and I bought another one (heck we both have to have our own) after using the first one and enjoying it so much. I especially like that it comes with speech to text capabilities right out of  the box. The apps that are available make this thing an amazing piece of electronic equipment. Like I said, I'm no pc wizard but I can't find one thing I dislike about this product. Also I only had to use the MAYDAY button a couple times and it worked just as advertised. The help was quick, consise and fast.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire, great
Reviews.Author: KaylaNanna
Reviews.Content: I've had the new kindle fire hdx for two months now and I love it.  I also own a first generation kindle fire.  My first kindle was bought because I love to read. As my eyesight deteriorates I find it easier to read larger print. One of the greatest things about a kindle, no matter which one you own, is you can carry all of your books with you. No worries about storage space. Moving? No shipping.The HDX? Lighter. Camera quality is very good. Game graphics, excellent. My favorite? Having the kindle read to me. Now I can crochet and read (ok listen) at the same time. I can also listen to a book while I'm cooking.Had my granddaughter our yesterday and decided to try the kindle FreeTime.  My granddaughter loves it. She wanted me to give her my old kindle. Now she wants my new one. Well she has a birthday soon. So who knows.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!
Reviews.Author: wolverine_girl
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it is a lot easier to use than a laptop (to me at least). Also, there are so many fun, new things to discover. I would recommend this for anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new kindle
Reviews.Author: randy timbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted this for the larger display and the camera works really well. I am overall very happy with my new kindle and have had no issues moving into it. I also like having the internet available with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Erickson
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen on this kindle and the ease of typing because the keyboard is bigger. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen BIZZ
Reviews.Author: Oran
Reviews.Content: Exotic product ... too difficult to use with FAT fingers.  Great battery life ... FOR NOW !  How much will the cost be to replace it, since no user access is available !! ??

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: OKchic
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I have had a original Fire, and 2012 Fire HD 7". I wasn't really sure I could justify the upgrade this time, but I had wanted a little larger screen for a long time and really wanted one. I am glad I did. I had a little problem with the first one I received, but called and Amazon got me a replacement on the way immediately. I was able to use the first one until the replacement arrived and then sent back. This one is great. I love the great display, and I really love how light it is! I got a semi hard plastic shell type back for mine so it added almost no weight, after trying some other cases. I just slide that into a sleeve to put in my purse. It is so light weight for the size and is really comfortable to hold for long periods. I am a huge reader and listener of my Amazon Ebooks, so I love how seamlessly it works and syncs with my Kindle Paperwhite and other Fire HD. I actually had tried a Samsung Note for a few days, thinking I would try something different, but I am too much of an Amazon gal, and my books not being available to listen to easily for my commutes just was not working for me. The new Fire HDX is noticeably faster than the HD. I also love that it is much faster and with no interruptions when viewing Prime videos. I have had almost no problems with that. It sounds great and the videos are crisp and clear. I got a Bluetooth speaker I use some when I am up doing stuff around the house, so I can listen to my books or music. It is quickly becoming my constant companion. I was concerned about the lack of the Google play store just like many others. That is the main reason I tried the Samsung first. I do believe however, that the Amazon app store is improving all the time and for what I do, I have adequate apps. I do have a Samsung phone, so I do have access on it for anything I would run across that I couldn't get on my Fire. I think most people will be pleased. Give it a try! I am really glad I went ahead and got one. I haven't used my laptop in ages!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: george kolb
Reviews.Content: Good product light weight ! Would recommend to anyone to replace most laptop functionsPrice was right but would recommend ordering cover and blutooth keyboard when purchasing

Reviews.Title: I couldnt be happier!
Reviews.Author: riderrick65
Reviews.Content: I self gifted myself with the Kindle Fire this past Christmas after seeing & reading the reviews on it. I am in my late 60's and trying to keep up with the younger crowd and couldn't have picked a better tablet for the money! I find it easy to use and the online support is great! There is so much you can do with this tablet it is unbelievable and I would recommend this Kindle Fire to anyone who is looking for a good inexpensive tablet!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: Absolutely beautiful picture. Even better than expected. Would recommend this item to everybody. I bought it for my wife and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: R. S. Hood "Movie buff"
Reviews.Content: The screen is really sharp, great size, lightweight and responsive. I had to get used to the touch screen as I never used one before, but after a while It's easy to navigate. The help app is awesome and free. Great for watching videos and surfing the net, Check your e-mail on the go.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: rkhjr
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kindle for my wife during Christmas!  She has nothing but good things to say about  it and recommends it highly.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Darlene N. Blacketer
Reviews.Content: The resolution, the size, the colors, everything about it, I love it, love it, love it.  I recommend the kindle to everyone that will listen.

Reviews.Title: best gift in a long time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my kindle fire HDX 8.9 mine was given to me as a gift for Christmas.  I primarily use mine for reading and web surfing.  Since Christmas I have only had to charge it once and I heavily use it for reading nightly for at least two hours or longer. I am able to dim the screen where it does not effect having light on or off.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Willie Jones
Reviews.Content: This is wife writing review!!!!  Love my new Kindle - does everything I need in just a small package.  Usually take my laptop on trips - but this is my new companion!  Also have the first Kindle Fire which will be going to my daughter!

Reviews.Title: 'nother hit from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Harshjudge
Reviews.Content: Great graphics, easy to to select a wide variety of media. This has become one of my all time favorite devices. And the little girl that responds to your one button request for help, is amazingly helpful. So impressed was I that I bought one as a gift for one who has been struggling with other readers for half a decade. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  has ended the struggle. Another happy reader and researcher thanks to the fiery Kindl;e.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Grampabillyboy
Reviews.Content: My wife is very happy with her Christmas present. I'm thinking of trading in my Kindle Fire for an HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mike Barnstable
Reviews.Content: This was my first Kindle and I am very happy with it. It took me a while to learn how to use it and I used the MAYDAY button 1 time and they were able to help me. Great customer service.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little gadget...
Reviews.Author: Zopa
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth Kindle for our family and I have loved them all... I am an avid reader and find that reading with a electronic device has few downsides. I have had a couple of disappointments with the HDX, the first being that it provides no native method to print web pages in general. Also, being a technically oriented type I'm feel that the support for apps is a little thin in the areas of performance and user friendliness. In order to support a tablet like device I think Amazon may need to add a little bandwidth to their  servers and require their app developers to provide more extensive help resources for their work. Overall though (hardware wise) its a beauty and provides a lot of features that top the competition. I recommend it! May the Android OS become available for PC's...

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Howard C. Wasserman
Reviews.Content: This is an extraordinary tablet! It is light in weight, the picture is pristine, and the Dolby stereo is utterly amazing!  Along with the reasonably priced Amazon Prime feature I added, which, in addition to the 2-day, free delivery of Amazon purchases, allows for no-extra-charge borrowing of up to a book a month and no-limit, free streaming of TV & film videos from a large Prime Library, many of which can be downloaded, this device becomes a superb entertainment-and-learning center. An additional enhancement is the cover-stand I purchased for this tablet. It solidly protects the device, serves as an excellent table-stand, and also strongly improves the already dramatically fine, rear-speaker audio by reflecting it to the listener in front.  I had expected to be pleased by each of these purchases, and the reality has exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Super Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Frisby "Vinshield Viper"
Reviews.Content: Beautifully constructed and very user friendly.  It would have helped if there were a basic user guide included rather than having to call for help each time I got lost during the initial stages of using the tablet.  By the way, the "Mayday" feature is excellent and the techs are very knowledgeable and helpful...the best I have encountered in all my years of messing around with PCs.All in all, a great product...the only thing preventing "5 stars" was the lack of a user guide in the box.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: K B
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend this year after owning a 1st Generation Kindle Fire.  The difference is STAGGERING.  The 1st Gen is a really great unit in its own right, but the HDX is leaps and bounds ahead.  The processor is so much faster, the load up for any apps or books is hands down the quickest of anything I've seen (even faster than her Galaxy SIII phone with the non-hd apps) and the display is by far the most amazing I've seen on any tablet or handheld device.  Without a doubt, well worth the money!  So much so, that I'll be upgrading to one in the near future!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great upgrade from my first kindle, easy to use and great from other uses as well. May not need my laptop any longer!

Reviews.Title: Great tool
Reviews.Author: Joseph Waschak
Reviews.Content: Large display!  Finally when I watch TV or download a magazine I don't have to scroll all over, like I do on my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: ThePeoplesChamp
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Tablet PC. It is very smooth and fast! By far the best Kindle yet. Sturdy built unit and the quad core processor makes for an almost instant no lag program load. Highly recommended! Skype runs smooth as butter. My other tablets did not run skype without using alot of its resources which made video quality poor. Not this unit HD front and back camera's for superior photo and video shots.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift.
Reviews.Author: Leta M. Franklin
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my grown son after he suggested he would like to have same.  He was happy and he is knowledgeable, so I know it measured up to his expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great screen and light
Reviews.Author: Movie fan "good books only!"
Reviews.Content: Ok, I'm going to be honest here. I own an ipad 4 with retina display and a google nexus 7 as well as having a windows phone and having had an android phone in the past. I like all variations of tech and prefer to be immersed in all instead of being ridiculously close minded and loyal to only one. Each has its own merits.  I bought the Kindle for my kids because they have the option of the lending library and I can control their time on the device. I have an amazon prime account, which in this case, is a plus. All of my already owned apps via the amazon app store were automatically downloaded as well as any kindle books I've purchased in the past.  The amazon app store does not have near the breadth of the apps that the ipad is but they have the major ones for game playing including ones the boys really like like minecraft pocket edition, angry birds go, etc. The most limiting app store would be that for the windows phone. Not the case with this device. You can also buy amazon coins on amazon so you have purchasing power for any apps in the store and depending on how man you buy, I believe you can save up to $10. Assuming you are going to spend that much on apps. It's not good towards books.  The OS on the kindle is good. It is lightning fast, has all of the settings at your fingertips and I've had 0 problems so far.  It holds a charge as well as the ipad with consistent use and the charging port is easy to access and secure. I'm still getting used to the buttons on the back but I like that I cant accidentally hit the home button. I actually have to go for it. The nexus 7 is disappointing as far as battery life goes and the charging port. Within two months of having the nexus, I had to ship it off to have the charging port replaced. The ipad I've replaced twice due to a malfunctioning home key and the wifi not working at all. I have cellular service on the ipad but do not on the kindle. I almost wish I did to see how well it functions.  Kindle has an incredible photo editing program. The photos it takes are as good as those the ipad takes (I don't expect much from tablet devices) and I was shocked to see the variety of editing features the program offered without having to buy an extra app. You could make a meme, add stickers, crop, etc. Many things as well as sharing features. Kindle is not compatible with instagram yet, which is a shame. It just became compatible with windows in December of last year. Hopefully this will be resolved soon.  Also, the Kindle has the unique and convenient feature (like the nexus 7) of typing by swiping the word across the keyboard. It is amazingly accurate, fast and easy to use once you practice once or twice. Because of the size of the screen and the touch accuracy, I've used it often on the Kindle if I've needed to type.  The only truly disappointing thing for me which may sound trivial is the fact you cannot personalize the background or lock screen. I paid the extra $15 not to be inundated with commercials because ultimately this is my device, not Amazon's to sell stuff to me. Even if they are great offers, I shouldn't have to feel like I have to buy something if I want to turn the thing on for the kids, etc. There is a pin lock screen available, just like the ipad. It does not have facial recognition or pattern offered like the nexus 7, though.  Mostly, I have been satisfied with this device. I have no real complaints and I care about performance and the visual screen first. The screen is beautiful. I like looking at it better than my ipad. The reason I got the ipad over a year ago was for the screen. Now they have better options. However, I like my ipad for the apps.  For kids, for reading, for those with an amazon account, this is perfect!  If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. I'm happy to answer.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and more!
Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HDX is everything I expected and more.  I love the fact that I can dictate emails without having to type them out.  The colors are very vivid and all functions work very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Now This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Is GREAT!  Love It!
Reviews.Author: t.holmes
Reviews.Content: When I purchased my first Kindle Fire I was very frustrated with it because I didn't know how to use it and it was hard to find someone to show me how to use the tablet and the same when I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  I found it difficult to even find a telephone number for Amazon so I could call someone to tell me how to use the tablet.  I complained to Amazon about the lack of not having a company or someone locally who could help teach me how to use the table.  I was really frustrated because I wasn't able to take good pictures with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 since it didn't have a back camera.  Oh, but baby!  Extra! Extra!  Read all about it! I know somebody really loves me because I got the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 as a Christmas present! Let me tell you now about my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I am now the proud owner of a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and every time I use this tablet, it's a new day with a new play!  Kindle Fire has stepped up it's game!  I can take great pictures all day long because it now has a front and back camera.  I now am a believer, that for the price, IPADs don't have anything any more on Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I love using the May Day which have live people showing you how to navigate the table.  The May Day People are fun to talk to and make me feel at ease. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is much lighter.  I really love watching movies on my Kindle.  I like the new, improved "Contact List" app. The one disappointment with the new Kindle Fire HDX is the "Office Suite" that was advertised as being a integral part of Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  which doesn't seem to exist.  I'm not sure this app exist because there isn't an "Office Suite" icon on my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It's been confusing as to why the "Office Suite" is not on the tablet as advertised.  May Day People weren't able to explain to me in a manner that I can understand why the app icon is not on the device and weren't able to clearly explain how I should use this app. Not having the "Office Suite" icon app on my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the only area where I feel slighted because that is one of the main reasons I purchased this new tablet. Otherwise, I most definitely am very satisfied with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  One other thing, Kindle Fire has also improved with the number of great movies and books that can be obtained if one purchases "Prime Time" each year. This is the first time I've purchased "Prime Time" since I began getting Kindle Fires. I am glad I paid the prime time fee because I've seen some great movies on my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. It's so much fun watching a movie on my Kindle while I'm lying in bed! With the Kindle Fire, one is able to store music in the cloud.  One last thing, on this past Sunday, when I visited my sister who was using her Kindle Fire HD 8.9 while I used my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, we could differently see the big and improved differences in the newest tablet.  Now, my sister is eager to get the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lin Boffeli
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It is my constant companion. It is fast and the color is wonderful. You should buy it today.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Fawn  K.  Williams
Reviews.Content: Best money I've spent in a long time. Have wanted one forever..If I'd have known what I was missing I'd of bought a Kindle years ago. My eyes don't focus well so I picked the black background with white print, reading is so easy now. I don't have to keep looking away from the page so my eyes can re-focus. Awesome if you don't have a lot of extra space for bookcases. Love that I can check my email, facebook and play my games. Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is so much more than an e-reader...you won't be disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Fired Up Over the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Debra M Schoch "Debra Schoch"
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY SECOND Kindle bought a 7 -inch one last year and really liked using, then this model came out and well thought I would try a bigger size and with all the extras on it had to get!  Both of my Kindle' s have cases, which I think is a must have. For me, to protect and just make it easier to handle. I did need help on sitting up my email account and grateful for the instant help and walk thru. Eager to try the Skype with the grandkids and did use the camera very cool. Overall very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: Paul Diamond "Pablo"
Reviews.Content: I love the screen resolution.I love the battery lifeI love that all my content (books, audio books, magazines, music, video, apps) can be on the device or in the cloud, and its so easy to access them from the cloud.I also have an ipad 2 and a Kindle Fire 8.9 HD. This device is superior to both in every aspect.

Reviews.Title: Overall great product
Reviews.Author: Debbie Nelson
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if it is the device or programs but there have been several times when programs report that it is not connected to the internet when it is.  The device shows it is connected and my other Kindle Fire HD, laptop and desktop all have access to the wireless when this message comes up.  Resetting the device always works but is a bit of a pain.  I wish more Google play apps would run on it as well but over all the app selection is pretty good.  Otherwise everything is awesome.  It is great having the 4g for those times that you want to take it on the road :)  The screen is absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Five Stars
Reviews.Author: Carol Barcomb
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire HDX - I find it very easy to read and the size is just perfect for my needs.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is interested in purchasing this.

Reviews.Title: Great pad
Reviews.Author: Henery
Reviews.Content: It's got everything you would like in a entertainment package plus  help when needed. What more could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Charlie in Austin
Reviews.Content: I wanted a very high quality display to show photos...and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 delivers!It's great for viewing movies and reading when I'm traveling.It has a long battery life.Amazon Cloud enables me to store pictures/files on my PC which then can be viewed on the Kindle.I can easily download pictures to the Kindle from Amazon Cloud to view when not connected to the internet.The Mayday HELP capability is GREAT...I've used it several times and got my issues resolved.The customer support is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: symply the best.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: i find the kindle fire hdx8.9 to be the best better than all the rest.this tablet is above all other.

Reviews.Title: Love this size and how light it is
Reviews.Author: Snow-white
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Paperwhite, which used I daily, and I was debating if it would be worth it to also get the Kindle Fire. I bought the Kindle Fire as a gift for my son. While he was home, I was able to see the 8.9" K Fire in action and loved that as a Amazon Prime member I can watch many movies and TV shows for free. I was able to check out reading magazines and cookbooks on the large 8.9" screen which was also a lot of fun. So I went ahead and ordered myself the new Kindle Fire.Now,  I use them both, the Paperwhite and the Fire, - daily. The books are stored in the cloud and available on both devices. When I wake up in the middle of the night and can't go back to sleep, reading on the smaller Paperwhite is the better option, because the light on the paperwhite can really be turned very low and somehow not interfere with my husbands sleep. Also, the Paperwhite fits into the smallest handbags. BUT for reading leisurely on the couch during the day, for watching movies, series ETC.!!! this Kindle Fire is really great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD X 8.9
Reviews.Author: SMITHKEN
Reviews.Content: excellent product excellent service I'm just beginning to understand all that it can do. glad I bought the user guide to go with it

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: weestraw
Reviews.Content: had the 1st generation kindle fire loved that, now i have this 1 & i really love it.
