I love the bigger screen, its faster and xtra clear, also my fire didnt have speech to text (or whatever its called), i took the time 2 get email running so now i can send and receive emails, i also changed the name of the kindle from what amazon gave me, and a plus is that all my information from my other kindle is on this 1.  i am glad that i purchased this!!!

Reviews.Title: HDX the best Kindle Fire to Date !!
Reviews.Author: David K.
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality..... you cant even see the pixels on the 8.9 HDX. Watching movies is the the number one thing for this tablet, along with reading books. For the price.... the Kindle Fire HDX has the Apple I-pad and the Samsung tablet beat hands down. Silk is fast and runs great. I get G-mail and YouTube just fine on this tablet, not sure what people are talking about not being able to get gmail and YouTube. I have a Apple I-Pad 2 soooo glad I bought this and saved some money.  I have shone all my friends and they all love it ! Several have since purchased the Fire HDX.....they have yet to be disappointed ! Only thing that really wasn't needed was the 64GB because the Kindle Fire HDX has cloud storage. But what ever ! I have it if I ever need it !

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mr. Mike W. Naylor
Reviews.Content: Pretty simple.  I Love this thing and Amazon has is right. I can watch on all my devices no BS.  I love that.

Reviews.Title: What a great tool
Reviews.Author: Tigerlaw
Reviews.Content: This is hands down the best deal in tablets. The presentation is stunning, compared to everything else. May day is a great plus.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: demo 717
Reviews.Content: The resolution on the HDX is like no other. My wife has an ipad and the resolution on the HDX is much better.It's incredibly light and fast, very happy to say the least.No doubt this is the most bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: No problems so far
Reviews.Author: Stacey*FamilyKindleCoffeLover*
Reviews.Content: I've had no problems with this product so far.  The screen is clear and good quality.  I mainly use this device for reading, but it has been handy for using the other apps such as games for my kids and using goodreads.Downloading books from Amazon is very quick and I like that all of my recent purchases are on the home screen ready to go. I had an older version of kindle and was able to transfer all the folders and books easily.  I found adding my purchases and maneuvering between folders and screens easy.It did take a couple of days to get used to the screen as my old one was the Kindle DX - not backlit.  The new kindle means I don't need to have extra light which was a major selling point for me.The battery life seems quite long, I can generally get nearly 2 full days of reading before having to charge. I bought this device because it claimed to have a longer battery life than an ipad if used for mainly reading.I'm happy with my kindle purchase and will continue using Amazon for my book purchases.

Reviews.Title: Best one yet
Reviews.Author: kyrhyne
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her HDX.  The only thing that would make it better would be supporting flash and expanding the app store.  Outside of those two things, it's an amazing tablet!

Reviews.Title: Fire 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: papagreg
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by the design and performance of this e-pad.  This is my second, bought the original Fire when it came out a couple years ago.  Looks and feels great, software works fine, quick response for the few things I have used it for so far.  Amazon was also quick to ship and made adjustment to order when I asked for it.  Don't know much about electronics, but I know right now that this will be used 90% of the time for all my web surfing, email reading, taking on vacation, reading books and downloading movies to watch on the road.  Great reader also.  Battery life is good.  Setup is a breeze.  Wireless works great.  Don't know anything about gaming capabilities, look to other reviewers for that.  Pay the $79 per year to become a Prime member to realize the greatest advantages of this unit. The quality of this build is on a par with and maybe better than that red tree fruit that grows in Washington state.  I see some reviews griping about being tied to Amazon, but for my use and needs, that is a plus rather than a minus.  Could go on with praises, but you get the idea.  If you are on the fence and are an average tablet user, get it now.  If you have kids or are clumsy dropping things a lot, get the protective case, otherwise the cheap cover pad will be sufficient.

Reviews.Title: A great gadget.
Reviews.Author: Jean A Swinehart
Reviews.Content: I was so ready to purchase the Kindle Fire HDX but I waited till the reviews were better.  And I am glad I did.  It works great.  No strange halo on the edges, it charges to 100%.  Holds a charge great.  Streaming off of Amazon Prime is very smooth.  Smoother than off my laptop.  Surfing the net is very quick.  There is so much I can do with it and I haven't even figured it all out yet.  The only thing that needs to be different is the speaker setup needs to be on the front of the Fire instead of on the back.  Camera works great.  Will post more once I have learned more about my new gadget.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Sugan
Reviews.Content: like: lightest kindle ever for its high speed and resolution and easy to read for long periods of time.don't like: unaffordable and very limited covers available for the HDX. still waiting for the price drops so have to keep it away from the kids.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sandy Ganz
Reviews.Content: I have the old 8.9" Kindle and was excited the improvements to the new Kindle. It's great! Display is razor sharp, audio is good and so far battery life is excellent. Not sure what else to say but this is a great pad, and a nice improvement in speed vs. the first one.Sandy

Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Farrand
Reviews.Content: The access to on-line-live help is fabulous.  This is a full-featured  table I can use with ease.  And I like to support amazon.com  when I can and as I have been for years.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle Fire and wanted to upgrade to a new one. I also wanted a tablet and thought I would give this new Fire a chance.I bought the Kindle Fire HX 8.9. I am retired and my eyes are not what they used to be. I have the Kindle Paperwhite and I read my books on the paperwhite. I am using this new Fire to check and write emails, shop on Ebay, listen to music, play Candy Crush, and the best part is I can plug it into my car radio and it will read to me.The Fire keeps my place as I am reading my Paperwhite. that works out great for me because I can switch between the two any time I want to. I love to listen to Pandora while I am reading in bed so I have them both going usually at the same time.The only set up problem I had was hooking up to my wireless. I called AT&T;, my wireless provider, and they gave me a tech supporrt number to call. I called and found out it was Amazon Tech Support. I was hooked up to my wireless in less than a minute of them answering the phone. I was so thrilled with both their support and treatment. They were very nice and had me up and running in no time.I am new to this Kindle Fire 8.9 but I have to tell you, I really like it and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet
Reviews.Author: Brian A. Sanders
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. Got it for myself and wife as a Christmas present and its hard to put down. App store still needs some work, and there are apps that are free in the Google Playstore that are not here, but overall they have most of the Apps I use anyway. The quality of the screen is incredible. Awesome for movies and TV shows, games, entertainment, etc. It is also great for productivity, and will be even better once that App store opens up a bit and we can get some better productivity Apps as well. Overall though, I am extremely happy with this purchase. I was a Prime member before and utilized the Amazon MP3 and cloud storage so all my music was there as well, which could leave my experience a little more biased toward this tablet as opposed to an iPad per say.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected
Reviews.Author: baseballplayer
Reviews.Content: I've owned many android tablets, and was a little hesitant to get the HDX because of Amazon's tweaking of android to it's own operating system.  But a friend of mine got one and really liked it, and he owns about 15 tablets as well as develops roms for many of them.  So along with the offer to pay in installments, I decided to give it a try.First thing is the amazing light weight, and thinness.  It almost feels like it's going to break, it's so thin.  But it hasn't(yet :) ).  The power and volume buttons being on the rear take a little getting used to, but it feels pretty good once you use it a while.The screen, of course, is tremendous, with the high resolution.  And colors are very bright, as well.  In operation, the speed of the UI is quite good, I haven't really noticed any lag.  Apps load quickly, and games like Asphalt 8 and Modern Combat 4 play effortlessly.Not everything is perfect, of course.  Three things in particular i wish were different.  First, lack of an sd card slot is a con, although with the 32gb version I have, storage isn't a problem so far.  But if you had a lot of movies, normally you could play them off an sd card.  Of course Amazon wants you to use the cloud, but what about if you can't connect to wifi?  For me it's not a big deal but I can see it being so for some users.The second item is no HDMI out port.  Sure, it can use Miracast, but if you don't have a Miracast enabled tv, then you have to get an adapter, and they're not cheap.  This bothers me more than no sd card slot, but again, i have a couple other tablets with HDMI out, so not a deal breaker.Lastly, no Google Play store.  While I thought this would be really bad, the Amazon app store isn't totally lacking in good apps.  Also, you can enable adb, and sideload apps easily enough.  Unless an app needs to download additional content, everything pretty much will work.Overall I find myself satisfied with the device, it's super-fast, the screen is brilliant, and the UI is actually pretty good, with the carousel.  If you're already in the Amazon ecosystem, it's much easier to get more out of the tablet.  And nothing else can really touch it for performance at this price.

Reviews.Title: Very impressive!
Reviews.Author: Michael Malloy
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! I wish I could have afforded the version with more internal storage. I have purchased many Kindle books already and I'm delighted to have such a library available in one lightweight and thin device. It's much better than the B&N; Nook I bought a year or two ago. It weighs almost half of what the Nook weighs. That alone is a major advantage. I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because the technical specifications are much more attractive than the similar iPad.I have used Amazon for several years. I find shopping on Amazon extremely easy. I only wish more of the books I like were available in Kindle format.I purchased a cover/stand from another manufacturer at a computer store. So far I'm happy with it and I got what I paid for. My Kindle is well protected and I can prop it in a comfortable position horizontally for reading and viewing.The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" also comes complete with TWO cameras. Granted the camera for taking pictures is pretty low on mega pixels but it makes good snapshots. I've never had a computer with a camera that allows me to communicate with anyone. The first time I used the "help" feature on the Kindle I was astonished. I had an immediate connection with someone who knew the product very well and helped me more than he knows.Watching videos on this device is very addictive. I love the perfect clarity and excellent sound.I wish I could use to Kindle to connect directly to my PC to move files into the Kindle. I can move files using the PC but the Kindle doesn't have a way to communicate with the PC.Perhaps in a next generation of Kindle a smart phone app will be included! I'd love to have one device that does everything.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Kerry S.
Reviews.Content: Works great just what I was looking for in a reader and a tablet.  The help is also great to use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bill Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I looked at the Apple Air and this.When comparing the 2 what made my decision was the price comparison and the fact that I already had a Paperwhite and was comfortable with Amazon  Inc.thank you for the most excellent product

Reviews.Title: Another winner for Amazon
Reviews.Author: KensDiamond
Reviews.Content: Everything from the picture quality to the sound is wonderful. I had a little problem with this HDX at first but I tried the mayday button and had online help within seconds. I followed the instructions I was given and the problem was solved instantly. This service alone is worth a lot, it is one of the greatest things Amazon has come up with..This is my 5th Kindle and I have enjoyed each of them more than the last. My hubby is always trying to think of something to get me that I would really like. When he first asked me if I wanted a Kindle I said no as I just didn't think I'd use it that much. I could tell he really wanted me to get one so I finally said ok. I couldn't believe how much I loved that first Kindle, it went everywhere with me. I would read where ever I had to wait, grocery store, post office, bank, Dr. office etc. If hubby is watching something on tv that doesn't interest me I watch something on my HDX or play a game or read. I still always have my Kindle with me no matter where I'm at.Thanks again Amazon for a wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: bcarter
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this kindle.  I have had to use the assistance from the May day feature and I have to say May day Dave was wonderful and was able to help me very quickly.  This is an excellent feature.  My kindle has a very fast response time.  I have several kindles but this is by far the best.  It takes wonder pictures also.

Reviews.Title: Not a Bad Amazon Gadget
Reviews.Author: Pnut Butta
Reviews.Content: For the record, I view tablets as toys so I largely relied on reviews from tech magazines such as Gizmodo, TechCrunch, PCWorld, etc. in addition to customer feedback that already had one of these units. I use this mostly when I'm flying to watch movies or if I'm in trainings/meetings at work to play JetPack Joyride.  It's super light (compared to my primary workhorse, the ASUS Transformer) and the user interface is fairly intuitive and easy to use. So, it serves my purposes. . . .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Great
Reviews.Author: WayneO
Reviews.Content: We have several lap top computers, a Nook, a Kindle Fire and now this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  The HDX surpasses expectations.  It will not replace the lap tops entirely, but for reading books, checking Facebook, reading emails, playing games, and some web surfing; it does a great job!!!  I would highly recommend it. iI is all that is advertised and more!

Reviews.Title: I have a Kindle fire HDX, that what she says
Reviews.Author: Patti
Reviews.Content: Christmas gift for my 10 year old daughter,  so far I can pry it from her hands.  We love  it. She watch movies,  play games,  but must of all she spend plenty of hour reading.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Don Carlson
Reviews.Content: We love our  Kindle Fire HDX and use it all the time! would recommend it to any one! It is just the right size to carry, love the sound and takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Love it....wish battery lasted longer...
Reviews.Author: Dulciecat
Reviews.Content: It is lighter than the old version and is a great device! I use it every day for reading, games and recipes. I just wish the battery would last longer. I have to remember to charge it every night or it won't last the next day. I started out with a Kindle Keyboard and it would last several days between charges. I realize the HDX is color and I'm using a lot of graphics, etc....but you'd think they could come up with a longer-life battery....or maybe a FASTER charger (I have the rapid charger.) Or......being able to use it while plugged into the charger would be good......Forgetting and leaving the WIFI on drains it super fast......but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Natalie Caesar
Reviews.Content: Easy to learn how to use, it teaches u in the beginning. Love the size when watching movies, very lightweight.I'm happy with the product

Reviews.Title: works great on the internet
Reviews.Author: Marlin Mogan
Reviews.Content: I like it for reading the morning paper, weather forecast, long with checking emails.  Battery life is shorter than what I expected.  Would be nice if it came with a operating manual.

Reviews.Title: The best Christmas present!
Reviews.Author: Ruth Rosamond
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning about my kindle, but it's brilliant. The screen size is perfect and its light weight is easier to handle than many books. I love having wireless at my fingertips when I want to look up something. Great new product, thank you.Ruth Rosamond

Reviews.Title: Sound Problem with my new Kindle HDX ...
Reviews.Author: TxLadyrah
Reviews.Content: I really like my new KINDLE HDX, but I'm still disappointed about the sound problem.  I like to listen to a book while I'm driving, and the voice reading my book to me will all of a sudden stop for no reason.  I have to pull over & try to reset it, but that doesn't always work.  It's very annoying. I've pressed the MAYDAY button & asked for assistance, but out of the 3 people I called when it keeps happening, not one knew how to fix the problem.  Only one said they would put in a "Problem Report Ticket" about the problem I've having with it.  Haven't heard back yet about a fix for it or an explanation.  That was a week ago.

Reviews.Title: Better than Apple Air
Reviews.Author: Brownbats
Reviews.Content: Love this Kindle Fire HDX. 8.9 very much  and very simple easy to use. My daughter tells me it is better than Apple because of it's lightweight  & longer battery life than Apple.

Reviews.Title: loving my Kindle Fire HDX so far!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Hightower "cloudhair"
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle Fire HDX for a week, and I'm very satisfied so far. I bought it primarily to surf the internet and stream movies and TV on Amazon prime. I have been very happy with those features so far.Browser speed Some people have complained about the browser speed, but it has worked fine for me so far. I've used the HDX to stream a TV show off the internet, and there were no problems there. A screen did pop up saying I needed a flash player, but then another screen popped up saying I could use an experimental Amazon player, and that worked well enough.Screen fingerprintsSome people have complained about fingerprints on the screen, and this can be a problem in certain light. I may invest in a screen cleaning cloth.AppsThe app availability is not as good as the iPad, but I did not buy this to run a bunch of apps. I have an iPhone for that. I did download the Pinterest app and the Facebook app, and I have been satisfied with those so far.PrimeAnother complaint I have seen is the limitations of prime. I agree that there don't seem to be enough shows you can download to your device. Fortunately I have been binge watching The Good Wife, and it was available to download onto my device. It takes a while to download. I ended up letting the episodes download overnight. There are three different download qualities. At first I used the middle quality, but that took too long, so I started downloading with the lowest quality. I'm not really a picture quality snob, so the lowest quality was fine with me. I liked the shorter download time and less memory needed. I have the 16g and had no problems downloading 6 45 minute episodes. It's very easy to delete them as you go. I didn't mind the 48 hour watching window since I watched each episode is one sitting on an airplane.As an ereaderI have an earlier kindle that I use for reading, so I wasn't planning on using this as an eReader. My original kindle is not backlit, so I did end up using my HDX as an ereader while riding in a dark car. It was good for this purpose, but I prefer to read on my other kindle if I am reading for longer periods of time since it is not backlit. I like the dictionary function on the HDX better. It's easier to use since my other kindle is not a touchscreen. I liked how the two kindles synched via the internet, so I could keep my place in my book between devices.Button placementMany people have complained about the on/off switch and volume buttons being located on the back. I would prefer a home button on the front like an iPad, but I've gotten used to the back buttons.Overall I am very pleased with my purchase. I've had no problems with it whatsoever. I love how lightweight it is and how beautiful the screen resolution is. The battery life is great even when streaming. I also love how much cheaper it is than the iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am still unsure of my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB - Includes Special Offers (Electronics
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle fire hdx as a Christmas gift to myself. I wanted to step up a bit with new technology from my old kindle fire and I am just unsure of my purchase. It was bought 28th November, 2013 and since I am living out of the USA my relative ship it to me. I was so excited when I received it on the 16th December and started to use it immediately. I love the feel of it ,larger screen and sound quality. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed and frustrated on 31st December,2013 when it refused to power on. After several tries and troubleshooting it came on. So I am going to update my review as time progress but for now I going to say it's okay.

Reviews.Title: Review coming from a Nexus 7 user
Reviews.Author: Ron Cooper
Reviews.Content: I'm still rather new to this device as I actually unboxed it on Christmas.  I would consider myself a power user that must push the boundaries of making a device do what I would like it to do.  I rooted my Nexus 7 so I can use apps like Titanium Backup Pro, etc.  However, I was getting tired of needing to root and deal with that headache and just get a device that works.  The Kindle HDX is a beautiful device and interface.  I have enjoyed it so far, but there are a bunch of App compatibility issues that I immediately ran into.I'll keep this short and maybe revisit and expand after I have had more time to settle in with this device.Pros:Beautiful display and I\interfaceIntegration with Amazon contentHandles about 80% of what I want to do with a tabletBook reading has been pleasant so farSpeakers and audio sound really good coming from a tabletCons:Locked into Silk BrowserLast Pass seems a little weird - not tied to Silk Browser - uses an embedded Dolphin browser I believe - wish this was integrated into Silk with a plugin or somethingNo Google integration - you don't know you miss it until it's not there any moreLack of GPSApps in the Amazon app store are not the same revision as current ones in the Google Play storeThings like Candy Crush - since its an older version, I'm missing features I get on my Google based devicesStuff I purchased in Google Play I cannot easily get to Kindle Fire or if I do it might not be supported (if I sideload something)Price.  Due to being so locked in to the Amazon marketplace, I feel this device should be priced lower or I wouldn't have a problem paying more if more of my apps worked out of the box.In short, there are challenges that need to be overcome on a directional level from Amazon.  I'm not sure why developers or Amazon are not keeping Apps up to date or what is preventing developers from moving to the Amazon Marketplace, but if I were Amazon I'd be addressing these issues.  If I had more compatibility and flexibility I wouldn't have such a problem losing a few apps, but the percentage is too high for me to give a 4 or 5 star review as the current device and platform sit.Companies that try to limit what we want or can do with these devices are going to pay the price, by losing users and sales.  It seems Amazon is following Apple's model more closely than Google's.  I'm happy with a mix in the middle.  Considered sending this back to Amazon but I'll wait it out some more and see how things go.  I would really like this device to replace all of my others but right now it is a complimentary tablet to my phone and other tablet usage.

Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. Boyle
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle Fire--so I was pleasantly surprised by how light and sleek the HDX is. The display is great and I'm pleased by how fast the web browser is. Hulu Plus and Netflix also work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: joy
Reviews.Author: Wile E's Mom
Reviews.Content: What a treat to be able to easily and clearly see the content. Very bright, very crisp.  And the simplicity of use!  Hardly a learning curve!

Reviews.Title: Great screen and functionality
Reviews.Author: David Ziring
Reviews.Content: My wife won't let go of this - she now watches more movies and TV shows on the HDX than on the television.It's not nearly as portable as the 7" tablets, but much easier to use.

Reviews.Title: i love this kindle fire 8.9 HDX.
Reviews.Content: I have tried the smaller kindle we bought one for my husband. I thought it was to small. I love this size. It is easy to put  it in my purse and go. Big enough to see without enlarging the page. So many free apps and games.  My daughter has an IPad and this is so much better. I also recommend this pad if your new to using a pad it has the May day feature that you just can,t beat. I have had to use it and the support Tec was fast super nice. Made it an easy fix. I love my kindle.

Reviews.Title: my new info center
Reviews.Author: carol piazza
Reviews.Content: First of all I am a senior . This is great , I love it. I have a computer so I do know a little. I am enjoying  it.l learn something new every day.Carol

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: C. Ellis
Reviews.Content: Much better than the 1st generation.  Lightweight, fast, love the increased storage space.  Makes me want to read more.  Easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: I'm a happy consumer.
Reviews.Author: English teacher
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX … vivid screen, easy to use … all that Amazon advertises it to be. Amazon did a great job on delivery time too! If you're an Amazon prime customer, you can't go wrong with this.

Reviews.Title: Truly Excellent Specialized Device
Reviews.Author: abacus
Reviews.Content: This is not a tablet for everybody. If one wants a tablet with a fully accessible operating system, this is not for you. Get a Samsung Note 10 2014 or an iPad Air. If you are a regular participant in the Amazon universe and you want to read both books and magazines, and consume other material that needs a superb screen, buy the Fire HDX.Screen quality is as good as the best of the other tablets and the device is lighter. It is designed to promote and facilitate the sale of Amazon products and Amazon is upfront about this. This concept works for me and I am very pleased with the device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire8.9 is Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Jay Wadsworth
Reviews.Content: We received our Kindle and found the device to be a super clean clear display with all the facility necessary except the absence of an external outlet port. However we were able to solve that with the addition of a Netgear wireless adapter  for wireless connection. The Kindle display connects flawlessly to our 47" TV as well as all of our smart phones with the mirror app installed.  The Kindle was also also supplemented with an additional purchase of a keyboard and a case. That has made the Kindle a real piece of welcome gear here at our house. The kindle takes a few minutes t learn your way around but that is worth it. I had a small issue and called support. The phone support was just great and fixed the problem over the internet to our Kindle.at our place.. Could not be more pleased at this point in time.

Reviews.Title: RE:Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: PKS
Reviews.Content: So happy to have this item. I like the different levels of background lighting for reading. Navigation is fairly easy but did have issues in connecting the calendar.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: BAXTER
Reviews.Content: I am still undecided about this. It came to me frozen from being out so long before being delivered. I think that is why it still has some issues. Like the battery does not even last a full day on stand by, you have to shut it totally down each time. Disappointing since my i pad air lasts for like 3 days atleast.  But I still favor the kindle over the apple. Maybe just need to be fixed.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!!
Reviews.Author: Alfredo H Ayala
Reviews.Content: the only inconvenience AT THE MOMENT is that the app market doesn't have as many apps as Google play or Apple store. I do expect it to get better as time goes by. Other than that I love it!

Reviews.Title: Screen WOW!
Reviews.Author: James M. Young
Reviews.Content: This is replacing my wife's old nook color.  What a difference, the HDX screen is simply beautiful.  She couldn't believe how thin and light it is.  You can also tell that it is running on a newer version of Android, as there are slide out menus, etc...

Reviews.Title: Finally a kindle that has a help button
Reviews.Author: L. D. Barr "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I love it because I can talk to someone any time with just pushing the May day button. Fantastic Would invite anyone to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Nice e-reader & tablet.
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I have an older Kindle e-reader that is stilling going strong, but like most people wanted the newer technology. The touch screen is responsive and the color is good.  Battery life is so-so and does not charge very quickly so be prepared to plug it in whenever your not using it. The lack of Flash Player is disappointing but from what I've read that is an issue with Adobe who are no longer supporting the Android format. I don't love the internet set up and not found it to be very smooth. The connection is fine,  I think it's the browser that I don't care for. Maybe I'm just used to Explorer and haven't given Silk enough of a chance.  I'm sure I'll travel with it rather than lugging my laptop so I can email, check FB, play games, read or watch a movie. I gave it 4 stars because of the browser.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: S. Schmunk
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I upgraded from the Kindle Fire HD and it took a little getting used to but now I have figured it out and it is great.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Arthur Byrd
Reviews.Content: I bought  this as a gift for my daughter she is in love with it,. it works very well and she is very happy with her gift

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is awesome, I've moved up from my kindle hd fire to this one and it's awesome. Light, great screen to read on.

Reviews.Title: What a good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Edward Ybarra
Reviews.Content: Spunky, Smart design, Fantastic Graphics! I am so pleased with this new Kindle. I't only needs an SD memory Slot to be incredible.Hint Hint!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Brant Thornton
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Best yet!  Love everything Amazon does - very good products and delivery and this Kindle is no different!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX8.9"
Reviews.Author: honeydew
Reviews.Content: to anyone who has a kindle or a kindle fire, you will love the kindle fire HDX8.9" or the smaller one. I  just love this one. I already have the kindle.which is in black and white. DI loved that one when I got It. My son gave me the kindle fire for Christmas last year.I loved that one even more.it is in color. But the kindle fire HDX8.9" is WOW it is faster,I haven't really played with it much, but what I see of it is awesome. I plan on keeping at least the first kindle because there are some games on there that I can't get on the other kindles. It came already set up for me which I liked.

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Stephen "reader of books"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle (my second Kindle Fire).  I find it faster and works more smoothly than the first Kindle fire.  I really like the 8.9 form factor.  The Origami case works pretty well but about doubles the weight it seems.The only thing holding it back from 5 stars is the fact it does not have full access to android store or apps.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: roseyv55
Reviews.Content: First tablet I have ever owned, very light weight, display great. Only wish it would of come with a manual so I could learn to navigate, but am figuring it out. Mayday button is very helpful!

Reviews.Title: happy with it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research before purchasing this unit.  It seems great for my daughter's use which will be mostly surfing the net, reading books, watching movies etc.  Since it doesn't seem to have full access to the google play apps and some of my work related apps are not silk compatible, it would not be the best choice for me.  But is was a great purchase for what is being used for.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: lureneh
Reviews.Content: These older eyes really enjoy the bigger screen and the high definition.  There was a problem with the speakers and they had to replace it, but the replacement came quickly and the return was free and effortless.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: John "JSM"
Reviews.Content: Excellent display lightweight and fast and there's plenty of storage. Voice to text conversion works very well. I am doing this review with voice to text conversion. It does most of the functions you expect of the tablet very well and very fast. I use it every day.  Although excellent it is not perfect. Kindle needs to supply a file storage program so you can see where documents reside. Now we have to download an app to do that. There should be a delete key to delete text to the right of the cursor instead of only a backspace to delete to the left. I am tired of the browser telling me I have too many windows open. You can never have too many windows. I have not yet found a function that properly stores your favorite websites.  The Adobe reader tells me some of the PDFs that I download are not in proper PDF format.  Yet I can download them on my desktop and  email them and put them on my Kindle.  This is too much work around. Also Amazon needs to make its peace with Google so that you can use Chromecast easily. You can do it now but it's too much work around.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display and 4G LTE,16 GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Packaged product arrived on promised date. Packaged very well. Was for me so was already registered and had all my content on it. This is my 4th Kindle and they just keep getting better. Highly recommend this product. Ease of use is great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: R. Perkins "MrPBob"
Reviews.Content: Excellent unit.  Much more bargain priced than the apple, etc.  Waited and waited for a special price and finally gave in.  Went on sale 3 days later.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing
Reviews.Author: Ryan Winningham
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect tablet. It does everything I need and more. It's super sleek and light. And paired with the leather origami case, it's perfect

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 16 gb
Reviews.Author: K. Debevc "IKat2u2"
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love it.  highly recommend it.  Lot cheaper than the IPad and does everything the Ipad does and much cheaper to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just as I expected
Reviews.Author: Country Woman
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle Fire and I'm still as pleased and excited with it as I was with the first one.  I decided to go with the bigger 8.9" model this time and I love the extra viewing room, especially for movies.  My only complaint and it is a big one, is that some apps that work on the 7" aren't available for the larger screen.  I'm guessing they work on the Ipad, so why not this??

Reviews.Title: Awsome picture quilty!
Reviews.Author: Jerod D. Smith
Reviews.Content: The HDX has a awesome  picture , in the short time we have had it , it has worked quit well.

Reviews.Title: revolutionary
Reviews.Author: heather wilhelm "wyogal"
Reviews.Content: the mayday is unbelievable!!  this is without a doubt one of the best tablets in the universe rite now!!! screen is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Feedback
Reviews.Author: evaconda
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle! This is the best kindle, excellent picture and sound, light, the email display is awesome , I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Dennis M. Rees
Reviews.Content: This device exceeds all my expectations. So easy to use and so full of wonder. It will do everything imaginable to educate and entertain.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for me
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Williams
Reviews.Content: It is fast, clear, and easy to hold. Light weight does not tire my arm. The camera is excellent and postingor emailing photos is super simple. Although battery life is much better than my original Kindle Fire it stillcould be better, I still have to charge it each night but it gets heavy usage since I am retired and read a lot.The help center is fast and easy to use.Only disappointment was that I could not put Facetime on it. (Apple product) Sure there is something else availablebut have not had time to search for it.. Overall a great product.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: M. Bouska
Reviews.Content: Graphics are amazing, and there is no lag or delay with any games I have tried.  Streaming video is perfect as well

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift too myself
Reviews.Author: Paul A Mala
Reviews.Content: I parted with my Kindle HD  fire 7 for 2 reasons, I want to read magazines without having to scroll around the screen and my daughter loves to read on it. I gifted the 7 to her and bought this model. This model has an awesome camera, is very light and I can see how much quicker the response time is.I have used both Kindle and Ipad and the Kindle gives me more of the entertainment experience with a balance of games books and music. I do wish there was and itunes for kindle app. not that I don't buy MP3's from Amazon, but most of my collection is already on Itunes. Between the offers and the overall collection this is a great experience especially when paired with an Amazon Prime account .

Reviews.Title: In love!!!!
Reviews.Author: claudia
Reviews.Content: I've had it for 3 days and I love it. Coming from a 1st generation kindle to this is breath taking. It's very fast, much bigger and very light weight. I just hate the limited cases for it.

Reviews.Title: Get One
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of pad like devices and this is easily the best of the bunch.  The resolution is bonkers and the ease of use is unprecedented.  If you live in the amazon ecosystem this is the only real choice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle love!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I received this product before expected and was as advertised. I absolutely love it. It was ready to use right out of the box. Has a great HD display and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Kevin  Halle
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this new Fire.  My father received an original fire when they first came out and this is a definite improvement.  The way it works is basically the same meaning someone could upgrade with no issues but they will totally notice how much faster it is and how much clearer the screen is.  If you have prime, I would definitely recommend this device because of all the free shows and movies you can watch.  If you don't have prime then you will probably end up spending lots of money to watch things on it because you will want to use it all the time for videos.  The new mayday feature is brilliant.  This device will be used by a very wide range of people and some may not be very tech savvy.  This does not matter at all because if they don't know how to do something, all they have to do is push that button and someone will teach you at no charge.  This is a tablet for anyone at any age to enjoy.

Reviews.Title: I no longer need glasses.
Reviews.Author: J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: After many years in life I recently decided I need reading glasses. After purchasing the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" I can read small type again. The resolution is so high! Now I probably still need glasses for the other times during the day but I can hold out a little longer now!

Reviews.Title: Good with a few drawbacks
Reviews.Author: E. Wenzel
Reviews.Content: Screen is good. Sound not so much. The rear facing speakers are pretty weak. Battery life is good. The power and volume buttons on the back side leave the kids complaining. The back plate that forms the body has a fairly sharp edge that catches a little on things. However the performance of the kindle fire was nice and responsive. So overall a good device with a few drawbacks.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gary Lewis "Gerald L Lewis"
Reviews.Content: I've been a Kindle customer and fan since the first one came out (I lost one and now own 3 including a 2nd generation 7", a DX, and now the Fire HDX). I also use the Kindle Windows client on my desktop and Microsoft Surface RT device. For my money, the HDX is the best platform for reading books and watching movies of them all. I particularly like the fact that I was able to download multiple high-quality movies that I can watch comfortably using my Bluetooth headphones, on the device since I don't always have WiFi access. I already have moved 6 movies and about 40 books to the device and I still have over 20GB available space. I've also installed several productivity applications and, OK, a couple of games as well. I'm extremely pleased with the speed of the device (downloading a book over WiFi occurs in seconds) and the quality of the display and sound. I chose the 32GB version without special offers. The Kindle HDX will be a very hard act to follow!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Cheyenne Harris "Cmarie"
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet ever. I am so happy with it! The 30 day trial was perfect so I could try this out and see what I was missing.

Reviews.Title: Love the new kindle fire!!!
Reviews.Author: Madeline Starnes
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire it's light weight and easy to use. The screen is beautiful!  I currently own an iPad 2 so the screen technology isn't the greatest. I like the design of the kindle except for the material of the back. Not sure why but it was hard to keep clean. I would have kept the kindle but I just couldn't afford it after the free trial. Great tablet for someone who is looking to buy a tablet but isn't sure which to buy. I also liked how your amazon account was integrated throughout the kindle made purchasing books or apps super easy!!!

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!
Reviews.Author: Jon Williquette
Reviews.Content: I have loved this tablet since the moment I opened the box! It's an amazing piece of work, and I'm proud to say I own one. The only little thing that I dislike about it is the scrolling carousel on the home page. Seems a bit unnecessary to me, but no big deal. Thanks Amazon for creating a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: A-
Reviews.Author: cflo93
Reviews.Content: I like the overall feel of an e-book reader, and the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is amazing. I have an iPad mini that I've used since they were released, and I am so used to using that. I do like the OS on the Kindle as well, and it's pretty high up there as far as functionality goes. The only thing that I would say I do not like is the button placement on the device.

Reviews.Title: i really love it
Reviews.Author: paul flores
Reviews.Content: light, fast boot time big hdd nice cam with high def screen and a big hd displaywould gift to friends and fam con price tag

Reviews.Title: better than an ipad
Reviews.Author: Carl F
Reviews.Content: Better battery life, better resolution.  Lighter, easy to carry, easy to read.  This is my 4th tablet. Just a matter of time before is my only one.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!!
Reviews.Author: Ken Ament
Reviews.Content: I ordered the HDX fire for the May day feature.It has turned out to be more  than I could have  expected,it his feature is VERY helpful

Reviews.Title: GREAT PURCHASE AND ACQUISITION!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Get one now, so versatile and enjoyable to use. Excellent product! This must be the best in the in industry. We love it.

Reviews.Title: better than my first Kindle and I could'nt do without my first one
Reviews.Author: Jim E. Stone
Reviews.Content: I still read my first kindle but when I can get a good leather cover for  my 8.9 I will use it alltogether

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received it.  I am impressed with the service, the speed of response, and the bonu is talking to nice people who are very helful.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Jean Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  It's fantastic and I use it every day.  I highly recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Crystal Peoples
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I am learning new things about it each day.  Since submitting my initial rating, I have no idea why my reasoning did not show up, but I have learned how to adjust text to speech voice speed.  The other issues I had were the inability to print web pages and the fact that the text to speech tends to stop at the beginning of a new chapter.  The volume is fine indoors but inside of a car, the road sounds tend to make it difficult to hear text to speech unless you have the device in your lap which is risky while driving.  In certain books, text to speech repeats the last word in a sentence.  This can be annoying.  I imagine I use text to speech more than the average person.  Other than my listed issues, I have no problem with the device.  I was told that Amazon is working on web printing and the text to speech new chapter stopping.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Redhot
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. So glad I chose this one. Lots of apps to pick from. Downloads are quick. Been easy to figure out everything.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael T Iocca
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that someone is able to help you at any time of the day with the May Day button.I love this thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet - highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet.  Bought the HD 7" in Jan.2013 & there is such a difference between the two. I ordered the 7 HDX 32gb online (not thru Amazon) & the store grabbed the wrong box & I ended up with the 8.9" HDX 32gb, which was even better because I saved myself 200.00 some dollars & got a better tablet.  The 8.9 HDX is very comparitive to the Nexus 10 which is also an excellent tablet, but about a $100.00 less than the 8.9 HDX 32bg.  I may be selling my 7" HD Kindle on ebay & maybe even the Nexus, because the Nexus & 8.9 HDX are the same in all qualities & specifications.  The HDX 8.9 is easy to use, light, good screen quality to watch movies & play games & I especially like the power button.  I recommend this to buy along with the Nexus 10

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Marianne Brown
Reviews.Content: It has a beautiful display.  I really loved it except for the fact that it froze up on me 4 times  in one week.  Also, certain games that I wanted were not formatted yet for the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Super Terrific!!!
Reviews.Author: IJL "IJL"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and still enjoy all three.  Super products!The newest Kindle Fire  I have is the HDX 8.9" and my others are HD 7" and HD 8.9"; each one has its own selling points and addresses a  variety of people---young, old, computer gurus and not so guru!!  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: A. Scott
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  I have each of the other versions (!) and think this one is outstanding.  I love the MayDay button and being able to download TV shows and movies.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Awesome Tablet!
Reviews.Author: PEIsinghood
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly. The Kindle Fire HDX performs very fast. The display has an awesome picture. Very light weight and super thin. The camera takes great pictures.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great birthday present for my hubby!
Reviews.Author: N2Paint25
Reviews.Content: I have had two kindles and when my husband wanted something to play games on and watch movies when we travel, we originally looked at small laptops however traveling made them too bulky to carry around so I bought him this for his birthday. He loves it! I have a kindle fire hd but wish I had this new one. It is lightweight and the screen is bigger than my 7".

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet, fast, clear, light.  Would be perfect with access to Google Play.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JKM"
Reviews.Content: I like the clarity and ease of use of this tablet.  It is fast and easy to use.  It is good to hold, light, I almost hated to put a cover on it, so I purchased a more open cover that doesn't detract so much from the tablet itself. The apps are pretty good, and I have found replacements close to those that I enjoy on my other Android tablet.  Of course it is very linked to the Amazon sphere of products.  I wish I had waited to add Amazon Prime, because of the delivery delay from ordering that my one month free trial was almost all used up before I received my tablet so I was not fully able to enjoy on the tablet.  That is why I cancelled Amazon Prime. My main complaint is that I still miss Google Play Store access.

Reviews.Title: love this new kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Constance
Reviews.Content: Perfect size screen and so sharp and easy to read books on. . Not to heavy. Movies look fantastic. Amazon Prime has so many movies and books for me to choose from.....  is a very good value  and with free shipping.... How can you beat this?

Reviews.Title: Excellent  Tablet
Reviews.Author: aml
Reviews.Content: Very quick to load information.  The clarity of the pictures and web information is just unreal.  The ease of using this kindle and the weight for this size of tablet is great. Another great feature is "May Day", which I have used and the tech. support has been great.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: daniel lane
Reviews.Content: I was not sure how much I liked  the Fire at first but after using it for the last two weeks I love it.  It is my first experience with a tablet as i've only used a laptop before. The mayday button is a great feature. Very helpful. I thought at first I would return it  but have decided to keep it. I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet/ebook.
Reviews.Author: Stephen J. Lemmons "DocTronics"
Reviews.Content: It is outstanding and easy to use no matter if you use it as an ebook or to access the internet and use it as a tablet.  There is one draw back I see a lack of an instruction manual.  It more than justifies the five stars if possible and it needs a sixth star.

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX!
Reviews.Author: djtaylor
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  This is my fourth one.  Started out with the paperwhite which still can't be beat for reading in the sun, helped one of my grandsons have a Kindle Fire by helping him purchase my last one.  Love the lightness of my HDX!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ann Hawley
Reviews.Content: Easty to use - hopefully I will have more time to play with it over the holidays; but I was very satisfied with my decision to purchase the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love how light it is & how quickly it responds. Wish the glass screen didn't show fingerprints, this is my only complaint. Can't imagine using any other tablet. My husband is enjoying my old kindle fire 8.9".

Reviews.Title: Wow and awesome.
Reviews.Author: Victor B Stanley
Reviews.Content: Wow. This a awesome reader and more. I find that I'm using it more than my laptop for everyday task. It's fast and responsive. The Mayday feature works as advertised. Good thing I don't have wifi at work I would probably use it in the middle of the night. Seriously a awesome buy well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: another great idea
Reviews.Author: In My Old Age "Jean"
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th kindle , best reader s around and the HD & HDX great as tablet for browsing. Haven't had this one long, seemed slow but has updated and is much better now.love this larger size. I removed the ads after received. Only issue now is on button but that's with otter box case on it, so not kindle fault. Looking forward to Mayday ability, wish only we could request who we get( I vote for a good lookin guy with sexy accent).

Reviews.Title: Very Very Happy with discission.
Reviews.Author: meowpal
Reviews.Content: So far everything I have tried to do with the Kindle, has worked perfectly.  I even used the mayday button one time and got a very fast and helpful response.  Solved my question immediately.  My daughter has an I Pad, and so far I am glad I chose the Kindle instead.

Reviews.Title: Basic features, overview ; even better than the Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jenraider72 "Jen"
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf";
