I had to buy a manual on how to use the Kindle Fire HDX when I believe it should come with it.  Therefore, I have had to access technical support with the 'Mayday' button constantly!Yes, I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to family/friends because of all it can do.  It was less expensive compared to other products similar to the Kindle Fire HDX.  I researched many devices and the Kindle is the best and least expensive device.

Reviews.Title: The Killer Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kripa T.
Reviews.Content: I have had a first gen kindle but it was too slow and i wanted to upgrade it. I went for a refurbished Kindle HD. I was not happy as i had Apps crashing issues. I bought this when it went to $339 sale 2-3 weeks ago. As usual prime shipping i had it in 2 days. The color and picture quality is so vibrant. The sound is breath taking. Much better than IPAD mini or IPAD i have had. I am a prime member and it is a bonus that i could download my rental and certain prime videos. I have already bought kindle book rental for month of April. I also downloaded 2 books which is a free offer for kindle owners. I also love Kindle free time for kids and i can set the timings on weekdays and weekends. I do not need to monitor as the kindle shuts it off. I have not had a chance to experience May Day service but i am sure it is revolutionary. Amazon has decent number of Apps but would be great if they had google play available. I have HBO Go, directv App, ESPN app all working perfectly fine. It comes with a charger unlike the other Kindles which is a huge plus. After i bought it went on sale with a extra 10% off for PRIME members and i contacted CS reps and within 5 min i was refunded. So i ended up paying $305. Great price for this power house! If you are thinking of buying pull the trigger !!Update: used the camera much better than iPad mini and photos gets automatically stored in the cloud. Skype works perfect too.

Reviews.Title: Amazing but no Google support
Reviews.Author: F. One
Reviews.Content: If you have Amazon Prime the Kindle Fire tables are the only mobile devices you can watch Amazon TV from.  The tablet it self is very fast, responsive, and light.  The display is is vibrant and sharp.  Kindle books and magazines function better than the kindle app for Android or IOS.  The only negative keeping this from being five stars is the abstinence of Google apps.  If Amazon gets these app this will be the perfect tablet for me hands down.

Reviews.Title: The greatest thing since SLICED BREAD!!!!
Reviews.Author: KulaKop
Reviews.Content: Amazing product!!! Bought my 7 year old son the HDX 7 version and was so impressed by it that I bought the HDX 8.9 version for myself!!! I was an Apple guy for the last 10 years plus and this kindle has turned me into a traitor. Great everything. I live on Maui and this was delivered on the 10th of February from New Jersey it made it to me on the 11th!!!! One day?! Love AMAZON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Media, Surfing, and the Amazon ecosystem.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for Media, Surfing, and Amazon ecosystem.If you need a light-weight tablet for playing Media, for surfing or for using the Amazon ecosystem (Kindle e-reader, Amazon shopping, Amazon cloud service, Amazon Instant Video, etc) then this is it!  Well, I setup 3 of these for my wife and kids and while I found this tablet lacking on the technical/features side (I prefer Windows 8 tablets for that matter,) my wife and kids loved it, ironically, for these same reasons. Since it is a locked-down, and watered-down version of Android, it is not overly overwhelming in features, making it easier to use for kids and non-technical people. So this tablet fills this niche perfectly. And the 4G LTE option makes it a great portable tablet on the go (travel/beach/school/etc.)To nitpick, I'm surprised Amazon didn't add wireless-ac and Bluetooth mouse support in this hardware refresh, To nitpick even more, a 13MP or even 20MP rear camera would have been more attractive than 8MP for this price range. I also found its charger, though very cute and small, is also very slow, specially if the Kindle is charging in sleep mode and not in shutdown mode. For that slow charging, maybe Amazon should have added wireless charging as an added feature to cancel out this shortcoming (it will still be slow to charge, but at least it will be a convenient wireless charging :-) ) But this is all nitpicking;  this a 5-star product!If I were to pick the one thing this tablet shines most at, it is, not surprisingly, on the (Kindle) e-reader side. The text-to-speech feature in the reader is a very well done feature...

Reviews.Title: Very handy once you get the hang of it
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Bryant
Reviews.Content: The help was printed in very tiny type and could not get it bigger so the help section was very hard to read.  Still have not figured out how to not have another person's notes show up on a book I am reading.  Screen is touchy at times and I end up in places I didn't really want to go to.  The Silk browser was hard to get used to.  Still haven't figured out how to add bookmarks but working on it.  Takes some time to boot up but very quick to shut off, just the opposite of the Paperwhite Kindle I have.  I use the HDX more for the games for the 1st grade student I tutor so the color and sound is great for him.  After a few weeks, I wasn't sorry I bought it but the learning curve was not fun.  I realize this review sounds negative but I do like the HDX but wish I would have known more about how to operate it when I bought it.

Reviews.Title: fast, lightweight, and fun.
Reviews.Author: Larry Garber
Reviews.Content: I love the speed, great display and it's very lightweight, the battery lasts all day.before I purchased the Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX I had a concern that the screen would be to small, not so, it's a great size for home use and travel. I'm using it more now then my laptop. go Kindle fire HDX. I would recommend the Kindle fire HDX 8.9" to anyone that is looking for a tablet or an e-reader. it's awesome.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Display WI Fi, 16 GB Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Edward Miller
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX Display Wi Fi however I wish we had not accepted with Special Offers it just too much distraction. Will be contacting Amazon to see if we can drop "Special Offers".

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I got the kindle fire hdx 8.9  for my grand daughter.  She turned two years old on 7 dec 2013.I was amazed at how light weight it was, and the picture is crystal clear.  The camera on it takesexcellent pictures and  I feel it was well worth the $379.00 I paid for it. I think there are a lot ofapps at the kindle store that will help her improve her learning experience.

Reviews.Title: Love the Mayday and Goodreads, but no Google Apps
Reviews.Author: Angela Bee Bee "angela bee bee"
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen, the speed and the mayday button is amazing. I like the integration with Goodreads, you can quote directly from your book to GR, similar to Facebook. There is also a way now to select and copy and paste text from ebooks using the google search tool.Your Goodreads review shows up at the end of the book. The font inside book menus is still way too small and light gray, hard to read (definitions and translations, love the translator too). There is still also no way to customize the screen when reading except for the three colors they had before. I downloaded a screen dim app to dim the screen while reading and use sepia and that seems to help reduce eye strain.I also tried the whole whispersync thing through Audible. It's expensive and confusing but nice if you like to listen to books. The speaker could be louder, but it does have a headphone port.The text to speech works awesome.You can also take a screengrab jpg file by pressing and holding the volume down and power off button at the same time.The only thing I don't like is the lack of Google Apps. You can't even sideload them, it's very proprietary. If you are Amazon friendly, it's no big problem, but it will be annoying for i people to try to switch over. And you have to download a file management browser, like ES file browser to get to your files.I bought mine at Best Buy for $350 in January 2014.I love my new Kindle Fire HDX and can not imagine how I read for so long on my previous gen 7". I am very happy with it.  I got a nice cover and stylus too that work great.Get one for yourself, you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX will not turn off. What is wrong? What can I do to fix it?
Reviews.Author: lucy laudenbach
Reviews.Content: My kindle does not shut off . I cannot do a thing with it.I had it plugged in rather than battery. I need to know what to do . It must still be under warrenty.

Reviews.Title: dont like it
Reviews.Author: billyboy
Reviews.Content: bad sound. My wife has a kindle fire small one it has better sound than my hdx 8.9.  It is hard to download apps and make them work like adobe for an example.  you download it and go to internet and click on things to view and it say to download adobe which I already did.  very touchy.  always have to start over.  I would recommend getting an apple ipad.  Bill.

Reviews.Title: Can only get apps from the amazon store
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: So if for example your cable company's app is somewhere else and it likely is NOT on amazon, you can't get it.  It's an incomplete tablet.  If you just want to use it to read, than it's fine.

Reviews.Title: wifi issues
Reviews.Author: Ginger L. Simons
Reviews.Content: I have had three kindles. All with no problems until purchasing the kindle fire HDX. Half of the time it disconnects from my WiFi and I have to repeatedly reconnect.

Reviews.Title: good not great
Reviews.Author: jabezmurphy
Reviews.Content: I have to reset the WiFi every time at home. I can go to the salon and not do anything to get t connected. Doesnt make sense to me..

Reviews.Title: Love my Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: LonnieK
Reviews.Content: This is my third and favorite tablet I "started" with an entry level Ziio that still works. I moved to an Acer A200 and the screen started behaving erratically. I am very familiar with most of the top tablets on the market through both personal and professional interaction. My tablet use 80/90% entertainment the Fire HDX is lightning quick, has gr8 applications and games and terrific support. The video and audio performance is fantastic; I love the feature to download videos to the tablet for "offline" viewing. Battery life is amazing; I have used it for days to watch movies listen to music read  etc.before having to charge it. I am extremely happy with my purchase; I forgot to note that it is "feather light", so holding the HDX for extended periods won't feel like a workout.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet. Needs more apps
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Great screen and features. Better than most tablets out there. My only problem is that the applications selection are still limited. Particularly when it comes to google.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dragonlyn "Stephen & Marilyn"
Reviews.Content: It's only been out of the package for three hours but I haven't been able to put it down. So easy to use and lightweight. More later.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Joyce Harring
Reviews.Content: I love this new Kindle.What I miss is the exterior charging light (green & amber), also the settings iconfor ease in screen brightness control. In certain light the screen is too bright for readingcomfortably.My original Kindle Fire had these features, so I guess I just got used to them.

Reviews.Title: Love the size and how fast it is
Reviews.Author: Kdskandles
Reviews.Content: I just received my Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX and I'm just getting started learning all the ins and out but so far I am really enjoying using it.  It is very fast and I love the size.  Now I wished I would have waited because now they have a $30 off coupon.  I received mine on Tuesday and now on Thursday the discount.  Oh well the device is still great.  I would recommend to everyone.  One thing that I wish is that if you have multiple deices that you could chose which device you want your books on and it wouldn't show up on the other ones unless you downloaded the content.  I have a 5 year old grandson who has his own Fire that is attached to my account so all of my books, etc show up on his.  At this age it doesn't really matter but as he is starting to read it will matter since some of the books are not appropriate for kids.  I know that you can activate free time but if it is off and he can get to other content that is not good.  Just a suggestion since when I order it asks for which Kindle but that doesn't matter because it ends up on all of them.

Reviews.Title: This is my Fifth Kindle and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Whovian
Reviews.Content: Yes, my FIFTH. My first was a kindle keyboard which my daughter now enjoys. The second was the first gen Fire. Third was the second gen fire. Fourth is my kindle paperwhite that I love to pop in my bag and take everywhere with me. I have loved all of my kindles, however this one is amazing! It is faster and more stable than the last gen. The screen is gorgeous. LOVE LOVE LOVE that they made it so much  LESS weighty than the last gen. The only downside, if any, is you can't use the google play store. If you could this puppy would be perfect! As it is it's pretty darn close.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet and Huge Improvement over Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Good Points!This thing is fast!  I had an original Kindle Fire 7 inch and a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and both felt fairly sluggish compared to other tablets.  I remember reading about how revolutionary the Silk browser would be but in practical use it was much slower than other browsers.  The extra speed gained by caching certain websites was lost when the processor couldn't handle loading pages.  Not any more! With the new processor every thing on this thing flies.  going into to apps, and books and trying processor heavy actions couldn't hold it back, every thing felt really fast and I wasn't constantly waiting for things to load like I had with the previous versions of kindle fire.  It really is a noticeable difference and a huge improvement.The fire OS 3.0 is really great.  while things look similar its a fresh coat of paint that was desperately needed.  the all ways there carousel is a lot better than the favorites tray of days past.  It really does make a big difference having all the apps immediately available instead of digging through menus.Video and the screen are super clear.  HD video looks amazing and every thing on the carousel is crisp and clear.  While this is a big upside there is a small downside in that i can see pixilation in some of my comic book novels I bought on kindle.  They apparently weren't created with HD in mind and now its distracting to see pixilation when every thing else on screen is so clear.  Comixology has upgraded their app for HD comics so its not an issue their.  My comixology books look incredible.  Hopefully this is temporary and the resolution of said books will be updated (I won't hold my breath though).x-ray features are really cool.  The movie and book x-ray features are back and even better.  you can make flashcards in books, you can see every time a character or place is mentioned and simply navigate books better than ever.  I was never a fan of having to hyperlink to the table of contents then hyperlink from there to the chapter you want and hope its the right now.  Now the chapters appear within the control menu of the book so you can go directly to another chapter while not switching pages.  You can highlight in more than one color now.  The notes and other extras are all a lot better integrated and slicker than ever.  There is also goodreads integration so you can read your friends reviews, write reviews from in the book, and see general good reads reviews as well all within the book.  The music x-ray is cool, you can now karaoke along with lyrics of songs you own.  It feels gimmicky but its nice to have and once there is better mirrorcast functionality its cool you can have impromptu karaoke sessions.  The movies x-ray is improved too.  Now you can go directly to famous quotes and trivia scenes via hyperlink.  Trivia from IMDB now shows up along with the actors/actresses that are on screen.  All and all lots of good improvements here.Mayday is all right.  I did it as a test run when I got it and while its nice its there I doubt i'll ever need it again.  It is nice that I could recommend a kindle fire to older non-tech savvy relatives and they have an easy tech support outlet that isn't me.Not so GoodApps, apps, apps.  Same complaint with every model in that you don't get the complete android app store.  While they are getting better at getting bigger apps there are still a slew of what I would consider top priority apps I can't get.  There is the entire google suite which we will pretty much never get our hands on but also apps like marvel comics unlimited, weight watchers, uverse, darkhorse comics, dropbox, etc. which have an android app but not in the amazon store.  I have been sideloading them on with varying degrees of success but it is frustrating to know the app exists but you are locked out of it.  This alone is the biggest downside of the kindle fire experience.  If I had access to all these apps it'd be a 5 out of 5 with just beaming radiance of amazon love.Long term upgrades.  With this being the third generation its clear that after a year you aren't going to get upgrades or support for your kindle.  I can understand when you upgrade the processor like you do for this iteration that putting fire os 3.0 might now be possible on the kindle fire HD 8.9 but there are a lot of things they could have upgraded they didn't.  The kindle reading app on the kindle fire hd 8.9 is inferior to the reading app on the ipad.  This just shouldn't be the case.  when you add features like multicolor highlighting and x-ray it should be across the line of devices.  While I love my kindle now there is real fear that in a year it will be missing cool new features and I know I will never get them.  It makes the iPad a lot better looking device when you know you'll have at least two and maybe more years of support to follow.Lack of Chromecast/screen share.  Maybe this will get better down the line but with out a hdmi output the solution of being able to mirrorcast your screen has a utter lack of support.  There are a couple of dongles you can by to use this feature and apparently future Samsung TV's will support it but as of now that's it.  The Fire Netflix app supports chromecast but the HBOGO app doesn't.  Amazon needs to get release its own screencast device and support chromecast fully to give people options.Battery life seems better all though it does drain a lot of battery while in stand by.  With my ipad if in stand by it'll last like a week, with my kindle fire a good 20-30% battery is lost if I leave it on and asleep all day.  usage battery life is up which is nice but like I said its a pain when I pick it up at the end of the day and find the battery is dead or close to dead.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Will not be buying that new laptop, this tablet does everything I need.  I stream movies, read books, get great special offers,listen to music, play a few games. I do have a desktop I still use, but would not trade this tablet.  Great for travel. All my apps and email and books are at a  touch.

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth problem and fix
Reviews.Author: Farron D. Brougher
Reviews.Content: My comments will not duplicate the many through reviews already posted and are specific to a Bluetooth pairing problem that turned out to be easy to solve. My Phiaton PS 210 BTNC earbuds paired to two earlier generation Kindles on the first try, but not only wouldn't pair with the HDX but weren't even recognized. The solution: read the manual.I actually read and followed the simple steps provided by Phiaton--for the first time--and pairing worked on the first try. I should add that Amazon Mayday and a referral to a "Kindle generalist" were helpful and patient, superb customer service.

Reviews.Title: need some help on how to connect to my ATT moble wi fi
Reviews.Author: jerry R
Reviews.Content: I am a 74 year old gentleman without very much training on how to use a tablet and i am having much trouble getting information on how to use my kindle fire WI -FI . please EMAIL me with some help thank you.

Reviews.Title: Very good but missing the mark-too bad..I wanted to like this unit!
Reviews.Author: J. Lerner "Ny Ranger fan"
Reviews.Content: Let me start out by saying I an Amazon Prime member. I love the whole ecosystem. I bought this because I loved the idea of being able to download the Prime videos. I find that Amazon limits only a very select number of movies to download. To me, thats a major mistake. This unit has the best picture for watching movies. Its actually incredible. However, since this unit only uses a limited version of Android your missing allot of apps.Its a fast unit not any faster than the iPad air.The sound coming out of this unit is the best!As a reader its excellent-unlike the smaller version there is no blue haze while reading your books.In short an excellent unit but misses the mark-If you want a more well rounded unit go iPad air or Nexus units if Android is your preferred system.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Beth R.
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle hdx. I am disappointed because I thought it was hdmi compatible. I do like the x ray feature and the mayday.

Reviews.Title: Wow..just wow
Reviews.Author: Prime Risk "primerisk"
Reviews.Content: We took the leap and went for the 8.9" HDX this year after having 3 original Fires in the family for the last two years.  I also have a slew of other comparable devices including the Nexus 7 and iPad.  The HDX is just incredible.  The screen is gorgeous, very fast, and is so light it is believable.  My cousin's daughter got an iPad mini for Christmas and was absolutely drooling over our HDX.  She is a complete iHead and has said "nothing is better than Apple".  Well, she's rethinking those statements now.I'd like to comment on the Mayday functionality, but we had no reason to use it.  Everything worked perfectly as soon as we took it out of the box.  As soon as we put it on the wifi network it knew what account it was associated with and all of our books, music, and apps were all there where we expected them.  (We did have to specifically download applications we wanted, but they were all there associated with our account).  Just perfectly simple.My one problem though, we have 3 original Fires and only one HDX 8.9.  I see more HDXs in our future.  That's ok, I also got a Sonos system for Christmas and it will make it easy to leave the original Fires laying around as Sonos controllers!

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Juanita Harris
Reviews.Content: The screens so big,I didn't think it would be this much larger than my Fire,but it's really sooo much bigger.We spend a lot of time traveling so I bought this so I could download movies to watch.I've only done one and it played  fantastic.I read a reveiw by a guy that had all the data on this and several others so scroll till you find it,it's very imformative.I'm not an expert,just love to read,facebook,ect while watching football or on the road,and I've found a new companion!

Reviews.Title: loved at 1st
Reviews.Author: BRENDA BENNETT
Reviews.Content: very sorry to say this but I wanted something like the ipad and I found this and just knew that this was it.  everything compared to the apple ipad, and the price for the kindle was less.  could not wait to get it, we all liked it.  but know every time we tried a game it would lock up and nothing we did got it to work again.  we had to set it aside until the next day then it would work for some time then quit again.  sorry to of sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Eh.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Alden Greer
Reviews.Content: Well I have had this device for about 7 days and it's so capable. But the capabilities are lacking. Heavily. The app store is terrible. And I'd be fine with this if it was a cheap device. But for $394 I can get a Microsoft surface which will run everything I need. I may send this back for a refund. I love the book reading capability. Which is what I first requested it for. But you can apparently download an app that does the same thing on a surface. The case is hard to find I don't have the patience to chase one down. I dunno it's a cool device. But buy something else if you need a functional everyday tablet.

Reviews.Title: Total Upgrade:)
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: This is a total upgrade from my kindle fire hd! I love that there is a rear view camera and that it has flash. The camera also has very good quality. I totally recommend this kindle :D !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: HD-Xcellence!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Hopper
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle and then the Kindle Fire and now the HDX.  I have loved all my Amazon products.  The picture and image quality on the HDX is far superior to other devices.  And the integration to all my Amazon products and features is great.Finding new things everyday like the lyrics feature with my music.Way to go Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Brian Meiers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 with high expectations.  Having seen and used friends Kindles, I was looking forward to seeing what the HDX had to offer.  I was NOT disappointed.  It has been easy to use, has beautifully clear images and the sound quality is AMAZING.  My family loves this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Daughters gift
Reviews.Author: SJM
Reviews.Content: This serves 2 purposes it gives my daughter a camera and a tablet.  She loves it and is constantly on it.  The set up was very easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: one of the best
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great! It definitely rivals an iPad and has amazing battery life. It looks really good and all around it's definitely with it's price.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Smooth "Smooth"
Reviews.Content: I have the old Kindle reader so since i want to go online and play games an such i decided on the new Kindle HDX. It was a toss up between the Kindle and the Samsung note. The reason being is because i needed my tablet to have a rear camera with a flash....The Kindle won..and I am very very happy with my decision. I even used the "mayday" which is in person help right from the kindle...

Reviews.Title: Surprised!
Reviews.Author: Brizi
Reviews.Content: I wasn't so sure about this at first...then I came across a store demo.  So far so food.  I had a negative visual of what a kindle fire would be like. I pictured the original grandma version.  But I'm quite impressed and surprised.  I was able to view other demos like Samsung and the IPad and it compared quite well.  The Kindle Fire HDX is attractive and efficient.  I Gove it a 4 because even though I bought it, I rather own the Samsung or the IPad and I had no idea that the Kindle FreeTime was a paid subscription although you have a 30 free trial period.  Other brands have similar feature for free.  I bought this for my son because that's what he wanted for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: MY NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I own all the the kindle fire's everyone of them that has came out. The Kindle HDX is far my favorite. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: Got it within 12 hours!
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: I ordered Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” at about 11PM on Dec 23, the system indicated the item will arrive on Thursday, Dec 26. That’s fine because I ordered it for myself. I didn’t ask for express delivery but Amazon did it. I received 2 packages from Amazon at 11AM on Dec 24, just an hour before my office closed for the holiday. One I knew what it was and the other I didn’t because I didn’t expect to receive the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” until Dec 26. I opened the package thinking my daughter probable ordered a book from my “Wish List” for me and have it delivered to my office just in time. I was very surprised, amazed and pleased to find the package contained Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. How did Amazon deliver it within 12 hours! And like many other reviewers I own a few version of kindle; the first generation of Kindle, the Kindle Keyboard, the first generation of Kindle Fire (still functioning perfectly). But reading a lot of reviews, seeing the ads and being a royal customer of Kindle family I have to try the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. I can’t give a review about the product yet because it is still in the box but I am impressed with how Amazon can get it to me within 12 hours. My Christmas wish is fulfilled. Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: A Surprise Gift
Reviews.Author: Agnes Murphy
Reviews.Content: It will take me a while to get to know my way around on this new instrument but I am enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Brilliance within the Amazon market ecosystem
Reviews.Author: R. Lurer
Reviews.Content: No third party apps like ALL my Realtor apps can't be used, can't put Chrome on am Android based tablet meaning no chromecast, otherwise utterly brilliant.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Allen G. Slocumb
Reviews.Content: I gave my Kindle Touch to a friend of ours and bought this unit. Book reading is great, lots and lots of aps. Couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Display
Reviews.Author: cincydon
Reviews.Content: I am giving this to my wife for Christmas. After setting it up befor wrapping it along with the matching case I was blown away. This is her third upgrade and by far the best yet. I will update after Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Not just the affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: Even Amazon's own commercials portray it as the cheap alternative to the iPad, but I think they do their product a disservice selling that way. It's a great device. Easy to learn, easy to use & a pretty good selection of free apps. I had some crashing issues with a few, but nothing I haven't seen with most smartphones as well. Working with Amazon Prime Video is also a huge benefit. So if you're shopping for tablets, don't look at this as a "you get what you pay for" price shopping deal, look at it as a a true rival to the iPad that happens to be cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, but the software needs some work still.
Reviews.Author: J. Savage
Reviews.Content: Pro: HardwareIt's a good buy for the price. It also has USB which the iPad is known to lack to make life easier.Cons: the SoftwareLimited file types supported and you have to basically trick it to installing a different web browser just to install the missing Flash compatibility that the Silk browser lacks. It can separate your imported files (pictures video etc) into their own folders, but it isn't up front about it so you have to go through a couple menus to get the folders instead of just tapping the Photos section.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Juli
Reviews.Content: I really like the bigger screen and lower price.  I debated buying the iPad air but I am very happy I went with the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Cate
Reviews.Content: I have tried all of the new kindle fires: new kindle fire hd, kindle fire 7" hdx, and the kindle fire hdx 8.9.  All three of the new kindle fire family are amazing tablets. I picked to keep the kindle hdx 8.9 because it meets more of my needs. Reason one I do online classes so I need large screen to view courses and to view word documents. Reason two I both like reading and watching videos which it is great for both.Theses are reason why I chose the kindle fire hdx 8.9 but all of other kindle fire are wonderful too. But the kindle fire hdx 8.9 is the perfect tablet for me.

Reviews.Title: She Loves It
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife is on her Kindle all the time. The HDX was a birthday/anniversary present and she has been like a little kid waiting for it to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Yet
Reviews.Author: Book Lover "Linda"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the originalFire and really have enjoyed using it.  The new HDX is a wonderful tablet and exceeds my expectations.  The camera is great, the videos and movies watched on the Fire have excellent clarity, and the aps available are also good.  I can't say enough about this new Fire and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a step above tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best value
Reviews.Author: Arun Dongre
Reviews.Content: After comparing with other tablets chose this for good value. More bang for bucks. Clean looks and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Definite plus upgrade
Reviews.Author: Elda B. Hueth "Erae"
Reviews.Content: Glad we got this.  Someone gave me one for a present a few years ago and about the only thing I did on it was read.  This one has a lot more features and we got two - one for me and one for my husband.  Been having fun with them and still use it for reading also.

Reviews.Title: Best One Yet
Reviews.Author: Doug Graham
Reviews.Content: It's faster and lighter than the previous generation and the power and volume buttons are much more accessible. It also has more RAM which really helps with web pages loading more quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had Kindles since they first came out. I have loved them all, this is the very best. I love it very much. The only thing I have trouble with is that if you get your finger too close to the screen it will change things, turn a page, loose a puzzle piece, turn page over, that kind of thing. A lot of that may be my fault, I have old hands.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Does all I wanted it to do and more.  I just love it. It works just like a regular tablet and does everything I ask of it.

Reviews.Title: Yet another kindle for me.
Reviews.Author: Nat P
Reviews.Content: Just got the new 8.9 HDX today(Nov 7,2013).  Doesn't weigh hardly anything; the video is stunning; it's so thin.  A piece of cake to figure out if you've ever used a Kindle before.  I'm in the process of reading my first book.  The screen is so clear, to me it's comparable to my wife's paper white.  And yes, the new operating system with the WIFI is blazing!A bit expensive but so far worth every penny.  If anything changes, which I doubt, I'll amend this review.

Reviews.Title: manual
Reviews.Author: Char Fuller
Reviews.Content: It would have been nice to have written instructions come in the box with the Kindle Fire HDX.  Good overall.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "love country"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it - from the size of the screen to the simplicity to use it (of course I bought the Kindle Fire HDX book to go with it as a just in case. lol).  I would rather read than watch movies or DVDs, so I haven't actually tried those features.  I especially love the automatic background light adjustment feature.  No more trying to guess where the Brightness button is located when I forget to turn up the light for daytime use.  I even used the Help feature once.  It was great to have someone answer immediately to assist me!  I have had the Kindle 2, the Kindle Fire, and now this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and this is my favorite one of the 3.  The only problem I have had so far is that I haven't figured out how to download the pictures from the Fire HDX to my PC, so I'll have to consult the book on that (I think I will need to upload them to the cloud then download from there to the PC).  I use it enough that I have to recharge it everyday, but that is no problem.  I read my first generation Fire while it is charging.  I love the way they sync between each other.  Thank you, Amazon, for a GREAT product!!

Reviews.Title: Missing capital free audio format
Reviews.Author: Marcio Barroso
Reviews.Content: I was almost buying one, but: no FLAC ==> no buying.I can't believe Amazon missed the most important audio format nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Sissy39
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase a tablet vs. a laptop after having an IPad loaned to me from work for a year.  The IPad was okay, and it did the job, but it had its issues; kind of iffy WiFi reception (even in my house), problems playing certain types of videos that required flash player, etc.  I did a fair amount of research, for a layperson, read lots of reviews, and decided to purchase this tablet instead of going for a laptop.  My main reason for doing so was portability; so much easier transporting a tablet.  I really needed something to access work sites from home, do professional reading, casual reading, watch a movie here and there, play a game.The first thing that I noticed was that the graphics were amazing. Crisp, clear pictures; clean lines, really gorgeous.  WiFi reception was much improved within my house, pages loaded faster than the IPad, so far so good.  Then I began running into some snags.  Amazon doesn't have the app we use for our company email (First Class), which was available on the IPad.  I am able to enter using a browser, but the site does not function as well.  I tried to access another company website and was met with "Error 500" codes when trying to login; again, not a problem I had on the IPad.  This one hurt, because I actually had to get in to do some work, so I had to kick my 15 year old off of his desktop to get into our company website (that was enjoyable for both of us).I did play one puzzle game and it was great-no hangups or lags; same with watching a movie.  I wish I could say that everything went well in this area, but I also ran into some snags.  Some games aren't available for the HDX, only the non-HDX versions of the Kindle, but are advertised by Amazon as "Available for Kindle".  It gets frustrating when you think you've found something, only to find its a non-compatible version.  If you go looking for games on popular sites like Big Fish or Google Play, you notice how far behind in the market Android is compared to IPad (I was schooled by a 7-year old in a rather know-it-all tone).So, is the Kindle the end-all-be-all? Well, it's nice, but not quite the workhorse/playhorse their ads make it seem.  I'm off to buy a laptop and will keep this around for reading and surfing.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Linda Rae
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with various different avenues to choose from. To read or listen to a book this is great.

Reviews.Title: A layman's perspective
Reviews.Author: mathew d herford
Reviews.Content: I am not knowledgeable about most gadgets, nor do I try to keep up with the latest trends in technology. I got this primarily for reading books while out of the house. I opted to go with the HDX because I dislike the later generations of the simple Kindles. The minimal button layout doesn't appeal to those of us with clunky fingers.The battery life is decent. I can surf the internet or read continuously all day without having to recharge it other than at night.The picture seems really good, but I am not picky with that sort of thing.E-book prices range from amazingly good to outrageously overpriced. Staying diligent, I am confident one could find a dozen books to read a month for less than $30.Overall, it's one of the best purchases I've ever made. I would recommend it to anyone who reads often and wants to read a lot on a limited budget.

Reviews.Title: all that  hoped for and more!
Reviews.Author: SUSAN JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: The pictures are way cool - lots you can doVery easy to use.  did have to return a cover...remember to look for HDX

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.  Glad this is my first tablet.
Reviews.Author: Keith Barber "Computer Geek"
Reviews.Content: It took me 3 months to choose from the different Kindle models.  Mostly I will use this for reading on a cruise.  The tipping point for me to choose this model was the rear facing 8 megapixel camera.  The fact that it was $40 off in a sale enticed me to get it.

Reviews.Title: Her Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Herb Reed
Reviews.Content: My wife likes it very much, it was a gift for her, the only problem she is having, she can not get on facebook, she has tried several times with no luck. Other than that she enjoys it alot

Reviews.Title: Great clarity of images
Reviews.Author: Holly S. Bedard "Holly"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is all that it claims in HD clarity. I love the portability and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Kelly L. Kreahling
Reviews.Content: i highly recommend the new 8.9 kindle hdx its very easy to use great display and steaming movies and tv is smooth no interruptions and battery life almost twice my old kindle

Reviews.Title: just love it... but man I miss not having the google play store
Reviews.Author: Felipe Amigo
Reviews.Content: There is really nothing to dislike about it, you just have to get used to the launcher (the way it is displayed in comparison to other Android devices).There are many apps that I can sideload, but there are some key one that I use with Google that I would love to use with the Kindle Fire, but it doesn't mean that I don't like it.It is really snappy, slim, great sound, lovely picture, great battery life and well ... just love it!

Reviews.Title: My KIndle Fire
Reviews.Author: CDF "luv2teach"
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I use it all the time.  I am glad this is what I chose because I find it easy to use. So far, no complaints.  I have had it for 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing in a way that makes it expensive.
Reviews.Author: W. Yee "WY"
Reviews.Content: One reason we bought the Kindle is to watch movies on Amazon Prime and have access to more recent movies that you pay for that are otherwise available only on DVD/Blu-Ray.  I believe that Amazon prime only is available on Ipads, computers, streaming boxes, smart TV's but definitely not on Android phones and tablets. The ipad, iPhone, and other I devices are not on my desired list.Amazon doesn't allow many Google apps to be installed such as maps, chrome, gmail (app) that work much better than the substitutes that are at their app store.  The browser app Silk they provide is really terrible.  When you use it to visit the Google search site, it really bogs down to almost not working.  If you use the Netflix app, it hardly works, just spins its wheels.What is disappointing about the Fire HDX is that I had expected the device to improve with time but it hasn't. It's on an island by itself with little reason to listen to its critics.  Though it is an Android device it doesn't take advantage of the large collection of great apps at the Android Play Store.  That makes it less than 2nd place if you consider Android and I devices to be 1 and 2 or 2 and 1.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the Kindle Fire HDX for its ability to do different apps and games. The Kindle Fire HDX is a great reading device.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kfo58
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the screen is amazing. I haven't watched any movies but so far I am loving the new Kindle

Reviews.Title: omg!  iT IS FANTASTIC.
Reviews.Author: Andy Zill
Reviews.Content: I'm in love with my Kindle, it is SO easy to use. I don't have problems with glitches, or freezing up. Set up was a complete breeze. Can hardly wait to see what Amazon can do with a smartphone!!!

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: john jamsion
Reviews.Content: lot easier to use then I had expected, I use it every day to keep track of whats coming up.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Kindle
Reviews.Author: Margarette White
Reviews.Content: This is a tablet anyone should want.  I would recommend this tablet to anyone.  I enjoy mine very much.ENJOY

Reviews.Title: HDX is beautiful but....
Reviews.Author: Kathryn L. Mcqueen "amazonwomyn"
Reviews.Content: Fast, clear & bright picture for sure.  But for the price, I believe an iPad is a better value.  The pull down screen was unresponsive in a protect case (required a MayDay call.)  I'm not much of a gamer, but the Kindle is perfect for Amazon.com prime, etc.  So I returned it and purchased the cheaper refurbished HD 8.9 Kindle and I'm very happy with it.  It meets all my needs, just isn't quite as fast processing.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Linda Locke
Reviews.Content: I had the 7 inch and traded up to this one.  I love being able to sit on my porch and surf the web.  The price and features are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 revue
Reviews.Author: Kary
Reviews.Content: I think it has good graphics,and is relatively easy to use. It holds it's charge well. I like that my reading material was transferred without my having to do anything

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Michael Norton
Reviews.Content: I have a 64 Gig Kindle and PRIME.  FREE Movies and TV.  Sweet!  I highly recommend them.  It's wonderful.  I bought them for myself.  Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great for non-techie users
Reviews.Author: Dean McCallum
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Kindle Fire.  She has had to contact them a number of times to figure out how to do some things, but better them than me.  I just got exasperated coming into a tech problem she would have and expected to fix it for her instantly.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marcy Chizmar
Reviews.Content: An awesome little machine.  So far it is one of the best purchases I have made.  I haven't even begun to know all of the things that it can do!

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First, I really like my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It does everything I need it to do, and it does it with clarity and speed.  I'm also very pleased with the screen and sound quality.  Thank you Amazon, well done!

Reviews.Title: Size and weight fantastic
Reviews.Author: jennifer hibb
Reviews.Content: Was very pleased with the quality of the product, it met all my expectations. It is really an improvement on the kindle fire, I use it mainly for reading and have no complaint. It was really worth the money I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: I am extremely happy
Reviews.Author: Arline Declue "babywaif"
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. Fast and easy to download. The only exception I have is I cannot download my music from my computer. I guess you have to pay, and pay

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet
Reviews.Author: wrdrichard
Reviews.Content: I have played this tablet for some time. I'm pleased with it.It's screen is very perfect.The fire os can be used very well.But I'm not satisfied with the used time of the battery .If the used time can be longer,I think the tablet is very very perfect.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Jaci Black
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my fire. I experience  absolutely  no eye strain when reading for several hours. I chose this over the ipad and I am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 HDX Display, Wi-Fi 64GB
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: This Tablet exceeded my expectation. I use this tablet more than I uses the I-Pad due to it being just as clear, but more GB"sI feels that it's the best on the market for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: rosarioit
Reviews.Content: Good quality. The kindle fire is a good device. There should be more products available. Probably having more choice would be better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: NorGY
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my Mom.  She is in her 70's. She loves to read and loves word games.  She cant put it down!!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Cole
Reviews.Content: After purchasing the HD's for my granddaughters, I was so impressed that I decided to purchase the HDX for myself.  I wanted the HDX mainly for the camera.  I am able to put my photos from my phone and my computer on to the Kindle, using Amazon Cloud.  It's great!  Very lightweight.  (The only thing I was discouraged with was that I couldn't load my favorite game - PopCats - apparently it's not compatible.  No big deal.  I'm not a game-playing person but I like playing it on the HD so hoped I could also play it on the HDX.)

Reviews.Title: #1 product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Radar999
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews for several months I decided to get this tablet.  Glad I did.  Very light, Mayday is great, tried it once to see if it worked as advertised.  Great product.  Amazon is great!

Reviews.Title: What could have been an excellent tablet, spoilt by minor niggles.
Reviews.Author: John Shorter
Reviews.Content: I bought my Kindle on the strength of favourable reviews I had seen, particularly the praise for sound quality.  Well, the quality may be acceptable, with earphones, but the volume is certainly not.  Other annoying features are that the contents, and features, of Skype, and Facebook do not match those on my desktop.  Particularly annoying is being unable to delete Skype contacts. The facility is there, but, it does not work!  A box appears, asking if you want to delete the contact, but clicking on it does nothing.  I have reloaded Skype twice recently, so have the latest version, it still does not work.  With the Facebook app, contacts are not listed alongside the home page, as on the desktop version.  Another minor annoyance is inconsistent loading time.  On some occasions it can take minutes, from switching on, others it "wakes up" instantly.

Reviews.Title: learning the tablet
Reviews.Author: marcias1
Reviews.Content: Coming off a sony e reader it is taking me a while to master the functions on the kindle.  The one function i find poor is that when no wifi is available and you have to use a usb port to transfer books from your computer to your device.  The steps are tedious and require to many processes to accomplish a single function. With the sony reader it was done in  2 steps whereas amazon you need several steps and if one is not computer knowledgeable it appears to be very complcated;

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Evan Fournaris
Reviews.Content: We consulted Consumer Reports and found that this product was highly rated anda Best Buy. It has certainly lived up to its reputation. Great display and flexibility.We also had rave reviews from friends who own this product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: David Orrino
Reviews.Content: This device is becoming my right hand.  I always have it around.  I don't do a lot of gaming but I use it for Internet access, reading books,  mail, calendar, almost everything.  I'm almost never on my PC anymore.  The only problem I have with this device, and it is not  a problem with the Kindle is that Evernote will not work properly on it.  I am a heavy Evernote user and Evernote works on my PC and iOS devices but it corrupts my notes on my Kindle.  Evernote support is silent.  Amazon has been helpful but this is an Evernote issue.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Marhanka
Reviews.Content: I've had this for several weeks now, and while I haven't had the chance to use it as much as I had intended, it has been quite pleasurable when I have used it.  The screen looks amazing, everything is nice and responsive.  It was also a pleasure to open it, as has been my experience with many Amazon products, things packed very thoughtfully.  My only complaint thus far has been with the Apps, in that some basic things I expected to have easy access to I do not, such as Youtube.

Reviews.Title: really love my new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: The new 8.9 Kindle Fire HDX is outstanding. The display clarity is outstanding. This is a versatile tablet with a very strong battery unlike previous tablets I have owned. I would recommend it over other tablets including the IPAD. It is an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: AniaNY
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and by far the best one. It is lighter than the previous version, has collection for my books - HD does not have, even ed n I can take pictures. The main reason I bought was for books and the internet; however, there are much more options with HDX.

Reviews.Title: A great way to catch up with the rest of the 21st century.
Reviews.Author: glen barry banks
Reviews.Content: An amazing device that pretty much does away with the need for a home computer in most cases. It can be murder on your phone bill but it makes up for it with so many different uses.

Reviews.Title: don't expect help when you have problems
Reviews.Author: Nancy Lister
Reviews.Content: I asked for help through the May day button on my Kindle.  The Lady became upset with me and when we ended the help session, she reset my Kindle to the default settings.  I lost all of the movies and tv shows I had downloaded.  I once again accessed the May day button, I was told that the representAtive had not ever heard of that happening before therefore she could not help me with that problem

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carol Elaine
Reviews.Content: My daughter has a Book Nook and tried talking me into getting one instead of the Kindle because of the price.  After a lot of research and comparison sites, I chose the KIndle and never looked back.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: S. Luna "Luna"
Reviews.Content: I have not had this long enough to truly say its all wonderful. However what I have experienced so far has been Great! The help line has been wonderful. I am not a gadget person & was on the fence about getting one. I went to the local store that carries them & I tried them all. Hands down this one was the only one I could pick up & make work. I knew we could be friends! Thanks for having such an easy to use product & are willing to help me on the spot with your help button. Love it! This product has exceeded my expectations & I am thrilled I picked the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from 7in.
Reviews.Author: Paul S. Kent
Reviews.Content: Larger screen is nice.  Still trying to figure out some of the operations. Battery life is less than I expected.

Reviews.Title: The HDX is AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Peggy T. "Pegs Quest"
Reviews.Content: This is actually my third Kindle.  I purchased the Kindle Fire 7" initially, thinking that it would be everything I ever wanted.  But then the bigger one came out and was HD so I purchased it.  (I gave the other one to my husband and it works well for his needs.)  Again, I thought the HD 9" Kindle would be all I needed and loved it, but then the HDX came out and had even more capabilities that I could use.  One of the most important reasons why I bought the HDX is because it is thinner and weighs less than the Kindle HD.  The picture/screen is more resilient and the other driving reason I bought it is because of the camera - not just a front facing one (which is an app on the HD camera) but is a real camera with zoom and video and other capabilities.  The one main issue that is somewhat of a negative however is that nowhere does it tell you that if you want to watch a movie by connecting to the TV, you have to purchase an additional 'unit' (I spent $60 for it).  I thought that the 'adapter' I bought for the Kindle HD would work just fine - but no, it is entirely incompatible with the HDX!  Bottom line - the HDX is awesome - just do your research and get all the needed components along with it.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet....
Reviews.Author: johwalty
Reviews.Content: After reviewing many different tablets, I found myself most interested in the Kindle Fire HDX with the larger 8.9" screen. Not totally knowing what to expect, I also took advantage of the free 30 day Prime trial along with my order. I found the Kindle well made, very user friendly, and offering all the content advertised. The sound is very good and videos are a pleasure to watch. I would recommend this highly.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Judy Grace Hanning
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS TABLET! Clear picture, fast, great design, easy to download, sleek design, big enough to read but not to big to hold. GLAD I ordered it!

Reviews.Title: finally gave in to temptation
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Higgins
Reviews.Content: Finally gave in and bought Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. omg I am loving it. Works wonderful right out of the box. Love I can download many of my prime movies to watch while traveling. Great for ready and the resolution is so easy on the eyes. So glad I gave in to temptation.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Heather Watts
Reviews.Content: love it....great price,  if you have any problems you call right from your kindle.  But you won't have any!!!Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: CWN
Reviews.Content: Strong 5 star rating for product and service. I love it. I wouldn't leave home without it. Easily portable. Beautiful screen and features. Super fast. Just love it is about all I can say.

Reviews.Title: neat tablet
Reviews.Author: carl gauntt
Reviews.Content: Good tablet.would be better with a 10 inch screen.no complaints.real thin and light. Key board is very responsive. Nice bright screen.

Reviews.Title: My rating on the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Barbara Luckenbill
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kindle Fire HDX and the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I do not know the full potential of it as yet. I am very much still in the learning process. When I become for familiar with it, it will probably rate the other star.

Reviews.Title: Best Investment Ever
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I enjoy reading and this table is the best for down loading books and ext. books view was really good, I didn’t want it to put the device down. you'll enjoy it buy it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: janice
Reviews.Content: I love it . it is easy to use. takes nice picture , can take it with me . the size is perfect . i can fit it in my bag. the price was great as well. the special offers do not brother me at the least.

Reviews.Title: Day to Day Routine
Reviews.Author: P. Patterson "Pannp"
Reviews.Content: This has become such a big part of my day to day routine!  I LOVE my Kindle Fire.  This has been integrated into just about every aspect of my day to day life.  I use it for watching tutorial on cooking while cooking in the kitchen, I use it for a quick search on the internet, reading, listening to music, shopping for deals on Amazon (lol).  I rarely turn on my laptop when I am at home because of my Kindle. It is lightweight, the perfect size, long battery life, brilliant color, and the price it pretty decent.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle For Streaming Video Yet
Reviews.Author: Steele Magnolia
Reviews.Content: Pros (compared to previous model kindles):1. Longer battery life2. Lightweight for the size3. Lots of great apps4. Easy video streaming (network apps, NETFLIX, YOUTUBE, etc)5. Faster CPU response times than previous models6. Larger storage capacity7. Better internet browser8. Louder and clearer soundCons:1. Amazon Fire Video app - THERE STILL ISN'T ONE!I love this new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and am glad that I bought it. For the price it was a great deal, comparable if a bit smaller in size than my husband's iPad and considerably less expensive. It has all the functionality I wanted and I'm glad that I got it. I will recommend this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX versus Samsung Pro Tab 10.1
Reviews.Author: William H. Weller
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of Kindle and E-books, but I also wanted a tablet. I decided to replace my older Kindle with a Kindle Fire HDX WiFi only. I liked the size, weight, and the brilliant display, but the browser, speed, and app utility didn't meet my expectations. I'll admit that I'm spoiled with my Samsung Galaxy 4s smart phone and the Android OS. The familiarity of the Android system was a bit too much for the Kindle Fire HDX to overcome, and I returned it after frustration with some apps I wanted to use. I replaced the Kindle with the Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 WiFi only. It's just the right size, has a brilliant screen, and has all the familiar Android features. The battery life is good and audio levels are adequate. All my favorite apps are downloaded and working. If you're looking for an E-reader with some browser capabilities, the Kindle Fire HDX may be just fine. But if you're looking for a more functional tablet, keep looking. As a side note, the Amazon return policy and my new order for the Galaxy worked flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is the best of all!
Reviews.Author: Virginia K Glass
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazing. Takes great pictures. Sound is wonderful Love the size. Buy it you will be so happy you did.

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I would have given it five-stars but nobody walks on water.  I listen to music; I watch video; I surf the Net, and I still get to read all my Kindle purchases.  JB

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle.... but...
Reviews.Author: drbrent
Reviews.Content: I got this for everything it does... but one deal breaker for me so far has been a very low quality audio out connection.  I have tried every headphone and audio cable I have and cannot get a halfway respectable audio transmission from the kindle fire hdx to my speakers or other devices with an mp3 player input on them.  I'm really not happy about this.  They are shipping me a new one to see if it will work better but I've seen online customer reviews (after I purchased of course) that claim widespread problems with the audio out functionality.  I really don't want to have to purchase an iPad or a Galaxy...  I want a Kindle darn it all.*****  Update  *****The replacement kindle fire hdx was an improvement... must have been a bad unit I received at first.  Still, the audio is not as good as a dedicated mp3 player, but it is not too bad.  Overall, I'm happy with my Kindle.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great reader
Reviews.Author: Harry Weidlich
Reviews.Content: Love the added utility comparable to I-pad. It's handy light weight and size makes it a great device. Also. I carry my whole library with me wherever I go!

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 tablet is beyond super!!
Reviews.Author: Fred Bolanda
Reviews.Content: I'm a long time customer that has previously had all the Kindle Fire versions. Bought the HDX because I wanted an IPAD style camera among other things. I got the HDX a week ago and it has blown me away. First of all, the weight is so light and also the battery is great. I played a video with the brightness all the way up and I got like ten hours with the WIFI off(the WIFI drains a lot of battery by the way so keep it off if your not on the web). The screen resolution is like BLURAY quality but also a great tip is that if you're watching an SD video, put it at least five feet from you and the brightness all the way up and it's very close to HD quality. It's very smooth and fast when scrolling around the screen. Love that they finally included a rapid charger. Nothing bad to say but are a couple of things they could improve on but are really minor. If you want a tablet with a great movie experience, there is no other better tablet on the market!!! Amazon rules!!!!

Reviews.Title: Buggy so far - please help!
Reviews.Author: J. Sembower "JS"
Reviews.Content: I just got the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for my birthday, as I'm upgrading from a 1st Gen iPad.  I want to love this thing, but so far, the experience has not been what I've expected from Amazon.Within a few hours of receiving the unit:1. Became unusable (froze) multiple times.2. Discovered that the readily available Economist App for Android doesn't exist on the Mojito platform.3. the WSJ app is buggy (crashed twice)4. Downloaded the Kindle Fire HDX update - hoping that would solve my issues, but did not help.5. Learned that the top back of the unit gets super hot when operating normally.Things I like:1. Email - works great.2. X-ray for Music - super cool.3. Books - awesome.4. Text to Speech - Even awesome-er.I'd love for someone to reach out and help me make my experience better.  I don't want to return the unit, but so far my experience isn't what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Tai Pan
Reviews.Content: I expected a very good Tablet , but what I got was beyond what I expected....Wonderful HD resolution , easy on the eyes , over 1000,000 apps , but I need only about 25 , and only use about 10.......The Direct Help Link, nothing can describe the Usefulness of this App , a big winner..........I'm glad I upgraded from the 7" HDX.......So much lighter and easier to handle for a 9 inch tablet......

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Charlie Robertson
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. It does everything I experienced. There is a learning curve with it but that is not a big problem. It is quite simular to my smartphone but does handle things a little differently. Most of the differences are improvements. I'm still learning but love it.

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: happy happycustomer
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Tablet.  I really can't stop smiling, when I think about. It is lightweight.  The sound and picture quality is first rate. I love this Kindle !

Reviews.Title: Works nicely but I wish I had made the purchase 12 hours later!
Reviews.Author: R. Groh
Reviews.Content: Just missed the big price reduction by less than a day!  Bummer.  Oh, well - the gift recipient loves it and my son (who owns an iPad) even complimented me on my good choice so the important stuff is ok.  It does have a fantastic screen and works well overall.  We added a protective case for a finishing touch. Gradually learning the new 'tablet' ways!  We have used the 'MayDay' function twice and that works well.  Audio is a bit anemic (not a biggie). We'll add an external keyboard (maybe) - for now, the onscreen keyboard is getting the job done.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Paul Willson
Reviews.Content: Works great! love the "Mayday" feature.. Great Screen very vivid! Great value love the screen colors  internet works great and my email is right there.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I spent weeks researching tablets.  I already owned a Galaxy 10.1 (wife's).  So considering what I wanted to use the tablet for, read books, email, a little web surfing, watching movies and tv shows while on the road and a few games, I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It's been fantastic.  Operates flawlessly.  Very fast.  I have Dish Network and using the Dish anywhere app I can a access all my recorded shows or watch live tv.  The device has a beautiful screen and great sound.  But the feature I love the most is the Mayday button!  This feature takes away all the frustration that comes with learning to use a new device.  I would recommend this device to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Laura Korte
Reviews.Content: The Kindle replaces another tablet.  The Kindle is superior in it's display.  I love it's size and everything I did with the previous tablet can be done with the Kindle and then some.  I would definitely recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: LOve this Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: R. Olson "Randy2u"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing not to like on this Kindle.  It's fast, has a long battery life, works for surfing, reading, games, and some light writing duties.  I keep getting surprised with the nifty features!

Reviews.Title: Silk Browser Stinks
Reviews.Author: Oannas
Reviews.Content: A nice product if you don't mind being bumped off the Internet every 10 minutes. Even after buying a new docsis 3 modem, I still lose my connection just as frequently with the Silk browser. The problem persists even after Amazon sent replacement Kindles (one of which was a refurbished model that also turned off just as often).

Reviews.Title: Got it last Christmas and I love it
Reviews.Author: Robin Stone
Reviews.Content: I have the first Kindle fire and this newer HDX 8.9, if you have the cash spend the money on the 8.9 its a great laptop replacement. The color and speed is excellent.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 camera will not work correctly in the two cases we purchased from Amazon.
Reviews.Author: xraylarry
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this for my wife.  I would love to give this 5 stars. But, there is a problem with the camera that Kindle knows about and has not fixed.  It was my wife's 50th birthday, and the first thing I wanted to show her was how to use the camera.  We had bought a new Finite Amazon Folio Case and the DigitalsOnDemand 12 item accessory bundle. When the Kindle Fire is in the case and you turn on the camera, there is a message in the middle of the screen that says "slide the kindle up." It stays there the whole time. This is a problem Kindle should easily be able to solve.  In fact there is a work around but you have to do it each time you turn the Kindle off.  Why?  It seems they are forcing you to buy the case that they sell.I will update this rating when Amazon fixes this problem.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: elliott
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my needs of a lightweight tablet. Clear and sharp picture, easy to use and quick internet response.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I use it almost exclusively for reading, the quality of the 'printed' page is great, crisp and easy to see/read.  I have recommended it to many people.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It arrived on the date that it was expected.  She opened it when she got home from work and started charging it and started checking the books that she had bought while she was waiting for it.  She loved it.

Reviews.Title: Myh newest one
Reviews.Author: Avid Kindle Reader
Reviews.Content: I have not figured it all out yet, but I am working on it.  It will be great when I get it all figured out. This is my sixth Kindle and I love all of them.  My favorites are the larger ones since I read so fast.  Buy it and try it.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9" hdx,Wi-Fi,16 GB- includes special offers
Reviews.Author: Nancy Norris
Reviews.Content: I love the size of this HDX but ....it doesn't have flash there's a lot of thing's I can't watch. With my old fire I didn't have that problem. The color is great when you look at pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I like that it was real easy to start using it right out of the box. the game graphics are superb.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This one is worth the cost and more. Very fast and the graphics are outstanding. So far I have absolutely no complaints. My other Kindle is the Kindle Fire HD,  32 GB and it works just fine but was a little too heavy for my small hands and was getting slow because of all the books I had on it but overall a really good reader. Now I have the best. I can't wait till they release a new Kindle with double the GB's.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: Bible Thumper
Reviews.Content: Ok So some say that it is not Good for an office tool. But they must have more demands for there office than I do. Let me say though that the arguments about it not having a good office suite are false. I live by my office suit and I love the one that I have one my Kindle Fire HDX. You can get Polaris Office, King Soft Office and several others that will allow full editing of documents, Spread Sheets and Power Points. No, it is not like Microsoft Office, nor can it be. A tablet of any kind simply does not have the capacity to operate such a monster of a program. But the features and abilities of a good office app on the Kindle are nothing to sneeze at. The idea that the Kindle is a toy is anything but accurate. I have no games or movies on my K.F.HDX and just a few books. It is filled with stuff for work... that is what I got it for. I am able to transfer data back home when I am in Russia, I can do anything I need to in my documents and spreadsheets. Great Map apps, Calendars, Database apps, transfer of old docs to Kindle, Cloud apps, Bible apps, Email, Notebooks, Calculators, unit converters and other office tools, the list goes on and on. The only thing I can figure is that either some people demand more than a man who has an office in the states and has to access it overseas, or they did not spend much time looking for an app that did there job right. Oh, and most of my apps were free.

Reviews.Title: Fast with endless apps!
Reviews.Author: Teacher in Ohio "mt"
Reviews.Content: I like the speed in which web pages load as well as the clear, sharp pictures and video. In the classroom my kindle has become an invaluable asset.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: ms000000 "ms000000"
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear high resolution display easy to read.....and I read a LOT!  I like the convenience of being able to check email and browse the web as well.

Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: lemkemichael
Reviews.Content: I have had laptops that are not this fast. I have yet to have any issues with the kindle fire HDX. Sound is great, battery lasts all day.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is excellent in it's design and concept
Reviews.Author: History Buff
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a super high resolution screen, is well designed and fits my purpose for having a tablet like a glove. The set-up was so simple, it's a dream. Gone are the requirements to struggle with all kinds of questions and techno jingle, a few tabs and one is set up. Simply great.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Nora C. Mccormick
Reviews.Content: I replaced a first generation Kindle with the Kindle Fire after comparing it with other devices.  I picked the Kindle because it best met my needs.  I love being able to access my email from anywhere.  And, of course, reading books is really nice.  The display is crisp and wit the larger screen I feel like I am reading faster.  I love the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: This Kindle Fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sasquatch
Reviews.Content: I really am crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  What amazes me is how fast it is.  I setup my apps and subscriptions so much faster and simpler than I did with other devices.  When I took it out of the box, there is a quick start guide which I used to hook up the charger, and I began running it while it was charging up the battery.  When I tested my video apps such as Netflix,Hulu Plus,Epix and HBO GO, I was surprised at how fluid the motion pictures were.  Also they were in HD.  I downloaded some of my Kindle books that were stored in the cloud, and that was quick.  There seems to be so much that can be done with this that I have yet to find out.  I like the fact that the user manual is installed on the device for easy access, and there is a "mayday" button to talk with a live customer service rep to walk me through any problems if I should have need to.  Physically this Kindle fire is very thin and light, which makes it easy to handle and transport.  I have yet to use the camera, which I'm sure will be a blast if it is anything like the other functions.  This is well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet !!!
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Its so beautiful! I have always wanted a bigger screen than my phone to play games and watch the news from apps. I recently got rid of my cable. Saved over 1 hundred  dollars.

Reviews.Title: best kindle
Reviews.Author: EVELYN GARCIA
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE, IT IS MUCH BETTER THAN THE OTHER KINDLE(not that the other is bad) BUT THIS ONE I ENJOY MUCH MORE.KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 YEAH!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ryan Modares
Reviews.Content: GOOD!!! IT'S AWESOME YOU SHOULD BUY JUST MARVELOUS MAGNIFICENT I AM RUNNING OUT OF WORDS.........OH NOOOOO GOOD BYE #YOLO #SWAG

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley McNabb
Reviews.Content: Love!!!

Reviews.Title: The FIRE display.
Reviews.Author: Barney GM "barney"
Reviews.Content: It is an good display and is intuitive in use.  A improvement over the Kindle that I had before my wife captured it.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get my hands off!
Reviews.Author: Jack Lim
Reviews.Content: I got this a day ago and its switch on and start surfing for books and videos! It logs-on to my home wifi immediately and after input of password, it starts working! Great piece of tablet! Yeah!

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Susan Burkey
Reviews.Content: i gave as a gift and she love it so much she is no longer using her phone thank you i can Skype her now

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Fire, HDX.  Had a question when I first got it and had immediate help from Amazon.  The books are a joy to read - so crystal clear - and games and videos are bright and eye-catching.  Had a friend pick it up to take a peek and his first reaction was "Whoa"!  That about says it all.

Reviews.Title: Can't stop using it
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX it is perfect I find i'm reading more and even on the web with it. I can watch movies any where that has wi-fi. It doesn't glare badly at all I just had it outside with me on a beautiful sunny day and it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: aimrehab
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use all the capabilities, I love what I've mastered so far. So much easier at times to use rather than pulling out my laptop. I was reading all my Kindle books on my phone and it so much easier to read on the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: parrington43
Reviews.Content: This is so much lighter than the 1st generation Fire. The screen is bigger but it's lighter! Same apps available, same fast charging, same quality. The only thing I am not sure about is the Silk Browser. Flash does not work with Silk and when available, you are prompted to use an "experimental" player. Some videos just will not play on this format. Too bad. Am hoping they are working on this.

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: As a long time Kindle owner, I looked forward to a larger version for better readability for magazines and maybe videos and I wasn't disappointed.  This size is perfect to hold and read and large enough for watching videos, unbelievably sharp screen, good sound and connects easily to Wifi.. It has a "learning curve" but not too difficult for most, lots of nice features, holds a long charge, camera is useful and O.K. I would have liked a detailed hard copy users manual instead of the quickie "how to charge and turn on" starter guide.  All in all, impressive, awesome and I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sandra Campbell
