Reviews.Author: Klaus D. Kracht
Reviews.Content: very nice compact unit,easy to use, quick access.need to become more conversant with its use to comment further at a future date

Reviews.Title: NICE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Xin Liang
Reviews.Content: The delivery was so fast. This is a nice tablet especially because of the high definition of the screen. I'm really into it. However, it does not last as long as iPad Air in terms of the battery. Anyway, I'm still recommending it to you because overall it is still fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Reading a book?  This goes UP so many levels...
Reviews.Author: Michelangelo Jack
Reviews.Content: From the moment I recharged this amazingly slim e-tablet and switched iton, I was impressed with the brilliant colours and clarity of the screen.  Soeasy to Register, adjust the date/time zone and load up the Flightradar24program, up and running within a very short time.  Downloaded a book frommy computer main Kindle Library in seconds, no fuss and now reading abook just got that so much more exciting, all over again.  Thanks Amazon.From time of order, it was in my hands in New Zealand in three days.Now, I wonder why I cannot order the protection cover/case?  For some reasonAmazon will not ship to NZ?  What is that about?

Reviews.Title: From laptops and hard back books, to HDX!
Reviews.Author: buckIinTX
Reviews.Content: I was totally against owning a tablet until I used a friend's kindle. After that, I had to own one. The rest is history! Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow! What a Kindle
Reviews.Author: David J. Crosby
Reviews.Content: This thing is really something. I think I like this one better than my old keyboard kindle, which is still holding my 90 some books. it is without a doubt far better than my HD which did not perform that well on a cruise in Australia.  The video is incredible and the speed is up way there.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: newmom15
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire is great. Light weight and bright screen! Battery holds charge and last long. Would definitely recommend it to others!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Davis
Reviews.Content: Was exactly what I wanted and the price was well worth it, it opened a whole new world for me

Reviews.Title: purchased for my wife as a valentines present
Reviews.Author: Pistol Pete
Reviews.Content: it is registered in her name now.  She loves it.  Only problem is, she had games on my kindle firethat were keeping score in my name, and when she registered her new HDX she had to startall over again.

Reviews.Title: highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Lori Freer
Reviews.Content: Had two other tablets that had issues.  This is easy to use a perfect size and I love it.  I take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre 8.9
Reviews.Author: Karen Brandt
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  THis is the 6th kindle fire that I have purchased.  You could say I am Kindle POOR!!

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kathy A Williams
Reviews.Content: I am able to do so much with my kindle.  I download articles now and save them for later. I love watching movies on my larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle. it works for just what I need which is the internet and my kindle books. I'm sure it does way more than I know how to do but I just mainly use it to read on.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Thomas Keane
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX.  I have been looking and comparing similar products for more than a year.  I have an ipad and it  OK for some of the applications that I use.  Kndle leaves the ipad and Nook in the dust when comparing the full pontential of each.  I am very pleaed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Arilisa Heredia
Reviews.Content: My only real criticism is it's lack of customization.  I'd like to add my own lock screen wallpaper and control what pops up in the carousel.  Aside from this though, I am in love with my kindle!  I would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves reading!

Reviews.Title: BEATS ANY TABLET OUT THERE
Reviews.Author: alzera morrison
Reviews.Content: It's the best electronic of its kind.  The mayday feature is awesome!!! To think if I need help I don't ever have to hear again, "due to high call volume your call will be answered in 1 hour."!!!!! Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Enjoy very much
Reviews.Author: Judy Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: I like the larger screen, I can take pictures. The picture is so much clearer. I t is not as heavy as my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: We love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Budge
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less than a week, both of my kids fight over who gets to use this new Kindle Fire instead of our iPad.  It's really fast and the picture quality is amazing.  And best of all...NO ITUNES!  I was a little concerned before buying this about not having access to Google Apps.  However, most apps were available through the Amazon App store.  Other things, like Google Maps, was available in it's full version using the Silk browser, which is really fast as well.  And if you really need an app you can't find in the Amazon App store, there are simple ways to get your apps from Google without needing to root your device.  Just search online...it's really easy.The only thing this tablet is missing that I can find is the lack of a GPS.  But for $170 less than an iPad, and for a faster processor and better display than almost any other tablet on the market, I can live without a GPS.  For the record, we are streaming videos to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and an iPad at the same time using the Corsair Voyager Air.  It works flawlessly on both devices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Hardware. Wish...
Reviews.Author: Roberto Fonseca
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is an excellent tablet. No doubt. FireOS 3.1 is also very polished OS. When tying it onto the Prime membership, it makes it a winning combination. There are a few reasons why I can't give 5 stars to this Kindle:1. No Google integration - Yes, I know what everyone else will say. If you really want that you should've bought either Google hardware or go with Samsung, etc. Sure, you're right. But no, that doesn't mean Google integration should not be part of the package. What happened if Google decided not to support any Amazon app (and just removed them all from Play store)? I wish Amazon would just allow Google apps in and let the market decide who they want to go with. Again, this hardware is just plain beautiful.2. Problem with speakers - Within the first few weeks I had a problem with speakers where they just stopped working.After reaching out to Mayday (awesome service, Amazon!) the service person suggested that I would insert/remove headphone jack and see if that would fix the issue. It did immediately. The person went on to say that it was a known issue and product development was working on it. I just wish there was some communication/fix on the issue already.Overall this is a great device. I am still enjoying it very much and look forward to updates to the ecosystem. I hope Amazon continues developing both software and hardware.

Reviews.Title: Stunning pics! Gotta have more Apps!!!
Reviews.Author: Gilda M. Kantey
Reviews.Content: Love it. Pics are amazing. Need more apps and compatibility with other systems. I do love it though and would recommend but with the app and compatibility caveat.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love IT
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, especially for kids with all the controls that are available.  Love mine and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: A very nice pad
Reviews.Author: Kindle reader
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is a joy to use.  It's lighter and about half the thickness of my wife's iPad.  The quad-core processor makes everything fast.  Screen resolution is very sharp.  I like the home screen and the presentation of frequently used apps.  I am very pleased with the purchase.  One a side note, the Send to Kindle software on my PC is very useful to send documents to the Kindle for my schoolwork.

Reviews.Title: It's a nice step up
Reviews.Author: Rashelley "rashelley the reader"
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It's more responsive, gives much better information as you are reading, easier to make changes in format.  I love the help chat option.  Only problem is this one freezes and it's quite a challenge to get the pages to move.  I've mastered it, but it never happened on earlier, simpler models.  I do recommend it though.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fir HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy Matthie "ravenous reader"
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle.  The first one had a small problem, so it was returned for a new one.  Those were the large Kindles, before Kindle Fire came out.  I still use that one at home for reading for long stretches...large screen.  My third Kindle is a Kindle Fire, which I can stick in my purse for taking to appointments, or when I travel.  My HDX is perfect for watching movies and videos, which since I subscribed to PRIME, I use very frequently.  Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: awso.e
Reviews.Author: Patricia J. Matthews
Reviews.Content: It's like a mini computer....this is my 3rd Kindle and I am in love:) office work, movies, tv, music and games. Wow!!!

Reviews.Title: Who needs Mayday?
Reviews.Author: jp! "Brisket City"
Reviews.Content: Flawless, flawless, flawless.  I would imagine many Amazon employees worked overtime on this and they all need to be congratulated for an outstanding product.  I think history will show that Amazon is providing us now with a "golden age" that we are fortunate to have.  Well done.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire  HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J. Galambos
Reviews.Content: The best!  It has everything I need .  Fits in my brief case and goes where I go.  It is great!!!@!

Reviews.Title: After the first 24 hours, it appears to be a solid tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 32MB 4G LTE (Verizon) version, and after the first 24 hours I'm very pleased.  Connecting to my WiFi was simple and without problems.  Adding the device to my existing Verizon account did require my calling Verizon's tech support, but that's probably because I live out from town and wasn't getting a strong enough signal.  However, Verizon tech support was very helpful and quickly resolved the problem.  There was also a glitch connecting to my email account on my ISP, but that seems to have been a problem at their end, and has been resolved.  Connecting to my Gmail account was seamless.I've found the frequent complaint of not enough apps (compared to as standard Android) to be a non issue for me.  I've had no problem finding the apps I need and want, or acceptable replacements in cases where the ones I'm use to aren't available.It would be nice if the HDX came with Google maps/navigator installed, but I have that on my phone, so it's not a big issue.  Besides Map Quest maps/navigation is free at the Kindle app store.  It may not be quite up to Google maps, but then again, maybe it is.  I really haven't an opportunity to try it yet.All in all, I'm pleased with my device, and I'm giving it 4 stars only because I've only had it for one day.=======================  Comments added on 2/27/2014 ==================================================I'm now two weeks into owning my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 (Verizon), and I've added another star to my rating to make it a 5-star rating.  I stand by all my comments above, and would like to add that I find the management and use of my Kindle library so much easier with this tablet than with my old (Gen. 3, I think) Kindle.  With this device I get to see the cover of the book I'm reading each time I open it on the carrousel, so I can remember the name of the book I'm reading.  On my old Kindle, I usually only saw the title and author when I first started reading and quickly forgot both (hey, I'm 70 years old).I've installed Waze navigation app, and it works very well - not that I will use my tablet often for navigation, but it's nice to have.Like most, if not all, Android based tablets, it doesn't get as strong a 4G or 3G signal as my Android phone, but I'm usually connected to WiFi, so that's not particularly important to me, which I'm sure begs the question of why did I buy a 4G model to begin with.  The answer is simple - I wanted to.All in all I find the Kindle Fire HDX far superior to my wife's Android tablet, and I'm very pleased with it.  So far, I've found no down side.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, fast with beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I gave the Kindle Fire HDX 4 stars because of not having access to Google Play Store for even more apps. The "plus" is you are allowed to install apps from 3rd parties via a selection in the setting menu. I sometimes have the need to remote in to our servers at work using RDP. I can do that with the Kindle Fire HDX. I tried several RDP apps available through Amazon and the results weren't satisfactory. I got an app from a 3rd party and now I seamlessly access the servers I need to get to and can even access my workstation desktop. I added a bluetooth keyboard and am very happy with my choice of the Kindle. Great video and graphics. As an e-book reader? Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Never Pristine condition.
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle amazon has ever made.  It looks beautiful in the box.  No wear and tear.  Only open use but had bad luck getting to work.  Since it is the best that amazon has ever made I bought it with confidence.  They sure made it sound really like something every one would love.  Guess it was a big mistake to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Lou Neff
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly.  Have had to use help once or twice and it has been a very good experience.  Recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Had a nook, love this one so much more.. Easy to read and just better all the way around. So glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. Gartz "Padigar"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for myself for Christmas and so far have enjoyed learning what all it offers. Once my husband saw how easy it is to maneuver through it, he’s ready to buy one for himself. Love all the deals Amazon offers for Kindle owners.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX - GREAT
Reviews.Author: Betty Furgele
Reviews.Content: Made a mistake - was rating the armorsuit for the kindle fire instead of the kindle fire.  But anyhow I love the Kindle Fire HDX and would recommend it to anyone.  Picture is beautiful, sound great, light weight.  Lighter than the 7" ipad.  Wish now I had gotten the one with the ability to sync to your internet provider.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day.  Love it.
Reviews.Author: Hilary B. Wagner "Hilary"
Reviews.Content: I also have an IPAD and an IPAD mini.  It's about the same size as the IPAD and weighs much less.  The display is the same and it has flash.  What's not to love.  Also, the battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Georgeen M. Ibarra
Reviews.Content: My second kindle and I love it. Great display, easy to read, quick to recharge and so light.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Wendy S Leishman
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this so my husband could get into this century and learn to use a touchscreen! But now I find myself getting the Kindle whenever I want to look something up online instead of using my laptop. It's the perfect size, not too big not too small. It's fast and responsive. I only locked it up once and it was the game not the unit.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Steven D Spatz
Reviews.Content: Beautiful colors, clear images, very fast processor...This is much better than my IPAD-2 in every way.  I will be traveling with my Kindle Fire instead of my IPAD this year.

Reviews.Title: Fire away
Reviews.Author: Joan Duclow
Reviews.Content: Priced right and far more useful than I expected. I have no problem telling my friends to skip the pricey "big brand" and by a Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: excellent tab
Reviews.Author: scott d poort
Reviews.Content: Screen res. Fast.ease of use.the only reason not 5 stars is not used to amazon app store.very very good.whats next

Reviews.Title: great. product
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: Very easy to figure out even for the technologically impaired. Crisp picture. Good battery life. Mayday feature is very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX is Hot!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth V. Jack "Ken Jack"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet or portable device, but my wife has an iPad4.  I found the iPad4 overpriced for my needs and it is heavy compared to the Fire HDX 8.9" tablet.  As most rave about in these reviews, I agree the screen display is superior on the HDX and it is faster.  I suppose there are users that can actually use many of the missing apps that the iPad offers but I can't.I trust Amazon to enhance the Fire HDX as time goes on.  The Flash player or something equivalent would be a great addition.For me, a portable device, like a tablet, will never replace a "real" computer.  I chose the Fire HDX because I'm a big reader of eBooks and I think Amazon has the edge on Apple with regard to the number and price of their eBooks.I have had my HDX for two months and have no complaints;  I recommend this device without reservations.TBlue Moon over Cuba: Aerial Reconnaissance during the Cuban Missile Crisis (General Aviation)

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: LINDA HOUGHOTN
Reviews.Content: I am so in love with my Kindle Fire HDX.  I watch movies, read books,browse the web, and much more.  The color is so vibrent and everything is crystal clear.  The size of the screen is great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Donna Peter "areader"
Reviews.Content: Due to unable to install "flash" there are alot of apps, games, and websites unavailable to me. The original kindle fire had on demand flash which worked very well. Had I known that the Kindle HDX 8.9 was not compatible with flash I would have purchased another brand and of tablet.

Reviews.Title: Grandmother loves kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Gifford
Reviews.Content: It's easy to share books with friends and grandchildren. Also the games are fun to play.  Also like the self published books

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Humanstreet
Reviews.Content: The screen display is gorgeous and it is so easy to use...I am on it daily for almost everything I do..as far as photographic display, you can easily impress  your friends...just take a look at a picture on Kindle...you'll never go back! Since I am retired I don't use the internet as much as I did, but with Kindle I easily access the internet...every site looks great!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: lily
Reviews.Content: I have the kindle hd 8.9 and love it so I decided to order the hdx 8.9 and am very happy with it.  The quality is fantastic, the screen is just beautiful the sound is great and the ease of use is fantastic.  Very happy with it so far.  Am enjoying learning about it.  Haven't used the mayday yet but just knowing that it is available if I need it is very reassuring!  Took advantage of the lower price, don't think I would have ordered it at the full price.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: PIC'S
Reviews.Author: Bev Brindle
Reviews.Content: It has wonderful pic's.Very vibrant and great color. Love the camera .Great features.Love how easy it is to share things

Reviews.Title: great tablet!
Reviews.Author: generic customer1
Reviews.Content: I had hesitated to purchase a tablet since I have a computer but I liked the idea of reading ebooks instead of having all these paper books. This tablet shows a very clear, crisp & sharp page, easy to read; & no problem to return to the exact place I had stopped reading. Easy & quick to purchase a book; & all the books are on this one tablet. I also enjoy watching all the TED talks on the Kindle; I have no problem hearing & understanding what is said. I'm glad I bought this Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Jerilyn L. Kozak
Reviews.Content: I find the kindle fire :8.9 very good.  The battery could use improvement.  It is difficult to plug in and in handy to see if the battery is fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Nicolia
Reviews.Content: Like so many things about the Kindle HDX: size, weight, clarity, etc.  What I do not like is having to pay the $15.00 to unsubscribe from those annoying ads.  Finally broke down and paid the piper as they were driving me nuts. Amazon certainly is rich enough to refund those of us who shelled out the shekles!

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: mary villella
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  Never disappointed. It live up to my expectations.. highly recommend it to anyone who is think I g of buying an iPad.  And kindle are very supportive.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Blessed mom
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and navigate through. Great way to bring your children close to view games, documentaries, and fun stuff. They cozy right up beside you!!

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I am just learning all the things I can do on my new Kindle Fire HDX.  Have lot more to learn, but I am mastering "one thing at a time", Thanks to the "help" button.

Reviews.Title: fire on fire
Reviews.Author: Charles Missler
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is light, extremely intuitive and has a great picture for videos. I had to use the help button on a Sunday morning and got a friendly knowledgeable person on my screen almost instantly. She was able to teach me how to do what I wanted to do in under a minute.

Reviews.Title: Because I liked my Kindle
Reviews.Author: sally cygan
Reviews.Content: I brought the Kindle Fire HD X because I all ready had a Kindle  and I wanted to be able to do more and play more games with it.

Reviews.Title: kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: mysterybuff
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the versatility of the Kindle 8.9 HDX.  We use it for news, reading,  games, weather and for email.  Games graphics are really clear.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX - PROBLEM WITH LOADING BOOKS
Reviews.Author: JACK BOGLE
Reviews.Content: Sometimes, my books do not load.  I've asked the MAYDAY people to correct it several times.  Other than that, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed using Kindle
Reviews.Author: Raymond B. Rice
Reviews.Content: It has just about taken the place of my PC, there are a few things I can't do with it, but otherwise it has been fun to have.

Reviews.Title: 8.9 Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: maryscopes
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I watched a t.v. show on it, and it is great.  I am still exploring all the things I can do with it.  I love the camera front and back.  I am like a kid with a new toy.  At 68, that is a good thing to have something new to play with.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Graffics
Reviews.Author: Barbara O. Cassel "Barcee"
Reviews.Content: This is my first android and I am loving it. Very convenient way to keep track of emails when travelling.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: d a
Reviews.Content: I was given the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" by my wonderful husband for Christmas, and I love it!  I had no idea how much I would enjoy it.  I have downloaded games, accessed my email, etc.  It is easy to use, it has a beautiful screen, I've accessed the online chat "help", which was also great.

Reviews.Title: Everyone should have one!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Received as a present this Christmas to replace my original Kindle and absolutely love it!  Find myself using it much more than a laptop purchased six months ago.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Dsaraceni
Reviews.Content: I love my ereaders and its even better when I have many uses for it like a tablet.  Its fast and delivers everything I ask of it.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: So Gorgeous
Reviews.Author: douglas fuller
Reviews.Content: Tablet was so pretty wrapped up in it's original plastic I barely wanted to take it out.For such a thin and light tablet it's super powerful and easily one of the best tablets on the market. ONLY thing limiting it from being the very best is the lack of Google Play access but that comes with the territory of a Amazon tablet. But you can sideload the majority of the apps from GP. They may lack the stability of the original app but most work.If you don't mind getting a skinnier access to Android apps and want a strong tablet, this is your guy!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ree
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my Kindle fire 7" for Christmas. I'm still trying to figure out all the apps that I can use on it. I do like how light it is without the cover and the battery lasts forever. One thing I was disappointed in and thought was false advertising was that you can't just put what is on your kindle on the TV with a swipe, even though I do have a wireless router and Blue-ray with the wireless connection. I come to find out that we need an adapter that costs another $58 to add to the TV's HDMI. This should have been boldly pointed out in the commercial. I learned about it through the Mayday button. That is one upgrade that I do love over the last Kindle. My husband now uses the "old" Kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: These are nearly PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. And, I use Amazon for so much more. I also have a dell xps that doesn't fit into my purse. We are so happy with our Kindles we can read, watch and purchase anything, anywhere we want. We wouldn't be caught without them, and we don't have to. Yeah !!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: amber anderson
Reviews.Content: I have been enjoying Kindle Fire.  I love how easy it is to use and I have been enjoying reading my books and watching various movies on it.Love the flex pay as well.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Colors and Easy to Read Books On It
Reviews.Author: visualpurple
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, and I'd recommend it to one and all. It's my favorite toy, my companion book-storage device, similar to my Kindle Paperwhite, but so very much more! Great definition and delicious colors ~ yum! I play my Majong game on it and Solitaire too, and I read, read, read! I use it more at home, and when I have to go out and waiting is involved, my Paperwhite is my choice device. But the colors on the Kindle Fire are unbeatable, and really happy-brain making. I'm very glad I got it, not one regret at all! (I especially love the Mayday option!)

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: PAMELA TUTOR
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle HDX 8.9 I had Samsung galaxy 8.0 this is way better more kid friendly ease of use the best

Reviews.Title: awesome crisp display
Reviews.Author: Toni Keeling
Reviews.Content: I've been able to work on the kindle, the apps are great, it also takes great pictures,with the editing functions , they come out wonderfull

Reviews.Title: LOVE it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My kids got me this for Christmas and I absolutely love it.  I had the original version and enjoyed it, but the upgrade is so much better that there is really no comparison.  I have some trouble seeing and the screen is very easy on my eyes.  I have Netflix and like being able to watch movies and Tv shows.  The only negative is some of the games I like to play on Facebook are not available.  At least I am unable to access them.

Reviews.Title: all I could ask for
Reviews.Author: AL
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the unit. As with anything new there is a learning curve however the mayday button works as advertised. And without an internet conection help was just a phone call away. I got the Kindle for Christmas and my wife got a Dell tablet. The Dell support was from India and they were very nice however each call for help took from 1/2 to 1 1/2 hours. I had a particular downloading problem with the Kindle. We got most of it cleared right away however there was a small lingering point. I tech did some research and called me back the next day. Not only that but he called back a week later to make sure everything was OK. I wish my doctor was as thoughtful.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My son loved this he was not expecting it and loves the bigger size and the color graphics are great.

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: Logachelle
Reviews.Content: What can I say it's awesome. I don't even use my lap top anymore especially with the Poetic keyboard case

Reviews.Title: 1st time tablet.
Reviews.Author: Rick&Carla Garduno
Reviews.Content: This is the first I have ever had a tablet, I'm still learning how to use it.  But  the HD screen is so remarkable to watch movies.  I recommend this table.

Reviews.Title: my opinion
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle. Pictures are so clear. The only thing I think could use improvement is the speed of the videos. It lags behind when playing.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE MY NEW KINDLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: T.A.P.
Reviews.Content: I had the Fire HDX 7 which I thought was great but heck this is even better! I love that it is bigger, it could be even bigger as far as I am concerned! Having vision problems the bigger the better for me! I love the fact I can take pics and video with it and they come out GRRRRRRRRRREAT!!! One more thing I wish I could get Google apps... The 2 should get together for us the consumers!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth S. Nahom
Reviews.Content: I had the smaller version and upgraded for the holidays. The sound is wonderful along with the picture. The only downside to this is reading a book outside. Sigh! Other than that it's  perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: C. Downs
Reviews.Content: This is the 6th Kindle I've bought and I love it. Each time I upgrade, I give my old one to someone in my family. My previous Kindle Fire I gave to my Uncle and he's constantly thanking me. He doesn't take his Bible to church anymore, he takes his KINDLE!

Reviews.Title: Kindle tablet
Reviews.Author: jnorthern
Reviews.Content: This tablet was everything I expected it to be. I am well pleased with the performance and reliability of your product. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: love my kindles
Reviews.Author: Terry L English
Reviews.Content: I'm a kindle fanatic! There is no need to say anything else.  I've purchased the original kindle, the kindle fire(loved the idea of color), and the kindle hdx.  Love them all, and I use all three!

Reviews.Title: Great better then my samsung 10.3
Reviews.Author: Curtis Thomas
Reviews.Content: Love the size, HD display only problem is I can only use Amazon apps. The sound for music and movies is the best.

Reviews.Title: fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: terry pletcher
Reviews.Content: outstanding.  it is eons beyond the first fire and works seamlessly.  my wife is so pleased.  keep up the excellent work.  we have a family that has a number of I pads and the hdx competes well at a much lower cost.

Reviews.Title: Totally Awsome!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Harp
Reviews.Content: I was betwwen the Kindle Fire and the iPad - I am very glad I bought the Kindle it is amazing!  It is by far the better value for the price.  The picture is outstanding and the speed is great and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Robert Eder
Reviews.Content: Great very easy to use and the screen is the right size to be able to read or play a game or to watch a movie on

Reviews.Title: This was for me and I really like it.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Lehmann
Reviews.Content: I sit in dr.s office quite abit and so thought this would help keep me occupied while I wait for my appt.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lesley
Reviews.Content: I really do love my kindle but I do wish I could print from it (other than my email) and I wish I was able to play my zumba videos. A lot of downloads consider the kindle as a mobile device and don't allow you to view there sites or videos. But it is very handy and very smart.  I use it a lot for recipes and learning its capabilities more so everyday.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful detail!
Reviews.Author: Diana Quinn
Reviews.Content: Thanks for offering a payment plan, that's the only way I was able to get this. I have two older android tablets that I eventually stopped using because of the need for a stylus. This Kindle Fire is so awesome, the view of my pictures is alone, almost worth the price of admission. My finger just glides through every screen, I finally understand the allure of a tablet. I subtracted one star for everyone's favorite complaint and that is the wish that Amazon figure out a way to work with Google Playstore. Even though I have found some nice apps and even a few android apps, I still want to share all my data with my phone and it's accounts.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This new version is a very lightweight device and my grandkids just love to watch their favorite videos on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX rating
Reviews.Author: Patty Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I don't like that I cant get adobe flash player and it limits some things I can do on my Kindle. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 2013 Edition by Sheila P.
Reviews.Author: Sheila D. Pendergraph
Reviews.Content: I gave this tablet a 5 stars because it's a great tablet and so easy to use once you get the hang of it. Everything is right at your fingertips and does many multiy tasking and the small size comes in handy and fits right in your purse. I got one for Christmas and haven't been able to put it down yet! I like the Kindle better than my PC and would highly recommend this to everyone and the price is right!!

Reviews.Title: Have wanted one
Reviews.Author: Jerry Hagan
Reviews.Content: I wanted the Kindle to take with me for reading books.  Have used several times so far  It is a little small for navigating some of the other areas though.  May be my eyesight or big fingers.  Haven't used all thefeatures yet, but I am satisfied with the main purpose of reading books.

Reviews.Title: BEST KINDLE YET !!!!
Reviews.Author: rkhhenry
Reviews.Content: There is nothing bad that can be said about this kindle, absolutely the best one yet. the commercials are spot on. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Christy Fisher
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this kindle. I compared it to the iPad and since I had previously owned a kindle fire and loved it I thought this was a better fit for me and I love it. It is so light and portable and the graphics are awesome!! I would recommend one of these to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I really like my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: Henrietta Jones-Nicholas
Reviews.Content: This tablet is really great for all my requirements and enjoyment.  It is easy to use.  My grandchildren use it all the time, basically, to play games.  Really great for the cost!!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: P. Defrange "okie"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and was my Christmas present this year.  The picture is great and the internet is fast.  I got the one that also can use 4G but have not hooked that up yet.  The wi-fi, however, works great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Diaz
Reviews.Content: Wow, the Kindle Fire HDX is super fast, great browising speeds, great brillance of the screen, easy navigating and all those apps from audiobooks to Amazon Prime instant viewing. The Kindle was for my jr. high kids who need more access to the internet for school. They are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: A gift I will always treasure
Reviews.Author: Carol B
Reviews.Content: With the online help you can't make a mistake.  The help is very knowledgeable and it is a pleasure to deal with them.  Courteous and efficient.  Once you get the help, the Kindle is relatively easy to operate.  Even if you are not computer savvy you cannot go wrong with this Kindle.  The help option takes all the stress out of using this Kindle. There is not words enough to describe the pleasure of using this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: J. Monahan
Reviews.Content: This is my first hand-held electronic device so I have nothing to compare it with.  It was a Christmas present and I love it.  It does morethan I ever thought it would and never ceases to amaze me.  I am still learning how to use it, but have no complaints so far.  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Long Battery Life
Reviews.Author: T. O. MaMairdon
Reviews.Content: I received the kindle fire right away in the mail.  After charging it, we started watching TV Shows & Movies on Amazon prime.  The picture was great and it was easy to get used to the user interface (I already own a iPad and a GS3 phone)

Reviews.Title: 1st Tablet
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: As I had never used a tablet, I was intimidated by the thought of learning this new technology.  The May day feature was a big selling point. However, the Fire HAD was so user friendly I haven't had need to use it as much as often as I had imagined.  It is still comforting to know that I can access help instantly. PRESTON

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Velasco
Reviews.Content: I love it! I use it everyday for school to study and store my notes. It comes in handy when I do not want to use my laptop.

Reviews.Title: its a ok tablet
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jones
Reviews.Content: Still trying to get use to the tablet haven't rely used its full potential. Have had a couple of stuck moments with the kindle which required a hard reboot. But still trying it out

Reviews.Title: A definitely must-have!
Reviews.Author: Cat Fox
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I had the opportunity to use Mayday (learning curve regarding the dual-facing camera) and it was amazing. Thank you Amazon! This device is a winner!

Reviews.Title: This product is very easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: D. Winkler
Reviews.Content: I see that the Kindle Fire HDX is cheaper than when  purchased it last month. Is there anyway I can get my purchase revised to reflect this savings? I would really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Glacia Parkins
Reviews.Content: I love that I have everything I want in this compact little screen and is so visually clear and the color is phenominal. Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't hear the sound very well
Reviews.Author: Sandra Marshall "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I can barely hear the sound even at maximum volume.  I had to get a separate speaker in order to hear it.

Reviews.Title: Stolen Kindle
Reviews.Author: William E Bidel
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. It would be extraordinary if Amazon wouldn't force you use THEIR web browser. If they would lift the block on the use of Firefox it would definitely raise the bar on this unit. If my Kindle had not been stolen i could give a more in depth evaluation of mine. I only had it a month.....not enough time to express my appreciation for its capabilities. I did especially like the camera. It did take wonderful pictures, and very quickly. No waiting between shots with high quality images.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Splettstoesser "Pamela"
Reviews.Content: Have the Kindle Fire but wanted the larger display and the connectivity of the 4G while traveling. Absolutely Love it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Myrtle Brooks
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for our handicap son. He loves it and so does his wife. I guess he has used it from Morning to night.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Mary F
Reviews.Content: I love having the bigger screen.  I still use my 7" when I have to recharge the HDX.  What a difference.  I have also used the Mayday button and the people I have talked to are always nice and have answered my questions and found out the answers on things they weren't sure of without putting me on hold.  It's just like talking face to face with a person.  I couldn't be more happy with a product.

Reviews.Title: love,love,love it!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am sitting on my couch writing this review on my kindle fire HDX 8.9". It has not been very far from my hand since I got it. I am not a technical person but have easily been able to purchase and read books, watched movies, downloaded apps, taken pictures and sent them to Facebook along with many other things with ease. The few things I was unsure of, like downloading a gift card, I access the May day button and someone is on my screen immediately to help.I can't say enough about this product. My 11 year old grandson has the kindle fire and told me this couldn't be any better but everyday after school he asks if I brought mine with me in the car so he can use it and a couple times he's called Mayday  himself. Everyone should buy one of these!!!!

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: E. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: easy to get started with .  I have the Paper White so most of my usage of the Fire HDX is for things relating to the internet and am still finding the ins and out of all that it is capable of doing.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Frank J Vaselewski
Reviews.Content: Had the original kindle this is my first tablet, my wife and daughter have the Ipad.  I think the kindle is every bit as good and maybe better in lots of ways.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: denise hoffman
Reviews.Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9. THIS IS THE FIRST NOTEBOOK I'VE EVER HAD. GREAT COLOR SCREEN. I LOVE THE SIZE. IT'S LIGHT WEIGHT. EASY TO USE. I LIKE THE MAYDAY OPTION BECAUSE I'M NOT GREAT WITH COMPUTERS.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: G. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Great clarity in the new technology for the display.  Easy to use with new features causing thetablet to offer help even when no help is requested.  I have a first generation Fire and loved it too.This one is better in every way, sound, display, function.  Love reading on it (my first love), but alsonow love going to the web, webcam, games, videos, my personal photos....Truly worth all myanxiety about getting a new reader/tablet.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: Michael Blanchard
Reviews.Content: This thing does everything I wanted it to do. Very powerful, quick, and the graphics are awesome. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: HobbyHorse
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love it... Far surpasses anything on the market. This is my 4th and they just keep getting better..

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Turek
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Easy to use and priced right.It has been a pleasure to do business with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Tery
Reviews.Content: I've had a Kindle Fire for 2 years and will still continue to use it.  But the Kindle Fired HDX 8.9 is so clear, easy to use and hours of fun.  The books and apps are so easy to download.  I am loving it.

Reviews.Title: netflix
Reviews.Author: Bruce "IT guy"
Reviews.Content: I have waited many years to buy a kindle and I finally made the decision and got one. I am disappointed in that there is no app or way to watch Netflix with the kindle fire hdx 8.9.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle HDX.
Reviews.Author: maggie k
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle. I absolutely don't know what I would do.without it. Super quality.Clear visuals and a wonderful investment.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Theresa M. Matowitz
Reviews.Content: Love the graphics and speed on this light weight tablet. Perfect gift for anyone in your household.  I have to hide it away from my kids and husband.

Reviews.Title: I am in love
Reviews.Author: Mary S. Joplin
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, it is everything I had hoped it would be.It is easily understood and easy to access everything.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Gary Tilt
Reviews.Content: Gave to my wife as a Christmas gift to replace her iPad.  She's thrilled so I am too. It says I have to add two more words so here are 13.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: s edwards
Reviews.Content: Even though I loved the kindle hd, there has been a significant amount of improvements made to the kindle hdx. The adding of the backward camera wa the greatest improvement that I enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Super reader
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, very readable in all lighting.  Love the Mayday.  Great improvement over the Fire.  The addition of Collections is a great tool.  Knowing which books I have read (when memory fails) is a great tool.  I am a person who like order and the "collection" part serves me well.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love my kindle!!
Reviews.Author: S. Handel
Reviews.Content: I am so much more than pleased with my HDX!! I had contemplated getting an iPad but I am so glad I looked at the reviews and the comparison . I had no trouble transferring all my stuff from my original Fire. The only thing lacking is the ability to use Flashplayer. Otherwise I am 1000% happy, happy, happy!!!

Reviews.Title: I got mine, what are you waiting for? :-)
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: The HD quality is amazing,  love the 8.9" screen and the one touch help with face talk is awesome, thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love It except it does not support Adobe Flash
Reviews.Author: Ruby "RNR "history fan""
Reviews.Content: Pictures are sharp & clear. Wish there was a Zoom Feature.Not supporting Adobe Flash Player is the biggest letdown. I can't view anyone's video's on facebook. The bigger screen is much better and the wi-fi & Verizon support is great.

Reviews.Title: Love the NEW Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: M. Liebergot
Reviews.Content: This is now my 3rd Kindle Fire.I had originally owned the "7" original and 2nd generation Kindle Fire's.I decided that I wanted to upgrade to the larger screen so I purchased the latest 32GB "8.9" Kindle Fire HDX.While I do love the larger screen size, I have to also say that I was rather impressed at how much thinner the new Kindle Fire HDX was.  And the screen resolution is phenomenal.While some have complained that they can't run non-Kindle Fire apps on it. I have found the opposite, as there are several sites out there that let you load other Android apps and browsers on it, without the need to jail break your unit. As a result I use my Kindle Fire HDX for what it does best, such as watch movies, and listen to music, as well as do work on it as well using office apps and the like.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my kindle fire HDX 8.9. The size is perfect (I'm not a big fan of smaller tablets) and the touch screen is just as responsive as that of an iPad. Although there is a smaller pool of apps to choose from, this is made up for by the capabilities it has regarding purchasing and reading books/magazines (which is what kindles were made for in the first place!). It is especially ideal for the college student who doesn't want to buy huge expensive textbooks to carry around. If you are looking for a tablet to replace your printed books/magazines and that has all the capabilities of an iPad for a great price, I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: Terry Brooks fan
Reviews.Content: I had been borrowing my husband,s IPad and I have the Kindle DX with the keyboard at the bottom. My Kindle started doing some crazy things, rebooting itself when I was reading a book, refusing to go online when I wanted to access the store, so I thought it was time for an upgrade.  I first considered the Kindle Fire because I already had a Kindle but after the commercial on TV, I had to have one.  Best decision I made.  Easy to use, beautiful screen quality.  I didn't even know it works the same as any tablet so researching things online has been great.

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: wolfmoon
Reviews.Content: Was the best Christmas gift. My daughter was glad I got the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 too, because she got my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  I had the original Kindle Fire and thought it was great.  But this Kindle Fire HDX has far exceeded my expectations.  And my Grandson is loving my old Kindle because it is still working great!!  I highly recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Right choice
Reviews.Author: Janet Pace
Reviews.Content: I have only had the new Kindle for a week, and I am impressed with it so far. I was afraid that the web browser would not work very well, but it has worked great. I took it to my local public library and they helped me get set up to download books and audio books. I have done both and I am happy with the experience. It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Display
Reviews.Author: richk
Reviews.Content: Great tablet. It does everything I require. Ease of use. Silk browser smooth & fast. Only negative is app store which is why I gave 4 stars. There is no reason not to let us use google play for better selection of apps.

Reviews.Title: so far so good, but not too much different from iPad
Reviews.Author: duck
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to it and learning how to use it.  Love the size, clarity and especially the weight.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is the best gift ever!
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: Just got my kindle and it is amazing. I absolutely love it. My next order will be books and a cover so I can take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: great for the whole family
Reviews.Author: Lynda Vance
Reviews.Content: We love our kindle.  The whole family uses it. The parental controls are great. We use it from checking emails, playing games to surfing the net.

Reviews.Title: great for the whole family
Reviews.Author: Lynda Vance
Reviews.Content: We love our kindle.  The whole family uses it. The parental controls are great. We use it from checking emails, playing games to surfing the net.

Reviews.Title: Pro
Reviews.Author: Patty Lovelace
Reviews.Content: Enjoying my Kindle HDX 8.9. Love the camera ability. Power last longer. Like the ability to talk with someone about the return I have on covers because I ordered the wrong size.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIRE HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Jill Nagle
Reviews.Content: I have looked for two years at all the tablets as they appeared on the store shelves. This is the first tablet that did everything I wanted and is fast. The battery lasts for 12 hours just like advertised. It is my "go to" minny computer and my reader all in one. I appreciate the thought that went into all the desin features. Particularly the reading features. Now I can adjust the back lighting to white or black, zoom in and out or c change the text font very quickly and easily. I am very happy with my new toy. Oh, did I mention how much I enjoy watching movies on my Kindle. And it takes a very clear photo from front or back. Thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love everything about it!
Reviews.Author: Rob Hanna
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love everything about it! Easy to use, great resolution, lightweight! So easy to download books, apps, etc. I take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: God bless America!
Reviews.Author: Petr
Reviews.Content: Engineering masterpiece. For such price this is the best tablet on market. Easy to use, good battery life, awesome screen and amazon features!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: William Sample
Reviews.Content: Fire has a fantastic display. Battery life is OK about 3 days with normal use. App store has most of the ones your Android phone would have. Seems to be as useful as IPad at cheaper price. Only negative is no GPS.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it, BUT....
Reviews.Author: Shoe lover
Reviews.Content: They took away the micro HDMI port on the new HDX!! It's a pain that I have NO WAY to hook my Kindle up to my TV to watch Netflix or shows on Amazon Prime.. luckily my daughter has a Fire HD that still has the port, but I have to fight to get it away from her to watch something... BAD idea to take the micro HDMI port away!! Even if they put it back on the next generation it doesn't do me any good!!! :-(

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Jean McCOmb
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle! I recommended this tablet to a friend who is not computer savvy . She was skeptical to buy this tablet. I told her how easy this tablet was to use right out of the box. How brilliant the colors were and how easy it was to get apps and shop at her favorite online stores. She bought the tablet and called me raving about this tablet! She even uses the built in camera for taking photos. I love the fact that this tablet is light weight. I like this tablet even more than my iPad. I have both the 7 inch tablet which I use for late night surfing in bed and the 8.9 Kindle. So if you are in the market for a great tablet don't hesitate to get the Kindle HDX, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Although I haven't used all the features yet, like movie streaming or watching my favorite tv shows, I give the Kindle Fire an excellent rating.  I also own an android tablet and between the 2 - I'll take the Kindle every time.  Picture quality is great and the speakers on the Kindle are better than the ones on the tablet.  I had the smaller Kindle Fire, which I also loved.  I "traded up" so I could have a bigger screen.  The battery life is very good.  I only have to recharge every 3 days or so, the tablet - every day.  Yet, I use the Kindle more often.  When I bought my original Kindle Fire, I also bought one for my son (who is an Apple user) and he loves it.  I recommend the Kindle Fire (smaller and larger screen) to everyone in the market for a quality tablet.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Esther Neumann
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love  my Kindle Fire HDX! I use it every single day. I have owned other tablets in the past, and this is by far my favorite.

Reviews.Title: no flash player
Reviews.Author: burgs6
Reviews.Content: I received as a gift. I really love it. It's simple and very user friendly. Why not give it 5? No flash player. Adobe does not work and it limits the websites you can use. If they fixed that problem it would be a lot better. I haven't found a solution that works for me. But it's great other than that.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular
Reviews.Author: TRTUC
Reviews.Content: You didn't put up enough stars...I would clearly give Kindle Fire HDX a 7 or 8.  This is one of the finest pieces of electronic equipment that I have come across through the "maze" of all that is out there. Beautiful crystal clear images, spectacular sound quality, easy to use, and overall beautifully designed for the user!I usually am not moved to critique products in which I have invested my hard earned dollars, but in this case I am making an exception.  This product is definitely worth the investment.  Oh by the way, if you order one of these instruments be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime membership. Another good investment.Thanks for allowing me to comment.TRTUC

Reviews.Title: kindle fire Hdx
Reviews.Author: Savoria Coles
Reviews.Content: I already had the kindle fire and my son purchased the kindle fire HDX as a Christmas gift. I love it now I'm able to take photos and so much more. I could not have received a better gift.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Beverly Bennett
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!  I bought mine without special offers.  The colors are so accurate and bright.  The web browser is so much quicker.  Wonderful~~

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Debbie Minarcik
Reviews.Content: Great product. Support is great and have had no problems with downloading games. Books are just as easy and the adjustable backgrounds and type size works great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Katrina Ruckle
Reviews.Content: I have no problems at all with the Kindle Fire HDX that I purchased in December.The problem I had was there was no information on how to use the Kindle beyondhow to turn it on, unlock the screen, power it up and use the camera.  I had noidea how to find any other information on use.  I would have really appreciateda book or booklet on where to find the more advanced ways to use my Kindle. Onthe other hand, Amazon's customer service is very reliable and knowledgeable.I've never had a problem that a quick phone call to customer service hasn't immediatelytaken care of.  Since my phone call, things have definitely gotten easier and more fun.I will continue to shop at and recommend Amazon.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: nancy ibendahl
Reviews.Content: so fare love my kindle fire!  good size and has a lot of workability and function.  i would recommend it

Reviews.Title: outstanding product and fast delivery
Reviews.Author: jnaki
Reviews.Content: hello,  we ordered an original kindle in 2012.  we never opened the box and it stood around for a week.  relatives were all hyped on their kindle readers and wanted us to get one.  finally we sent it back.  no use for a reader as we are avid book readers.  but, we go through books rapidly and the used book store always had a large amount of our new books back in their stock.  this new kindle is better for us now as we are ready to use it.  we are not pressured into getting something that was pushed on us just to have something new.  the new 8.9 screen is outstanding in all lighting situations. touch a word and instantly it gives the meaning, usage, references to other literary works.  great for those that are english learners, too.  the kindle 8.9 hdx gives one accessibility to all kinds of books instantly, no large bookcase is needed for storage of quickly read books. there is an endless supply of books online anytime.  better than the paperwhite for us because it also has a color screen, search engine for web browsing, games, etc.  so far, it is only used for reading.  the light is perfect to read in the dark.  it is very user friendly.  now the used book store is not on our itinerary to give them our endless supply of quickly read new books... poor guys...we love the kindle and amazon service for the kindle.  yrmv  great product and service...yea

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire is Great!
Reviews.Author: Spider lover
Reviews.Content: I love this device. It's size is manageable, screen clear, content exceptional. While I am still a fan of paper books, for on-the-go stuff this can't be beat. And with magazines, internet content and games - it is a pleasure and joy to play with.

Reviews.Title: Loved my original Kindle Fire...and love this one even more!
Reviews.Author: jenn
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tablet is amazing! Also, love the help button. Saved me from having to call/email customer service when I had a few issues with video downloads. The folks on the other end of the help button were able to fix it almost instantly. Great product!

Reviews.Title: totally satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Bob Ness
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied.the May day button is the greatest,and the camera takes sharp,clear pics very essay to share with friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Agler
Reviews.Content: This has been all I had hoped for....I had loved my original kindle fire, but this unit is so much more and the screen is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: marie walker
Reviews.Content: so far so good. only had it for several weeks Like to look at books and play games. Spider solitaire are the best!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Karen Updegraff
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle HDX everyday.  The only thing I do not like about it is I have issues getting on some of the sites that require adobe flashplayer.  I don't think I should have to purchase this.  The clarity is great and the weight of it is as advertised.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love love my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Julie Rettig
Reviews.Content: I love love my new kindle and I haven't even scratched the surface of what I can do with it

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Norma Cooksey "nc"
Reviews.Content: A gift to my husband for Christmas.  He is using it more and enjoying it more.  It does seem to need charging very quickly but this is only a minor inconvenience.  We would like to have received more instructions, an abbreviated manual perhaps, to be able to make use of all its capabilities.  It is a super little tablet!  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Spoiled
Reviews.Author: Guy Kincaid
Reviews.Content: I chose the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the aversion I have to pay more just because a product has an "I" in the name.  Also it's lighter and has already spoiled me to the ease of getting new books to read.  Can't hardly pick up an actual book anymore.

Reviews.Title: great Christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: Marilee Mcbride
Reviews.Content: I love it the only thing I  have any problem is you can only download certain games, have some on Facebook I would like to have on the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 and it is no contest when it comes to my Kindle it's faster and smoother than even the iPad air I checked into first.

Reviews.Title: The kindle rocks
Reviews.Author: Brandon Reese
Reviews.Content: I love every thing on the kindle it's awesome and also how you get some of the apps . My son loves it.

Reviews.Title: It's Great! I love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the Fire which I had for 2 years and used it every day. I went to the FireHDX 8.9  for the bigger screen and do not regret it. I have found it just as easy to use and love the larger screen without adding any weight. My only complaint is so far, I have not found a way to delete a page of email messages at one time. This I could do on my fire.It is a great tablet for my uses and would recommend it to anyone who likes to read.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Leslie Becker
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and I absolutely love it. I had a Fire HD 8.9 and was very happy with it but I was excited about the changes they made with the HDX so I just had to have one. The graphics are amazing and I am very happy with the placement of the power and volume buttons. Also, because of the slimmer profile and the lighter weight it is much nicer to hold. I'm already looking forward to the next model upgrade. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: I take it everywhere!
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "mjsw"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic table/reader. There are more than ample apps for what ever your interests are. And they are reasonably priced and often free! I get my news, my games and my books all in one device. The only negative item I have found is you can not use any application that uses Flash. And some videos won't play on it. For what it DOES do, it out weights the couple of things it doesn't do.

Reviews.Title: im in love!!
Reviews.Author: raquel
Reviews.Content: this is my 3rd kindle and I love it!!!  its nice and slim.  I can now enjoy my movies. thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: cboo1970
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to say except I love my HDX. I use it more than my computer and I use it for everything. If you are looking for a tablet, you can't go wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: Love at First Sight!
Reviews.Author: Carol Weeks "Carol Weeks Speaks!"
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle was 2nd generation, so this was quite a change for me.  The colors are brilliant.  I keep expecting something I'm watching to jump out into my lap!  Love the apps.  Battery charge is very good, but of course, games eat up the battery pretty quickly.  I was able to load my e-mail, facebook, twitter, etc. very easily.  Books are wonderful to read and I love the highlight function.  I like the size of it and the weight.  I bought a beautiful Belkin cover that fits it perfectly.  I bought the cover in the Kindle store.  The speed is incredible. It is instantly on and ready to go.  The camera takes excellent pictures, although it's a bit bulky to actually take the pictures.  I'm used to a much smaller phone with camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Timothy D Parker
Reviews.Content: Great device great hardware software is restrictive for customization....home screen you can't change the background, permanently change the carousel or turn it off. I don't mind the special offers but they don't open the device to it's fullest. If you have a decent idea what you want to do in a tablet and know how to use it don't get this one. If you want a tablet that just works "Mac style" with out the cost get this one. If you have enough devices to do what you want with any how (like myself) this is a great addition to the arsenal.

Reviews.Title: love kindle
Reviews.Author: roberta laughlin
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle. it does more then I realize. my reading experience has been wonderful. I love the apps and I can play my games,

Reviews.Title: The superior Kindle has finally arrived!
Reviews.Author: RST10
Reviews.Content: I've kept tabs on all the Kindles and iPads and many of the Androids since tablets came out. I'm a bit of an enthusiast and I'm an IT guy, so people come to me for advise. I've had one in each generation for a while now.I can finally say that the superior Kindle has arrived. This is the first Kindle Fire that has a screen truly better than anything else in the mainstream market. It is clear, bright, infinitely crisp and perfectly meant for reading. Reading on this may actually be better than a real book. I've liked other Kindles and iPads, but for the pure reading enthusiast this is a fantastic device.Thin, light, fast. Fast charging. Feels good in the hands. I have no hesitation to recommend this, though I did give it 4 stars instead of 5.I still want to challenge Amazon to keep innovating on their "home screen". I feel like they can do more, and do better. It's a small thing, but I think it really says a lot about the device to the user, and I feel like the current home screen, which hasn't changed much since Kindle Fires came to be, undersells the power of the device, but doesn't better sell any single function.That all being said, I have never been more strongly in support of the Kindle Fire line, especially for those who love Amazon and are huge readers.

Reviews.Title: happy,happy,
Reviews.Author: J. NELSON
Reviews.Content: I have nerve damage in left hand, I have the kindle fire,but as soon as I read this one was lighter ,I gave it a chance and glad I did. I am not as comp, or electronic savy. I mainly read,play games , surf internet. I love the turn on button and volume controls on the back. i can work them just by touch. i have trouble with reading long periods of time. so i do the whispersync ,where you can switch between reading and listening. i like where the speakers are on the top. i think i can hear my audio books better. i haven't had to use mayday button yet. picture is very clear.and yes it is a lot lighter , so i would say yes give this a try is as good as people say..
